[\[22a.1\]]'dul ba la bstod pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang /_/'dul ba thos par 'gyur ba dang /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnyed dka' ste/_/sgrub pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde/_/chos bstan pa yang bde ba yin/_/
[\[22a.2\]]dge 'dun mthun pa bde ba ste/_/mthun pa rnams kyi dka' thub bde/_/'phags pa rnams ni mthong ba bde/_/dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa bde/_/byis pa rnams ni ma mthong na/_/rtag tu bde ba nyid du 'gyur/_/tshul khrims ldan pa mthong ba bde/_/mang du thos pa mthong 
[\[22a.3\]]ba bde/_/yang srid rnam par grol ba yi/_/dgra bcom pa dag mthong ba bde/_/'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bde/_/chos la goms pa'i skye bo bde/_/shes rab thob par gyur pa bde/_/nga 'o nga rgyal zad pa bde/_/nges par byas shing dbang po thul ba dag_/dgon pa zhi 
[\[22a.4\]]ba rnams su rgas gyur dang /_/mang du thos pa nags kyi nang dag tu/_/lang tsho yol ba rnams kyis gnas pa bde/_/shAkya seng ge de la ni/_/sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te/_/'dul ba rab tu gdon par byas/_/gdul ba'i don du nga la nyon/_/thos nas drang srong chen po 
[\[22a.5\]]yis/_/ji skad gsungs bzhin bsgrub bya zhing /_/kha na ma tho phra rnams la/_/rtul cing byed pa nyid du gyis/_/rtag tu 'bad pas bda' ba yi/_/sems rta kha blan dka' ba la/_/mthun pa gzer rnon brgya pa yi/_/srab ni 'dul ba 'di yin no/_/che ba gang dag 
[\[22a.6\]]ngag tsam gyis/_/ldog cing mtshams las mi 'da' ba/_/de dag mi rta bzang po ste/_/nyon mongs g.yul las nges rgal 'gyur/_/su la srab 'di med pa dang /_/nam du'ang 'dod par mi 'gyur ba/_/de dag nyon mongs g.yul gyis dkrugs/_/'jog bral 
[\[22a.7\]]rnam par 'khyam par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun lo bcu gnyis su skyon med cing chu bur med la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa yang mdor bsdus te/_sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste/_/dge ba phun 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]sum tshogs par bya/_/rang gis sems ni yongs su gdul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste/_/ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin/_/yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste/_/thams cad du ni sdom pa legs/_/kun du bsdams pa'i 
[\[22b.2\]]dge slong ni/_/sdug bsngal kun las rab tu 'grol/_/ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid kyis rab bsdams te/_/lus kyi mi dge ba dag mi byed cing /_/las lam gsum po 'di dag rab sbyangs nas/_/drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes ston par gyur to/_/
[\[22b.3\]]lo bcu gsum la bab pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed dag na ka lan da ka'i grong na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na ka lan da ka'i grong na ka lan da ka'i bu bzang byin zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/_yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnams thos kyi 
[\[22b.4\]]bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/_chos dang dge 'dun 
[\[22b.5\]]la mngon par dad/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing /_des srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las phyir log_/ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_
[\[22b.6\]]bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las phyir log go/_/de dad pa snga ma de nyid rjes su spel zhing skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho 
[\[22b.7\]]nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas 'di lta ste/_sngon khyim pa bzhin du nye du rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas so/_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]ba la rab tu byung nas 'di lta ste/_sngon khyim pa bzhin du nye du rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa ni bdag gis ma rnyed de rnyed pa ma yin zhing nyes pa rnyed de legs pa rnyed pa ma yin gyis/_bdag nye du rnams dang 'bral ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs 
[\[23a.2\]]te ljongs rgyur 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin nye du rnams dang 'bral ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyur song ngo /_/de'i tshe na mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu 
[\[23a.3\]]dag la zas sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag lta la smos kyang ci dgos pa byung ngo /_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin 'di snyam du sems te/_da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la 
[\[23a.4\]]zas sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag lta la smos kyang ci dgos pa byung la/_bdag la nye du longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dag yod pas bdag ka lan da ka'i grong du song ste/_nye du rnams kyi gan du song la dge 'dun la zas dag sbyor du gzhug cing dge 
[\[23a.5\]]'dun la skyo ma dag dang /_thug pa'i btung ba dag dang /_rtag res 'khor dag dang /_mgron du bos pa dag dang /_brgyad ston dang /_bcu bzhi ston dang /_nya ston dang /_spyan gzigs phran tshegs phran tshegs sbyor du gzhug go snyam mo/_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan 
[\[23a.6\]]pa bzang byin ljongs su ci dgar 'dug nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_ka lan da ka'i grong ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na mthar gyis rgyu ba'i tshe ka lan da ka'i grong du phyin nas ka lan da ka'i grong na dgon pa'i spyil bu na gnas so/_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang 
[\[23a.7\]]ldan pa bzang byin nye du rnams kyi gan du song ste phyin nas de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod de/_dge 'dun la zas dag sbyor du 'dzud cing /_dge 'dun la skyo ma dag dang /_thug pa'i btung ba dag dang /_rtag res 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]'khor dag dang /_mgron du bos pa dag dang /_brgyad ston dang /_bcu bzhi ston dang /_nya ston dang /_spyan gzigs phran tshegs phran tshegs sbyor du 'dzud do/_/de'i tshe na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin dgon pa pa/_chos gos gsum pa/_phyag dar khrod pa/_bsod 
[\[23b.2\]]snyoms pa mthar chags kyis rgyu bar gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na dang po kho nar dge slong gi dge 'dun thug pa bsod pas tshim par byas nas snga dro sham thabs bgos te/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas ka lan da ka'i grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 
[\[23b.3\]]mthar gyis ka lan da ka'i grong du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i tshe rang gi khyim du phyin to/_/de rang gi khyim nas sbyin pa ma thob/_phyir gtong ba ma thob par myur ba myur bar phyir song ngo /_/de'i tshe na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma bya ba 'ga' zhig la phyi rol du song bar 
[\[23b.4\]]gyur to/_/bran mo rnying pa rgan mo zhig gis ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin rang gi khyim nas sbyin pa ma thob/_phyir gtong ba ma thob par myur ba myur bar phyir song ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[23b.5\]]nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/jo mo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/jo co bzang byin 'phyi ba 'phyi bar rang gi khab du byon nas/_de rang gi khab nas sbyin pa ma brnyes/_slar gtong ba ma brnyes par myur ba myur bar slar song ngo /_/de nas 
[\[23b.6\]]ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma ma la ka lan da ka'i bu bzang byin 'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba 'am/_rnam par 'khyam 'dod par gyur cing dge sbyong gi tshul don du mi gnyer ba'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul gyis sgyid lug 
[\[23b.7\]]pa'am/_mus byung ba'am/_the tshom za ba'am/_smod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 'dod pa'am/_cig tu ma gyur grang snyam du sems shing rig nas ka lan da ka'i grong nas byung ste/_ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ka 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu bzang byin gal te khyod 'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba'am/_rnam par 'khyam 'dod cing dge sbyong gi tshul don du mi gnyer ba'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul gyis sgyid lug pa'am/_mus byung 
[\[24a.2\]]ba'am/_the tshom za ba'am/_smod pa'am/_khyod dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 'dod pa lta na/_bu bzang byin bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi nor zhes bya ba'am/_bud med kyi bag rdzangs zhes bya ba'am/_bud med dbang ba'i rdzas zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni khyod kyi ma'i dbyig 
[\[24a.3\]]dang /_gser gyi phung po chen po gang la mtha' gcig na 'greng ba'i mis mtha' gcig na 'dug pa'i mi mi mthong la/_mtha' gcig na 'dug pa'i mis mtha' gcig na 'greng ba'i mi mi mthong ba yin te/_'di ni khyod kyi ma'i yin no/_/gzhan yang khyod kyi pha'i dbyig dang /_gser 
[\[24a.4\]]mtshan ma btab pa yang brgya phrag du ma dang /_stong phrag du ma dang /_brgya stong phrag du ma dag yod na gzhan dang pha la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bu bzang byin tshur shog_/khyod 'dug la 'dod pa la yang longs spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig_/bsod nams 
[\[24a.5\]]dag kyang gyis shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yum bdag ni 'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba'am/_rnam par 'khyam 'tshal zhing dge sbyong gi tshul don du mi gnyer ba'am/_dge 
[\[24a.6\]]sbyong gi tshul gyis sgyid lug pa'am/_mus byung ba'am/_the tshom 'tshal ba'am/_smod pa'am/_bdag dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong bar mi byed do/_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis de skad byas kyang 
[\[24a.7\]]bu bzang byin phyir bzlog par ma nus kyis bdag khyim du song la 'di'i bag sar sbed par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma khyim du song ste mna' ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sru khyod gang gi tshe dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]pa de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig_/ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi sngon gyi chung mas yum bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgyug mo las mnyan to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi sngon gyi chung ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang 
[\[24b.2\]]ldan par gyur nas/_ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yum ngan bu dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur na bdag gis ci bgyi ba de mkhyen 
[\[24b.3\]]par mdzod cig_/sru de'i phyir khyod kyis bsku mnye ji lta bus bsku mnye byas pa dang /_khrus ji lta bus khrus byas pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_rgyan ji lta bu dag gis brgyan na bu bzang byin sngon khyim pa nyid na dga' ba dang /_
[\[24b.4\]]yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i bsku mnyes bsku mnye gyis shig_/de lta bu'i khrus kyis khrus gyis shig_/de lta bu'i dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dag gis brgyan par gyis shig_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang 
[\[24b.5\]]ldan pa bzang byin gyi sngon gyi chung mas sgyug mo las mnyan te sku mnye ji lta bus bsku mnye byas pa dang /_khrus ji lta bus khrus byas pa dang /_dri dang phreng ba rgyu dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_rgyan ji lta bu dag gis brgyan na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[24b.6\]]bzang byin sngon khyim pa nyid na dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i bsku mnyes bsku mnye byas/_de lta bu'i khrus kyis khrus byas/_de lta bu'i dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dag gis brgyan nas ka lan da ka'i 
[\[24b.7\]]bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yum ngan bu 'di 'dra na bdag gis ci zhig bgyi/_de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma mna' ma dang shing 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]rta gcig tu zhugs te ka lan da ka'i grong nas byung nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bzhon pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song ste/_bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa dag kho nas ka lan da ka'i 
[\[25a.2\]]bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi drung du song ngo /_/de'i tshe na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gnas kyi phyi rol bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chags so/_/ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi mas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin thag ring po kho na 
[\[25a.3\]]nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu bzang byin gal te khyod mi 'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba'am/_rnam par 'khyam 
[\[25a.4\]]'dod par mi 'gyur zhing /_dge sbyong gi tshul don du mi gnyer ba ma yin pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul gyis sgyid lug pa ma yin pa'am/_mus byung ba ma yin pa'am/_the tshom za ba ma yin pa'am/_smod pa ma yin pa'am/_khyod dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 
[\[25a.5\]]'dod pa ma yin pa lta na/_bu khyod kyi bag sar 'di dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur gyis 'di la sa bon gyi chos cung zhig rjes su byin cig_/khyod la bu med pa'i phyir dbang ba'i rdzas thams cad de bzhin du'am/_ji ltar yang rung bas rgyal pos dbang 
[\[25a.6\]]du byas par gyur na mi rung ngo /_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyis sngar bslab pa'i gzhi ma bcas shing /_nyes pa ma mthong la bud med kyi yul gzhon nu kha dog bzang ba chags par 'gyur ba mthong nas 'dod chags kyis sems zil gyis non cing 
[\[25a.7\]]de 'dod chags kyis sems zil gyis non pas yongs su gdung ba'i lus dang /_yongs su gdung ba'i sems dang ldan zhing /_de yongs su gdung bzhin pa'i lus dang yongs su gdung bzhin pa'i sems kyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yum bdag gis 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]de ltar bgyir rung ngam/_bu bzang byin 'di lta ste/_sa bon gyi chos la brten nas shin tu rung ngo /_/de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyis ma las mnyan te sngon gyi chung ma'i lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste phyogs gcig tu song nas chos gos 
[\[25b.2\]]dag bzhag ste/_de dang lhan cig tu mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos lan gnyis lan gsum du bsten te/_sems can srid pa tha ma pa/_spyod pa tshol ba/_thar pa'i snying po bzung ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa la phyogs pa/_'khor ba las phyir 
[\[25b.3\]]phyogs pa/_srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba don du mi gnyer ba lus tha ma 'dzin pa zhig kyang lha'i ris bzang po zhig nas shi 'phos te/_de'i skye dgu'i bdag mo'i mngal du zhugs so/_/bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can 
[\[25b.4\]]la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /_mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa 
[\[25b.5\]]shes pa dang /_khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la/_gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o/_/de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas sgyug mo la smras pa/_yum mkhyen par mdzod cig_/
[\[25b.6\]]bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pas nges par khye'ur 'gyur ro/_/de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas 'di skad ces/_kho mo yun ring po nas mngon par dad pa'i tsha bo ngo mthong ba dang /_kho mo dang 
[\[25b.7\]]mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /_kho mo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /_gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /_bgo skal la spyod pa dang /_kho mo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu'am/_
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams kyang byas nas/_'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon bshad pa byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par byed do/_/de la sems can 
[\[26a.2\]]zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste/_mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs par grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /_sman pas bcas pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /_ha cang mi 
[\[26a.3\]]skyur ba dang /_ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang /_ha cang mi mngar ba dang /_ha cang mi tsha ba dang /_ha cang mi bska ba dang /_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_
[\[26a.4\]]rgyan gyis bklubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /_khri nas khrir dang /_khri'u nas khri'u dang /_shod kyi sa gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /_des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'jug 
[\[26a.5\]]go/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_gsal ba/_gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_
[\[26a.6\]]sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhig byung ngo /_/de nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir khye'u 'di sa bon 
[\[26a.7\]]gyi chos la brten te rnyed pa de'i phyir khye'u'i ming sa bon pa zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming sa bon pa zhes bya bar btags so/_/khye'u sa bon pa ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/_/de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du 
[\[26b.2\]]myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_gzhug pa dang /_gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing 'byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mkhas 
[\[26b.3\]]pa dang /_spyod pa gsal ba dang /_brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste/_rin po che brtag pa dang /_gzhi brtag pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_shing brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_bud med brtag pa dang /_skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par 
[\[26b.4\]]gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing des srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las phyir log_/ma byin 
[\[26b.5\]]par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las phyir log 
[\[26b.6\]]go/_/de pha las byung ba'i dad pa snga ma de nyid rjes su spel zhing legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas/_khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de de ltar rab tu 
[\[26b.7\]]byung nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na/_rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par 
[\[27a.2\]]spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan 
[\[27a.3\]]bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha 
[\[27a.4\]]rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa bon pas dgra bcom pa thob cing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba so sor yang dag par rig pa na/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_chos 
[\[27a.5\]]rnams las ni skal ba thob/_/yab kyi dkor gyis bdag mi stod/_/bdag gis ha cang 'phyi nas shes/_/bdag ni chung dus shin tu 'das/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na bzhugs shing nyan thos rnams la/_'dod 
[\[27a.6\]]chags 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston to/_/zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes 
[\[27a.7\]]rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston to/_/de'i tshe na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin 'khor de nyid du 'dug cing mthun par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]rnam par grol ba'i chos ston pa dang /_zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston pa de lta de ltar ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin 
[\[27b.2\]]cung zad 'gyod par gyur/_rnam par 'gyod par gyur/_rab tu 'gyod par gyur cing 'dug la/_'gyod pa dang ldan/_'gyod pa thob cang mi smra bar gyur/_yul yul por gyur/_phrag pa klod/_gdong smad/_spobs pa med/_sems khong du chud cing 'dug 
[\[27b.3\]]go/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas nyul zhing rgyu ba na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi gnas ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[27b.4\]]ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin khyod 
[\[27b.5\]]sngon chad dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag mthong na bshes pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgrog gu can dang /_mchil 
[\[27b.6\]]lham dag len par byed na/_khyod da ltar dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag mthong na cung zad 'gyod par gyur/_rnam par 'gyod par gyur/_rab tu 'gyod par gyur cing 'dug la/_'gyod pa dang ldan/_'gyod pa thob cang mi smra bar gyur/_yul yul por gyur/_
[\[27b.7\]]phrag pa klod/_gdong smad/_spobs pa med/_sems khong du chud cing 'dug na/_tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin da ltar khyod la lus kyi gnod pa'am/_sems kyi yongs su gdung ba 'ga' zhig med grang /_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la da ltar lus kyi gnod pa ni 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'ga' yang med mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag la sems kyi yongs su gdung ba yod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi sems kyi yongs su gdung ba gang yin/_des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong de dag de las mngon par 
[\[28a.2\]]bstod par yang mi byed/_phyir zlog par yang mi byed cing mngon par bstod pa yang ma byas/_phyir zlog par yang ma byas par stan dag las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[28a.3\]]'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis skabs de rgyas par gsol to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[28a.4\]]to/_/dge slong dag zag pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos mang po rnams kyi dang po ni ka lan da ka'i bu bzang byin gyis 'di lta ste/_mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen gyis byas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la 
[\[28a.5\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang gnyis gzigs pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun sdud par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi kun shes pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir dang /_ngas 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi legs 
[\[28a.6\]]par bcas par 'gyur ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa/_mkhyen kyang mi rmed pa/_dus su rmed pa/_dus las yol bar mi rmed pa/_don dang ldan pa rmed pa/_don dang mi ldan pa mi 
[\[28a.7\]]rmed pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ka lan da ka'i 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin la rmas pa/_bzang byin khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa 
[\[28b.2\]]ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/bzang byin ngas 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_gti mug 'dod chags 
[\[28b.3\]]dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos bstan pa la khyod kyis ci'i phyir mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur mi gti mug can khyod kyis sbrul nag po dug myur du khyab pa/_dug drag pa/_dug rno ba'i khar rang gi yan 
[\[28b.4\]]lag gi rnam pa bcug par gyur pa ni bla'i/_de ltar gyur pas bud med kyi yul la ni ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na 
[\[28b.5\]]phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_'di lta ste/_dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir dang /_dge 'dun legs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dge 'dun bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_gnong 
[\[28b.6\]]mi bkur ba'i gang zag rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang /_ngo tsha shes pa rnams bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_mngon par ma dad pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang /_mngon par dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_tshe 'di'i 
[\[28b.7\]]zag pa rnams bsdams par bya ba'i phyir dang /_tshe rabs phyi ma'i rnams bzlog par bya ba'i phyir dang /_nga'i tshangs par spyod pa skye bo mang po la phan pa yangs par gyur pa lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir nga'i nyan thos 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams dang lhan cig bslab pa mtshungs par gyur pas bslab pa ma phul/_bslab pa nyams par ma byas par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten 
[\[29a.2\]]na dge slong de pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/
[\[29a.3\]]de'i tshe na dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab na dgon pa'i spyil bu na 'dug go/_/de nas dge slong des dgon pa'i spra mo zhig zas kyis brngod brngod nas de dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten to/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas nyul zhing rgyu ba na 
[\[29a.4\]]dge slong de'i spyil bu ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas dge slong de dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/_mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas spra mo de sngon gyi sdig pa can dam pa ma yin 
[\[29a.5\]]pa'i chos de nyid rjes su dran nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_dge slong de'i gdong du rnam par lta bar byed/_ro smad stobs par byed nas dge slong de 'di lta ste/_dge slong de dag la ngo tsha bas de zlog par byed do/_/spra mo de lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 
[\[29a.6\]]slong de'i gdong du rnam par lta bar byed/_ro smad stobs par byed nas dge slong de 'di lta ste/_dge slong de dag la ngo tsha bas lan gnyis lan gsum du de zlog par byed do/_/de nas spra mo de khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur cing yid mi dga' nas/_dge slong de'i gdong dang /_
[\[29a.7\]]sna dang chos gos rkang pa'i sen mo dag gis mngon par brad de mtha' gcig tu song nas ngu ru ru zer zhing khyi tshugs su 'dug go/_/de nas dge slong de dag gis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir dgon pa'i spra mo 'di khyod kyi gdong du rnam par 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]lta bar byed/_ro smad stobs par byed nas khyod 'di lta ste/_kho bo cag la ngo tsha bas de zlog par byed/_ci'i phyir dgon pa'i spra mo 'di lan gnyis lan gsum du khyod kyi gdong du rnam par lta bar byed/_ro smad stobs par byed nas khyod 'di lta ste/_kho bo cag la ngo tsha bas de 
[\[29b.2\]]zlog par byed/_'on kyang dgon pa'i spra mo 'di khyod la khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur cing yid mi dga' nas khyod kyi gdong dang /_sna dang chos gos rkang pa'i sen mo dag gis mngon par brad de mtha' gcig tu song nas ngu ru ru zer zhing khyi tshugs su 'dug_/des skabs 
[\[29b.3\]]de dge slong de dag la rgyas par brjod do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos ma bkag gam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bkag 
[\[29b.4\]]ste/_de yang mi nyid la yin gyi dud 'gror skyes pa la ni ma yin no/_/dge slong de dag mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/_phyir zlog par mi byed cing mngon par bstod par yang ma byas/_phyir bzlog par yang ma byas par stan dag las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[29b.5\]]dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis skabs de rgyas par gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[29b.6\]]ngas re zhig mi la yang bkag na dud 'gror skyes pa la lta ci smos te/_dge slong dag mi gti mug can de ni pham par gyur te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/
[\[29b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pas zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/_btsun 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa zhes bya ba nas/_mi gti mug can khyod kyis sbrul nag po dug myur du khyab pa/_dug drag pa/_dug rno ba'i khar rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa bcug par gyur pa ni bla'i/_de 
[\[30a.2\]]ltar gyur pas dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skyes pa la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa'o/_/'di ni 
[\[30a.3\]]rjes su bcas pa'o/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams dang lhan cig bslab pa mtshungs par gyur pas bslab pa ma phul/_bslab pa nyams par ma byas par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i 
[\[30a.4\]]chos bsten na tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang lhan cig kyang rung ste dge slong de pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni dge slong rnam pa bzhi po ming gi dge slong dang /_khas 'che ba'i dge slong dang /_slong ba'i phyir dge 
[\[30a.5\]]slong dang /_nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong las ming gi dge slong gang zhe na/_gang gi ming dang /_ming du brjod pa dang /_tshig gnyis pa dang /_tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]dang /_'du shes dang /_bod pa dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad dge slong zhe'am/_dge slong 
[\[30a.6\]]gi rigs zhe'am/_dge slong dang 'dra bar gyur pa zhes bya ba de ni ming gi dge slong zhes bya'o/_/khas 'che ba'i dge slong gang zhe na/_gang dge slong ma yin bzhin du bdag nyid dge slong ngo zhes khas 'che bar byed pa dang /_rku thabs su gnas shing dge slong du dam 
[\[30a.7\]]'cha' bar byed pa de ni khas 'che ba'i dge slong zhes bya'o/_/slong ba'i phyir dge slong gang zhe na/_gang chos dang ldan pas slong mo spyod pas 'tsho bar byed pa de ni slong ba'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong gang zhe na/_gang gis zag 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]pa kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa/_yang srid par byed pa/_rims nad dang bcas pa/_rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba/_phyi ma la skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag spangs pa dang /_yongs su shes pa dang /_rtsa ba nas bcad 
[\[30b.2\]]pa dang /_shing ta la'i mgo bzhin du gzhi mi snang ba dang /_phyi ma la mi skye ba'i chos can du gyur pa de ni nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o/_/don 'dir ni gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las mi g.yo ba gzhag par mi 'os pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa gang 
[\[30b.3\]]yin pa de dge slong du dgongs te/_des na yang dge slong gang zhes gsungs so/_/dge slong rnams dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni de las gzhan pa chos mthun pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang ngo /_/bslab pa mtshungs par gyur pas zhes bya ba ni bslab pa 
[\[30b.4\]]gang la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge slong gis bslab par bya ba de la deng bsnyen par rdzogs pas kyang /_deng bsnyen par rdzogs pas gang la bslab par bya ba de la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pas kyang ngo zhes 'di la tshul khrims nyid kyis 
[\[30b.5\]]mnyam pa dang /_bslab pa nyid kyis mnyam pa dang /_so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa nyid kyis mnyam pa gang yin pa de ni bslab pa mtshungs par gyur pas zhes bya ste/_de na bslab pa mtshungs par gyur pas zhes gsungs so/_/bslab pa ma phul zhes bya ba la/_
[\[30b.6\]]ji tsam gyis na bslab pa ma phul ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non pas bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pas bslab pa 'bul na bslab 
[\[30b.7\]]pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/smyon pa la bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_'on pa 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]la bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/dben par dben par 'du shes pas bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/dben par mi dben par 'du shes pas bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[31a.2\]]mi dben par dben par 'du shes pas bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/dbus pas mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis dbus pa la bslab pa 'bul bar byed la/_dbus pas gal te mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig smras pa de ma shes na bslab pa ma phul 
[\[31a.3\]]bar brjod par bya'o/_/mtha' 'khob pas dbus pa'i tshig gis mtha' 'khob pa la bslab pa 'bul bar byed la/_mtha' 'khob pas gal te dbus pa'i tshig smras pa de ma shes na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i 
[\[31a.4\]]tshig gis dbus pa la bslab pa 'bul bar byed la/_dbus pas gal te mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig smras pa de ma shes na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/dbus pas dbus pa'i tshig gis mtha' 'khob pa la bslab pa 'bul bar byed la/_mtha' 'khob 
[\[31a.5\]]pas gal te/_dbus pa'i tshig smras pa de ma shes na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/mi gnyid log pa dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_lha dang /_sprul pa dang /_dud 'gro dang /_gzugs brnyan la bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par 
[\[31a.6\]]bya'o/_/klag cor can gyis klag cor can la bslab pa 'bul na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/gtong ba'i sems med pa dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul 'dod pa dang /_khyim na gnas pa mi 'dod pa dang /_mi rang bzhin du gnas pa shes pa 'ga' la yang 
[\[31a.7\]]rnam par rig par mi byed na bslab pa ma phul bar brjod par bya ste/_des na bslab pa ma phul ba zhes gsungs so/_/bslab pa nyams par ma byas par zhes bya ba la bslab pa phul la bslab pa nyams par ma byas pa yang yod/_bslab pa nyams par byas la 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]bslab pa ma phul ba yang yod/_bslab pa nyams par yang byas la bslab pa phul ba yang yod/_bslab pa ma phul zhing bslab pa nyams par ma byas pa yang yod do/_/de la re zhig bslab pa phul la bslab pa nyams par ma byas pa ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong 
[\[31b.2\]]'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba'am/_rnam par 'khyam 'dod cing /_dge sbyong gi tshul don du mi gnyer ba'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul gyis sgyid lug pa'am/_mus byung ba'am/_the tshom za ba'am/_smod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 'dod 
[\[31b.3\]]pa na dge slong gi drung du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bslab pa 'bul lo zhes zer na bslab pa phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun 'bul lo zhes zer na bslab pa phul 
[\[31b.4\]]bar brjod par bya'o/_/mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'bul lo zhes zer na bslab pa phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/mkhan po dang /_slob dpon 'bul lo zhes zer na bslab pa phul bar brjod par bya'o/_/bdag khyim pa'am/_dge tshul lam/_za ma'am/_ma ning 
[\[31b.5\]]ngam/_dge slong ma sun phyung ba'am/_ma bsad pa'am/_pha bsad pa'am/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa'am/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba'am/_mu stegs can nam/_mu stegs can zhugs pa'am/_
[\[31b.6\]]rku thabs su gnas pa'am/_tha dad par gnas pa'am/_gnas par mi bya bar gzung du gsol zhe 'am/_tha na 'di skad ces bdag khyed lta bu chos mthun pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chog go zhes zer na bslab pa phul bar brjod par bya ste/_de ltar na bslab 
[\[31b.7\]]pa phul la bslab pa nyams par ma byas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na bslab pa nyams par byas la bslab pa ma phul ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong 'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba'am/_rnam par 'khyam 'dod cing dge sbyong gi tshul mi 'dod pa'am/_dge 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sbyong gi tshul gyis sgyid lug pa'am/_mus byung ba'am/_the tshom za ba'am/_smod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 'dod pa na dge slong gi drung du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/
[\[32a.2\]]rab tu dben pa bya dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag tu gnas pa khong du chud par dka'o/_/gcig pu dgon par gnas pa sdug bsngal lo/_/pha ma dang /_phu nu dang /_bu sring 
[\[32a.3\]]dran no/_/bdag bzo dag slob tu chug shig bdag gi las kyi mtha' dag tshol cig_/bdag khyim bzang po dag tu gtod cig ces de ltar de la 'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba'am/_rnam par 'khyam 'dod cing dge sbyong gi tshul mi 'dod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul 
[\[32a.4\]]gyis sgyid lug pa'am/_mus byung ba'am/_the tshom za ba'am/_smod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 'dod pa'i ngag dang /_tshig dang /_tha snyad dang /_skad dang /_rjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_ngag gi las dang /_
[\[32a.5\]]ngag gi rnam par rig byed gang yin pa dag ni rjod par byed la/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bslab pa 'bul lo zhe'am/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun 'bul lo zhe'am/_mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 
[\[32a.6\]]'bul lo zhe'am/_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon 'bul lo zhe'am/_bdag khyim pa'am/_dge tshul lam/_za ma'am/_ma ning ngam/_dge slong ma sun phyung ba'am/_ma bsad pa'am/_pha bsad pa'am/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa'am/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa 
[\[32a.7\]]'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba'am/_mu stegs can nam/_mu stegs can zhugs pa'am/_rku thabs su gnas pa'am/_tha dad par gnas pa'am/_gnas par mi bya bar gzung du gsol zhe'am/_tha na 'di skad ces bdag khyed 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]lta bu chos mthun pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chog go zhes ni mi zer ba ste/_de ltar na bslab pa nyams par byas la bslab pa ma phul ba yin no/_/ji ltar na bslab pa nyams par yang byas la bslab pa phul ba yang yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong 
[\[32b.2\]]'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba'am/_rnam par 'khyam 'dod cing dge sbyong gi tshul mi 'dod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul gyis sgyid lug pa'am/_mus byung ba'am/_the tshom za ba'am/_smod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 'dod pa na dge slong 
[\[32b.3\]]gi drung du song ste/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/rab tu dben pa bya dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag tu 
[\[32b.4\]]gnas pa khong du chud par dka'o/_/gcig pu dgon par gnas pa sdug bsngal lo/_/pha ma dang /_phu nu dang /_bu sring dag dran no/_/bdag bzo dag slob tu chug shig_/bdag gi las kyi mtha' dag tshol cig_/bdag khyim bzang po dag tu gtod cig ces 
[\[32b.5\]]de ltar de la 'dod pa'am/_mngon par mi dga' ba'am/_rnam par 'khyam 'dod par gyur cing dge sbyong gi tshul mi 'dod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul gyis sgyid lug pa'am/_mus byung ba'am/_the tshom za ba'am/_smod pa'am/_dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 
[\[32b.6\]]'dod pa'i ngag dang /_tshig dang /_tha snyad dang /_skad dang /_rjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_ngag gi las dang /_ngag gi rnam par rig par byed pa gang yin pa dag kyang rjod par byed la/_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag dgongs 
[\[32b.7\]]su gsol/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bslab pa 'bul lo zhe'am/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun 'bul lo zhe'am/_mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma mo 'bul lo zhe'am/_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon 'bul lo zhe'am/_bdag khyim 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]pa'am/_dge tshul lam/_za ma'am/_ma ning ngam/_dge slong ma sun phyung ba'am/_ma bsad pa'am/_pha bsad pa'am/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa'am/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba'am/_mu 
[\[33a.2\]]stegs can nam/_mu stegs can zhugs pa'am/_rku thabs su gnas pa'am/_tha dad par gnas pa'am/_gnas par mi bya bar gzung du gsol zhe'am/_tha na 'di skad ces bdag khyed cag lta bu chos mthun pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chog go zhes kyang 
[\[33a.3\]]zer na bslab pa phul bar brjod par bya ste/_de ltar na bslab pa nyams par yang byas la bslab pa phul ba yang yin no/_/ji ltar na bslab pa ma phul zhing bslab pa nyams par ma byas pa yang yin zhe na/_rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa ste/_des na bslab pa nyams par ma 
[\[33a.4\]]byas pa zhes gsungs so/_/mi tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa'o/_/'khrig pa zhes bya ba ni mi tshangs par spyod pa gang yin pa de 'khrig pa yang yin no/_/chos zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa de chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa'o/_/bsten na zhes bya 
[\[33a.5\]]ba ni lhag par spyad na'o/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang /_lhan cig kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ni spra mo'am/_spra mo dang 'dra bar gtogs pa dang ngo /_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni gang la dge slong gi dngos po yod pa gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong gi dngos po gang zhe na/_
[\[33a.6\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa gang yin pa'o/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa gang zhe na/_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyi bya ba byed pa nyid dang /_rtog pa nyid dang /_yang dag par rtog pa nyid dang /_mthar phyin par byed pa nyid dang /_yang dag par mthar phyin par byed pa nyid gang yin 
[\[33a.7\]]pa dang /_gang zag de'i khas len pa dang /_mngon par khas len pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_phyir mi 'gog pa nyid dang /_ngag dang /_tshig dang /_tha snyad dang /_skad dang /_rjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi lam dang /_tshig gi sgra dang /_ngag gi 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]las dang /_ngag gi rnam par rig byed gang yin pa'o/_/de zhes bya ba ni nye bar bstan pa dang /_kun tu bstan pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]de'o/_/pham par gyur pa yin gyis zhes bya ba ni de mthar gyur pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_dman pa dang /_mjug na 'dug pa dang /_tha chad dang /_
[\[33b.2\]]yid dang mi mthun pa yin pa'o/_/yang gang gis ltung ba de byas na byas ma thag tu dge slong du mi rung bar 'gyur/_dge sbyong du mi rung /_shAkya'i sras kyir mi rung /_dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur te/_de'i dge sbyong gi tshul zhig par 'gyur zhing /_nyams 
[\[33b.3\]]pa/_bcom pa/_ltung ba/_pham par gyur pa ste/_de'i dge sbyong gi tshul phyir bslang du med par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_dper na shing ta la'i mgo bcad na sngon por 'gyur du mi rung la/_'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /_yangs par 'gyur du mi rung ba de bzhin du dge slong 
[\[33b.4\]]gis gnas de lta bu byas na byas ma thag tu dge slong du mi rung bar 'gyur/_dge sbyong du mi rung /_shAkya'i sras kyir mi rung /_dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur te/_de'i dge sbyong gi tshul zhig par 'gyur zhing nyams pa/_bcom pa/_ltung ba/_pham par gyur 
[\[33b.5\]]pa ste/_de'i dge sbyong gi tshul phyir bslang du med par 'gyur bas/_de na pham par gyur pa yin gyis zhes gsungs so/_/gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong rnams kyis de dang gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang 
[\[33b.6\]]bzhi'i las la gnas par mi bya'o/_/gang zag bcu gnyis po dag tu bsko bas bsko bar mi bya ba ste/_de na gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//sdom la/_'ba' zhig dang ni gnas gsum dang /_/bud med skyes pa ma 
[\[33b.7\]]ning dang /_/sten la gzhol dang rtsol ba dang /_/myos par byas dang mthus 'dzin pa'o/_/dge slong gis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten na pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis gnas gsum gyis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten na pham par 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/zag byed zag byed dam/_kha'am/_bshang ba'i lam du 'jud na bcug ma thag tu pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi bud med dang /_skyes pa dang /_ma ning gsum dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos sten na pham par 
[\[34a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab par gyur cing /_de sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab pas mi'i bud med gson po ma nyams pa la zag byed bar 
[\[34a.3\]]dang bcas pas bar chad dang bcas pa dang /_bar dang bcas pas bar chad med pa dang /_bar med pas bar chad dang bcas pa dang /_bar med pas bar chad med pa zag byed dam/_kha'am/_bshang ba'i lam du 'jud na bcug ma thag tu pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi 
[\[34a.4\]]sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab par gyur cing de sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab pas/_mi'i bud med gson po nyams pa la zag byed bar dang bcas pas bar chad dang bcas pa 
[\[34a.5\]]dang /_bar dang bcas pas bar chad med pa dang /_bar med pas bar chad dang bcas pa dang /_bar med pas bar chad med pa zag byed dam/_kha'am/_bshang ba'i lam du 'jud na bcug ma thag tu nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi sems sten pa la gzhol ba 
[\[34a.6\]]dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab par gyur cing /_de sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab pas mi'i bud med shi ba ma nyams pa la zag byed bar dang bcas pas bar chad dang bcas pa dang /_bar dang bcas pas bar 
[\[34a.7\]]chad med pa dang /_bar med pas bar chad dang bcas pa dang /_bar med pas bar chad med pa zag byed dam/_kha'am/_bshang ba'i lam du 'jud na bcug ma thag tu pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gi sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]la bab par gyur cing /_de sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab pas mi'i bud med shi ba nyams pa la zag byed bar dang bcas pas bar chad dang bcas pa dang /_bar dang bcas pas bar chad med pa dang /_bar med pas bar chad 
[\[34b.2\]]dang bcas pa dang /_bar med pas bar chad med pa zag byed dam/_kha'am/_bshang ba'i lam du 'jud na bcug ma thag tu nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mi'i bud med gson po dang shi ba la ji lta ba de bzhin du mi ma yin pa mo gson po dang /_shi ba dang /_dud 'gro'i 
[\[34b.3\]]skyes gnas su skyes pa mo gson po dang /_shi ba la yang de bzhin no/_/skyes pa gson po dang /_shi ba la rma'i sgo gnyis su yang de bzhin no/_/skyes pa gson po dang /_shi ba la rma'i sgo gnyis su ji lta ba de bzhin du mi ma yin pa pho gson po dang /_shi ba la 
[\[34b.4\]]rma'i sgo gnyis su dang /_dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skyes pa pho gson po dang /_shi ba la rma'i sgo gnyis su yang de bzhin no/_/skyes pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du mi'i ma ning pho gson po dang /_shi ba la rma'i sgo gnyis su dang /_mi ma yin pa'i ma ning pho gson 
[\[34b.5\]]po dang /_shi ba la rma'i sgo gnyis su dang /_dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skyes pa'i ma ning pho gson po dang /_shi ba la rma'i sgo gnyis su yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gi dge slong nyal ba la rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de dang por yang ma shes/_bar du yang 
[\[34b.6\]]ma shes/_tha mar yang ma shes na gang rtsol bar byed pa de bsnyil bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong nyal ba la rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de dang por shes shing bar du yang ma shes/_tha mar yang ma shes na gang rtsol bar byed pa de bsnyil bar bya'o/_/
[\[34b.7\]]dge slong gis dge slong nyal ba la rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de dang por yang shes/_bar du yang shes shing tha mar ma shes na gang rtsol bar byed pa de bsnyil bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong nyal ba la rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]de dang por yang shes/_bar du yang shes/_tha mar yang shes la shes nas kyang bdag gir mi byed na gang rtsol bar byed pa de bsnyil bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong nyal ba la rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de dang por yang shes/_bar du yang shes 
[\[35a.2\]]tha mar yang shes la shes nas kyang bdag gir byed na gnyi ga bsnyil bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong la ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong gis dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge slong mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul la dang /_dge tshul mas dge 
[\[35a.3\]]slong dang /_dge tshul la dang /_dge tshul gyis dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong 'bru'i chang gis myos par byed du bcug ste rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de dang por yang ma 
[\[35a.4\]]shes/_bar du yang ma shes/_tha mar yang ma shes na gang rtsol bar byed pa de bsnyil bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong 'bru'i chang gis myos par byed du bcug ste rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de dang por shes shing bar du yang ma shes/_tha mar yang ma shes na gang rtsol 
[\[35a.5\]]bar byed pa de bsnyil bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong 'bru'i chang gis myos par byed du bcug ste rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de dang por yang shes/_bar du yang shes/_tha mar yang shes la shes nas kyang bdag gir mi byed na gang rtsol bar byed pa de bsnyil bar 
[\[35a.6\]]bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong 'bru'i chang gis myos par byed du bcug ste rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de dang por yang shes/_bar du yang shes/_tha mar yang shes la shes nas kyang bdag gir byed na gnyi ga bsnyil bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong la ji lta ba 
[\[35a.7\]]bzhin du dge slong gis dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge slong mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge slob mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]'bru'i chang gis ji lta ba bzhin du bcos pa'i chang dang /_sbyar ba'i chang dang /_rtsa ba'i btung ba dang /_sdong bu'i btung ba dang /_'dab ma'i btung ba dang /_me tog gi btung ba dang /_'bras bu'i btung bas sam/_gsang sngags dag dang /_rig sngags dang /_sman gyis 
[\[35b.2\]]sems 'khrugs par byas pa'am/_gnyid log par byas te yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis dge slong gya tshom du mthus bzung ste rtsol bar byed cing /_gal te dge slong gis de 'jud pa na bdag gir byed na gnyi ga bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'jud pa na mi byed kyang bcug pa na bdag gir 
[\[35b.3\]]byed na gnyi ga bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'jud pa na yang mi byed/_bcug pa na yang mi byed mod kyi 'byin pa na bdag gir byed na gnyi ga bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'jud pa na yang bdag gir mi byed/_bcug pa na yang mi byed/_'byin pa na yang mi byed na gang rtsol ba de bsnyil bar 
[\[35b.4\]]bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong la ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong gis dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge slong mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge slob mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul mas dge slong dang /_
[\[35b.5\]]dge tshul dang /_dge tshul gyis dge slong dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin no//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_sdom la/_rgyab mnyen dang ni 'phyang ba can/_/mdzes dga' tshogs can 
[\[35b.6\]]rgan mo dang /_/dge slong gnyid kyis log pa la/_/lci thun mas btsal nyes med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las 
[\[35b.7\]]chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/dus gzhan zhig na rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]pa las khye'u zhig byung ba de'i rgyab 'di lta ste/_dper na ri bong ngam/_byi la'i ltar mnyen pa dang /_shin du mnyen par gyur to/_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/_khye'u'i ming cir 
[\[36a.2\]]gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir khye'u 'di'i rgyab 'di lta ste/_dper na ri bong ngam/_byi la'i ltar mnyen pa dang /_shin tu mnyen pa de'i phyir/_khye'u'i ming rgyab mnyen zhes bya'o/_/zhes de'i ming rgyab mnyen zhes bya 
[\[36a.3\]]bar btags so/_/de 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen 
[\[36a.4\]]por gyur pa de'i tshe legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo /_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos/_chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/_grong ngam/_grong rdal gang na nye bar rten cing gnas pa'i grong ngam/_grong rdal de nyid du lus ma 
[\[36a.5\]]bsrungs/_dbang po dag ma bsdams/_dran pa nye bar ma bzhag par bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/des grong ngam/_grong rdal de nyid du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log par lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos 
[\[36a.6\]]su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/_nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gnas su zhugs so/_/de'i sems gang gi tshe 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris par gyur pa de'i tshe des rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te/_rang gi khar bcug nas rtsol bar byed 
[\[36a.7\]]do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rab tu mang po gnas nyul zhing rgyu ba dag dge slong de'i gnas ga la ba der phyin pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis dge slong de de ltar byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yid mi dga' zhing mngon par ma mgu nas dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa ci byed/_reg pa bdag gir byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos ma bkag gam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bkag ste/_de ni gzhan gyi la yin gyi rang gi la ni ma yin no/_/dge slong de dag de la mngon par bstod par yang 
[\[36b.2\]]mi byed/_phyir zlog par yang mi byed cing /_mngon par bstod pa yang ma byas/_phyir zlog pa yang ma byas par dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig 
[\[36b.3\]]tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis skabs de rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas re zhig gzhan gyi la yang bkag na rang gi la lta smos kyang ci dgos te mi gti mug can de ni pham par gyur to/_/
[\[36b.4\]]dge slong gi sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab par gyur cing /_de sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab pas rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te rang gi'am/_gzhan gyi khar 
[\[36b.5\]]bcug nas rtsol bar byed na bcug ma thag tu pham par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs 
[\[36b.6\]]nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/dus gzhan zhig na rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam/_dgu 'das te btsas 
[\[36b.7\]]pa las khye'u yan lag gi rnam pa tshad las shin tu 'das pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/_khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/de dag 'di snyam du 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]sems te/_gang gi phyir khye'u 'di'i yan lag gi rnam pa tshad las shin tu 'das pa de'i phyir khye'u 'di 'phyang ba can zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming 'phyang ba can zhes bya bar btags so/_/de 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad 
[\[37a.2\]]kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo /_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung 
[\[37a.3\]]bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_grong ngam/_grong rdal gang na nye bar rten cing gnas pa'i grong ngam/_grong rdal de nyid du lus ma bsrungs dbang po dag ma bsdams/_dran pa nye bar ma bzhag par bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/des grong ngam/_grong rdal de nyid du bsod snyoms la 
[\[37a.4\]]brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gnas su zhugs so/_/de'i sems gang gi tshe 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris 
[\[37a.5\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe des rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te rang gi bshang ba'i lam du bcug nas rtsol bar byed do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rab tu mang po gnas nyul zhing rgyu ba dag dge slong de'i gnas ga la ba der phyin pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis 
[\[37a.6\]]dge slong de de ltar byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yid mi dga' zhing mngon par ma mgu nas dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ci byed/_reg pa bdag gir byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos ma bkag 
[\[37a.7\]]gam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bkag ste/_de ni gzhan gyi la yin gyi rang gi la ni ma yin no/_/dge slong de dag de la mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/_phyir zlog par yang mi byed cing /_mngon par bstod pa yang ma byas phyir bzlog pa yang ma byas par dong nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis skabs de rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[37b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas re zhig gzhan gyi la yang bkag na rang gi la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_mi gti mug can de ni pham par gyur to/_/dge slong gi sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab par gyur cing /_de sems 
[\[37b.3\]]sten pa la gzhol ba dang /_sten pa la 'bab pa dang /_sten pa la bab pas rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te/_rang gi'am/_gzhan gyi bshang ba'i lam du bcug nas rtsol bar byed na bcug ma thag tu pham par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[37b.4\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na 'phags rgyal na ded dpon dga' bo zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba/_yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor 
[\[37b.5\]]dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu 
[\[37b.6\]]yang med bu mo yang med nas/_de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dag la gsol ba 'debs shing /_lha'i bye brag gzhan 'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /_tshal gyi lha dag 
[\[37b.7\]]dang /_bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /_sum mdo'i lha dag dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dag dang /_chos mthun pa dag dang /_rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]bu dang /_bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/_de ni de lta ma yin te/_gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar gnas gsum po dag mngon 
[\[38a.2\]]du gyur pa las bu dang /_bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag gang zhe na/_pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/_gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa 
[\[38a.3\]]las bu dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na sems can zhig kyang lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te de'i skye dgu'i bdag mo'i mngal du zhugs so/_/bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga 
[\[38a.4\]]yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /_mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa/_de shes pa dang /_khye'u shes shing bu mo 
[\[38a.5\]]shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la/_gal te bu mo yin na ni dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o/_/de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyim thab la smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi 
[\[38a.6\]]dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pas nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste/_lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas 'di skad ces kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /_kho 
[\[38a.7\]]bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /_kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /_gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /_bgo skal la spyod pa dang /_kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu'am mang 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon bshad pa byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par byed do/_/de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 
[\[38b.2\]]'di lta ste/_mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /_sman pas bcas pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /_ha cang mi skyur ba dang /_ha cang lan tshwa 
[\[38b.3\]]mi che ba dang /_ha cang mi mngar ba dang /_ha cang mi tsha ba dang /_ha cang mi bska ba dang /_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_rgyan gyis bklubs pa'i lus lha'i 
[\[38b.4\]]bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /_khri nas khrir dang /_khri'u nas khri'ur rgyu zhing shod kyis gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /_des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'dzud do/_/de zla ba brgyad dam/_dgu 'das 
[\[38b.5\]]te btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_gsal ba/_gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/_lag pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i 
[\[38b.6\]]nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/yul dbus na gang gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa de la mdzes pa zhes bya'o zhes kun 
[\[38b.7\]]tu spyod pas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir khye'u 'di gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa yin la/_ded dpon dga' bo'i bu yin pa de'i phyir khye'u'i ming mdzes dga' zhes bya'o/_/zhes de'i ming mdzes dga' zhes bya bar btags so/_/
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]khye'u mdzes dga' ma ma brgyad po/_pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/_/de ma ma brgyad po de dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang 
[\[39a.2\]]mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_
[\[39a.3\]]rtsis dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_gzhug pa dang /_gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas/_de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing 'byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mkhas pa dang /_spyod pa gsal ba dang /_brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste/_rin po che brtag pa dang /_gzhi brtag pa dang /_gos 
[\[39a.4\]]brtag pa dang /_shing brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_bud med brtag pa dang /_skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par gyur to/_/phas de'i chung ma'i 'khor gsum po rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma dag rnam par gzhag go/_/'dug pa'i gnas gsum po dgun gyi 
[\[39a.5\]]dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go/_/skyed mos tshal gsum po dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go/_/de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na skyes pa med par sil snyan gyis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod 
[\[39a.6\]]par byed do/_/ded dpon dga' bo rtag tu rtsis la chags shing 'du ba dang /_'god pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed nas mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_yab khyod ci'i slad du rtag tu rtsis la chags shing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_bu ci steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na rtse ba nyid kyis 
[\[39a.7\]]nor bsgrub par byar nus sam/_ngas khyim gyi bya ba los kyang bsam dgos so/_/mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]don gyis 'dis bdag la bskul to snyam du rig nas des de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_yab gal te de ltar rjes su gnang na yul gzhan du mchis la nor bsgrub par 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu nor gyi rnam pa mang po yod na ci'i phyir yul gzhan du 'gro/_'dug shig des smras pa/_yab ngan bu gor ma bkum par mchi'o/_/ded dpon dga' bos 'di 'dod pa la bab par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_des lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po la 
[\[39b.2\]]sogs pa blangs te/_dbyig dang /_gser byas pa dang ma byas pa de'i mdzod gang ba bdun phye ste bstan nas smras pa/_bu mdzes dga' nor gyi rnam pa 'di snyed yod kyis khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa la yang longs spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig_/bsod nams dag kyang gyis 
[\[39b.3\]]shig_/yul gzhan du 'gro mi dgos so/_/des smras pa/_yab khyod ngan bu la ston par mdzad na/_ngan bus bu rnams la ci zhig bstan par bgyi/_ded dpon dga' bos de zer ba bzang ste/_bdag 'das nas 'dis khyim gyi bya ba sbyong bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir ji srid bdag gson pa 
[\[39b.4\]]de srid du zong mnos shing yul gzhan du 'gro la rag ste/_yul gzhan du 'di la pha'i grogs dag kyang mngon du gyur pas de lta na bdag 'das nas 'di'i 'gro ba'i phyogs mun pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du shes shing rig nas chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo 'das nas mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]
[\[39b.5\]]khyim gyi bya ba sbyong bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir ji srid kho bo gson pa de srid du zong mnos shing yul gzhan du 'gro la rag ste/_yul gzhan du 'di la pha'i grogs kyang mngon du gyur pas de lta na kho bo 'das nas 'di 'gro ba'i phyogs mun pa med par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras 
[\[39b.6\]]ma nongs te de bzhin mchi la rag go/_/de nas ded dpon dga' bos mdzes dga' bos te smras pa/_bu khyod kyis zong mnos te yul gzhan du 'gro'o snyam du sems bskyed pa mnyes te/_kho bo 'das nas khyod kyis khyim gyi bya ba sbyong bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir ji srid kho bo gson pa de 
[\[39b.7\]]srid du zong mnos shing yul gzhan du 'gro la rag ste/_yul gzhan du khyod la pha'i grogs dag kyang mngon du gyur pas de lta na kho bo 'das nas khyod kyi 'gro ba'i phyogs mun pa med par 'gyur ro/_/mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_yab bka' bzhin 'tshal mchi'o/_/de nas ded dpon 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dga' bos 'phags rgyal du dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste/_'phags rgyal na gnas pa dang /_phyogs tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i tshong pa rnams la shes ldan dag nyon cig_/ded dpon mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]zong mnos shing yul gzhan du 'gros/_khyed cag 
[\[40a.2\]]las ded dpon mdzes dga' dang lhan cig tu sho gam med pa dang /_la gcan med pa dang /_gru btsas med par yul gzhan du 'gro bar spro ba gang yin pa des yul gzhan du 'gro ba dang mthun pa'i zong bsdogs shig_/tshong pa lnga brgyas yul gzhan du 'gro ba dang /_mthun pa'i 
[\[40a.3\]]zong bsdogs so/_/ded dpon dga' bos tshong pa de dag mgron du bos te zas byin nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag ji ltar mdzes dga' 'di kho bo'i bu yin pa de kho na bzhin du khyed kyi yang yin gyis/_tshong pa yul gzhan du dong ba rnams kyi bar chad ni gsum yod de/_rgyan po dang /_
[\[40a.4\]]'jud mthun ma dang /_chang gi gnas so/_/khyed cag gis 'di gnod pa las nges par bzlog par bya zhing phan pa la yang dag par sbyor bar bya'o/_/gal te gnod pa las nges par bzlog cing phan pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa na rab tu gnas par gyur na de lta na legs/_
[\[40a.5\]]gal te rab tu mi gnas par gyur na khyed kyis zong rnam par spongs shing rin mnos te 'gro bar bya'o/_/mdzes dga' la yang smras pa/_bu mdzes dga' ji ltar khyod kho bo'i bu yin pa de kho na bzhin du tshong pa 'di dag gi yang yin gyis/_khyod kyis 'di dag gi tshig dang bas mnyan 
[\[40a.6\]]cing bya bar sems shig_/ded dpon mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]yab bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ded dpon dga' bo las mnyan nas dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te/_shing rta dag dang /_khur dag dang /_spyad dag dang /_gle ba dag dang /_rnga mo dag dang /_ba 
[\[40a.7\]]lang dag dang /_bong bu dag gis zong mang po blangs te/_tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig yul gzhan du 'phags so/_/de mthar gyis grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas dag tu khad kyis rgyu ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas mnyan yod du mdzod 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]cig tu zong btsud de 'dug go/_/de'i tshe na mnyan yod na gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_skyes bu dga' ba zhig 'dug ste/_de kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyas skyes pa dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/des 'phags rgyal na 
[\[40b.2\]]ded dpon dga' bo zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i bu mdzes dga' zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa de tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu 'dir phyin nas mdzod che ge mo zhig tu zong mkhos su phab ste 'dug go zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_gal 
[\[40b.3\]]te bdag gis de'i zong thams cad ma phrogs na bzang mo zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo snyam mo/_/des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo ded dpon mdzes dga' zhes bya ba 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas/_zong khyer te 'ongs nas mdzod che ge mo zhig tu btsud kyis/_dri dang /_phreng 
[\[40b.4\]]ba rgyu thogs te de'i drung du song la 'di skad ces jo mo bzang mo khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing /_rje'i sras kyis ci'i slad du rang gi pho brang spangs te mi phal pa bzhin du mdzod na bzhugs/_'di ni khyod nyid kyi pho brang lags kyis tshur spyon cig ces kyang mchi'o zhes gyis shig_/jo mo 
[\[40b.5\]]bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bu mo mngag gzhug ma des gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mo las mnyan te/_dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu thogs nas ded dpon mdzes dga' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ded dpon mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/jo mo bzang mo khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 
[\[40b.6\]]'tshal zhing /_dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu 'di yang bskur/_rje'i sras kyis ci'i slad du pho brang spangs te mi phal pa bzhin du mdzod na bzhugs/_'di ni khyod kyi pho brang lags kyis tshur spyon cig ces kyang mchi'o/_/mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bu mo song shig dang /_kho bo dri dang /_
[\[40b.7\]]phreng ba rgyu 'di btags te 'ong ngo /_/de nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma de gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_des ded dpon mdzes dga' dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas par gyur pa de dag thams cad gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mo la bsnyad do/_/de 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]nas gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mos bu mo mngag gzhug ma las thos nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_khyim byug pas bskus shing byi dor byed du bcug nas me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing bdug spos zhim pos bdugs te/_bla re bres pa dang bcas pa'i 
[\[41a.2\]]mal bshams nas gtso cher ded dpon mdzes dga' la stod cing 'dug go/_/ded dpon mdzes dga' yang dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_rgyan gyis bklubs te bzhon pa la zhon nas khye'u mngag gzhug pas yongs su bskor cing lang tsho'i gzugs mchog tu sdug pas rnam par mdzes 
[\[41a.3\]]shing gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mo'i gnas ga la ba der song ngo /_/gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mos ded dpon mdzes dga' lang tsho'i gzugs mchog tu sdug pas rnam par mdzes pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bran mo mngag gzhug ma la dris pa/_bu mo 'di ded dpon mdzes dga' 
[\[41a.4\]]yin nam/_des smras pa/_jo mo ded dpon mdzes dga' ni 'di kho na lags so/_/de nas gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mo dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rigs skyes rigs min skyes pa'am/_/nor nyams nor gyis 'byor pa'ang rung /_/gzugs 
[\[41a.5\]]kyis phyug pa mthong bas ni/_/bud med rnams kyi yid 'phrog byed/_/de bzhon pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa dag kho nas gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mo'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_des myur ba myur bar khang thog nas babs 
[\[41a.6\]]te de bsu nas yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud de/_khyim gyi nang du khrid nas bud med kyi khri la bzhag ste smras pa/_rje'i sras kyi mtshan ci/_des smras pa/_mdzes dga'o/_/des smras pa/_e ma khyod kyi mtshan ni gzugs dang 'dra la/_gzugs kyang mtshan dang 'dra ste/_
[\[41a.7\]]gal te yab yum dag gis khyod kyi mtshan mdzes dga' zhes bgyi bar ma gsol bar gyur na/_deng bdag gis khyod kyi mtshan mdzes dga' zhes bgyi bar gsol bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_khyod kyi mtshan ci/_des smras pa/_bzang mo'o/_/des smras pa/_e ma'o/_/khyod kyi 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]mtshan ni gzugs dang 'dra la/_gzugs kyang mtshan dang 'dra ste/_gal te yab yum dag gis khyod kyi mtshan bzang mo zhes bgyi bar ma gsol bar gyur na deng bdag gis khyod kyi mtshan bzang mo zhes bgyi bar gsol bar 'gyur ro/_/mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzang mo dgung 
[\[41b.2\]]gcig gi gla ci tsam/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras kyis mi phal pa bzhin du mi gsha' ba zhig bka' stsal to/_/de'i bu mo mngag gzhug mas smras pa/_dgung red zhig kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya lnga brgya'o/_/des mi la khyod kyis nyin re zhing kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya lnga brgya bskur bar 
[\[41b.3\]]bya'o zhes bsgo nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/'dod pa dag ni bsten pa na ldog pa'am/_ngoms pa'am/_mthar thug pa med pas de nyi ma mang po 'das kyang ngoms par ma gyur cing /_mis kyang nyin re zhing kAr ShA 
[\[41b.4\]]pa Na lnga brgya lnga brgya 'bul ba kho nar byed do/_/tshong pa dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ded dpon mdzes dga' mi snang na/_de bdag cag la grogs pos gtad pas kun tu btsal bar bya'o/_/tshong pa dag gis de'i g.yog dag la dris pa/_ded dpon gar bzhud/_de dag 
[\[41b.5\]]gis smras pa/_ded dpon nyi ma gang kho na la mnyan yod du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la 'jud mthun ma'i khyim du zhugs te 'dug na khyed cag gis deng gzod dran nam/_tshong pa dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag yu bu cag gis ded dpon mdzes dga' yal bar bor ba ni ma legs pa byas te/_
[\[41b.6\]]'di'i phas yu bu cag la klan kar 'gyur ro/_/tshong pa dag gis mdzes dga' la don mthun rnams kyi mchid nas tshur spyon cig ces mchi'o zhes bang chen btang ngo /_/bang chen des mdzes dga' la bsgo nas mdzes dga' 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /_bzang mos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste 
[\[41b.7\]]smras pa/_rje'i sras 'dod pa dag ni rgyu gnyis kyis bsten par bgyi ste/_gzugs bzang ba nyid dang /_lang tsho nyid kyis so/_/khyod ni gzugs bzang ba dang /_lang tsho la bab pa lags na gzhon pa'i gnas skabs su re zhig rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod pa mdzod la bgres pa'i 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]gnas skabs su nor sgrub pa mdzod cig_/mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bang chen de la smras pa/_kye khyod song shig dang 'ong ngo /_/bang chen de song ste tshong pa rnams la smras pa/_ded dpon gyi zhal nas song shig dang 'ong ngo zhes gsung ngo /_/tshong pa de dag 'dus te/_sdod pa na mdzes 
[\[42a.2\]]dga' thogs nas/_tshong pa de dag thams cad 'dus te 'jud mthun ma'i khyim du dong nas tshong pa de dag gis sgor bsdad de/_mi la smras pa/_kye khyo ga song la ded dpon la tshong pa'i tshogs rnams sgo na sdod cing ded dpon blta bar 'tshal lo/_/zhes gyis shig_/mi des song ste mdzes 
[\[42a.3\]]dga' la brjod nas mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]'byung bar brtsams pa dang /_yang gzugs 'tshong ma bzang mos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste smras pa/_rje'i sras tshong pa de dag kyang bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod 'tshal te/_de dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad du ga la rung bzhugs 
[\[42a.4\]]shig_/'dod pa dag ni bsten pa na kun du sbyor ba dag 'phel bar byed pa yin pas mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gang gi tshe kho bo kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi des song ste tshong pa'i tshogs rnams la smras pa/_ded dpon gyi zhal nas 
[\[42a.5\]]gang gi tshe kho bo kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe 'byung ngo zhes gsung ngo /_/tshong pa dag gis smras pa/_kye ma mdzes dga' 'di bya ba ma yin pa la zhugs kyis 'dong ngo zhes de dag gis zong rnam par spangs nas rin blangs te 'phags so/_/de nas mi gang gis nyi ma 
[\[42a.6\]]re re zhing bzang mo la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya lnga brgya phul bar gyur pa des phyin chad 'bul bar mi byed do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na bzang mos mi de la dris shing smras pa/_kye khyo ga ci'i phyir phyin chad kAr ShA pa Na dag 'bul bar mi byed/_des smras pa/_don mthun dag dong bas 
[\[42a.7\]]bdag gis ga las dbul/_ci don mthun dag gis mdzes dga'i zong yang khyer ram/_khyer ro/_/bzang mos mdzes dga' dang lhan cig nyi ma gnyis sam/_gsum dga' mgur spyad nas smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag la zhing yang ma mchis/_las kyi mtha' bgyid pa dag kyang 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]ma mchis/_grong mi zong mnos te yul gzhan du mchi ba dag kyang ma mchis te/_khyod lta bu dag gi drung nas gang thob pa des bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur ba kho nar bas na yang na ni kAr ShA pa Na dag stsol cig_/yang na ni skyes pa gzhan gyis skabs dbye ba mdzod cig_/mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]
[\[42b.2\]]smras pa/_bzang mo khyod la sdug pa 'ga' yang med dam/_bzang mos smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod kyis/_tshogs can rnams la sdug pa med/_/de dag rang bzhin ring mi gnas/_/bya rnams 'bras med ljon pa bzhin/_/de dag rnying pa rnam par spong /_/zhes bgyi ba ma gsan
