[\[83a.6\]]gnod sbyin la gtor ma byas te sgo dag mnan te/_sdod do/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag mig lam chad kyis longs shig 'dong ngo /_/yongs su mi shes par sge'u chung nas bde bar 'jug tu gzhug go/_/de dag 'phags te mthar gyis bong bu dang /_rnga mo 
[\[83a.7\]]dang /_glang dag 'debs shing /_sge'u chung nas mnyan yod du zhugs nas mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /_srang du dong ste byang lam pa'i zong bkram nas btsong bar brtsams so/_/mi zhig don mthun de nyid dang bral ba sgo nas zhugs pa sho gam pa dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]kye nang rje ga las 'ongs/_mi des smras pa/_ri brag che ge mo zhig nas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_kye nang rje ri brag de na byang lam pa'i don mthun 'dug ces grag na khyod kyis de ma mthong ngam/_mi des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo ni don mthun de nyid dang bral zhing 'gro ba 
[\[83b.2\]]yin te de ni sngar song zin to/_/sho gam pa dag gis thos nas yid mi bde bar gyur te smras pa/_kye nang rje kho bo cag sgo gnon cing 'khod na de ga las zhugs/_mi des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na tshur shog srang du 'dong dang rang nyid kyis mthong bar 
[\[83b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag de dang lhan cig srang du dong ba dang don mthun dag byang lam pa'i zong bkram zhing tshong pa mthong nas de dag gis dris pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag gang gis zhugs/_don mthun dag gis smras pa/_rkang pa dag gis so/_/sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/_
[\[83b.4\]]khyed cag ji ltar rkang pa dag gis zhugs pa lta kho bo cag gis kyang shes kyi/_'di ltar khyed cag gang gis 'jug tu bcug pa dang /_sgo gang nas zhugs pa de 'dris smros shig dang /_khyed cag dang bshes par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa drug sde dag gis 
[\[83b.5\]]sge'u chung nas 'jug tu bcug go/_/sho gam pa de dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa yin no/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa yin te/_gang la da ltar gzhan gyi 'tsho ba la yang gnod pa byed do/_/zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha 
[\[83b.6\]]zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis gzhan gyi 'tsho ba la gnod par mi bya'o/_/gnod pa byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sho gam pa dag gis drug sde 'di 
[\[83b.7\]]dag ni dge sbyong mi srun pa dag yin pas ngo bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa sho gam pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]pa phyag 'tshal lo/_/lhung bzed na cung zad mchis sam gzigs/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci sems lhung bzed na sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas med do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig_/bdag de snyam mi 
[\[84a.2\]]sems kyi 'di ltar bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa cung zad mchis na/_de khyod las bslangs te 'tshal snyam mo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci chu klung rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'bab bam/_khyod kyis kho bo la sbyin par bya ba yin gyi kho bos khyod la sbyin par bya 
[\[84a.3\]]ba ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bzhad gad bgyi'o/_/tshur spyon khyim du bzhud do/_/sho gam pa des nye dga' khyim du khrid nas bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste byin nas/_smras pa/_'phags pa bdag la bka' stsol cig dang /_bka' 
[\[84a.4\]]bzhin bgyid cing 'phags pas bka' stsal pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod nad med par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo /_/drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos 
[\[84a.5\]]bstan par bya/_rgol ba dag tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa bsgrag par bya/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya'o zhes yang na ni sgo drung du gtsug lag khang nod par byed/_yang na ni lam dang nye bar gtsug lag khang nod par byed pas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]lam dang nye bar gtsug lag 
[\[84a.6\]]khang mnos nas de de'i steng du nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par gnas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gtsug lag khang dang ha cang thag mi ring ba nas 'dong ba dang /_nye dga' sgra la mkhas pas des 
[\[84a.7\]]de dag gi rting sgra thos nas yongs su g.yo ba dang bcas bzhin du smras pa/_'dong ba 'di dag su yin/_tshong pa de dag cang mi smra bar sdod pa dang /_nye dga' myur ba myur bar gtsug khang gi steng nas babs te/_tshong pa de dag gi drung du song nas smras pa/_shes 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]ldan dag mtshan mo nor dang bcas pa kho nar 'dong ba 'di dag su yin/_tshong pa de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag ni tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag lags so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bkren pa dag kho bo cag la rgyal po yo byad thams cad kyis nye bar gnas pa yin te/_
[\[84b.2\]]gnas brtan kun shes kauN+Di n+ya yang de la 'di skad ces ji nas kyang rgyal po 'di'i longs spyod ma byung ba dag ni 'byung bar gyur cig_/byung ba dag ni rgyas pa dang /_'phel ba dang /_yangs par gyur cig ces yon bshad pa byed pa yin na/_khyed cag de dbang ba'i sho gam dral te 
[\[84b.3\]]'dong na kho bo cag gis ci'i phyir yal bar dor bar bya/_deng khyed la gnod pa byed du gzhug go/_/de dag skrag nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyed ni thugs rje can dag lags pas bzod par mdzod cig dang bdag cag gis 'phags pa la mkho ba dag bgyi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]
[\[84b.4\]]smras pa/_ci zhig bya bca' ba'i cha rin dag dbul lo/_/dbul lam/_dbul lo deng shig_/de dag de nas dong ste nye dga'i drung nas bral ba dang /_'di skad ces yu bu cag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la yang sho gam mi 'jal na/_dge sbyong mgo reg nye dga' 
[\[84b.5\]]la 'jal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes kun du rjod par byed do/_/nye dga' yang myur ba myur bar zas kyi bya ba byas te sgo drung nas lhung bzed 'khru zhing phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar byed do/_/gzhon nu zhig gis nye dga' phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar byed pa mthong nas/_des 
[\[84b.6\]]smras pa/_gnas brtan ci'i slad du phan tshun rnam par gzigs par mdzad/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo'i mdza' bshes tshong pa dag zong thogs te mnyan yod du zhugs pa de dag lta'o/_/gzhon nu des smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod ji tsam na 
[\[84b.7\]]zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa de tsam na de dag dong lags so/_/nye dga' mi bzod pa skyes nas kho bo yang de dag gis bslus te spu gri la khu tshur gyis brdegs shing rang thags kyi rdo la rtswas phug gis kho bos de dag la gang bya ba shes so snyam du sems so/_/ji tsam na tshong pa de 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]dag yang de kho na bzhin du 'ongs pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kyang de kho na bzhin lan gnyis su bzung ste/_khyed kyis kho bo yang bslus so zhes smras pa dang /_tshong pa de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag la bgyi ba cung zhig byung bas des na bdag cag ma 
[\[85a.2\]]zhus par mchis te/_da ni de dang gzhan yang thams cad 'bul lo/_/'bul lam/_'bul lo/_/deng shig de dag de nas dong ste nye dga'i drung nas bral ba dang /_'di skad ces yu bu cag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la yang sho gam mi 'jal na/_dge sbyong 
[\[85a.3\]]mgo reg nye dga' la 'jal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes kun du rjod par byed do/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]tshong pa de dag gis bdag la mang po zhig khas blangs pas yang de kho na bzhin du mi lta bar song na mi rung gis mtshan ma dang bcas pa kho nar langs te/_de dag gi drung du 'gro bar 
[\[85a.4\]]bya'o snyam du bsams nas des snam sbyar bgos te srang du song ba dang /_tshong pa de dag kyang zong bkram ste 'tshong bar byed nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de dag la mtshan ma bstan par brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa je zong bsgyur bar bgyis bzhud cig dang bdag 
[\[85a.5\]]cag mchis te dbul bar bgyi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gal te bden na'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyod ni 'gal bar bgyi ba ma lags kyis bzhud cig_/nye dga' song ste myur ba myur bar gtsug lag khang du song nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_lhung bzed 
[\[85a.6\]]'khru zhing phyogs su rnam par lta bar byed do/_/de bzhin du gzhon nu zhig gis smras pa/_gnas brtan ci'i slad du phan tshun rnam par gzigs par mdzad/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo'i mdza' bshes tshong pa dag zong thogs te mnyan yod du zhugs pa 
[\[85a.7\]]de dag lta'o/_/gzhon nu des smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod ji tsam na zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa de tsam na de dag dong lags so/_/nye dga' rgya cher mi bzod pa skyes nas mgo bsigs te kho bo de dag gis lan gnyis su bslus kyis/_da ni gal te de dag mthong na gang 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]gis phyin chad tshong par mi 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i khrims 'char gzhug go snyam du sems so/_/ji tsam na yang tshong pa de dag de kho na bzhin du 'ongs pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis yang dang yang du kho bo bslus pas/_da ni gang bya ba de ltos shig_/
[\[85b.2\]]de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bzod par mdzod cig_/bdag cag tshong pa dag ni rtag tu 'jal tshongs kyis sems g.yengs pa lags pas da ni sngar mchid kyis 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /_slad kyis mchid kyis 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dang gzhan 
[\[85b.3\]]thams cad kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]gal te 'di dag la gzu lums su 'dzud par byas na shes par 'gyur gyis mthun par brjod par bya'o snyam du shes shing rig nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag nges par 'bul lam/_'phags pa nges par 'bul lo/_/
[\[85b.4\]]gal te de lta na khyed cag la nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur tam/_kho bo cag la yang gtsug lag khang gi drung du tshong pa dag tshong pa ma yin par rnam par gzhag par gyur na ma legs kyis re zhig lam lta ba de srid kyi bar du sdod cig_/de dag sdod pa dang nye 
[\[85b.5\]]dga' de na sho gam pa dag gi drung du song ngo /_/de'i tshe na sho gam pa dag shes ldan dag tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gis sho gam dral cing sge'u chung nas 'jug pas lo tang 'du ba mi 'byung la dus la ni bab/_rgyal po ni gtum pas bdag cag bu dang /_chung ma dang /_
[\[85b.6\]]rtsa lag dang bcas pa btson rar bcug ste gsad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do zhes zer zhing sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de dag de ltar sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa na nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyed cag ci'i phyir/_'di ltar sems khong du 
[\[85b.7\]]chud cing 'dug_/'phags pa ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi mchi/_tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gis sho gam dral cing sge'u chung nas 'jug pas lo tang 'du ba mi 'byung la dus la ni bab/_rgyal po ni gtum pas bdag cag bu dang /_chung ma dang /_rtsa lag dag 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]dang bcas pa btson rar bcug ste gsad par 'gyur ba gang lags pa/_de lta bu'i gnas mchis so/_/bkren pa dag khyed cag sus sho gam gyi gnas su bzhag_/khyed cag ni lcag rgod mang pos brims las skyed pa'am/_shing 'cheg tu gzhug par bya ba yin no/_/
[\[86a.2\]]ci'i phyir khyed kyis tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba gcig tsam yang nor thams cad dang bral bar mi byed/_'phags pa mnyan yod ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can lags kyi nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ma lags pas ji ltar nor thams cad dang bral bar bgyi/_bkren pa dag mnyan 
[\[86a.3\]]yod ni nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin gyi kun shes pa'i sho gam can ma yin no/_/'phags pa bdag cag gis yun de srid du sho gam bsgrubs na lan 'ga' yang nyes pa bgyid pa'i sho gam can ma lags na/_da ji ltar nyes pa bgyid pa'i sho gam can du 'gyur/_bkren 
[\[86a.4\]]pa dag sdod cig dang nga song la tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gtang bar byas/_de dag khyed kyis zung la nor thams cad dang bral bar gyis shig_/gal te mnyan yod ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin gyi nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ni ma yin no zhes zer na/_mnyan yod 
[\[86a.5\]]ni nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin gyi kun shes pa'i sho gam can ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te yun de srid du kho bo cag tshong pa'i tha snyad byed pa na/_lan 'ga' yang mnyan yod nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ma yin na/_da nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du 
[\[86a.6\]]gyur tam/_tshur shog tshong pa'i tshogs kyi nang du 'dong ngo /_/zhes zer na rgyal po'i pho brang du bkri bar bya'o/_/gal te rgyal po na re shes ldan dag yun de srid du nga'i rgyal srid byed du bcug na/_lan 'ga' yang ngas mnyan yod nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du ma thos na/_
[\[86a.7\]]da nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du gyur tam zhes zer na/_rgyal po a ra da tshangs byin tshong pa'i tshogs dang bcas pas gang skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa 'am/_lha'i gnas che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug pa la de la ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin la/_gang 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug pa de la nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin no/_/zhes khrims su bya ba rnam par bzhag pa gang lags pa de lha la brtsan nam zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te brtsan no zhes zer na/_
[\[86b.2\]]lha mdzod che ge mo zhig na sgrom mchis pa de na zangs ma'i glegs bu la yi ge bris pa mchis pa de lhas gzigs su gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/_/ji tsam na sho gam pa de dag gis tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba de dag bzung ste nor thams cad dang bral bar byas pa na tshong pa de dag 
[\[86b.3\]]gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir kho bo cag nor thams cad dang bral bar byed/_mnyan yod ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin gyi nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ni ma yin no/_/sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/_mnyan yod ni nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin gyi kun 
[\[86b.4\]]shes pa'i sho gam can ni ma yin no/_/tshong pa dag gis smras pa/_yun de srid du kho bo cag tshong pa'i tha snyad byed byed na lan 'ga' yang mnyan yod nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ma yin na da nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du gyur tam/_tshur shog tshong pa'i tshogs kyi nang du 
[\[86b.5\]]'dong ngo /_/sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/_tshong pa'i tshogs kyi nang du mi 'gros tshur shog_/rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo zhes de dag 'khang bzhin du mthus rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid pa dang /_de dag gis tshong pa'i tshogs la shes ldan dag kho bo cag sho gam pa dag gis nor 
[\[86b.6\]]thams cad dang bral bar byas kyis grogs gyis shig ces ra mda' zlog pa'i skad phyung ngo /_/tshong pa'i tshogs kyang de dag dang lhan cig rgyal po'i spyan sngar song nas/_lha khyod kyi rgyal srid la sho gam pa dag gis tshong pa glo bur du lhags pa dag nor thams cad dang bral bar 
[\[86b.7\]]bgyis kyis yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes smras so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la shes ldan dag sho gam pa dag khug shig ces bsgo nas blon po rnams kyis sho gam pa dag bkug pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed kyis tshong pa dag nor 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]thams cad dang bral bar byas/_sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/_lha tshong pa 'di dag ni sho gam 'dral ba lags la/_mnyan yod ni nyes pa bgyid pa'i sho gam can lags pas de'i slad du bdag cag gis 'di dag nor thams cad dang bral bar bgyis so/_/
[\[87a.2\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag yun de srid du nga'i rgyal srid byed du bcug na lan 'ga' yang ngas mnyan yod nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du ma thos na/_da nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du gyur tam/_sho gam yang dag pa long la thong shig_/sho gam pa dag gis smras 
[\[87a.3\]]pa/_rgyal po a ra da tshangs byin tshong pa'i tshogs dang bcas pas gang skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa 'am/_lha yi gnas che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug pa de la ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin la/_gang skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas 
[\[87a.4\]]che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug pa de la ni gnod pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin no zhes khrims su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa gang lags pa de lha la brtsan nam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i yab kyis mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brgya byin gyis mdzad pa/_tshangs 
[\[87a.5\]]pas mdzad pa yin te mchog tu brtsan no/_/sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/_lha mdzod che ge mo zhig na sgrom mchis pa de na zangs ma'i glegs bu la yi ge bris pa mchis pa de lhas gzigs su gsol/_rgyal pos gtogs par byas pa dag la zangs ma'i glegs bu de 
[\[87a.6\]]'on cig_/ces bsgo nas blangs te bklags pa dang /_rgyal pos pha'i bsngags pa thos nas mchi ma dang bcas pa'i skad kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i yab kyis mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brgya byin gyis mdzad pa/_tshangs pas mdzad pa yin te/_gal te nor 
[\[87a.7\]]thams cad dang bral bar byas na legs so/_/tshong pa de dag re ba med par gyur nas mchi ma dang bcas pa'i skad kyis dong nas de dag gis sho gam pa de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed la sus sbran pa smros shig_/sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag la su 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]zhig sbron par 'gyur/_kho bo cag nyid kyis shes mod kyi 'on kyang kho bo cag khyed la snying rje bas yal bar bor ro/_/khyed cag ha cang bya ba byed par brtsams pas des na kho bo cag mi bzod pa skyes so/_/tshong pa dag gis smras pa/_khyed la snying rje ga la yod/_smros shig 
[\[87b.2\]]dang kho bo cag khyed dang mdza' bor 'gyur ro/_/sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa drug sde dag gis so/_/tshong pa de dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa yin no/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa yin te/_gang la de ltar gzhan gyi 'tsho 
[\[87b.3\]]ba la yang gnod par byed do zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka btong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis gzhan gyi 'tsho ba la gnod par mi bya'o/_/
[\[87b.4\]]gnod pa byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_rkang med dang ni rkang gnyis dang /_/rkang bzhi pa dang rkang [{]mangs kyi[,]mang gi[}]/_/sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/_/rkang med ces bya ba ni sbrul dang pad pa dang /_srog chags dri'u srin dag go/_/de dag ni gsum gyis 
[\[87b.5\]]sogs par byed de sbrul khas sdigs pa dag dang /_rgyal po'i sman pa dag dang /_kha lungs pa'i ya ba na dag gis so/_/ji ltar sbrul khas sdigs pa dag gis she na/_'di ltar sbrul khas sdigs pa dag sbrul la brten te 'tsho bar byed pa ste/_de ltar sbrul khas sdigs pa dag 
[\[87b.6\]]gis so/_/ji ltar rgyal po'i sman pa dag gis she na/_'di ltar rgyal po'i sman pa dag pad pa la brten te 'tsho bar byed pa ste/_de ltar rgyal po'i sman pa dag gis so/_/ji ltar kha lungs pa'i ya ba dag gis she na/_'di ltar kha lungs pa'i ya ba na dag srog chags dri'u srin 
[\[87b.7\]]dag bag bye son par byed/_sa 'byin par byed cing sla nga la rngod par byed de de dag de 'cha' zhing myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba rnam pa du ma 'thung bar byed de/_de ltar kha lungs pa'i ya ba na dag gis so/_/dge slong gis srog chags rkang med dag rku bar byed na/_srog chags 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]rkang med dag gi rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la/_dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rkang gnyis zhes bya ba ni mi rnams dang /_bya kha cig go/_/mi rnams ni rnam pa gsum gyis rku ste/_yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_
[\[88a.2\]]mtshan mas so/_/ji ltar yul phyogs kyis she na/_gang gi tshe kho bo skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa'am/_lha'i gnas che ge mo zhig tu mthong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis bya ba de byas par shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/_de ltar yul phyogs kyis so/_/ji ltar brdas she na/_
[\[88a.3\]]gang gi tshe kho bo snga dro 'am/_gung tshigs sam/_phyi 'bred mthong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis bya ba de byas par shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/_de ltar brdas so/_/ji ltar mtshan mas she na/_gang gi tshe kho bo skra dang /_kha spu bregs nas ring por ma lon pa'am/_snam sbyar dmar ser 
[\[88a.4\]]ram/_zha nye'i dbyar 'dab kyis glan pa'i lhung bzed dam/_khar ba sbubs can nam/_zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_'bru mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed dam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i lhung bzed thogs par mthong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis bya ba de byas par shes par gyis 
[\[88a.5\]]shig ces bya ba ste/_de ltar mtshan mas so/_/dge slong gis mi rku bar byed na mi'i rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la/_dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bya ni rnam pa gnyis kyis rku ste/_sbar ba dang /_mngon sum du babs pas 
[\[88a.6\]]so/_/ji ltar sbar bas she na/_'di ltar dge slong gis bya sbar te rku bar byed na bya'i rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la/_dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sbar bas so/_/ji ltar mngon sum du babs pas she na/_'di ltar 
[\[88a.7\]]bya ba'am/_bya ba'i slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bya drungs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /_chud gzan par bya ba'i phyir dang /_tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir nags mes btang bar gyur cing de na bya kha cig du bas khyab cing 'khrugs par gyur nas/_dge slong rnams 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]kyi 'chag sa dag tu babs sam/_dag ra dag gam/_sgo khang dag tu babs par gyur pa na/_dge slong gis de ltar babs pa'i bya rku bar byed na/_bya'i rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la/_dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te/_de ltar 
[\[88b.2\]]mngon sum du babs pas so//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug pa/_rkang bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_ra dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_ma he dang /_phag dag go/_/de dag ni rnam pa gnyis 
[\[88b.3\]]kyis rku ste/_khyu nas dgar ba dang /_brtod pas so/_/ji ltar khyu nas dgar bas she na/_dge slong gis glang po che khyu nas dgar bas rku bar byed na/_ji srid mig sngar snang ba de srid du nyes pa sbom por 'gyur la/_mig sngar mi snang bar gyur na brkus par brjod par bya ste/_rin 
[\[88b.4\]]thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la/_dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te/_de ltar khyu nas dgar bas so/_/ji ltar brtod pas she na/_dge slong gis glang po che brtod pa sna tshogs shing ljon pa'am/_rtsig pa'am/_gzhan dag la brtod par byed na/_
[\[88b.5\]]ji srid mig sngar snang ba de srid du nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mig sngar mi snang bar gyur na brkus par brjod par bya ste/_rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la/_dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te/_de ltar brtod pas so/_/glang po che 
[\[88b.6\]]la ji lta ba bzhin du rta la sogs pa rkang bzhi pa lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin no/_/rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]zhes bya ba ni grog mo dang /_phye ma leb dang /_til dang /_phub ma dang /_rul pa za ba dang /_sdig pa dang /_t+ya ma bu ka dang /_tre'i la ta dag go/_/de dag ni gsum gyis 
[\[88b.7\]]sogs par byed/_de gnod byed dag dang /_grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag dang /_rgya mtsho'i tshong pa dag gis so/_/ji ltar gnod byed dag gis she na/_'di ltar gnod byed dag gis srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag gis bum pa so btang ba bkang ste/_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'jog par byed cing de dag gis gang gi tshe chad pas gcad pa dag khrid de/_de dag gi rkang pa'am/_lag pa bum pa de dag gi nang du 'dzud par byed cing /_de dag de dag gis zin pa na myur du dbya dang /_gsug mang po 'jal bar byed de/_de ltar gnod byed 
[\[89a.2\]]dag gis so/_/ji ltar grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag gis she na/_'di ltar grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag gis srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag gis bum pa so ma btang ba bkang ste/_'jog par byed cing de dag gis gang gi tshe pha rol gyi dpung 
[\[89a.3\]]'ong ba de'i tshe de dang lhan cig g.yul sprod par byed pa na/_gal te de dag gis 'joms par nus na de lta na legs/_gal te mi nus na srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag gis bkang ba'i bum pa so ma btang ba ra ba la gnas pa 'phen par byed cing de dag srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]
[\[89a.4\]]dag gis zin pa na 'byer bar 'gyur te/_de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag gis so/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i tshong pa dag gis she na/_'di ltar rgya mtsho'i tshong pa dag gis srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag gis bum pa so ma btang ba bkang ste/_rgya mtsho'i 
[\[89a.5\]]gru sbyar nas nor sgrub pa dag rgya mtsho chen po rgal ba na der de dag la chom rkun pa rtags mtshan sngon po'am/_nag po can dag 'ong zhing /_gru 'joms par byed pa na tshong pa dag gis de dag dang /_lhan cig g.yul sprod par byed pa na/_gal te de dag gis 'joms 
[\[89a.6\]]par byed nus na de lta na legs/_gal te mi nus na srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag gis bkang ba'i bum pa so ma btang ba 'phen par byed cing /_de dag srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag gis zin pa na/_'byer bar 'gyur te/_de ltar rgya mtsho'i tshong pa dag gis so/_/dge 
[\[89a.7\]]slong gis srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag rku bar byed na/_srog chags rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag gi rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la/_dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_gdol pa dang ni bag rdzangs can/_/snam sbyar re zhig dus dang 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]ni/_/mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ni nor gyis byin/_/rang gir shes pas lhung bzed len/_/mi pham dang ni zla bas sbas/_/bdag nyid sun 'byin rku ba yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan 
[\[89b.2\]]yod na dge slong gdol pa dang bag rdzangs can zhes bya ba gtam 'dre ba/_phebs par smra ba/_'grogs bshes/_smos 'drin gnas skabs mnyam par spyod pa gnyis shig 'khod de/_de la gdol pa ni grags pa dang /_bsod nams che ba yin mod kyi lus chung ste/_de la lhung 
[\[89b.3\]]bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag yod do/_/bag rdzangs can ni lus che ba yin mod kyi grags pa dang /_bsod nams chung ste/_chos gos gsum lhur len cing de'i chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings 
[\[89b.4\]]pa yin no/_/dge slong rnams kyis bag rdzangs can la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod te por 'dod pa chung bar gyur na/_ci'i phyir bdag nyid gcer bur ston par byed/_ci rnyed pas sam/_ma rnyed pas/_bag rdzangs can gyis smras pa/_ma rnyed pas so/_/ci'i phyir sbyor du mi 
[\[89b.5\]]'dzud/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun spangs te/_su zhig kho bo la sbyin par byed/_dge slong gdol pa de khyod kyi gtam 'dre ba/_phebs par smra ba/_'grogs bshes/_smos 'drin yin la/_de la lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor 
[\[89b.6\]]bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag yod na ci'i phyir de la mi slong /_bag rdzangs can gyis smras pa/_mi ster ro/_/ci khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' bslangs sam/_lan 'ga' yang ma bslangs so/_/ci chu'i sgra kho nas lham dag 'bud par byed dam/_song la slongs shig dang ster ro/_/
[\[89b.7\]]bag rdzangs can de dge slong de dag gis spro bar byas nas gdol pa'i gan du song ba dang /_gdol pa med nas bag rdzangs can gyis gdol pa ni lus chung ba yin pas je 'di'i chos gos gzhal bar bya ste/_gal te bdag gi lus kyi tshad du 'gyur na bslang bar bya'i/_gal 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]te mi 'gyur na ci'i phyir de drin bgrang du gzhug par bya snyam du bsams nas/_bag rdzangs can gdol pa'i gnas khang du zhugs te snam sbyar blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na chos gos kyi gdang la snam sbyar dmar ser 'dug pa mthong nas/_bag rdzangs 
[\[90a.2\]]can gyis phog ste/_gyon zhing bsnyams nas/_ngos dang ngos la rtog par byed pa na gdol pa 'ongs te mthong ma thag tu smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyis snam sbyar 'di rku sems kyis blangs so/_/bag rdzangs can gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bos rku sems kyis ma 
[\[90a.3\]]blangs te/_'di ltar kho bo la gdol pa ni lus chung ba yin pas je 'di'i chos gos gzhal bar bya ste/_gal te bdag gi lus kyi tshad du 'gyur na bslang bar bya'i/_gal te mi 'gyur na yo byad don med pa 'di ci bya snyam pa'i blo skyes so/_/gdol pas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[90a.4\]]ci'i phyir gzhan nas gzhan du 'phro bar byed/_khyod kyis rku sems kyis blangs pas khyod la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ngo /_/bag rdzangs can bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/_des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod do/_/dge 
[\[90a.5\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa/_dge slong khyod kyis bsam pa ji lta bus snam sbyar de bgos/_bag rdzangs can gyis ji ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[90a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong dpyod pa'i bsam pa can 'di la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong gis yid gcugs pa ma yin pa la yid gcugs pa bskyed par mi bya'o/_/'di ltar mdza' bshes ni gsum ste/_tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_chen po'o/_/de la 
[\[90a.7\]]mdza' bshes tha ma la ni yid gcugs pa chung ngu bya'i/_'bring yang mi bya/_chen po yang mi bya'o/_/mdza' bshes 'bring la ni yid gcugs pa chung ngu dang /_'bring bya'i chen po mi bya'o/_/mdza' bshes chen po la ni yid gcugs pa chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]yang bya'o/_/dge slong gis yid gcugs pa ma yin pa la yid gcugs pa skyed par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong mtshan 
[\[90b.2\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_nor gyis byin zhes bya ba gtam 'dre ba/_phebs par smra ba/_'grogs bshes smos 'drin mtshungs par 'don pa gnyis shig 'khod de/_mtshan [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]lhung bzed ni mdzes pa/_gsal ba/_zlum pa/_longs spyad bzod pa yin la/_nor gyis byin gyi lhung 
[\[90b.3\]]bzed chung ngu yang mdzes pa/_gsal ba/_zlum pa/_longs spyad bzod pa yin no/_/de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na zas kyi bya ba byas te/_'chags na lhung bzed 'khru ba'i tshe mtshan [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]nor gyis byin dbang ba'i lhung bzed chung ngu rang gis lhung bzed du bcug ste smras 
[\[90b.4\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nor gyis byin gang la lhung bzed dang lhung bzed chung ngu 'di lta bu bdog pa de ni snying las chung ngus dge ba'i phyogs spyod par byed do/_/nor gyis byin gyis smras pa/_gal te thob na khyer cig_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nor gyis byin la ri brag shig tu bya ba 
[\[90b.5\]]chung zhig byung nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la ri brag shig tu bya ba chung zhig byung na/_kho bo'i bya ba de byed pa de la kho bos lhung bzed chung ngu sbyin no/_/mtshan [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_sbyin nam/_sbyin no/_/thabs yin no/_/mtshan [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]thabs 
[\[90b.6\]]yin no/_/zhes byas nas bdag la gzhi 'dis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni gla rngan gyis las byed do/_/zhes zer bar 'gyur ro snyam nas 'gyod pa skyes te de ma song ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la ri brag der bdag nyid kyi bya ba zhig 
[\[90b.7\]]byung nas/_des song la de gnyi ga byas te phyir 'ong ngo snyam du bsams nas mtshan [{]bzangs so[,]bzang ngo [}]nga ste gnyi ga byas nas phyir 'ongs te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nor gyis byin kho bos khyod kyi dgos pa de bsgrubs kyis lhung bzed chung ngu byin cig_/nor gyis byin gyis smras pa/_khyed 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]bdag nyid kyi dgos pa la song ba yin gyi/_kho bo'i dgos pa la song ba ma yin pas kho bos mi sbyin no/_/mtshan [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_gal te mi sbyin na kho bo rang nyid kyis blang bar bya'o/_/gal te thob na'o/_/ji tsam na nor gyis byin phyir byung ba de na 
[\[91a.2\]]mtshan [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]lhung bzed chung ngu blangs te rang gi lhung bzed du bcug ste bzhag go/_/ji tsam na nor gyis byin 'ongs pa na lhung bzed chung ngu mi snang nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo'i lhung bzed chung ngu sus blangs mtshan [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_su dbang bas 
[\[91a.3\]]so/_/su dbang /_kho bo dbang ngo /_/nor gyis byin gyis spyos te smras pa/_khyod kyis rku sems kyis blangs pas khyod la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ngo /_/mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/_des skabs 
[\[91a.4\]]de dge slong rnams la brjod do/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod kyis bsam pa ji lta bus lhung bzed chung ngu de blangs/_des ji ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 
[\[91a.5\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong rang gi 'du shes pas lhung bzed chung ngu blangs pa 'di la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong gis gla rngan gyis las mi bya bar 'di ltar lag pod dam/_bsod nams 'dod pas 
[\[91a.6\]]las bya'o/_/dge slong gis gla rngan gyis las byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong mi pham dang /_zla bas sbas zhes bya ba 
[\[91a.7\]]gtam 'dre ba/_phebs par smra ba/_'grogs bshes smos 'drin gnyis shig 'khod de/_zla bas sbas ni grags pa dang /_bsod nams che ba yin te/_de la lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag yod do/_/mi pham ni 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]grags pa dang /_bsod nams chung ste/_chos gos gsum lhur len cing de'i chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings pa yin no/_/dge slong rnams kyis mi pham pa la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod te por 'dod pa chung bar gyur na ci'i phyir bdag nyid gcer 
[\[91b.2\]]bur ston par byed/_ci rnyed pas sam/_ma rnyed pas/_mi pham gyis smras pa/_ma rnyed pas so/_/ci'i phyir sbyor du mi 'dzud/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun spangs te su zhig kho bo la sbyin par byed/_dge slong zla bas sbas de khyod kyi gtam 'dre ba/_phebs 
[\[91b.3\]]par smra ba/_'grogs bshes/_smos 'drin yin la/_de la lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags lhag pa dag yod na ci'i phyir de la mi slong /_mi pham gyis smras pa/_mi ster ro/_/ci khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' bslangs sam/_lan 'ga' 
[\[91b.4\]]yang ma bslangs so/_/ci'i phyir chu'i sgra go nas lham dag 'bud par byed dam/_song la slongs shig dang ster ro/_/mi pham de dge slong de dag gis spro bar byas nas zla bas sbas kyi gan du song ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa zla bas sbas bdag la lhung bzed byin cig_/zla bas 
[\[91b.5\]]sbas kyis smras pa/_mi sbyin no/_/mi pham gyis smras pa/_gal te lhung bzed mi sbyin na chos gos byin cig_/zla bas sbas kyis smras pa/_ci kho bo khyod kyis sbyin bdag mgo reg tu mthong ngam khyod la kha tshar yang yongs su mi gtang na/_chos gos lta smos kyang ci dgos/_
[\[91b.6\]]mi pham gyis spyos te/_kho bo 'di'i 'phral gyi bya ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba yin na/_'di de skad ces kha tshar yang khyod la yongs su mi gtang na/_chos gos lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes zer ro snyam du bsams nas/_mi pham gyis smras pa/_deng gos thams cad ma 
[\[91b.7\]]phrogs na mi pham zhes bya ba'i ming mi gzung ngo zhes mi pham de nam zhig na 'di'i chos gos dag brku bar bya snyam du skabs tshol zhing de lhur len bzhin du sdod do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na zla bas sbas la btso blag gi las nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang /_mi pham de zla bas sbas 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]kyi drung du song ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa zla bas sbas kho bos kyang grogs bya'o/_/zla bas sbas kyis smras pa/_ma nyes kyis de bzhin gyis shig_/mi pham de zla bas sbas kyi chos gos dag 'tshed par byed/_byi dor byed/_'dren par byed cing zlog cing 
[\[92a.2\]]zlog cing rtog par byed do/_/zla bas sbas kyis 'di 'di ltar lta bas bdag gi chos gos dag zlog cing zlog cing rtog par byed pa las na gdon mi za bar bdag gi chos gos 'di dag rku bar byed do/_/snyam du bsams nas zla bas sbas dogs pa dang bcas pas chos gos dag 
[\[92a.3\]]kha bsgyur nas gtur bur bcug ste de dag sngas su bcug nas nyal lo/_/dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par spyod pas mi pham gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa zla bas sbas tshur shog_/dge ba'i phyogs byed du 'dong /_
[\[92a.4\]]zla bas sbas kyis smras pa/_khyod song shig kho bo ngal bas phyi bzhin 'ong ngo /_/mi pham pa tshe dang ldan pa shog shig ces zer te phyir byung ngo /_/zla bas sbas kyis gal te 'gro na ni chos gos dag rlag par 'gyur/_'on te mi 'gro na ni bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams 
[\[92a.5\]]par 'gyur na/_gang gi phyir bdag gi chos gos dag kyang rlag par mi 'gyur la/_dge ba'i phyogs kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam du sems shing rig nas/_bdag nyid kyi gtur bu mi pham gyi sngas su bcug ste/_mi pham dbang ba'i gtur bu bdag 
[\[92a.6\]]nyid kyi sngas su bcug nas nyal lo/_/dge slong dag gis nam gyi cha smad la kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang /_zla bas sbas kyis mi pham la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mi pham longs la dge ba'i phyogs spyod cig_/mi pham gyis smras pa/_kho bos dge ba'i phyogs byas 
[\[92a.7\]]zin gyi/_da khyod song la dge ba'i phyogs spyod cig_/kho bo ngal ba ngal ba sos so zhes zla bas sbas dge ba'i phyogs kyi ched du song ngo /_/mi pham gyis re zhig dus ni snang na lam gyi dus yin nam ma yin snyam du bsams nas/_dus bzang po mthong ba dang /_de zla 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bas sbas kyi sngas nas bdag nyid kyi gtur bu khyer te song ngo /_/ji tsam na mtshan mo nam nangs par gyur pa dang /_des re zhig chos gos ci 'dra ba dag gis bdag pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung ba blta'o snyam du bsams nas/_ji tsam na bdag nyid kyi rnyang rnying dag 
[\[92b.2\]]mthong nas yid mi bde bar gyur te/_bdag nyid kyi chos gos dag kho nas bdag pham par gyur gyis lcags kyi thu lum 'cha' bas ci bya/_phyir 'babs par bya'o snyam mo/_/des yang je bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar byas te/_gal te skal ba yod par 
[\[92b.3\]]gyur na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o/_/'on te skal ba med na ni phyir 'babs so snyam du bsams nas/_de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi mdun na chos ston 
[\[92b.4\]]pa'i phyir bzhugs shing chos ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mi pham thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba'i dge slong de mthong ngam/_btsun 
[\[92b.5\]]pa mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag mi pham mi gti mug can 'di ni rang gi chos gos rnyang rnying dag gis nyes pa sbom po'i ltung ba byung ngo /_/dge slong dag de ltar rku sems la ni nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang yod pas de'i phyir dge slong gis rku sems kyis rang gi lhung 
[\[92b.6\]]bzed dang /_chos gos kyang blang bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis rku sems kyis rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos len na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_snam sbyar 'phyang bar gyur pa dang /_/bgam phyir 'bru mar slong ba dang /_/khyim bdag bu dang 
[\[92b.7\]]tsha bo dang /_/lha 'bangs pi lin da yi bu/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong ma shar nas skyes pa dang /_lho nas skyes pa gnyis shig 'dug ste/_shar nas 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]skyes pa ni mdun du 'gro ba'i dge slong ma yin/_lho nas skyes pa ni phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong ma yin no/_/de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing spyan sngar song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[93a.2\]]'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la chos bstan nas/_de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te dong ba dang /_shar nas skyes pa mdun du 'gro ba de'i snam sbyar phrag pa la gyon pa 'phyang bar gyur nas/_lho nas skyes 
[\[93a.3\]]pa phyi bzhin 'ong bas smras pa/_'phags ma a ba sa Tha a ba sa Tha/_shar nas skyes pa de chos kyi shugs thob pas mi sems pas/_snam sbyar ltung bar gyur nas/_lho nas skyes pas blangs te/_des 'di ltar bdag gis da phul na/_'phags ma'i dge ba'i phyogs 
[\[93a.4\]]yongs su nyams par 'gyur bas dbyar khang du phyin nas dbul bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_de gnyis dbyar khang du son pa dang /_shar nas skyes pa myur ba myur ba kho nar gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs 
[\[93a.5\]]te skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug go/_/lho nas skyes pas gal te phul na nyes dmigs de kho na bstabs par 'gyur bas re zhig phyis langs pa la dbul lo snyam du bsams nas/_des snam sbyar de rang gi gnas khang du khyer te chos gos kyi gdang la bzhag go/_/
[\[93a.6\]]ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig na mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /_shar nas skyes pas smras pa/_gzhon nu ma snam sbyar khyer shog_/bsod snyoms la 'gro'o/_/gzhon nu ma de gnas khang du zhugs te/_chos gos kyi gdang la bltas pa dang /_snam sbyar ma mthong 
[\[93a.7\]]nas des smras pa/_'phags ma snam sbyar ma mchis so/_/shar nas skyes pas smras pa/_lho nas skyes pa'i gnas khang du ltos shig_/gzhon nu ma de lho nas skyes pa'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /_chos gos kyi gdang la snam sbyar bzhag pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]mthong nas kyang sus 'phags ma'i snam sbyar 'di 'dir khyer snyam du sems so/_/lho nas skyes pas thos nas des smras pa/_kho mos khyer te 'ongs so/_/ci'i phyir lho nas skyes pas ji ltar gyur pa de la go bar byas so/_/dge slong ma de de la nang dang bcas pas 
[\[93b.2\]]gshe zhing smras pa/_khyod kyis rku sems kyis rang gi gnas khang du bcug ste/_bzhag pas khyod la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ngo /_/lho nas skyes pa'i dge slong ma de bdag la yang dag pa kho nar pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod 
[\[93b.3\]]pa skyes nas des skabs de dge slong ma rnams la brjod pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma de la rmas pa/_dge slong ma khyod 
[\[93b.4\]]kyis a ba sa Tha zhes brjod pa ci'i tha tshig_/btsun pa yul dbus na nar pa dang /_lhung ba gang lags pa de la bdag cag a ba sa Tha zhes mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma 'di la ni skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang /_
[\[93b.5\]]yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang /_ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig gis ltung ba med mod kyi/_'on kyang nyes dmigs gang yin pa de thams cad gzhan gyi dngos po lhung ba yun ring du 'chang ba las gyur pa yin pas de lta bas na dge slong ngam/_dge slong mas gzhan 
[\[93b.6\]]gyi dngos po lhung ba yun ring du bcang bar mi bya ste/_'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ngam dge slong mas gzhan gyi dngos po lhung ba yun ring du bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs nas/_dge slong zhig gis gzhan gyi 
[\[93b.7\]]dngos po lhung ba mthong nas 'di dge slong che ge mo zhig gi yin no zhes ngo shes nas dge slong de'i gnas khang du song ste dal bus khad kyis khad kyis sgo gtan la brdungs pa dang /_dge slong de ting nge 'dzin las langs nas smras pa/_'di su/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]pa khyod kyi dngos po lhung ba 'di kho bos mthong gis long shig_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo la dngos po de ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus par gyur pa ni bla'i/_kho bo khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma bzang po 'di 'dra ba las bslang ba ni 
[\[94a.2\]]ma yin no/_/dge slong de bdag la dge slong ting nge 'dzin las bslang bas ltung ba dang bcas par ma gyur tam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/_des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[94a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong gis dge slong don de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las bslang bar mi bya bar 'di ltar de'i mngon sum du gzar thag la btags te gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong zhig gis gzhan gyi dngos 
[\[94a.4\]]po lhung ba mthong nas des 'di dge slong che ge mo zhig gi yin no zhes ngo shes nas des de khyer te dge slong de'i drung du song nas/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dngos po lhung ba 'di kho bos mthong gis long shig_/dge slong de de la nang dang bcas pa yin pas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[94a.5\]]khyod kyis 'di ltung ba mthong ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar khyod kyis rku sems kyis brkus so/_/dge slong de bdag ltung ba dang bcas par ma gyur tam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes par gyur nas/_des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[94a.6\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med mod kyi 'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong gi yo byad lhung ba mthong na dge skos la gtad par bya zhing /_dge skos kyis kyang nyi ma gnyis sam/_gsum du dge 'dun gyi nang du brim 
[\[94a.7\]]par bya zhing gal te ngo shes pa yod na gtad par bya'o/_/gal te med na dge 'dun gyis ci bder bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong ma ri ma zhes bya ba dgra bcom 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]pa rnam par rgyal bar bya ba las rnam par rgyal ba zhig 'dug pa de la spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig mngon par dad par gyur nas/_des de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_'phags ma khyod la ci dang ci 'tshal ba de'i slad du bka' stsol cig dang thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o 
[\[94b.2\]]zhes yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa dang /_des kyang bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]a rog gya de ltar bya'o zhes dang du blangs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong ma ri ma na bar gyur nas bsod snyoms la ma song zhing dge slong ma dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_spos 
[\[94b.3\]]'tshong gi khye'u des de dag la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags ma dag 'phags ma ri ma re zhig mi gda' na gar bzhud zhu'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thugs mi bde'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags ma de la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis 
[\[94b.4\]]bstabs na des bdag la lan 'ga' yang cung zad kyang ma bslangs na de'i slad du gal te de la 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig mchis na spyon la snoms shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin bzang a rog gya de bzhin bya'o zhes smras te dong ngo /_/des de bzhin lan gsum gyi bar 
[\[94b.5\]]du bstabs pa dang /_de na gzhon nu ma zhig gis spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'di yang dang yang du stobs par byed na/_ci 'di'i yang dag par stobs pas stobs par byed dam/_'on te rtog pas stobs par byed pa bgam par bya'o snyam du bsams nas des de la 'phags 
[\[94b.6\]]ma ri ma la 'bru mar dgos so zhes lhung bzed chung ngu phul ba dang /_des de nyid la 'phral la btsir ba'i 'bru mar gyis lhung bzed chung ngu bkang ste byin nas smras pa/_'phags ma gal te yang de 'tshal ba cung zad mchis/_spyon la snoms shig gzhon nu ma des bzhin 
[\[94b.7\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]a rog gya de ltar bya'o zhes smras te song nas/_des 'bru mar de dge slong ma ri ma'i lag pa'i bsku mnye dang /_rkang pa'i bsku mnye dang /_mgo dang lus kyi bsku mnye dang mar me'i 'bru mar du spyad do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong ma ri ma nad sos te bsod 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_spos 'tshong gi khye'u des mthong nas/_des phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags ma ha cang yun ring zhig gis mthong ngo /_/des smras pa/_bu bdag bro 'tshal bar gyur to/_/'phags ma bdag gis yo byad thams cad 
[\[95a.2\]]kyis bstabs na/_khyod kyi yan lag 'ga' yang cung zad kyang bka' ma stsal nas/_'di ltar 'phags ma gcig cig mchis te 'phags ma ri ma la 'bru mar 'tshal lo zhes mchis nas/_bdag gis de nyid kyi sug par 'bru mar 'phral la btsir bas lhung bzed chung 
[\[95a.3\]]ngu bkang ste stsal to/_/des smras pa/_a rog gya ma nongs so zhes smras te/_song nas bsod snyoms brgyus te dbyar khang du phyin nas smras pa/_gzhon nu ma khyod kyis kho mo'i ming gis spos 'tshong gi khye'u che ge mo zhig las lan gcig 'bru mar bslangs sam/_gzhon 
[\[95a.4\]]nu ma des smras pa/_'phags ma bdag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na des lan gsum gyi bar du 'phags ma ri ma la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na/_des bdag la lan 'ga' yang cung zad kyang ma bslangs na/_gal te 'phags ma la 'tshal ba 
[\[95a.5\]]cung zad mchis na spyon la snoms shig ces mchi nas/_bdag la 'di yang dang yang du stobs na ci 'di yang dag par stobs pas stobs par bgyid dam/_'on te rtog pas stobs par bgyid pa bgam mo snyam pa'i blo byung nas bdag gis de la 'phags ma ri ma la 'bru 
[\[95a.6\]]mar 'tshal lo zhes lhung bzed chung ngu phul ba dang /_des 'bru mar gyis lhung bzed chung ngu bltam ste stsal nas bdag gis des 'phags ma'i phyag dang /_zhabs dang /_dbu dang /_sku'i bsku mnye dang /_zhugs mar gyi 'bru mar du spyad do/_/des smras pa/_ci kho mos 
[\[95a.7\]]khyod la lan 'ga' zhig de'i gan du song la 'bru mar khyer te shog shig ces smras sam/_lan 'ga' yang bka' ma stsal to/_/de la nang dang bcas pa'i dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_'phags ma ci 'di 'ga' zhig tu bas snyam mam/_'dis 'phags ma 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]ri ma rgyur bgyis te/_mnyan yod thams cad khyab par bgyis pas pham par gyur pa dag gis lto gang ngo /_/dge slong ma de bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/_des skabs de dge slong ma rnams la brjod do/_/dge slong ma rnams 
[\[95b.2\]]kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma de la rmas pa/_dge slong ma khyod kyis bsam pa ji lta bus 'bru mar bslangs/_bcom ldan 'das bgam pa'i bsams 
[\[95b.3\]]pas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma bgam pa'i bsam pa can 'di la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong ngam/_dge slong mas nad pa la ma dris par sman sbyor du gzhug par mi bya bar 'di ltar dge 'dun gyi nad pa'i sman khang nas 
[\[95b.4\]]bslang bar bya ba'am/_'on te dad pa can las sam/_nye du'am/_nye du mang ba nyid yin na yang gang sbyor du gzhug ces nad pa la dri bar bya zhing /_des gang brjod pa de las bslang bar bya'o/_/dge slong ngam dge slong mas nad pa la ma dris par sman sbyor du 'jug na/_
[\[95b.5\]]'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod 
[\[95b.6\]]du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag klog go/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khyim 
[\[95b.7\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag klog pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khye'u dag ci klog_/'phags pa slad rol gyi bstan bcos dag go/_/khyim bdag phyi 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]rol gyi bstan bcos dag ni lcags kyi se'u dang 'dra ste rtogs par dka' zhing /_rtogs na yang de dag gis nges pa la 'jug par yang mi 'gyur/_zag pa zad par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi bka' ni thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha mar 
[\[96a.2\]]dge ba/_mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba yin na ci'i phyir de mi klog_/'phags pa sus de klog tu stsol/_kho bos klog tu gzhug go/_/'phags pa ma nongs kyis klog tu stsol cig_/khyim bdag 
[\[96a.3\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyis khye'u de dag la smras pa/_khye'u dag 'phags pa'i drung du rgyal byed kyi tshal du deng la sangs rgyas kyi bka' klogs shig_/khye'u de dag nyi ma re re zhing rgyan gyis bklubs te/_khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas rgyal byed 
[\[96a.4\]]kyi tshal du dong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po las sangs rgyas kyi bka' bklag par brtsams so/_/mnyan yod na ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can zhes bya ba chom rkun pa dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni de dag dgag dbye byas ma thag tu shes ldan dag bdag cag gis 
[\[96a.5\]]las ci zhig byas na des brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do/_/de dag la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag nyi ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag gis bskor nas/_
[\[96a.6\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong zhing 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par byed kyis lam gyi bar du bsdad de de dag bzung na 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u dag khyim na 'khod do snyam du shes la/_khyim bdag gis kyang 'phags pa maud 
[\[96a.7\]]gal gyi bu chen po'i drung na 'khod do snyam du shes pas gal te khye'u dag dbrog par nus na ni bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i bar gyi 'tsho ba yod la/_ji ste ma nus na rgyan dbrog par byas te/_des kyang bdag cag brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'gyur ro snyam pa'i blo skyes so/_/de dag brda byas te lam gyi bar du dong nas 'khod pa dang /_khye'u de dag kyang rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te 'ongs nas chom rkun pa de dag gis khye'u de dag khyer ro/_/khye'u de dag gi phyi bzhin khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag 'dong ba de dag gis 
[\[96b.2\]]khye'u de dag chom rkun pa dag gis brkus pa mthong nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du brgyugs te sbran pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyi sras bu dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis brkus kyis thabs dgongs shig_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin brgyugs 
[\[96b.3\]]te ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song nas smras pa/_lha bdag gi bu dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs kyis bu'i slong mo stsal du gsol/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal bu gzhon nu 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba/_song la khyim bdag 
[\[96b.4\]]gi bu rnams dang chom rkun pa dag myur du khug shig_/'phags skyes po yun ring po nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nang dang bcas par gyur pas de'i mod la ma song ngo /_/de nas lha gang dag tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la mngon par dad pa de dag gis 
[\[96b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod kyi nye gnas dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs kyis brtson par mdzad du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos gal te khye'u dag 
[\[96b.6\]]la ma bsams na/_re zhig khye'u dag pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing pha ma dag kyang bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur la/_ma dad pa dag gis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur zhing /_dad pa rnams 
[\[96b.7\]]kyang 'di ltar dong ngo cog ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis 'phrog par byed na/_phyin chad su zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gzhan du gyur pa nyid du 'gyur gyis bdag gis rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par bya'o snyam du bsams shing rig nas/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis 'phags skyes po'i dpung mngon par sprul te/_phyogs bzhir rnga pa Ta ha brdungs pa dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis shes ldan dag bdag cag dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos phyogs bzhi 
[\[97a.2\]]nas bskor gyis zin par gyur na mi rung gis bor la 'dong ngo snyam du bsams nas de dag gis khye'u de dag bor te byer ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir brtul nas lam dang nye bar shing ljon pa'i drung du 'dug go/_/khye'u 
[\[97a.3\]]de dag kyang 'ongs pa dang /_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_khye'u dag khyed cag gar dong dong /_'phags pa bdag cag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis brkus so/_/'o na sus thar bar byas/_dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos so/_/
[\[97a.4\]]khye'u dag de ring khyed cag gi pha ma dag yid mi bde bar 'khod kyis deng la sang lhogs shig_/khye'u de dag khyim du 'phags pa dang /_dmag dpon 'phags skyes po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_
[\[97a.5\]]shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te mnyan yod nas byung ngo /_/'phags skyes pos khye'u de dag mthong nas smras pa/_khye'u dag khyed cag gar dong dong /_de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong ba na bdag cag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]
[\[97a.6\]]g.yon can dag gis brkus so/_/'o na khyed cag sus thar bar byas/_dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos so/_/'phags skyes pos bdag da ltar 'gro bas bdag gis ji ltar 'di dag thar bar byas/_'phags pa rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba 'ga' zhig gis 'di 
[\[97a.7\]]dag thar bar byas gor ma chag snyam du bsams shing rig nas smras pa/_khye'u dag khyed cag gis phyogs de na su mthong /_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'o/_/'phags skyes pos des 'di dag thar bar byas kyi gzhan su zhig gis nus snyam du bsams shing rig 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]nas yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas bdag cag gi yul na 'phags pa de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_de ltar mthu che ba tshe 'di'i don dang /_tshe phyi ma'i don dang /_tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la skyabs mdzad pa bzhugs pa de ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do 
[\[97b.2\]]zhes ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed do/_/de bsngags pa brjod cing mnyan yod du 'jug pa na drug sde dag kyang phyir byung zhing drug sde dag gis smras pa/_khyod su'i bsngags pa brjod/_'phags skyes pos smras pa/_khyed kyi'o/_/nged kyis ci byas/_'phags 
[\[97b.3\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs pa thar bar byas so/_/bkren pa dag kho bo cag de 'dra yang 'on kyang 'di na la la byi bo gcer bu dag la mngon par dad de/_gal te gcer bu 
[\[97b.4\]]dag gis mthong bar gyur du zin na/_de dag gis lam yang nye bar bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' de dag la go bar byas so/_/don nyung ngu la ltung ba byung gis dong la 'chags su gzhug go/_/
[\[97b.5\]]drug sde dag gtsug lag khang du dong ste zas kyi bya ba byas nas rgan rims kyis phyag 'tshal te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[97b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa dag a rog gya gnas brtan je skabs phye shig_/ltung ba sde lnga po dag la skabs phye'o/_/gnas brtan gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs pa thar bar bgyis sam/_de bzhin te thar bar byas so/_/
[\[97b.7\]]gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan go/_/bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar mdzad cing bzhugs par 'tshal gyi bdag cag gis thugs rje phyogs gcig pa dang ldan zhing nye 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]gnas la thugs rje bar mdzad la ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag la thugs rje bar mi mdzad par ma 'tshal to/_/gzhan dag gis bdag gir bgyis pa'i nor dag thar bar bgyis pa'i ltung ba chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig_/ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/tshe 
[\[98a.2\]]dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/zhes gsungs kyis khang skyong su snang gaN+DI rdungs shig_/'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/zhes khang skyong gi gan du dong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gaN+DI 
[\[98a.3\]]rdungs shig_/ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed pas/_de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed cing bstan pa la chos kyi sgyu thabs kyis mi mthun pa 'ga' 
[\[98a.4\]]mi 'byung ngam zhes kun du spyod pa'i chos rmed par byed pas des khang skyong la rmas pa/_tshe dang ldan pa su zhig yongs su gnas pa'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am/_mgu bar bya ba'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am/_'byin par byed/_gnas brtan su 
[\[98a.5\]]yang mi bgyid de/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin slar mi bgyid pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge slong gnas brtan la tho ma 'tsham par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[98a.6\]]ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa/_the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa yin gyi de'i gan du song la zhus shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed cag la ji skad lung 
[\[98a.7\]]ston par mdzad pa de de bzhin du zung shig_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyed kyis bsam pa ji lta bus rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan btsun pa bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_gal te khye'u dag la ma bsams na re zhig khye'u dag pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /_pha ma dag kyang 
[\[98b.2\]]bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur la/_ma dad pa dag gis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur zhing /_dad pa rnams kyang 'di ltar dong ngo cog ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis 'phrogs par byed na/_phyin chad su zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[98b.3\]]du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gzhan du 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par bgyi'o snyam du bsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag maud gal gyi bus bsam pa de lta bus rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[98b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu snga dro shams thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis 
[\[98b.5\]]bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing dmag pa'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i tsha bo dag phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag klog go/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus tsha bo dag phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag klog par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 
[\[98b.6\]]dmag pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tsha bo khye'u dag ci klog_/'phags pa slad rol gyi bstan bcos dag go/_/tsha bo phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag ni lcags kyi se'u dang 'dra ste rtogs par dka' zhing rtogs na yang de dag gis nges pa la 'jug par yang mi 
[\[98b.7\]]'gyur/_zag pa zad par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi bka' ni thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha mar dge ba/_mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba yin na ci'i phyir de mi klog_/'phags pa sus 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]de klog du stsol/_kho bos klog tu gzhug go/_/'phags pa ma nongs kyis klog tu stsol cig_/dmag pa des khye'u de dag la smras pa/_khye'u dag 'phags pa'i drung du 'od ma'i tshal du deng la sangs rgyas kyi bka' lhogs shig_/khye'u de dag nyi ma 
[\[99a.2\]]re re zhing rgyan gyis bklubs te khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas 'od ma'i tshal du dong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu las sangs rgyas kyi bka' bklag par brtsams so/_/rgyal po'i khab na ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can zhes bya ba chom rkun pa dag 
[\[99a.3\]]gis kun tu spyod pa ni de dag dgag dbye byas ma thag tu shes ldan dag bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na/_des brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do/_/de dag la 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu'i tsha bo dag nyi 
[\[99a.4\]]ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te/_khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag gis bskor nas 'od ma'i tshal du 'dong zhing 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par byed kyis lam gyi bar du bsdad de/_de dag bzung na 'phags pa pi lin da'i bus ni khye'u dag 
[\[99a.5\]]khyim na 'khod do snyam du shes la/_bram zes kyang 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu'i drung na 'khod do snyam du shes pas/_gal te khye'u dag dbrog par nus na ni bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i bar gyi 'tsho ba yod la/_ci ste ma nus na ni rgyan dbrog par bya ste/_des kyang bdag cag 
[\[99a.6\]]btsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i blo skyes so/_/de dag brda byas te lam gyi bar du dong nas 'khod pa dang /_khye'u de dag kyang rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te 'ongs nas chom rkun pa de dag gis khye'u de dag grur bcug 
[\[99a.7\]]ste khyer ro/_/khye'u de dag gi phyi bzhin khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag 'dong ba de dag gis khye'u de dag chom rkun pa dag gis brkus pa mthong nas/_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i dmag pa'i drung du brgyugs te sbran pa/_jo bo khyod kyi sras bu dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]g.yon can dag gis brkus kyi thabs dgongs shig_/bram ze yang brgyugs te/_ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i gan du song nas smras pa/_lha bdag gi bu dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs kyis bu'i slong mo stsal du gsol/_
[\[99b.2\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rgyal bu gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/_song la bram ze'i bu rnams dang /_chom rkun pa dag myur du khug shig_/ma skyes dgra yun ring po nas bram ze de dang /_nang dang bcas par gyur pas de'i mod la ma song ngo /_/de nas lha gang dag 
[\[99b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la mngon par dad pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod kyi tsha bo dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs kyis brtson par mdzad du gsol/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[99b.4\]]pa pi lin da'i bus gal te khye'u dag la ma bsams na/_re zhig khye'u dag pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /_pha ma dag kyang bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur la/_ma dad pa dag gis kyang 
[\[99b.5\]]glags rnyed par 'gyur zhing /_dad pa rnams kyang 'di ltar dong ngo cog ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis 'phrogs par byed na/_phyin chad su zhig 'od ma'i tshal du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gzhan du gyur pa nyid du 'gyur gyis bdag gis rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par 
[\[99b.6\]]bya'o snyam du sems shing rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste gru'i drung du 'dug pa dang gru de mi 'gul bar 'dug go/_/chom rkun pa dag gis ci'i phyir gru 'di mi 'gul bar 'dug snyam du bsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i 
[\[99b.7\]]bu gru dang nye ba na 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa ci'i slad du tho 'tsham par mdzad/_rga ba'i chos can dag kho bo 'ba' zhig tho 'tsham par byed dam/_gal te kho bos yon tan gyi tshogs 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur du zin na deng khyed kyi kho bo'i tsha bo dag brkus par mi 'gyur ram/_'phags pa gtang du gsol deng shig_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de dag phyir brtul nas khye'u de dag la 'di skad 
[\[100a.2\]]ces smras so/_/khye'u dag de ring khyed cag gi pha ma dag yid mi bde bar 'khod kyis/_deng la sang lhogs shig_/khye'u de dag khyim du 'phags pa dang /_gzhon nu ma skyes dgra yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che ba'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i 
[\[100a.3\]]tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te rgyal po'i khab nas byung ngo /_/ma skyes dgras khye'u de dag mthong nas smras pa/_khye'u dag khyed cag gar dong dong /_de dag gis smras pa/_'od ma'i tshal du 'dong ba na bdag cag 
[\[100a.4\]]ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis brkus so/_/'o na khyed cag sus thar bar byas/_'phags pa pi lin da'i bus so/_/ma skyes dgra yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas bdag cag gi yul na 'phags pa de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_de ltar mthu che ba/_tshe 
[\[100a.5\]]'di'i don dang /_tshe phyi ma'i don dang /_tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i don la skyabs mdzad pa bzhugs pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed do/_/des bsngags pa brjod cing rgyal po'i khab tu 'jug pa la drug sde dag kyang phyir 
[\[100a.6\]]byung zhing drug sde dag gis smras pa/_khyod su'i bsngags pa brjod/_ma skyes dgras smras pa/_khyed kyi'o/_/nged kyis ci byas/_'phags pa pi lin da'i bus bram ze'i bu dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs pa thar bar byas so/_/bkren pa dag kho bo 
[\[100a.7\]]cag de 'dra yang 'on kyang 'di na la la byi bo gcer bu dag la mngon par dad de/_gal te gcer bu dag gis mthong bar gyur du zin na/_de dag gis lam yang nye bar bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]de dag la go bar byas so/_/don nyung ngu la ltung ba byung gis dong la 'chags su gzhug go/_/drug sde dag gtsug lag khang du dong ste zas kyi bya ba byas nas rgan rims kyis phyag 'tshal te/_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i 
[\[100b.2\]]bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag a rog gya gnas brtan je skabs phye shig_/ltung ba sde lnga po dag la skabs phye'o/_/gnas brtan gyis bram ze'i bu dag ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs pa thar bar bgyis 
[\[100b.3\]]sam/_de bzhin te thar bar byas so/_/gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan go bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar mdzad cing bzhugs par 'tshal gyis/_bdag cag gis 
[\[100b.4\]]thugs rje phyogs gcig pa dang ldan zhing bram ze'i bu dag la thugs rje bar mdzad la/_ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag la thugs rje bar mi mdzad par ma 'tshal to/_/gzhan dag gis bdag gir bgyis pa'i nor dag thar bar bgyis pa'i ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du 
[\[100b.5\]]slar mdzod cig_/ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes gsungs kyis khang skyong su snang gaN+DI rdungs shig_/'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes khang skyong gi gan du dong nas 
[\[100b.6\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gaN+DI rdungs shig_/ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed pas de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed cing bstan pa la chos kyi sgyu thabs kyis mi 
[\[100b.7\]]mthun pa 'ga' mi 'byung ngam zhes kun tu spyod pa'i chos rmed par byed pas des khang skyong la rmas pa/_tshe dang ldan pa su zhig yongs su gnas pa'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am/_mgu bar bya ba'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am/_'byin par byed/_
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]gnas brtan su yang mi bgyid de/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid pas/_de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge slong gnas brtan la tho ma 
[\[101a.2\]]'tsham par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa/_the tsom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa yin gyis/_de'i gan du song la zhus shig dang /_bcom 
[\[101a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis khyed cag la ji skad lung ston par mdzad pa de de bzhin du zung shig_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[101a.4\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_pi lin da'i bu khyod kyis bsam pa ji lta bus rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan/_btsun pa bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_gal te khye'u dag la ma bsams na re zhig khye'u dag pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug 
[\[101a.5\]]bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing pha ma dag kyang bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur la/_ma dad pa dag gis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur zhing /_dad pa rnams kyang 'di ltar dong ngo cog ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis phrogs 
[\[101a.6\]]par byed na/_phyin chad su zhig 'od ma'i tshal du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gzhan du gyur pa nyid du 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par bgyi'o snyam du bsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag pi lin da'i bus bsam pa 
[\[101a.7\]]de lta bus rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan pa la ltung ba med do//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun tu 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]spyod pa ni nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 
[\[101b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang 
[\[101b.3\]]dag par gzengs [(]stod [,]bstod [)]par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi 
[\[101b.4\]]gsung ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te song nas/_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gtsug 
[\[101b.5\]]lag khang de na ral ba dang 'drums pa rang nyid kyis phyir 'chos par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang lag pa dang /_rkang pa dag bkrus te stan 
[\[101b.6\]]bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs 
[\[101b.7\]]gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa ci lags/_rang nyid kyis ral ba dang 'drums pa slar 'chos par mdzad dam/_rgyal po chen po rab tu byung ba ni rang nyid kyis byed pa yin te/_bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba yin 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pas gzhan su zhig byed par 'gyur/_'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag gis 'phags pa la zhabs 'bring ba dbul lo/_/rgyal po chen po a rog gya de bzhin du lan bzhi'i bar du smras nas/_lan lnga pa la yang de kho na skad du bdag gis 'phags pa la 
[\[102a.2\]]zhabs 'bring ba dbul lo zhes zer ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i lhan cig gnas pa bden pa dang /_mthun pa dang /_ngo zlog phod par smra ba zhig gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po gang tshun cad nas rgyal po chen pos mkhan po la zhabs 'bring ba dag gis bstabs 
[\[102a.3\]]pa nas mkhan pos gal te gtsug lag khang 'di yal bar bor du lags na da tsam ngos rdib par yang gyur to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa ci lags bdag cag gis yang dang yang du khas blangs sam/_rgyal po chen po lan gcig tu ma bas kyi 'di ltar 'di ni 
[\[102a.4\]]lan lnga pa lags so/_/rgyal po de brjed ngas pas rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang yang rung ba la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]khas blangs pa ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad phyi na 'dug pa'i mis yi ger 'dri bar byed pas rgyal po des mi de la smras pa/_kwa'e nang rje kho bos yang dang 
[\[102a.5\]]yang du khas blangs pa bden nam/_lha mad de 'di ni lan lnga pa lags so/_/de lta na kho bo chad pa'i las la thug gis kho bos 'phags pa la zhabs 'bring ba lnga brgya dbul lo/_/des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_'phags pa la zhabs 'bring ba lnga brgya phul cig_/
[\[102a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa/_rgyal po chen po kho bo rang gi g.yog nyid spangs te rab tu byung ba la g.yog dag gis ci bya/_'phags pa dge 'dun gyi don du bzhes shig_/rgyal po chen po gal te de lta na bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/'phags pa de ma 
[\[102a.7\]]nongs kyis zhus shig_/skabs de tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi don du g.yog dag blang bar bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus g.yog de dag 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]blangs pa dang /_g.yog de dag yang dang yang du rgyal po'i pho brang du las byed du bcug nas/_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag cag 'phags pa dag gi zhabs 'bring bar phul ba ni/_bdag cag glo ba dga' na ci'i 
[\[102b.2\]]slad du bdag cag yang dang yang du rgyal po'i pho brang du sug las bgyid/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'khrug long ma byed cig dang /_kho bos rgyal po la gsol bar bya'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[102b.3\]]pi lin da'i bu'i drung du 'ongs te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod dge 'dun gyi don du g.yog dag phul bas 'gyod par ma gyur tam/_'phags pa bdag la 
[\[102b.4\]]'gyod pa 'ga' yang ma mchis so/_/'o na ci'i phyir g.yog de dag yang rgyal po'i pho brang du las byed du bcug_/rgyal pos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag 'phags pa rnams kyi zhabs 'bring ba dag phyin cad rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[102b.5\]]du las byed du ma gzhug shig_/blon po rnams kyis gang yang rung ba dag la rgyal po'i pho brang du las gyis shig ces bsgo ba na/_de dag na re bdag cag 'phags pa dag gi yin no zhes zer nas/_blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha gang la yang mchid 
[\[102b.6\]]stsal bar rngo ma thog ste/_gang yang rung ba dag la rgyal po'i pho brang du sug las tshol cig ces bgyis na/_de dag bdag cag 'phags pa rnams kyi lags so zhes mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_song la thams cad las byed du chug shig_/de dag thams cad 
[\[102b.7\]]yang rgyal po'i pho brang du las byed du bcug nas/_de dag gis yang tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag yang de kho na bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang du sug las bgyid du stsal na/_'phags pas ma gsol tam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gsol 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]te/_yang gsol ba bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang de kho na bzhin 'ongs pa la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ci lags/_khyod yang 'gyod pa skyes par gyur tam/_'phags pa 
[\[103a.2\]]ci nongs/_g.yog dag yang de kho na bzhin du las byed du bcug go/_/'phags pa gang la yang mchid stsal bar rngo ma thog ste/_gang yang rung ba la mchid stsal ba na de dag bdag cag 'phags pa dag gi lags so zhes mchi'o/_/e ma 'phags pa dag gi lha 'bangs 
[\[103a.3\]]kyi sdum pa logs shig tu rtsig tu stsal na/_'di dag ni rgyal po'i 'o/_/'di dag ni 'phags pa dag gi'o/_/zhes 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus don de bcom 
[\[103a.4\]]ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa rtsig tu 'jud par rjes su gnang ngo /_/dge slong dag gis gnas gang du lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa rtsig tu gzhug pa mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[103a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po'i pho brang gi phyi rol dang /_'od ma'i tshal gyi phyi rol gyi bar gang du skad kyis bos pa thos nas dge 'dun gyi don sgrub par 'gyur ba der lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa rtsig tu gzhug go/_/dge slong rnams kyis zhang blon dag la bsgo ba/_bcom 
[\[103a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis phyogs 'dir lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa rtsig tu chug shig ces bka' stsal gyis de khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig_/zhang blon dag gis rgyal po'i khab tu dril gyi sgra sgrog tu bcug ste/_gang dag 'phags pa rnams kyi zhabs 'bring ba yin pa de 
[\[103a.7\]]dag rgyal po'i khab kyi phyi rol dang /_'od ma'i tshal gyi phyi rol gyi bar du 'dug par chad kyis deng la der sdum pa rtsigs shig ces bsgo nas/_de dag der dong ste sdum pa brtsigs so/_/lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa brtsigs nas de dag gtsug lag khang du dong ste las 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]byed cing /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la las 'di ni rung ba yin gyis khyed kyis bya'o/_/'di ni rung ba ma yin gyis khyed kyis mi bya'o zhes las bstan nas/_de dag las rung ba byed pas lha 'bangs lha 'bangs zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/_/dge 'dun gyi 
[\[103b.2\]]kun dga' ra ba skyong bar byed pas rtse rgod rtse rgod ces bya ba'i ming du gyur to/_/de dag thams cad gtsug lag khang du 'jug pas klag cor gyi sgras dge slong dag gis sems rtse gcig pa nyid mi sgrub nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji snyed dag 
[\[103b.3\]]gis las 'grub pa de snyed 'jug par bya'i thams cad mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis de dag thams cad la zas dang gos sbyin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dag las byed pa de dag la zas dang gos sbyin par bya'i thams cad la mi bya'o/_/
[\[103b.4\]]dge slong rnams kyis de dag na ba yal bar bor nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dag na ba de dag la zas dang gos sbyin par bya zhing bsnyen bkur yang bya'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nye dga' dge skos byed pas des lha 'bangs de dag la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[103b.5\]]dag kho bo dge skos byed kyis khyed cag nang par sngar shog shig_/rgyal po'i khab na ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can zhes bya ba chom rkun pa dag gis kun tu spyod pa de dag dgag dbye byas ma thag tu shes ldan dag bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na des btsal mi dgos par lo
