[\[144b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/g.yangs nas ji lta ba de bzhin du 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas sam/_
[\[144b.6\]]ra ba las sam/_glang po che'i gshul nas sam/_rta'i rgyab nas sam/_khyogs spyil las sam/_khri las sam/_khri'u las sam/_phrag pa nas sam/_blo nas sam/_rked pa nas sam/_brla nas sam/_byin pa nas sam/_tha na long bu nas sa la ltung bar byed cing /_de yang rtsom pa 
[\[144b.7\]]des dus byed na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe ma yin yang des de'i 'og tu na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis skyes pa dang /_bud 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]med dang /_ma ning la gsad pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas chur 'jud par byed cing de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe ma yin yang des de'i 'og tu na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[145a.2\]]des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/chur ji lta ba de bzhin du 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por ram/_lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 
[\[145a.3\]]ram/_nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por ram/_byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por ram/_mtshor ram/_lteng kar ram/_ljan ljin du 'jud dam/_tha na de'i khar snyim pa'i chu ldugs par byed cing /_de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe ma yin yang des 
[\[145a.4\]]de'i 'og tu na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning la gsad pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 
[\[145a.5\]]'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas mer 'jud par byed cing de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe ma yin yang des de'i 'og tu na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor 
[\[145a.6\]]ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mer ji lta ba de bzhin du 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas grong khyer sreg pa'am/_grong sreg pa 'am/_yul sreg pa 'am/_rgyal thabs sam/_da nur du 'jud dam/_tha na de'i khar mgal ba tsam 'jud par 
[\[145a.7\]]byed cing /_de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe ma yin yang des de'i 'og tu na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]gis skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning la gsod pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas/_seng ge dag gam/_stag dag gam/_gung dag gam/_mtsha' dag gam/_spyang ki dag gis zos par gyur pas sam/_nyi ma dang rlung dag gis yongs su 
[\[145b.2\]]skam pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su gtugs par gyur pas sam/_bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i nyam chung bas dkris pas dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su mngag pa nyid du gtong bar byed cing /_de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge 
[\[145b.3\]]slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe ma yin yang des de'i 'og tu na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning la gsad 
[\[145b.4\]]pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas dus grang ba/_mchog tu grang ba gang dag yin pa de dag gi tshes brgyad kyi bar gang dag tu 'od ma 'gas pa'i rlung dag ldang ba de dag tu nyin mo steng g.yogs par 'dzin du bcug nas mtshan mo bla gab med par 'dzin cing 
[\[145b.5\]]de'i steng du sog ma'i chag chag 'debs par byed cing /_de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe ma yin yang des de'i 'og tu na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes 
[\[145b.6\]]pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning la gsad pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar rtsom pa 'dis 'di dus byed par gyur cig snyam pas dus tsha ba/_mchog tu tsha ba gang dag yin pa/_de dag gi so ga'i gung gi tsha ba la bab pa gang dag tu srog chags phra mo skye ba de dag tu nyin mo bla 
[\[145b.7\]]gab med par 'dzin du bcug nas mtshan mo steng g.yogs par 'dzin cing /_de'i lus la gseg gam/_re ldes kyang 'khri bar byed/_du ba rngub pas kyang 'dug par byed cing /_de yang rtsom pa des dus byed na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe ma 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]yin yang des de'i 'og tu na dge slong pham par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshe yang ma yin la des de'i 'og tu yang ma yin na dge slong la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_bsro khang dang ni me khang dang /_/'char ka dang ni 
[\[146a.2\]]gnyis po dang /_/skyong ma dang ni bcu bdun sde/_/ri brags pa dang rgan zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas na 'brog gi nags mchog na bzhugs so/_/de na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig khyim bdag cig gi sdum par dus dang mthun pa'i 
[\[146a.3\]]dus su 'gro zhing chos kyang ston par byed do/_/ji tsam na dge slong des khyim bdag de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la rab tu bzhag go/_/de nas yang dge slong de nye bar song nas khyim bdag de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gi 
[\[146a.4\]]bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis kyang dge 'dun la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi 'ga' zhig bgyid du stsal to/_/bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_khyim bdag legs kyis byed du chug shig_/'phags 
[\[146a.5\]]pa ci zhig bgyid du stsal/_khyim bdag dge 'dun la bsro khang gi khang pa med kyis de byed du chug shig_/'phags pa bdag la kAr ShA pa Na dag ni mchis mod kyi 'on kyang bsod nams kyi grogs bgyid pa ma mchis so/_/khyim bdag kho bo khyod kyi bsod nams kyi 
[\[146a.6\]]grogs yin no/_/'phags pa legs so/_/khyim bdag des bsod snyoms pa de la kAr ShA pa Na dag phul nas bsod snyoms pa de dge 'dun gyi bsro khang gi khang pa byed du 'jud pa la zhugs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'brog gnas su dus ston byung nas 
[\[146a.7\]]gla mi dag ma 'ongs pa dang /_bsod snyoms pas de dag bos te smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag deng khyed cag ci'i phyir ma 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa deng 'jig rten gyi dus ston lags pas de'i slad du bdag cag ma mchis so/_/bsod snyoms pas 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag la ni dus ston yod na/_khyed cag mkhar len gyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba dag dus ston ci 'dra ba dag cig yod/_tshur sheg la las gyis shig dang /_de'i phyir gla nyis gyur du sbyin no/_/de dag 
[\[146b.2\]]gis smras pa/_'phags pa gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag la ni rtag pa kho nar dus ston mchis kyi/_bdag cag ni mkhar len gyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags pas de nyid kyis na bdag cag la brgya la brgya lam na dus ston 'byung bas gal te gla sum 
[\[146b.3\]]gyur du stsal du lags kyang bdag cag deng ni las mi bgyid do zhes de dag ma btub ste dong nas bsod snyoms pa yang snying las chung ngur 'dug go/_/khyim bdag gis bsam pa/_bdag gis sbyin par bya ba'i chos de la ji tsam ni byas/_ji tsam ni ma byas pa de [(]bltar [,]ltar [)]
[\[146b.4\]]'gro'o snyam nas de nang par sngar langs te song ba dang /_'ga' yang las mi byed pa mthong nas de bsod snyoms pa'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_'phags pa gla mi dag deng las mi bgyid dam/_khyim bdag mi byed do/_/ci'i slad du 
[\[146b.5\]]de dag na re deng 'jig rten gyi dus ston yin pas bdag cag las mi byed do zhes zer ro/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa de dag ni mkhar len gyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags pas 'phags pa de dag la gla ma stsal bas des na ma btub gor ma bkum/_bsod 
[\[146b.6\]]snyoms pas smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bos gla nyis gyur byin yang ma grub ste/_de dag na re 'phags pa gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag la ni rtag pa kho nar dus ston mchis kyi bdag cag ni mkhar len gyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags pas de nyid kyis na 
[\[146b.7\]]bdag cag la brgya la brgya lam na dus ston 'byung bas gal te gla sum gyur du stsal du lags kyang bdag cag deng ni las mi bgyid do zhes zer ro/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag ni bdag gi slad du yang bgyid du mi stsol la/_nye du rnams kyi slad du yang bgyid 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]du mi stsol gyi/_'di ltar 'phags pa rnams kyi slad du bgyid du stsol ba lags pas kye ma 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang brgya la brgya lam du mkhar len gyi stongs mo mdzod cig_/bsod snyoms pas skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[147a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhi ma zin pa la dge slong rnams kyis mkhar len gyi stongs mo bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi ma zin pa la dge slong rnams kyis mkhar len gyi stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong 
[\[147a.3\]]dag gis mkhar len gyi stongs mo bya bar brtsams nas/_de dag phan tshun so phag 'phen par byed do/_/ji tsam na dge slong zhig gis dge slong la so phag 'phangs pa dang lag pa nas shor te dge slong gi mgor phog nas de dus la bab bo/_/dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes shing /_
[\[147a.4\]]de dag yid mi bde nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bsod snyoms pa las med pas las phyung nas bdag cag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yid du 'ong ba dang bral bar gyur cing /_bdag cag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes par gyur to/_/
[\[147a.5\]]zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong rnams kyis so phag 'phang bar mi bya bar 'di ltar lag pas lag par brgyud par bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[147a.6\]]bye ba'am gas pa yin na go bar bya ste brgyud par bya'o/_/go bar ma byas par brgyud par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis mkhar len gyi stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams nyi ma rangs par las byed nas 
[\[147a.7\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag dag ci'i phyir dge slong 'di dag nyi ma rangs par gla mi bzhin du las byed ces 'phya bar byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyi ma 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]rangs par las mi bya bar 'di ltar lan gcig bya'o/_/dge slong dag so ga ni phyi dro las byed la/_dgun ni snga dro las byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so ga ni snga dro las bya la/_dgun ni phyi dro las bya'o/_/de dag dus rting la thug pa na gtong zhing 'jim rdzab kyis gos pa'i 
[\[147b.2\]]lus kyis de bzhin rings pa rings par bsod snyoms la 'jug pa na ma dad pa dag 'phags pa dag khyed cag gis gla mi dag kyang pham par byas te/_de dag kyang zas kyi dus yongs su spong bar byed na/_khyed cag zas kyi dus kyang spong bar mi byed do zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i 
[\[147b.3\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni sta gon byas nas grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom pa dang /_gang dag dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dbang ba 
[\[147b.4\]]de dag gis ni sta gon byas nas dge 'dun gyi dbus su 'jug khom pa de ltar dus shes par byas te gtang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sta gon byas nas grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya zhing dge 'dun gyi dbus su yang 'jug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_
[\[147b.5\]]dge slong rnams kyis ji tsam gyis na sta gon byas par brjod par bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji tsam gyis lag pa gnyis dang /_rkang pa gnyis bkrus pa dang /_lhung bzed bkrus par gyur pa de tsam gyis sta gon byas par brjod par 
[\[147b.6\]]bya'o/_/gzhan yang ngas dge slong mkhar len byed pa dag gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong mkhar len byed pas dus ji lta ba bzhin du snga dro ni khye'u sus dag sbyor du gzhug par bya'o/_/phyi dro ni skom dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa'i sku mnye rgyu dag sbyor du gzhug 
[\[147b.7\]]par bya'o/_/dge slong mkhar len byed pas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'brog gnas su bsod snyoms pas bsro khang byed du bcug pa ji lta ba bzhin du me khang gi gleng gzhi yang de kho na bzhin du 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/bye brag ni 'di yod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi ma zin pa la mkhar len gyi stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag me khang gi las byed cing phyam dag phar sbed tshur sbed pa na de dag gi 'og na shing mkhan zhig zhal 
[\[148a.2\]]ta byed de/_ji tsam na phyam dag sbed pa na/_dge slong gi lag nas phyam shor bas shing mkhan gyi mgor phog nas de dus la bab pa dang /_dge slong de dag tshe dang ldan pa dag bsod snyoms pa las med pas las phyung bas bdag cag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung 
[\[148a.3\]]ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong dag gis mi bzod pa'i khur gdeg par mi bya'o/_/rkyen de lta bu 
[\[148a.4\]]zhig byung na mdo mdor khyim pa dag 'dzin du gzhug par bya zhing gdeg pa dag dang /_gzhag pa dag kyang brjod par bya ste/_mnyam du gdeg pa dang /_mnyam du gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag mi bzod pa'i khur 'deg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[148a.5\]]ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis mi bzod pa'i khur gdeg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams kyis ji tsam ni bzod pa yin/_ji tsam ni mi bzod pa yin pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim pa gcig gi khur gang yin pa 
[\[148a.6\]]de dge slong gnyis kyis gdeg par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas gtum mo btul te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa de'i 
[\[148a.7\]]tshe des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas yod byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dang du ma blangs te smras pa/_sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin par zhugs pa yin pas kho bos kyang gzhan la 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]phan pa bya dgos so/_/gtum mos smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta lags te dang du mi bzhed na/_bdag gis 'phags pa'i slad du drang srong gi gdan bsham par bgyis/_khyod kyis bsod snyoms brgyus nas drang srong gi gdan la longs spyad de gshegs par rigs so/_/
[\[148b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_sring mo de bzhin bya'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nyi ma re re zhing bsod snyoms brgyus nas gtum mo'i khyim du drang srong gi stan la longs spyad de 'gro'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la ljongs su bya ba zhig byung nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[148b.3\]]pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bdag je song la sring mo blta bar bya'o snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gtum mo'i gan du song ste smras pa/_sring mo kho bo ljongs rgyur 'gro yis/_khyod kyis chos kyi lus la bag gyis shig_/gtum mos smras pa/_'phags pa myur du slar gshegs 
[\[148b.4\]]pa'i rigs te/_der bzhugs par mi mdzad cing der dgyes pa mi bskyed du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas gtum mo bltas te ljongs rgyur 'phags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyur gshegs 
[\[148b.5\]]kyis/_khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thos nas bsams pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rgyu ba la ni phan yon [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod de/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_chom rkun gyi 
[\[148b.6\]]'jigs pa med pa dang /_me'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_mi'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_klu'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_gdug pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_seng ge'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_stag gi 'jigs pa med pa dang /_gung gi 
[\[148b.7\]]'jigs pa med pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /_spyang ki'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /_sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /_la gcan gyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /_gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /_dus dang dus su lha'i gzugs dag mthong zhing lha'i sgra dag 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]thos la kun shes pa brda sprod pa dag thos pa dang /_chos kyi longs spyod dang /_zang zing gi longs spyod yod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rgyu ba la gnod pa nyung ba yin gyis/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ljongs rgyur 'gros phyir ldog par bya'o snyam nas/_
[\[149a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyir log go/_/de'i bar skabs su gtum mo'i khyim du bu mo zhig la khye'u zhig btsas nas gtum mos khye'u de'i ma la smras pa/_bu mo khye'u 'di khrus gyis la gos dkar pos dkris te drang srong gi stan 'di la snyol cig dang yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing tshe ring du skyong bar 'gyur 
[\[149a.3\]]ro/_/bu mo des khye'u de khrus byas te gos dkar pos dkris nas drang srong gi stan de la rtag tu bsnyal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang nyi ma gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms la zhugs nas gtum mo'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo /_/dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa 
[\[149a.4\]]dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de bzhin du drang srong gi stan de la 'dug pa dang /_bud med kyi yul de brtad pa dang bcas shing 'phags pa khye'u 'phags pa khye'u zhes zer nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka myur du langs te bltas na khye'u dus la bab pa mthong ngo /_/khyim 
[\[149a.5\]]mi dag gis cho nges gdab par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_sring mo ma ngu shig_/sems can 'dis tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag go/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de lta mod kyi 
[\[149a.6\]]'di la kho bos ngud mos gdab par bya ba yin te/_'di ltar kho bos dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang kho bo las brten te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la/_nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar 'gyur ro/_/des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams 
[\[149a.7\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong 'char ka la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong gis khyim gzhan du stan la ma brtags par 'dug par mi bya'o/_/'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_phan tshun gtam 'dres pa/_phebs par smra ba/_'grogs bshes/_smos 'drin gnyis shig 'khod do/_/
[\[149b.2\]]ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis nor zad pa dang /_longs spyod zad par gyur nas de gnyis kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa/_bdag cag gnyis 'di nyid du mthos pa dang dmas par gyur pas rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'tsho ba za zhing longs spyod pas ci bya/_rab tu 'byung du 'dong ngo 
[\[149b.3\]]zhes de gnyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo /_/de na gcig na bar gyur nas cig shos de'i nad g.yog byed do/_/nad pa de nyam dmas shing sos par ma gyur nas/_nad g.yog des nad pa la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod la sngon khyim pa'i tshe 
[\[149b.4\]]na lan 'ga' nad 'di lta bu byung ngam/_sngon yang byung ngo /_/'o na ji zhig gis zhi bar gyur/_lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs kyis so/_/'o na da ci'i phyir lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs mi 'thung zhes nad g.yog des lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs bslangs te nad pa la blud pa dang /_nad pa des dus kyi chos 
[\[149b.5\]]dang ldan par gyur nas dge slong de bdag gis 'di la sman ma yin pa byin par ma gyur tam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas/_des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[149b.6\]]dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong gis sman pa la ma dris par rang gi blos nad pa la sman sbyin par mi bya'o/_/gal te sman pa med na sman pa rab tu byung ba la dri bar bya'o sman pa rab tu byung ba med na sman pas bkol ba la dri bar bya'o/_/sman pas bkol ba med na 
[\[149b.7\]]nad kyis thebs pa la dri bar bya'o/_/nad kyis thebs pa med na dge slong rgan pa rgan pa dag la dri bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis sman pa la ma dris sam/_ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin ma byas par rang gi blos nad pa la sman sbyin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong de la sman gang lags pa de nyid sman ma lags pa nyid du gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[150a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_de sngon khyim pa'i tshe na rlung dang bad kan can du gyur la/_da ltar ni rlung dang mkhris pa can du gyur pas des na de la sman gang yin pa de nyid sman ma yin pa nyid du gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[150a.3\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bkod pa de'i tshe na ma ga d+hAr byung 
[\[150a.4\]]ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i khab tu 'di skad ces rgyal po'i khab na 'khod pa dang /_pho brang 'khor ba dang /_yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i tshong pa'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig_/nga'i yul du gang gis kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/_/gang nga'i 
[\[150a.5\]]yul du chom rkun byed pa de ngas yul med par bya'o/_/bcom pa rnams kyi rkun rdzas ni nga'i mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes dril gyi sgra bsgrags pa byas so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo sdes btul ba de'i tshe na 
[\[150a.6\]]ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang mnyan yod du 'di skad ces mnyan yod na 'khod pa dang /_pho brang 'khor ba dang /_yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i tshong pa'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig_/nga'i yul du gang gis kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/_/gang nga'i yul du chom rkun byed 
[\[150a.7\]]pa de ngas bsad pa'i gyod la bsgrin par bya'o/_/bcom pa rnams kyi rkun rdzas ni nga'i mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes dril gyi sgra bsgrags pa byas so/_/de'i bar skabs na chom rkun pa gang dag yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa dag dang /_chom rkun pa gang dag yul ko sa la na gnas 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]pa de dag sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod do/_/thams cad du chom rkun pa gang dag yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa dag dang /_chom rkun pa gang dag yul ko sa la na gnas pa de dag sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing don mthun 'joms par byed do zhes bya ba'i sgra de lta bus kyang 
[\[150b.2\]]khyab par gyur to/_/de thos nas yul ma ga d+hA nas don mthun bsel ba dang bcas pas yul ko sa lar 'gro bar brtsams shing yul ko sa la nas kyang don mthun bsel ba dang bcas pas yul ma ga d+hAr 'gro bar brtsams so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yul ma ga d+hA nas don 
[\[150b.3\]]mthun bsal ba dang bcas pa yul ko sa lar 'phags nas de gang gi tshe sa mtshams kyi bar las 'das te yul ko sa lar zhugs pa de'i tshe na ded dpon gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni gtum pa/_rtun ngas pa dral shul che ba/_dpa' ba/_
[\[150b.4\]]rtsal che ba zhes grags pas/_gal te don mthun chom rkun pas bcom par gyur na yang des bdag cag la rkun rdzas sbyin par nus kyis bsel ba phyir thong shig_/don mthun dag gis smras pa/_ded dpon gal te de lta na de lta bgyi'o zhes de dag gis bsel ba phyir btang ngo /_/
[\[150b.5\]]chom rkun pa de dag gis bya ma rta bzhag ste 'khod pa dang /_bya ma rta dag gis bsel ba phyir btang ba de mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bsel ba phyir log gis don mthun gzhom par byas 'dong ngo /_/zhes de dag gis don mthun sA la'i dgon par 
[\[150b.6\]]zhugs pa bcom mo/_/de na tshong pa kha cig ni bsad/_kha cig ni byer ro/_/de na gang dag byer ba de dag mgo sa rdul gyis bkang ste/_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du dong nas smras pa/_lha bdag cag tshong pa rnams khyod kyi yul du tshong par mi rung bar rnam 
[\[150b.7\]]par bkod do/_/ci zhig byas/_lha bdag cag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo/_/rgyal pos dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba/_gzhon nu song la chom rkun pa dag dang rkun rdzas dag myur du khug cig_/dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos lha bka' 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che ba'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te myur ba myur bar sA la'i dgon par song 
[\[151a.2\]]ngo /_/de'i bar skabs na chom rkun pa dag sA la'i dgon pa shin tu stug po'i nang na zhugs nas bag phab ste rkun rdzas bged par byed do/_/'phags skyes pos kyang de dag gi steng du brdzis nas de na chom rkun pa kha cig ni bsad/_kha cig ni byer/_chom rkun pa drug bcu ni gson por 
[\[151a.3\]]bzung ngo /_/de nas g.yul las rnam par rgyal zhing chom rkun pa dang rkun rdzas khyer te ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_lha chom rkun pa ni 'di dag lags/_rkun rdzas ni 'di dag lags so/_/rgyal pos chom rkun 
[\[151a.4\]]pa dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas 'di skad ces nga'i yul du gang gis kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/_/gang nga'i yul du chom rkun byed pa de ngas bsad pa'i gyod la bsgrin par bya'o/_/bcom pa rnams kyi rkun rdzas ni nga'i mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes dril gyi sgra bsgrags pa 
[\[151a.5\]]byas pa de khyed kyis ma thos sam/_lha thos so/_/'o na khyed kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa 'di dag bcom/_lha bdag cag 'tsho ba ma mchis so/_/gal te de lta na yang ci'i phyir gzhan bsad par gyur/_lha 'jigs pa bstan pa'i slad du'o/_/ngas kyang khyed la sngon sus kyang ma 
[\[151a.6\]]bstan pa de lta bu'i 'jigs pa bstan par bya'o/_/rgyal po de gtum pas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la chos rkun pa 'di dag bsad sar khrid la/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa chod cig_/tshong pa 'di dag gi ci phrogs pa nga'i bang ba dang mdzod 
[\[151a.7\]]nas byin cig_/blon po de dag gis chom rkun pa de dag dur khrod du khrid de lag pa dang rkang pa bcad nas tshong pa rnams la rkun rdzas rgyal po'i bang ba dang mdzod nas byin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bdag gi rgud pa dang /_gzhan gyi rgud pa la yang dang yang du 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]so sor rtogs shig_/bdag gi 'byor pa dang /_gzhan gyi 'byor pa la yang dang yang du so sor rtogs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag bdag dang gzhan gyi rgud pa ni yid 'byung ba'i gnas yin la/_bdag dang gzhan gyi 'byor pa yang yid 'byung ba'i gnas yin 
[\[151b.2\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag langs shing langs shing dur khrod rgyur 'gro bar brtsams so/_/dge slong ma dag kyang langs shing langs shing dur khrod rgyur 'gro bar brtsams so/_/de'i tshe na rab tu mang po dag dur khrod rgyur dong zhing de dang de dag gis chom rkun pa dag 
[\[151b.3\]]la nges par brtags par brtsams so/_/mi gzhan zhig kyang de dag nyid la rtog cing 'dug pa des smras pa/_gal te don 'dod pa 'ga' zhig gis 'di dag la lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs blud par gyur na/_des na 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos na ma gzhon nu dag gi nu zho 'thung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[151b.4\]]dge slong ma de dag gi nang na dge slong ma skyong ma zhes bya ba sbom mo/_glen ma/_mi gsal ba zhig 'dug pa des de thos nas des bsams pa/_gal te bdag bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu las yongs su nyams par gyur na/_bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 
[\[151b.5\]]byung nas ci zhig rnyed kyis bdag song la lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs bslangs te 'di dag la blud par bya'o snyam nas/_dge slong ma skyong ma de dge slong ma rnams kyi nang nas phyir byung ste/_gnas su song nas de nas lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs kyi phru ba dang /_kham phor drug bcu bslangs te/_
[\[151b.6\]]chom rkun pa dag gi drung du song ba dang /_chom rkun pa de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag gis nyen cing srog la mi ltos pa skom pas gdungs pa dag gis bsams pa/_kye ma 'phags ma 'dis bdag cag skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la bum pa de nas skom blud na ci ma rung snyam mo/_/skyong 
[\[151b.7\]]mas bsod nams kyi 'du shes kyis re re la kham phor byin te lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs brims pa dang /_gang gis 'thungs pa de dus la bab ste de bzhin du thams cad dus la bab bo/_/skyong ma chom rkun pa de dag la lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs 'drim par byed pa na nam sros par gyur nas dge 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]slong ma'i dbyar khang sgo bcad pa na skyong ma 'ongs nas des dal bus khad kyis khad kyis sgo gtan brdungs pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_sgo gtan rdung bar byed pa 'di su/_skyong mas smras pa/_bdag skyong ma'o/_/khyod nam sros nas ga las 'ongs/_phu 
[\[152a.2\]]nu mo dag rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/ci khyod kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas sam/_'on te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas sam/_'on te dge 'dun gyi 
[\[152a.3\]]gtsug lag khang byed du bcug_/phu nu mo dag ma yin no/_/'o na 'bras chan nam/_skyo ma 'am/_thug pa'i btung ba 'am/_ras yug chen sbyor du bcug gam/_skyong mas smras pa/_phu nu mo dag ci khyed cag 'bras chan dang /_skyo ma dang /_thug pa'i btung ba dang /_ras 
[\[152a.4\]]yug chen sbyor du gzhug pa btsal ba las las gzhan med dam/_'o na gzhan ci byas/_khyed cag gis chom rkun pa drug bcu po lag pa dang /_rkang pa bcad pa de dag mthong ngam/_mthong ngo /_/bdag gis lan tshwa'i sman rtsabs bslangs te de dag 'thung du bcug nas 
[\[152a.5\]]'thungs pa dang /_de dag dus la bab pas ma gzhon nu dag gi nu zho 'thung du bcug go/_/skal chad ma khyod lto pham par 'gyur ba dag gis bkang ba la nged cag rjes su yi rang ba byed du 'jud dam/_de bdag la yang dag par pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa 
[\[152a.6\]]skyes nas des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma de la 'du shes kyang yod/_sems pa yang yod pas phas pham par gyur to/_/de lta bas na dge slong 
[\[152a.7\]]ngam/_dge slong mas nad pa la ji nas kyang nad pa dus byed par gyur cig snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis sman sbyin par mi bya bar 'di ltar ci nas kyang nad pa nad sos par gyur cig snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis sman sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong gis nad pa la ci nas kyang nad pa dus byed par gyur 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]cig snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis sman sbyin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor 
[\[152b.2\]]la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas pa de'i tshe na bcu bdun sde dag gal te gcig la las su bsko ba bab na yang de dag thams cad bsdongs te byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gtsug lag khang der mtshan thog 
[\[152b.3\]]thag tu chos mnyan pa byung bas der de dag thams cad kyis bsdongs te tron byas so/_/phyi de nyin par dge 'dun gyi bsro khang byung nas der yang de dag thams cad kyis bsdongs te tron byas so/_/de'i phyi de nyin par bcu bdun sde las gcig la dge skos bab nas de'i nyin mo yang 
[\[152b.4\]]thams cad kyis gtsug lag khang brgyan te 'khod do/_/de na dge skos tron byed pa'i tshe bcu bdun sde las gcig la blo byung ba bdag ni chad kyis nyal lo/_/mi bcu drug gis ci'i phyir tron mi nus snyam mo/_/de bzhin du re re la yang blo de lta bu byung nas gzhan bcu drug po thams cad 
[\[152b.5\]]so sor nyal du dong ngo /_/dge skos de 'ba' zhig gcig pu/_mtshan thog thag las byas te/_mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /_mar me'i kong bu dag bsdus/_sgo dag phye/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/_byug pa byas te/_dus shes par byas nas stan bshams shing 
[\[152b.6\]]mchod rten gyi 'khor sar bdug spos brims te/_gtsug lag khang gi steng du 'greng nas gaN+DI brdung bar brtsams so/_/de nas bcu drug po de dag gaN+DI'i sgras sad nas rang rang gi gnas khang dag nas lhung bzed thogs te byung ba dang /_de dag gis dge skos de gcig pu phar rgyug tshur 
[\[152b.7\]]rgyug cing 'dug pa mthong nas de dag gis phan tshun smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di gcig pu phar rgyug tshur rgyug cing 'dug na yu bu cag las sus kyang 'di'i grogs ma byas sam/_gcig gis smras pa/_kho bo la blo byung ba bdag ni chad kyis nyal lo/_/mi bcu drug gis ci'i 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]phyir tron mi nus snyam mo/_/de bzhin du gzhan yang de skad zer/_gzhan dag kyang de skad zer te/_thams cad kyis de skad smras so/_/de nas bcu drug po dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di bdag cag gi 'phral gyi bya ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba 
[\[153a.2\]]yin na bdag cag gis 'di'i grogs ma byas pa ni yu bu cag gis ma legs pa byas te/_'di bdag cag la gshe bar 'gyur gyis zan zos ma thag tu bzod pa gsol bar bya'o zhes de dag gis zan zos nas bzod pa gsol bar brtsams te/_gzhon pa rnams kyis ni de'i 
[\[153a.3\]]rkang pa gnyis la gtugs/_rgan pa rnams kyis ni mgul nas 'khyud de tshe dang ldan pa bzod par gsol zhes byas na de cang mi smra ba nyid du 'dug go/_/de dang ches bshes pa gcig yod pa des ga ga tshil byas pa dang /_des rgod par brtsams te/_bzod do zhes kyang zer ro/_/
[\[153a.4\]]de dag gis bsams pa/_de ni thabs legs pa yin no snyam nas gzhan gyis kyang ga ga tshil byas shing de bzhin du thams cad kyi bar gyis ga ga tshil byas pa dang /_de rlung gyen du 'chugs te dus la bab bo/_/de dag brtad cing mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams 
[\[153a.5\]]kyis smras pa/_kye bcu bdun sde dag ci'i phyir brtad cing mya ngan byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag sngon ni bcu bdun sder gyur na da ni bcu drug sder gyur te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yid du 'ong ba dang bral zhing pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung ngo /_/dge slong de dag gis ma legs 
[\[153a.6\]]so zhes smras te dong ngo /_/bcu drug po de dag kyang mtha' gcig tu dong ste/_sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa dge slong gzhan dag gis mthong nas dge slong de dag gis spyo bar brtsams te/_tshe dang ldan pa bcu bdun sde 'di dag ni sog ma'i me bzhin du skad cig gis 'bar zhing skad cig gis shi bar gyur te/_
[\[153a.7\]]yud tsam zhig rgod bag byed cing yud tsam zhig sems khong du chud cing 'khod do zhes zer ro/_/de dag mya ngan gyi mes yid gdungs pas yongs su spyos kyang cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong de rnams la ni ltung ba med de/_yang dge slong gis ga ga tshil mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal 
[\[153b.2\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod nas ha cang mi ring ba na/_ri brags shig yod pa de na khyim bdag phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste/_de yang dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin 
[\[153b.3\]]pas des dge 'dun la bsngos te gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang /_skar khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 'phrog pa/_mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug go/_/gtsug lag khang der dge slong drug 
[\[153b.4\]]bcus dbyar gnas pa dag byas te dong nas khyim bdag des der ma byin par len pa dag gis khri'am/_khri'u dag ma rkus par gyis shig ces srung ma'i mi bzhag go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gzhan drug bcu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brags der phyin nas bsti 
[\[153b.5\]]gnas rnyen par byed pa na mi zhig gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang du mi gnas/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gtsug lag khang ga la yod/_'phags pa dag dgon pa 'di na'o/_/dge slong de dag der dong ba dang srung ma'i mis mthong 
[\[153b.6\]]nas des 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bsnyen bkur byas te/_gnas khang dag bskos nas khri dang /_khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba la sogs pa dag phul te sbyangs tshags g.yar nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag re zhig chab btsag pa mdzod cig dang 
[\[153b.7\]]de'i bar du bdag gis khyim bdag la brjod par bgyi'o/_/zhes mi de khyim bdag gi drung du song ste smras pa/_khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig_/khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du dge slong glo bur du lhags pa drug bcu mchis so/_/khyim bdag gus par bsgrims pa dang bcas 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]pas nang mi dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong gi dge 'dun byon pa de dag legs par sbyar ba'i btung bas tshim par byas/_bu ram dang /_hwags dang /_li khar dang /_dgun dang /_bal po se'u long shig ces khyim bdag 
[\[154a.2\]]des legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sbyar nas gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_dge slong dag kyang chu btsags te rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod do/_/khyim bdag des dge slong de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/_des gtsug lag khang de mtsho pad mas gang 
[\[154a.3\]]ba bzhin du mthong nas rgya cher dad pa'i shugs kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyud kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_grong ngam yang na dgon pa'ang rung /_/gshong ngam yang na thang yang rung /_/gang na 'os pa gnas pa yi/_/sa gzhi de ni dga' byed yin/_/de nas legs par sbyar 
[\[154a.4\]]ba'i btung ba sta gon byas te rang gi lag nas dge slong gi dge 'dun de tshim par byas nas rang nyid kyis pog phor thogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/_rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug go/_/dge 'dun gyi 
[\[154a.5\]]gnas brtan gyis yon bshad nas khyim bdag des rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te sang bdag gi sdum par 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis kyang dang du blangs nas khyim bdag des rkang pa gnyis la 
[\[154a.6\]]phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/khyim bdag des phyi de nyin par zas bsod pas dge slong dag tshim par byas shing dus ma yin par yang btung ba blud nas dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan to/_/phyis kyang de kho na bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad pa dang /_khyim bdag de 
[\[154a.7\]]rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag gis gtsug lag khang 'di bdag nyid kyi slad du yang bgyid du ma stsal nye du rnams kyi slad du yang bgyid du ma stsal gyi/_'di ltar 'phags pa rnams kyi slad du bgyid du stsal ba lags kyis 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]zhal gyis bzhes shig dang /_bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag mnyan yod na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing /_dus dang dus su dge slong che ge mo 
[\[154b.2\]]zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas/_che ge mo zhig gis ni mi sdug pa'i bar grub bo zhes shes pa brda sprod pa dag kyang thos par 'gyur/_rgyal po yang bstan pa la shin tu dad/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /_rnying 
[\[154b.3\]]pa dang /_dge bsnyen ma sa ga dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma dang /_gzhan yang dad pa can mang du yod pas de zang zing gi longs spyod dang /_chos kyi longs spyod chen po yang 'grub pas bdag cag de nyid du 'dong ngo /_/'phags pa dag chos kyi longs spyod ni 'phags pa nyid la rag las pa lags 
[\[154b.4\]]kyi/_zang zing gi longs spyod ni bdag la rag las pa lags pas dgyes pa skyed cig dang /_cung zad kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa can gyi dad pa spel bar bya zhing sbyin bdag la rjes 
[\[154b.5\]]su snying brtse bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas 'di nyid du 'khod par bya'o zhes de dag der 'khod nas blo brtan pas gtsug lag khang de'i phyi nang bcas par so sor brtag par brtsams pa dang /_gtsug lag khang de me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'bras bu phun sum 
[\[154b.6\]]tshogs pa/_shin tu dga' bar mthong nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_shin tu dga' ba yin pas gal te bdag cag gis 'dir dbyar snga mar gnas par 
[\[154b.7\]]khas blangs na me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad yongs su longs spyod par mi 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag gis nges par dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o zhes de dag gis der dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs so/_/khyim bdag de la gtsug lag khang de gcig pu 'ba' 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]zhig yod pas de sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/_/ri brags de na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas/_ri brags pa de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug 
[\[155a.2\]]lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/_/ri brags de'i nyen kor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags kyi nyen kor ba de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas der dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i 
[\[155a.3\]]dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo /_/ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dgag dbye byas ma thag tu 'dus te/_bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na des btsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros 
[\[155a.4\]]byed do/_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di dag gzhom par bya'o snyam mo/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_de dag ni sgo 'phar brgya snyed bzla ba byas kyang /_lto khengs pa 'grub par dka' bas de dag la ci yang med na bdag cag ci'i phyir yun de srid du 
[\[155a.5\]]bsdad par bya/_de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa gcig 'dug pas smras pa/_khyed ci shes de dag la mang du yod do/_/ji ltar zhig gtsug lag khang 'di gang gi yin pa'i khyim bdag de ni dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin la khyim bdag de la yang 
[\[155a.6\]]gtsug lag khang 'di gcig pu 'ba' zhig yod pas de sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/_/ri brags 'di na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags pa 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa 
[\[155a.7\]]de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do/_/ri brags 'di'i nyen kor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags kyi nyen kor pa 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin pa'i zhing byed pas 'dir dbyar 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo /_/gal te yid mi ches na song la ltos shig dang rang nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/gal te de lta na khyod nyid je song la/_mngon sum du gyis shig dang /_kho bo cag phyis 'ong ngo /_/des smras pa/_legs kyis 
[\[155b.2\]]de bzhin gyis shig dang kho bo 'gro'o zhes de gos tshags bcos te 'phags shing de nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te/_gtsug lag khang der zhugs so/_/ji tsam na sgo khang na rgan zhugs shig 'dug nas g.yon can des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te dri 
[\[155b.3\]]bar brtsams pa/_'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi yin no/_/'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/_'on te phongs pa lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gtsug lag khang ni ji 
[\[155b.4\]]lta bu yin/_phongs pa ni ji lta bu yin/_'phags pa gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lags so/_/gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'o na 'di ni gtsug lag khang yin gyi phongs pa ma yin te/_'di ni yo byad phun sum 
[\[155b.5\]]tshogs pa yod kyi 'di na yo byad med pa ma yin no/_/'phags pa zas za ba ni 'ga' yang sa rdul mi za la/_gos dag gyon pa ni 'ga' yang shing shun dag mi gyon pas khyed cag la gos cung zad mchis sam/_rgan zhugs de drang po'i rang bzhin can yin pas des g.yon 
[\[155b.6\]]can de'i lag nas bzung ste gnas khang du bcug nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gos kyi gdang gos dag gis phur shog cing 'dug pa la ltos/_'phags pa ci 'di khyod kyi lags sam/_'on te dge 'dun gyi lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di kho bo gang zag gi yin no/_/
[\[155b.7\]]'phags pa 'o na khyod ni gor ma bkum par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nam/_chos sgrog pa zhig lags sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan yang ma yin la/_chos sgrog pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar kho bo ni dge 'dun gyi gsar bu dge tshul zhig yin no/_/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]'phags pa de ni mjal na 'di na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal cung zad mchis sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mang du yod de re zhig kho bo'i byug ris su yang dngos po bdun po dag 'thob bo/_/'phags pa de yang mjal gyis 'di zhu'o/_/gtsug lag khang 'di na gang la la 
[\[156a.2\]]'tshal ma bgyid pa da ci rdza mkhan gyi snod du 'tshod dam/_'on te zangs ma'i snod du 'tshod bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis gnas khang 'di dag mthong ngam/_'phags pa mthong ngo /_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gnas khang 'di dag zangs ma'i snod kyis gang zhing 'dug go/_/g.yon can des bsams 
[\[156a.3\]]pa legs par brid zin gyis da ni 'gro'o snyam nas g.yon can des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams la bdag gi don yongs su nyams pa lags pas bdag slad kyis kyang mchi yis da ni mchi'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de bzhin gyis shig_/g.yon can des rgan zhugs 
[\[156a.4\]]de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas g.yon can de chom rkun pa de dag gi drung du song ste smras pa/_pad ma'i mig can dag rdzas thams cad kyis gang ba'i gru bo che skams la 'dug gis phrogs shig_/phrogs shig_/de na gcig gis smras pa/_de na 'khod pa'i rab tu byung ba drug bcu po dag ni 'phong 
[\[156a.5\]]gi slob dpon sha stag yin zhes grag pas de bzhin du gzhom par mi nus kyis/_gang gi tshe de dag mtshan mo chos nyan pa de'i tshe gzhom mo/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_nyi ma gang la de dag gi chos nyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_des smras pa/_tshes brgyad dang /_bcu 
[\[156a.6\]]bzhi la 'byung ste/_de la tshes brgyad ni thal zin pas tshes bcu bzhi la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag sor mo dag gis nyi ma bgrang zhing 'khod 'khod pa nas ji tsam na tshes bcu bzhi la bab ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo bton te dge 
[\[156a.7\]]'dun gyis gso sbyong byas nas chos sgrog pa seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te 'di skad ces/_mi mchog 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur mdzad pa/_/kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod pa de bzhin gshegs/_/dbang po zhi zhing nyer zhi zhi la mkhas/_/mnyan yod bzhugs pas bka' bzhin byed la 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]gsungs/_/zhes smra bar brtsams pa dang /_g.yon can de dag gis sgo brdungs so/_/dge slong de dag gis tshor nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag su yin/_'phags pa dag bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go/_/dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/_ri brags nas 
[\[156b.2\]]skye bo'i tshogs dag chos nyan du lhags gor ma chag gis sgo dbye'o snyam nas de dag gis sgo phye ba dang de dag zhugs so/_/ji tsam na gzhom par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag na re bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go zhes zer na da 
[\[156b.3\]]nged cag 'joms par byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag la ming gnyis mchis te/_slad rol du ni rigs kyi bu dag ces bgyi la/_nang du ni chom rkun pa dag ces bgyi'o/_/khyed cag ming 'dogs par byed pa ni nyams so/_/g.yon can de dag gis 
[\[156b.4\]]dge slong de dag bcom ste dong nas/_dge slong bcom pa de dag gis gros byas pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas par bzho bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas re zhig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/_
[\[156b.5\]]bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci byas/_bdag cag mnyan yod nyid du dong na der bdag cag re re la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gros byas so/_/ji ltar 'dong bar bya/_mtshan mo 'gebs pas 
[\[156b.6\]]'dong zhing /_nyin mo thibs por zhugs te 'gro bar bya'o zhes de dag gis khyim bdag la yang ma bltas par dong ngo /_/ji tsam na mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa 
[\[156b.7\]]de dag gis dge slong de dag sgren mor sgo'i gam yo na rgyu ba mthong nas smras pa/_gcer bu sgre byi dag khyed cag 'dir ci 'dod/_'di khyed kyi gtsug lag khang yang ma yin la 'dug gnas kyang ma yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]cag gcer bu pa dag ma yin no/_/'o na khyed su yin/_dge slong dag go/_/'di lta bu dag dge slong yin nam/_gang dag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa de dag ji lta bu yin/_khyed cag ming ci/_sangs rgyas 'tsho'o/_/chos 'tsho'o/_/dge 'dun 'tsho'o/_/
[\[157a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/zhes de dag gis sgo phye nas dge slong de dag 'jug tu bcug ste/_de dag la la las ni chos gos byin/_la las ni sham thabs byin/_la las ni rdul gzan byin/_la las ni lhung bzed byin/_la las ni chu tshags byin te/_bgo bsha' ji lta ba 
[\[157a.3\]]bzhin du thams cad bgo bsha' byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi shes pa la gtsug lag khang gi sgo gya tshom du dbye bar mi bya ste/_gal te 'ga' zhig mtshan mo sgo 'dod na de'i ming dang 
[\[157a.4\]]ris dri bar bya zhing gal te ngo shes na sgo dbye bar bya zhing /_ngo mi shes na sgo dbye bar mi bya'o/_/gzhan yang chos mnyan pa la bab pa'i tshe dge slong mel tse ba gzhag par bya zhing /_gal te chom rkun pa 'ongs na gaN+DI 'on cig_/gaN+DI'i the'u 'on cig_/dus kyi 'khor lo 
[\[157a.5\]]'on cig_/snam sbyar dang /_bdun pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_gtur bu dang /_rgya cang dang /_shur bu dang /_lcag pod dang /_shur bu phre'u 'on cig ces tsham ngam bya'o/_/gzhan yang ngas dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_
[\[157a.6\]]dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis chos mnyan pa la bab pa'i tshe dge skos la tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gi sgo bcad dam/_so sor brtags sam/_chos smra ba la gsol ba btab bam/_bshang ba dang gci ba'i skyabs byi dor byas sam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/
[\[157a.7\]]dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas chom rkun pas bcom pa'i dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]gis khyed cag la bgo bsha' ji lta ba bzhin du bgo bsha' byas mod kyi 'on kyang da dung khyed cag chos gos dag gis brel gyis khyed cag khyim bdag gang gi gtsug lag khang du bcom par gyur pa'i khyim bdag de ni dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas/_de nyid kyi gtsug 
[\[157b.2\]]lag khang du deng shig dang de nyid kyis khyed cag la chos gos dag gis mi brel bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong de dag mtha' gcig tu dong ste phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'di dag zer ba ni bzang ste/_bdag cag 
[\[157b.3\]]gis khyim bdag la ma bltas par 'ongs pas yang phyir de nyid du dong na des bdag cag la chos gos dag gis bgo bsha' byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang yod do/_/zhes de dag yang phyir der dong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci'i 
[\[157b.4\]]slad du khyed kyis bdag la ma gzigs par bzhud/_dge slong de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas par bzho bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas des na bdag cag la blo byung ba re zhig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[157b.5\]]sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/_bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci byas/_bdag cag mnyan yod du dong na der bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/snyam nas de'i phyir bdag cag mnyan yod du dong 
[\[157b.6\]]ngo /_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gal te bdag gi gtsug lag khang bcom pas ci khyim na bdag dbang ba'i rdzas dag kyang bcom snyam mam/_'phags pa dag khyed cag gang gi slad du byon pa ni byon pa legs so/_/zhes khyim bdag des yang rgya cher 
[\[157b.7\]]gus pa dang bcas pas mkhos su phab ste dge slong re re la yang yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum phul lo/_/chom rkun pa de dag yang phyir 'ongs te gtsug lag khang gi sgo rdung bar byed pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis tshor nas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]g.yon can de dag nyid lhags kyis tsham ngam gyis shig ces gaN+DI 'on cig ces gaN+DI de'i the'u dang /_dus kyi 'khor lo dang /_snam sbyar dang /_bdun pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_gtur bu dang /_rgya cang dang /_shur bu dang /_lcag pod dang /_shur bu phre'u 'on 
[\[158a.2\]]cig ces tsham ngam bya bar brtsams pa dang /_g.yon can de dag skrag ste 'byer bar brtsams pa na lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_legs gsungs rkang gnyis gtso bo thub pa yis/_/nyan thos rnams kyi tsham ngam gang bstan pa/_/tsham ngam rab brtson pa

[\[158a.4\]]'khod pa'i rab tu byung ba drug bcu po dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon sha stag yin no zhes zer bas ji ltar mi 'bros su rung /_gzhan yang bdag cag gis gaN+DI zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshon de lta bu dag gi ming ni sngon lan 'ga' yang ma thos so/_/des smras pa/_de dag 
[\[158a.5\]]ni mtshon ma yin no/_/'o na de dag ci yin/_re zhig gaN+DI zhes bya ba ni de dag gi brdung ba'o/_/gaN+DI'i the'u zhes bya ba ni gang gi rdung bar byed pa'o/_/dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni dus yongs su gcod par byed pa'o/_/snam sbyar dang /_bdun pa dang /_lnga pa zhes bya ba de dag ni chos gos 
[\[158a.6\]]dag gi ming ngo /_/gtur bu zhes bya ba ni gang du de dag gzhug pa'o/_/rgya cang dang /_shur bu dang /_lcag pod dang /_shur bu phre'u zhes bya ba de dag ni ska rags kyi ming yin gyis khyed cag ma sdar bar yang phyir 'dong la gzhom par bya'o zhes smras nas/_de dag yang phyir log ste 
[\[158a.7\]]chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis ya gad btsugs te 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang /_de na rgan zhugs zhig mel tse bar bzhag pa des chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'dzeg pa de mthong nas rgan zhugs des bsams pa/_g.yon can 'di dag ni gang dag gis bdag cag lhung bzed 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]dang chos gos phrogs te sgren mor bzhag pa dag yin gyis/_gal te 'di dag la btang snyoms byas na yang 'di dag gis bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos phrogs te sgren mor bzhag par 'gyur bas 'di dag bsdigs par bya'o snyam nas/_rgan zhugs des dal bus khad

[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga'

[\[161a.1\]]kha na ma tho bas kyang ma reg la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba yang ma byung ngo /_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/pham par 'gyur ba gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs

[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]zhugs nas gzung bar ma nus so/_/skyabs med pa de dag gis kun du shes ldan dag rgya mo spyod pa chen mo dang bdag cag khyer gyis grogs gyis shig ces ra mda' ba bzlog pa dang las ma mthong ba'i mi ba lang rdzi dag dang /_phyugs rdzi dag dang /_shing thun dag dang /_rtswa thun dag dang /_
[\[161b.2\]]lam gyis 'tsho ba dag dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi dag dang /_gzhan yang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag log nas de dag gi lus smas pa dang /_rnam par smas pa dag gis rgya mo ral pa dang rab tu ral pas chu srin de chu nas skam la phyung ngo /_/de la mgo 
[\[161b.3\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mig sum bcu rtsa drug yod do/_/de'i mgo la la ni glang po che'i mgo 'dra/_la la ni rta'i mgo 'dra/_la la ni rnga mo'i mgo dang /_bong bu'i mgo dang /_ba lang gi mgo dang /_spre'u'i mgo dang /_seng ge'i mgo dang /_stag gi mgo dang /_dom gyi mgo

[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /_mi gzigs pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_bsrung ba

[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/_gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 
[\[162b.2\]]bskyed pa ni yongs su smin par bya/_yongs su smin pa gang yin pa ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang /_gzigs pa 'jug go/_/smras pa/_chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/_/dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas gdul la byams 
[\[162b.3\]]pa ni/_/dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la/_/rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la/_/rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad/_/kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' 
[\[162b.4\]]ba'i thugs rje yi/_/gzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste/_/srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni/_/rab 'byams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_chu srin nya'i rigs gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_
[\[162b.5\]]mi bde ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag la bya ba lhag par byas pa yin gyis/_ngas chu srin nya'i rigs 'di la rten te 'dul bar gyur pa'i rgya mo chen mo drang bar byas/_de'i phyir chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram du 'gro'o snyam mo/_/sangs 
[\[162b.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs la gson zhing gzhes pa rnams kyis chos nyid ni gdul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la rjes su thugs brtse bas dus dang dus su sems can dmyal ba rgyur gshegs pa dang /_dud 'gro rgyu ba dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgyu ba 
[\[162b.7\]]dang /_lha rgyu ba dang /_ljongs rgyu ba dang /_chu klung rgyu ba dang /_ri rgyu ba dang /_dur khrod rgyu ba dang /_gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs pas don 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung rgyur gshegs par bzhed nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]chos nyid kyis na gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas 
[\[163a.2\]]kha cig ni 'og logs su 'dong /_kha cig ni steng logs su 'dong bas gang dag 'og logs su 'dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_
[\[163a.3\]]mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol ba dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer ba dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por dong ste/_sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang dag 
[\[163a.4\]]yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed la/_sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do/_/des sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /_de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci 
[\[163a.5\]]bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so/_/de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos 
[\[163a.6\]]pa yang ma yin la/_gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam du sems so/_/de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/_sems 
[\[163a.7\]]can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do/_/gang dag steng logs su 'dong ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi pa dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang /_
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge 
[\[163b.2\]]rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya 
[\[163b.3\]]ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_/brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 
[\[163b.4\]]'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba yang smras so/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi 
[\[163b.5\]]slad bzhin slad bzhin du rjes su 'dong ste/_de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur/_ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal 
[\[163b.6\]]bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/_dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/_mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor 
[\[163b.7\]]nub par 'gyur/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/_lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par 
[\[164a.2\]]bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi lte bar nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa de bzhin 
[\[164a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_tshigs su bcad pa yang gsol pa/_kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[164a.4\]]stong gis bkra ba yi/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur te/_/de yis phyogs rnams thams cad snang bgyis pa/_/nyi gdugs bdal bar gyur pa ji bzhin no/_/rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs pa/_/sangs rgyas 'gro bar mchog gi 
[\[164a.5\]]rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/_/rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad brtan pa rang blos dus mkhyen nas/_/thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang po/_/nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan rnams la/_/
[\[164a.6\]]the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yis/_/sangs rgyas mgon rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pa ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo'i 
[\[164a.7\]]tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyis/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung rgyur gshegs bzhed kyis/_khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_thabs cig chu klung rgyur 'gro bar spro ba 
[\[164b.2\]]des chos gos dag long shig ces sgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das chu klung rgyur gshegs bzhed kyis/_
[\[164b.3\]]khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig chu klung rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig/_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang 
[\[164b.4\]]ldan pa/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang 
[\[164b.5\]]bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_seng ge ltar mche 
[\[164b.6\]]ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sman 
[\[164b.7\]]pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]bskor ba/_tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi 
[\[165a.2\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i 
[\[165a.3\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_thags zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshangs 
[\[165a.4\]]pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang /_spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_chu gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen 
[\[165a.5\]]po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun 
[\[165a.6\]]du bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_
[\[165a.7\]]maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te chu klung yid 'ong ldan ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/'khor des thag ring po kho 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]na nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni dge sbyong gau ta ma ltad mo dang bral lo zhes grags na/_de la yang ltad mo skyes te chu srin nya'i rigs blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongs so zhes 
[\[165b.2\]]zer ro/_/gang dag dad pa dang ldan pa de dag ni ma dad pa de dag la shes ldan dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ltad mo dang bral ba kho na yin te/_bcom ldan 'das chu srin nya'i rigs las brtsams te/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po la ngo mtshar rmad du byung 
[\[165b.3\]]ba'i chos cung zhig ston par bzhed gor ma chag go zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/thub pa ltad mo bral ba'i dgongs ldan pa/_/ltad mo med la skye ngan don med smra/_/gzhan phan de la gzhol ba'i rgyal ba 'di/_/lus can phan phyir nges par 
[\[165b.4\]]'dir gshegs so/_/de nas 'khor des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas 'phral kho na la mngon par langs te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pas yab dang /_yum dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_
[\[165b.5\]]bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag la mngon par bzhengs pa mdzad mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor de'i dbus su gshegs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 
[\[165b.6\]]'das kyis nya pa lnga brgya po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag re zhig khyed cag ni nyes par byas pa'i las byed pa yin te/_des na da ltar nya pa'i skye gnas dman par skyes shing khyed cag da ltar drag shul can/_lag pa khrag gis gos pa/_
[\[165b.7\]]nyams pa rab tu nyams pa la zhen pa/_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed de/_'di nas shi 'phos na khyed cag gi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni cir 'gyur/_tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/_de dag gis gsol pa/_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nya dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbal pa dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_nya khyi ba la sogs pa chu nas bton pa 'di dag thong shig_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[166a.2\]]kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin gtang bar bgyi'o zhes de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i dus kyi mjug thogs su de dag btang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas ci nas kyang chu srin nya'i rigs ma gtogs pa nya dang /_
[\[166a.3\]]rus sbal dang /_sbal pa dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_nya khyi ba la sogs pa'i srog chags 'di dag chu ji lta ba kho na bzhin du chu klung yid 'ong ldan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_chu srin nya'i rigs kyang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran zhing mi'i skad rjod par 
[\[166a.4\]]'gyur la/_nga dang thabs cig smra bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang chu srin nya'i rigs ma gtogs pa nya dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbal pa dang /_chu srin byis 
[\[166a.5\]]pa gsod dang /_nya khyi ba la sogs pa'i srog chags de dag chu ji lta ba kho na bzhin du chu klung yid 'ong ldan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_chu srin nya'i rigs kyang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran zhing mi'i skad rjod par 'gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[166a.6\]]dang thabs cig smra bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin nya'i rigs la bka' stsal pa/_bu khyod ser skya yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ser skya lags so/_/bu khyod 
[\[166a.7\]]ser skya yin nam/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag ser skya lags so/_/bu khyod la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa yod dam/_bcom ldan 'das mchis so/_/bu khyod la ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa yod dam/_bde bar gshegs pa mchis 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]so/_/bu khyod kyis lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das nyams su myong ngo /_/bu khyod kyis ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ngam/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[166b.2\]]pa nyams su myong ngo /_/'o na khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin/_bdag gi ma lags so/_/de gang du skyes sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o/_/khyod gang du skyes dud 'gror ro/_/ji snyam du sems/_khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 
[\[166b.3\]]'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o zhes gsol nas ngu ba la zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_khyod ni dud 'gro'i skye 
[\[166b.4\]]gnas skyes/_/mi khom zhugs par gyur pa la/_/da lta ngas kyang ci byar med/_/don med ngus pas ci la phan/_/thugs rje ldan rgyal nga la ni/_/legs par sems ni dad gyis dang /_/dud 'gro'i skye 'dir chags bral zhing /_/de nas mtho ris 'gro bar 
[\[166b.5\]]'gyur/_/des bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par byas nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/zhes tshig gsum gyis chos 
[\[166b.6\]]bstan to/_/de nas 'khor de mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas sngon gyi skye ba dran par byas shing mi'i skad kyang rjod par byed la/_bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig smra bar byed pa 'di su zhig yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[166b.7\]]ldan 'das rnams ni bsten par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba yin pas bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar mi nus kyis bdag cag 'phags pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas 'phags pa kun dga' bo la don de zhu bar bya zhing 'phags pa 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]kun dga' bos bdag cag la ji skad lung ston par 'gyur ba de de kho na bzhin du gzung bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas 'khor de tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[167a.2\]]'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas/_sngon gyi skye ba dran par bgyis shing mi'i skad kyang rjod par bgyid la/_bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig smra bar bgyid pa 'di su zhig lags/_kun dga' bos smras pa/_shes ldan dag bcom 
[\[167a.3\]]ldan 'das nyid la don de zhus shig_/'phags pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsten par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar rngo mi thog go/_/shes ldan dag kho bo la yang 
[\[167a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsten par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba yin pas kho bos kyang bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar mi nus mod kyi/_'on kyang khyed kyi don du zhu bar bya'o zhes smras nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[167a.5\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas sngon gyi skye ba dran par bgyis 
[\[167a.6\]]shing mi'i skad kyang rjod par bgyid la/_bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig smra bar bgyid pa 'di su zhig lags/_kun dga' bo 'di ni chu srin nya'i rigs yin no/_/kun dga' bo khyod chu srin nya'i rigs kyi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba las brtsams te chos dang ldan pa'i gtam nyan 
[\[167a.7\]]par 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin nya'i rigs kyi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba las brtsams te dge slong rnams dang skye bo'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid bka' stsal par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das las thos nas dge slong rnams dang skye bo'i tshogs dag 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]'dzin par 'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das de ni dus lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni dus lags so/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid 
[\[167b.2\]]la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston 
[\[167b.3\]]pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/_
[\[167b.4\]]rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_phyi dgra dang /_nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang bral ba/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/_
[\[167b.5\]]chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyis rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/de nas shed bu gsang tshig 'dod pa gsang tshig tshol ba zhig yul dbus nas lho lam du song ngo /_/de na bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol du son pa/_yul tha dad pa na gnas 
[\[167b.6\]]pa'i bram ze rnams kyi ston par gyur pa zhig 'dug nas/_shed bu de bram ze de'i drung du song ste phyin nas zhi ba dang spyod lam zhi bas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze des shed bu de la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad nas smras pa/_
[\[167b.7\]]kye shed bu khyod ga las 'ongs/_ci zhig 'dod/_shed bus smras pa/_bdag yul dbus nas mchis te mkhan po'i zhabs la sri zhu bgyid par 'tshal lo/_/ci zhig gi phyir/_rig byed bklag pa'i slad du'o/_/shed bu legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig_/de ni bram zes bya ba yin no/_/
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]shed bu des bram ze de'i drung du rig byed bklag par bya bar brtsams so/_/shed bu rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni 'di yin te/_gang gi tshe mi klog par gyur pa de'i tshe na lan 'ga' ni chu ngogs su nye reg byed du 'dong ngo /_/lan 'ga' ni grong khyer ltar 'dong ngo /_/lan 'ga' 
[\[168a.2\]]ni yam sreg shing thur 'dong ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de dag mi klog par gyur nas de'i tshe de dag yam sreg shing thur dong ba dang /_de dag la lam gyi bar du bar skabs kyi gtam rjod pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_kye kud sa'i rigs dag_/bad sa'i rigs dag_/shan di la'i rigs 
[\[168a.3\]]dag_/bar dwa dza'i rigs dag_/lnga pa'i rigs dag_/nye lnga'i rigs dag je khyed cag las gang ni yul ga las 'ongs pa dri bar bya'o/_/de na shed bu gcig gis smras pa/_kho bo ni yul shar nas so/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_kho bo ni lho lam nas so/_/yang gzhan zhig gis 
[\[168a.4\]]smras pa/_kho bo ni nub kyi sa nas so/_/yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_kho bo ni byang lam nas so/_/shed bu des smras pa/_kho bo ni yul dbus nas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag gis yul thams cad mthong zhing thos na yul dbus ni ma mthong ma thos so/_/shar 
[\[168a.5\]]na blo can gnas pa ste/_/lho lam na ni yon byed 'dug_/nub kyi yul na phra ma can/_/byang lam na ni tshig rtsub bo/_/zhes tshigs su bcad pa yang smras so/_/de nas dris pa/_shed bu yul dbus ci 'dra/_shes ldan dag yul dbus ni yul rnams kyi mchog yin te/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang ba lang 
[\[168a.6\]]dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_slong mo ba brgyas khyab pa/_dbus pa'i skye bos gang ba mtha' 'khob pa'i skye bos spangs pa/_skye bo mkhas pas bsten pa/_de na chu klung gang gA kha rje dang /_bsod nams dang /_bkra shis dang /_gtsang ba dang /_gtsang ba nyid kyi gnas su grags pa/_'gram 
[\[168a.7\]]gnyis nas rlan 'phyo ba/_drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas zhes bya ba chu dgur [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'bab pa yod de/_der drang srong rnams kyis dka' thub spyad na rang gi lus nyid kyis mtho ris su 'dong ba yin no/_/kye shed bu de ni mjal gyis gzhan 'di dri'o/_/yul dbus na mkhas par 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]bgrang ba dag yod dam/_shes ldan dag kho bos dang po nyid nas shes ldan dag yul dbus ni dbus pa'i skye bos gang ba/_'thab 'khob pa'i skye bos spangs pa/_skye bo mkhas pas bsten pa'o zhes ma smras sam/_shed bu khyod kyis de skad smras so/_/shed bu yul dbus na 'di lta 
[\[168b.2\]]ste/_dper na bdag cag gi mkhan po dang 'dra ba smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag yod dam/_shes ldan dag yul dbus na bdag cag gi mkhan pos gang dag gi gdong du lta bar yang mi nus pa snyan par smra ba smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag yod do/_/shed bu des de dag la de lta de ltar 
[\[168b.3\]]yul dbus kyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_'di ltar de dag thams cad yul dbus su 'dong 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas shed bu de dag gis yam sreg shing dag btsal te/_yam sreg shing gi khur thogs nas bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas yam sreg shing gi khur mtha' gcig tu 
[\[168b.4\]]bzhag ste bram ze de ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/shed bu 'dis ci nas kyang bdag cag thams cad yul dbus su mchi 'tshal bar gyur pa de ltar yul dbus kyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/bram ze des smras pa/_bu 
[\[168b.5\]]dag ci ji snyed thos pa de snyed bgrod par bya ba yin nam/_'di ltar yul dag ni thos na dga' bar 'gyur ba yin pas mnyan par bya'i bgrod par ni mi bya'o/_/mkhan po shed bu 'di'i mchid nas yul dbus na bdag cag gi mkhan pos gang dag gi gdong du lta bar yang mi nus pa snyan par smra ba smra ba'i 
[\[168b.6\]]khyu mchog de lta bu dag mchis so zhes mchi'o/_/bu dag ci kho bo na re sa'i steng na kho bo gcig pu kho na smra ba yin gyis smra ba gzhan 'ga' yang med do zhes zer ram/_sa ni rin po che mang po 'dzin pa yin pas sa gzhi ni mdzes pa mdzes pa dag gis gang ba yin no/_/mkhan po re zhig yul de yang
