[\[168b.7\]]mthong bar 'gyur zhing chu ngogs su nye reg kyang bgyi/_smra ba'i khyu mchog de dag la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi/_rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bgyi/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bgyi/_rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bgyis/_bdag cag yul dbus su mchi'o/_/bram ze de slob ma la rjes 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]su chags pa dang bcas pa dang 'khor nyung ba yin pas des shed bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu dag gal te de lta na g.yang gzhi dag dang /_shing shun dag dang /_dbyug gu dag dang /_blugs gzar dag dang /_dgang gzar dag dang /_ril ba dag long shig 
[\[169a.2\]]dang yul dbus su 'dong ngo /_/de dag gis de dag blangs nas bram ze de shed bu de dag dang lhan cig yul dbus su 'phags pa dang /_des rgol ba kha cig ni tshar bcad de rgol ba'i shing rta la sbyor bar byed/_kha cig ni mgor thal ba'i bum pa dag gis bsnun/_kha cig ni 
[\[169a.3\]]'phong gi dpong sar khwa bzhin du thag ring po nas yongs su spong bar byed/_kha cig ni gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsu bar byed/_kha cig ni slob ma nyid du khas len par byed cing de mthar gyis grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_dbye tshongs 
[\[169a.4\]]dang /_tshong rdal dag tu rgol ba 'dul zhing bA rA Na sIr phyin to/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_bdag gis ci'i phyir rtsa ba spangs te yal ga dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo ma la nyug par bya/_rgol ba gang dag dang mkhas par bgrang ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po dang nye ba yin 
[\[169a.5\]]gyis bdag kyang rgyal po'i gan du 'gro'o snyam nas/_bram ze de rgyal po kr-i kI ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po kr-i kI la rgyal ba dang tshe spel bar byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po kr-i kI la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag la bla ma las yi ge nyung 
[\[169a.6\]]shas shig blangs pa mchis te de'i slad du lha'i spyan sngar rgol ba dag dang lhan cig bka' mchid dam par gtan la dbab par 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i yul na bram ze 'di dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i rgol ba 'ga' 
[\[169a.7\]]yod dam/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ri brags che ge mo zhig na bram ze ser skya zhi ba zhes bgyi ba rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu mchis pa/_zhugs lta bu'i shes pas rang gi smra ba gsal bar bgyid pa/_gzhan gyi smra ba tshar gcod par rngo thog pa zhig mchis so/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]mkhan po de bos shig_/lha bod par bgyi'o zhes de dag gis de bos nas/_de rgyal po kr-i kI ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po kr-i kI la rgyal ba dang /_tshe spel ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mkhan po de 'di lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[169b.2\]]pos 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad de smras pa/_mkhan po khyod kho bo'i mdun du bram ze 'di dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa byed nus sam/_ser skya zhi bas smras pa/_bdag gis rngo ci thog pas rgyal po dgyes par bgyi'o/_/
[\[169b.3\]]rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor shoms shig_/phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par zhog shig_/blon po rnams kyis rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor bshams shing phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par bzhag go/_/de nas 
[\[169b.4\]]blon po rnams kyis rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_lha phyogs snga ma gang bgyid du stsal/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bram ze 'di 'gron po yin gyis 'di phyogs snga ma byed du chug shig_/bram ze de phyogs snga ma byed du bcug nas des rgyud chags lnga brgya bzlas so/_/
[\[169b.5\]]ser skya zhi bas phyir bzlas so/_/khyod kyi 'di ni rigs pa med pa yin no/_/'di ni mi mthun pa yin no/_/'di ni mi 'thad pa yin no zhes skyon btags pa dang /_bram ze de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/tshar gcad pa'i gnas rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste lan la spobs pa med pa 'di 
[\[169b.6\]]ni tha cad yin no/_/de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas smras pa/_mkhan po khyod gnas gang du gnas/_ser skya zhi bas smras pa/_lha ri brags che ge mo zhig tu'o/_/khyod song la ri brags de khyod kyi rgol ba'i longs spyod gyis shig_/ser skya zhi ba rangs pa dang /_dga' 
[\[169b.7\]]ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas skye bo mkhas pa dag gis yongs su bskor te ri brags der song ngo /_/'jig rten ni 'byor pa 'dod pa yin pas ser skya zhi ba des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la bu ral pa ser skya can zhig btsas nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/_khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/nye du rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[170a.2\]]khye'u 'di bram ze ser skya zhi ba'i bu yin la 'di'i ral pa yang ser skyar 'dug pas khye'u 'di'i ming ser skyar gdags so zhes de'i ming ser skyar btags so/_/de 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis 
[\[170a.3\]]sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe na yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_gzhug pa dang /_gzhag pa dang /_'byed pa dang /_klog pa'i pha rol du son cing /_
[\[170a.4\]]de'i tshe na bram ze'i spyod tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_kun tu spyod pa dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_bya ma bum blang ba dang /_sa blang ba dang /_lag ltang dang /_thor tshugs dang /_rab bsngags bya ba dang /_kye zhes bya ba dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig 
[\[170a.5\]]byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_bram ze'i las drug po mchod sbyin byed pa dang /_mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_klog tu 'dzud pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_len pa la mkhas pa'i bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol 
[\[170a.6\]]du son pa/_me lta bu'i shes pas rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed pa/_gzhan gyi smra ba tshar gcod nus par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na bram ze ser skya zhi bas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam dag bram ze'i gsang tshig dag 'don du bcug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/_shed bu ser skya klog par 
[\[170a.7\]]byed pas pha la smras pa/_yab ri tsa zhes bgyi ba 'di'i don ci lags/_ser skya zhi bas smras pa/_bu yi ge dag ni yun ring po nas bral ba dag ste bla ma'i tshig shes par dka' ba dag yin pas drang srong de dag gis don dang bral ba'i bstan bcos nye bar sbyar ba 'di ci yin mi shes so/_/
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]ser skyas smras pa/_yab bdag gis ri tsa zhes bgyi ba 'di'i don de 'tshal to/_/bram ze ser skya zhi bas bsams pa/_'di ltar phas bu la bdag dang mnyam pa'am khyad par du 'phags pa de ni 'dod par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir 'di bdag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyis 
[\[170b.2\]]bdag gis 'di la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag gtad par bya'o snyam du rig nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya la smras pa/_bu 'di ltar phas bu la bdag dang mnyam pa'am khyad par du 'phags pa de ni 'dod par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir khyod kho bo bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyis/_
[\[170b.3\]]khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag bram ze'i gsang tshig dag 'don du chug shig_/ser skyas smras pa/_bka' bzhin 'tshal 'don du stsal to zhes des bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag_/bram ze'i gsang tshig dag 'don du gzhug par brtsams so/_/bram ze ser skya zhi ba yang 
[\[170b.4\]]bya ba med cing ci dgar 'gro ba dang /_spyod pas dga' mgur spyod par brtsams so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na drang srong smra bar song ste der dge slong zhig gi gan du song nas smras pa/_slob dpon tshig 'di'i don ci lags/_dge slong des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dri ba de ni de skad 
[\[170b.5\]]dri bar mi bya ste/_dri ba de de skad dris na yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dri ba de ni 'di skad dri bar bya ste/_dri ba de 'di skad dris na tshig 'di'i don yin no zhes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze ser skya zhi bas bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di dag la dri ba yang 
[\[170b.6\]]'dri bar mi nus na bdag gis 'di dag dang lhan cig ci ltar smra ba bya bar 'gyur snyam nas/_de dge slong rnams la shin tu mngon par dad par gyur nas dus dang dus su dge slong dag mgron du bos te khyim gzhan du zas sbyin par byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur nas des shed bu 
[\[170b.7\]]ser skya la smras pa/_bu ji tsam na nyi ma 'char ba dang /_ji tsam na nub pa de'i bar du khyod dang 'dra ba'i smra ba gzhan med kyis/_de'i phyir khyod kyis kho bo 'das nas smra ba thams cad dang /_lhan cig 'jigs pa med pa dang /_bag tsha ba med par smra bar bya'o/_/'od srung gi dge 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]sbyong rnams ni ma gtogs te/_de dag ni rgyud rgya chen po dang ldan pa/_rgyud zab mo dang ldan pa/_rgyud bzang po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten pa la pham par mi nus pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa la gting med pa yin te/_de dag ni mang ba dang /_mthun pa dang /_longs spyod 
[\[171a.2\]]dag don du mi gnyer ba yin no/_/ser skyas smras pa/_yab de bzhin bgyi'o/_/bram ze ser skya zhi ba na ba las ma langs te/_de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman dag gis bsnyen bkur byas kyang nyams pa nyid du gyur nas/_ji tsam na bsags pa 
[\[171a.3\]]kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson po'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/de shed bu ser skya dang nang mis gos sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag 
[\[171a.4\]]gis khyogs spyil brgyan te dur khrod du bskyal nas bsregs te de'i 'og tu mya ngan bsang ba byas nas 'khod do/_/lho phyogs nas lhags pa'i smra ba de dag gis bram ze ser skya zhi ba dus la bab ces thos so/_/thos nas kyang phan tshun smra bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag bram ze smra ba de 
[\[171a.5\]]dus la bab kyis da ni 'dong bar bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'dus te rgyal po kr-i kI'i gan du dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas te smras pa/_lha bdag cag la bla ma las yi ge nyung shas shig blangs pa mchis te bdag cag lha'i spyan sngar bka' mchid rnam par gtan la 
[\[171a.6\]]dbab pa bgyid par 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag mkhan po de bos shig_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bram ze smra ba de dus la bab bo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de'i phyir 'di dag g.yul du phug ron bzhin du 'dus te nga'i drung du lhags kyis/_bram 
[\[171a.7\]]ze de'i bu'am phu nu bo 'ga' ci yod/_lha de'i bu shed bu ser skya zhes bgyi ba mchis so/_/mkhan po'i bu de bos shig_/de dag gis de bos nas des rgyal po la/_rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha de'i bu shed bu ser skya zhes bgyi 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]ba 'di lags so/_/rgyal pos de la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad nas smras pa/_mkhan po'i bu bram ze smra bar 'dod pa yul tha dad pa na gnas pa 'di dag nga'i drung du lhags na/_khyod 'di dag dang lhan cig smra ba byed par nus sam/_rngo ci thog gis lha dgyes par bgyi'o/_/de 
[\[171b.2\]]nas rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor bshams shing phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par bzhag ste de dag phyogs snga ma byed du bcug pa dang /_smra ba de dag bram ze ser skya dang lhan cig gzhi gang dang gang la smra ba de dang de dag la bram ze ser skyas spobs pa med par byas nas de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/
[\[171b.3\]]tshar gcad pa'i gnas rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/_lan la spobs pa med pa nyid ni tha cad yin no/_/rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes te/_e ma na tshod gzhon la shes rab kyi spobs pa 'di dang 'di lta bu yod do zhes ngo mtshar skyes nas de'i 'og tu mngon par dad pas glang po che'i gshul du bskyon te smra 
[\[171b.4\]]ba'i rgyal srid la dbang bskur to/_/ser skya de'i ma sems khong du chud cing rnam par rtog pa bzang po ma yin pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed de/_ser skya des hab shur gyis rgol ba'i longs spyod 'phrog tu bcug ste/_'ong bar mi 'gyur ram snyam du de de ltar sems khong du chud 
[\[171b.5\]]cing rnam par rtog pa bzang po ma yin pa dag la/_rnam par rtog par byed cing 'dug pa na shed bu ser skya smra ba'i rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/_skye bo mkhas pas yongs su bskor nas rang gi sdum par 'ongs so/_/de nas de'i mas gus par bsgrim pa dang bcas pas smras 
[\[171b.6\]]pa/_bu khyod kyis smra ba thams cad tshar bcad dam/_ser skyas smras pa/_yum tshar bcad de 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/ser skya'i ma de bzhin sgyur bar byed/_lag mthil gnyis 'dril bar byed do/_/shed bu ser skyas smras pa/_yum khyod ci'i slad du bzhin 
[\[171b.7\]]sgyur bar mdzad/_lag mthil gnyis 'dril bar mdzad/_mas smras pa/_bu da dung yang khyod 'gran zla dang bcas pa yin pas/_'od srung gi dge sbyong de dag gis rgol ba'i longs spyod dag phrogs par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod kyis song la de dag tshar chod cig_/ser skyas smras pa/_
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]yum bdag la pha'i mchid nas bu ji tsam na nyi ma 'char ba dang /_ji tsam na nub pa de'i bar du khyod dang 'dra ba'i smra ba gzhan med kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis kho bo 'das nas smra ba thams cad dang lhan cig 'jigs pa med pa dang /_bag tsha ba med par smra bar bya'o/_/'od srung gi 
[\[172a.2\]]dge sbyong rnams ni ma gtogs te/_de dag ni rgyud rgya chen po dang ldan pa/_rgyud zab mo dang ldan pa/_rgyud bzang po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten pa la pham par mi nus pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa la gting med pa yin te/_de dag ni mang ba dang /_mthun pa dang /_longs spyod dag don du mi 
[\[172a.3\]]gnyer ba yin no zhes mchi'o/_/mas smras pa/_bu khyod kyi pha ni dge sbyong gi bran du gyur pa yin na ci khyod kyang dge sbyong gi bran du 'gyur ram/_song la de dag tshar chod cig_/ser skya de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma'i tshig mdun du byas te/_drang srong smra bar 'phags pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[172a.4\]]zhig kyang bA rA Na sIr 'phags nas/_ser skyas dge slong de lam gyi bar du mthong nas smras pa/_kye dge slong ga las 'ongs/_drang srong smra ba nas so/_/drang srong smra ba na dge slong ji snyed yod/_dge slong nyi khri lhag tsam mo/_/re zhig dge slong dag ni mang na bstan bcos kyi tshad ji tsam/_sde 
[\[172a.5\]]snod gsum mo/_/sde snod kyi tshad ji tsam/_stong phrag brgya'o/_/khyim pas gzung du rung ngam/_mdo sde dang chos mngon pa gnyis ni rung ngo /_/'dul ba ni cho ga'i gzhung yin pas mi rung ngo /_/ser skyas bsams pa/_'di dag gi smra ba'i bstan bcos gang yin pa de ni khyim pa la mi ston 
[\[172a.6\]]to snyam du rig nas smras pa/_kye dge slong je sangs rgyas kyi bka' las cung zhig smros shig_/dge slong des bsams pa/_bram ze 'di ni smra ba yin pas ji 'di 'jal bar 'dod pas dri ba 'dri 'am/_'on te kun shes par 'dod pas dri ba 'dri ba je blta'o snyam nas/_des tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[172a.7\]]smras pa/_mtsho rnams gang du ldog par 'gyur/_/lam ni gang du ldog par 'gyur/_/gang du 'jig rten bde sdug bsngal/_/ma lus par ni 'gag par 'gyur/_/zhes brjod de smras pa/_bram ze tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don ci yin smros shig bram zes rig pa'i gnas thams cad la rnam 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]par dpyad par brtsams na mtsho yang ma shes/_lam yang ma shes/_ldog pa yang ma shes nas de bdag la las mthong bar ma gyur tam snyam du phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar byed cing bsams pa/_gal te 'di na gzu bo 'ga' zhig yod par gyur du zin na bdag deng nyid du tshar bcad par 
[\[172b.2\]]'gyur bas rnam pa thams cad du spang ba bya'o snyam du rig nas smras pa/_kye dge slong tshigs su bcad pa de ni rgyud rgya chen po dang ldan pa/_don zab mo nyid dang ldan pa yin la khyod kyang bA rA Na sIr 'phags pa yin/_kho bo yang drang srong smra bar 'phags pa yin pas 'di'i don 'phral kho nar 
[\[172b.3\]]smra bar mi nus kyis song shig dang /_phyis kyang 'di'i don smra bar mi dka'o zhes drang srong smra bar song ba dang /_dge slong klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa dag mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu de sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/_bsams pa/_
[\[172b.4\]]su zhig snying rje med cing 'jig rten pha rol btang ste/_'di dag la rab tu sdang ba'i sems skyed cing 'di dag dang lhan cig rtsod pa skyed par 'gyur snyam du rig nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang de la mas smras pa/_bu khyod kyis 'od srung gi dge sbyong dag tshar bcad dam/_ser skyas smras pa/_
[\[172b.5\]]yum khyod bdag gi rgol ba'i longs spyod dag gis mi dgyes sam/_'di ltar khyod ni rgol ba'i longs spyod dag 'phrog tu stsol bar bzhed par gda'o/_/bu ji skad zer/_yum bdag deng drang srong smra bar 'phags pa dang /_ji tsam na bdag gis shul gyi bar du dge slong zhig mthong nas 
[\[172b.6\]]bdag gis de la kye dge slong ci sangs rgyas kyi bka' las cung zhig smros shig ces bgyis pa dang /_des tshigs su bcad pa/_mtsho rnams gang du ldog par 'gyur/_/lam ni gang du ldog par 'gyur/_/gang du 'jig rten bde sdug bsngal/_/ma lus par ni 'gag par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[172b.7\]]brjod nas bdag gis rig pa'i gnas thams cad la rnam par dpyad par brtsams na mtsho yang ma 'tshal/_lam yang ma 'tshal/_ldog pa yang ma 'tshal nas/_gal te de na gzu bo 'ga' zhig mchis par gyur du lags na bdag deng nyid du tshar bkum par yang 'gyur ro/_/bu gal 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]te de lta na song la sangs rgyas kyi bka' lhogs shig_/yum ci zhig bklag par bgyi ste/_de dag gis smra ba'i bstan bcos gang lags pa de ni khyim pa la mi ston to/_/bu song la rab tu byung ste lhogs shig_/yum rigs mchog tu gyur nas rigs tha dad pa rnams 
[\[173a.2\]]kyi nang du ji ltar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi/_bu ci khyod kyi mgo la smyig ma dang rtswa dag skye bar 'gyur ram yang phyir bobs shig_/de ma la gus pas nan gyis mnan pa na rab tu 'byung ngo zhes drang srong smra bar song ste dge slong gi drung du song nas smras pa/_kye dge slong bdag rab tu 'byung bar 
[\[173a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/dge slong gis bsams pa/_bram ze smra ba 'di rab tu phyung na bstan pa la gces pa bstabs par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras pa/_bram ze legs kyis de ltar bya'o/_/longs spyod dag ni mi rtag pa yin pas/_rab tu byung shig_/ser skyas smras pa/_kye dge slong 
[\[173a.4\]]bdag ni rab tu shes pa'i bram ze lags pas bdag gis 'dir rab tu 'byung bar rngo mi thog gis ljongs su bzhud do/_/dge slong des bram ze de ljongs su khrid nas rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te bklag pa dang /_kha ton dag la nges par sbyar to/_/ser skya des bklag pa dang 
[\[173a.5\]]kha ton byas pa na sde snod gsum po dag bklags shing sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrog pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to/_/gang gi tshe de chos mnyan pa sbyin par 'dod pa de'i tshe na seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa shom par byed/_dung sgril ma 
[\[173a.6\]]'bud du 'jud par byed/_rnga bo che rdung du 'jud par byed cing rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor sdud par byed/_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyang mngon par dad par byed do/_/chos sgrog pa ser skyas bsams pa/_bdag gis thos pas thob par bya ba gang yin pa de thob kyis bdag bA rA Na 
[\[173a.7\]]sIr song ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/_de ljongs su ci dgar 'dug ste bA rA Na sI ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i tshe bA rA Na sIr phyin to/_/de nas de'i mas thos nas ma de bu tshol zhing drang srong smra bar song 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]ba dang des bu mthong nas smras pa/_bu khyod kyis 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams tshar bcad dam/_yum bdag ni lung tsam dang ldan pa lags la de dag ni lung dang rtogs pa dang ldan pa lags pas de'i slad du bdag gis de dag tshar dgum par ji lta rngo thog_/bu khyod kyis de dag 
[\[173b.2\]]gdon mi za bar tshar gcad par bya ba dag yin gyis tshar chod cig_/ser skya de ma la gus pas mas nan gyis mnan pa dang /_dang du blangs te smras pa/_yum gang gi tshe seng ge'i khri bshams par gyur/_dung sgril ma bus par gyur/_rnga bo che brdungs par gyur cing rgyal po dang bcas 
[\[173b.3\]]pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyod spyon cig_/bu legs kyis 'ong bar bya'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ser skya la chos sgrog par gsol ba btab nas seng ge'i khri bshams par gyur/_dung sgril ma bus par gyur/_rnga bo che brdungs par gyur cing /_rgyal po dang bcas 
[\[173b.4\]]pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas ser skya'i mas dung dang rnga bo che'i sgra thos nas rings pa rings par drang srong smra bar song ste/_gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas seng ge'i khri'i rgyab logs su 'dug go/_/chos sgrog pa ser skya yang seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te chos bstan par 
[\[173b.5\]]brtsams nas des chos ji tsam pa de tsam zhig bstan nas chos ma yin pa bstan par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde'i mtha' la gnod pa ma byed cig_/chos kyi khrid byed rnam par dkrug par ma byed cig_/chos kyi mngal ma rtol 
[\[173b.6\]]cig_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan ma rtib shig_/bdud kyi rgyal mtshan ma sgreng shig_/sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig_/ser skya de nyam nga nas babs te de'i 'og tu ma la smras pa/_yum khyod kyis gzigs sam/_bu mthong ngo /_/bdag gis dang po 
[\[173b.7\]]nas khyod la yum bdag ni lung tsam dang ldan pa lags la de dag ni lung dang rtogs pa dang ldan pa lags pas de'i slad du bdag gis de dag tshar dgum par ji ltar rngo thog ces ma bgyis sam/_bu gang gi tshe khyod chos ston pa de'i tshe na chos ji tsam pa de tsam zhig bstan nas chos ma 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]yin pa ston cig_/gal te khyod la de dag na re tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde'i mtha' la gnod pa ma byed cig_/chos kyi khrid byed rnam par dkrug pa ma byed cig_/chos kyi mngal ma rtol cig_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan ma rtib shig_/bdud kyi rgyal mtshan ma sgreng shig_/
[\[174a.2\]]sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig ces zer na/_de'i tshe khyod kyis tshig gi mtshon gyis gdab par bya ste/_de dag ni legs pa ma yin pa byed pas 'jigs pa yin pas cang mi smra bar 'dug par 'gyur te/_des na 'jig rten dag gi mig lam na tshar bcad 
[\[174a.3\]]do snyam du shes par 'gyur ro/_/yum thabs de ni bzang ste/_'on kyang de'i tshe khyod kyang yang spyon cig_/bu de ltar bya ste kho mo yang 'ong ngo /_/ji tsam na yang chos mnyan pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams nas ser skya la chos sgrog par gsol ba btab ste dung sgril ma yang bus/_rnga bo che yang 
[\[174a.4\]]brdungs shing rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus pa dang /_ser skya'i ma de yang snga ma bzhin du 'ongs te seng ge'i khri'i rgyab logs su 'dug go/_/chos sgrog pa ser skya yang seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te chos bstan par brtsams nas/_des chos ji tsam pa de tsam zhig bstan nas 
[\[174a.5\]]yang chos ma yin pa bstan par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde'i mtha' la gnod pa ma byed cig_/chos kyi khrid byed rnam par dkrug par ma byed cig chos kyi mngal ma rtol cig_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan ma rtib shig_/bdud kyi rgyal 
[\[174a.6\]]mtshan ma sgreng shig_/sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig_/ser skya de mas bslus pas mi bzod pa skyes nas tshig gi mtshon gyis gdab par brtsams te/_glang po che'i mgo can khyod kyis re zhig chos sam chos ma yin pa'am/_'dul ba 'am 'dul ba ma 
[\[174a.7\]]yin pa ci shes/_rta'i mgo can/_rnga mo'i mgo can/_bong bu'i mgo can/_ba lang gi mgo can/_spre'u mgo can/_seng ge'i mgo can/_stag mgo can/_dom mgo can/_dred mgo can/_gung mgo can/_byi la'i mgo can/_ra mgo can/_lug mgo can/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi mgo can/_ma he'i 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]mgo can/_phag gi mgo can/_khyi mgo can khyod kyis chos sam/_chos ma yin pa'am/_'dul ba 'am/_'dul ba ma yin pa ci shes zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dis tshig gi mtshon gyis gdab par brtsams kyis 'dong ngo zhes 
[\[174b.2\]]zer ro/_/de na gang dag so sor rtog pa mi mang ba de dag ni dong ngo /_/gang dag spro ring ba de dag ni gal te re zhig chos ston par 'gyur na ni mnyan par bya'o/_/'on te chos ma yin pa ston par 'gyur na ni 'di nyid kyir 'gyur bar zad do zhes de nyid na 'khod do/_/de nas chos sgrog pa ser 
[\[174b.3\]]skyas dge slong slob pa dang mi slob pa dag la ngag gis nyes par spyad pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad byas nas seng ge'i khri las babs te ma la smras pa/_yum khyod dgyes par gyur tam/_bu kho mo dga' bar gyur gyis tshur shog khyim du 'dong ngo /_/ser skyas smras pa/_yum bdag ni yang dag 
[\[174b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la mngon par [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mi mchi'o/_/bu khyod kyis ma'i tshig tshig ma yin par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ma thos sam tshur shog 'dong ngo /_/ser skyas smras pa/_kho bo 'khor bar 'khor ba na khyod 'dra ba'i ma yod par ma gyur cig_/deng 
[\[174b.5\]]mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen khyod la brten nas kho bos gang zag slob pa dang mi slob pa dag la ngag gi las rtsub po brjod pas de'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa so sor myong bar 'gyur ro/_/ser skya'i ma des bA rA Na sI'i lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag 
[\[174b.6\]]tu bA rA Na sI na gnas pa dang /_pho brang 'khor pa dang /_yul mi shes ldan dag nyon cig_/'od srung gi dge slong rnams kyis kho mo'i bu phrogs kyis grogs gyis shig ces ku co 'don par brtsams so/_/de na gang dag dad pa can de dag ni yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do/_/
[\[174b.7\]]gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni tho btsam par byed do/_/ser skya'i ma de la tho btsams pa na 'di lta bu'i kun nas dkris pa byung ste/_des khrag tsha ba skyugs nas dus la bab ste sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/chos sgrog pa ser skya yang dge slong slob pa dang mi slob 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]pa rnams la ngag gi nyes par spyad pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad byas pas dus la bab ste/_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du chu srin nya'i rigs 'jigs su rung ba 'dir skyes so/_/de nas 'khor de yid la gcags te/_shes ldan dag chos sgrog pa ser skya sde snod gsum dang ldan pa rigs pa 
[\[175a.2\]]dang grol ba'i spobs pa can gyis srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi rna ba'i sbubs dag tshim par byas nas ngag gis nyes par spyad pa tsam gyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas ngan par skyes par gyur na/_bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni cir 'gyur/_
[\[175a.3\]]tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas kha cig gis dro bar gyur pa dag rtogs pa dang /_kha cig gis rtse mo dag dang /_kha cig gis bzod pa dag 
[\[175a.4\]]dang /_kha cig gis 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog dag rtogs pa dang /_kha cig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa dang /_kha cig gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_kha cig gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_kha cig gis rab tu byung nas nyon 
[\[175a.5\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa dang /_kha cig gis nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_kha cig gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_
[\[175a.6\]]'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bzhag pa de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdul ba'i don chen po mdzad nas gshegs so/_/de nas chu srin nya'i rigs 'di snyam 
[\[175a.7\]]du sems te/_gang gi phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas zas za bar byed pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/_de zas mi za ba la zhugs so/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi me ni rno ba yin pas de bkres pas 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]nyam dmas pa na/_bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus la bab pa dang rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring por ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du 
[\[175b.2\]]skyes pa dang /_las gang gis skyes pa'o/_/des dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon chu srin lha'i bu de 'di snyam du 
[\[175b.3\]]sems te/_gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/_bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i 
[\[175b.4\]]phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon chu srin lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/_do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mud dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan 
[\[175b.5\]]mo la bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar sngon chu srin lha'i bu'i kha dog gi 
[\[175b.6\]]mthus khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon chu srin lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sngon chu srin lha'i bus stan de 
[\[175b.7\]]nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag 
[\[176a.2\]]gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can 
[\[176a.3\]]dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go/_/zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan 
[\[176a.4\]]pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal 
[\[176a.5\]]bar gyur/_/'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/_/de nas gdud byas do shal rab 'phyangs pas/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur 
[\[176a.6\]]nas/_/dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song /_/de nas sngon chu srin lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo thog 'byor pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa 
[\[176a.7\]]nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te/_cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa de dag 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas the tshom za ba'i yid kyis mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i 
[\[176b.2\]]dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'am/_lha'i bu 'byor pa che ba mthu che ba gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du nye bar mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 
[\[176b.3\]]nye bar 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin/_lha'i bu 'byor pa che ba mthu che ba gzhan ma yin te/_dge slong dag 'di ltar khyed kyis ngas chu srin nya'i rigs gang la tshig gsum gyis chos bstan pa de mthong 
[\[176b.4\]]ngam/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag de de nas shi 'phos te rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i gan du 'ongs te/_ngas de la chos bstan nas des bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/yang dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[176b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sngon chu srin lha'i bus las ci bgyis na des rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur/_las ci bgyis na des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[176b.6\]]slong dag sngon chu srin lha'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/_sngon chu srin lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis 
[\[176b.7\]]nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/
[\[177a.2\]]dge slong dag skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang yod/_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang yod do/_/skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/_'dis chu srin du gyur pa na nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa gang yin pa de ni skyes nas myong bar 
[\[177a.3\]]'gyur ba'i las zhes bya ste/_de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur to/_/lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/_ser skyas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dang /_lung phog pa dang 
[\[177a.4\]]bklags pa dang /_kha ton byas pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa gang yin pa de ni lan grangs gzhan la myong 
[\[177a.5\]]bar 'gyur ba'i las zhes bya ste/_las de'i tshogs kyi dngos pos da ltar lha'i bur gyur pas nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam 
[\[177a.6\]]par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed 
[\[177a.7\]]kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_de nas rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po de dag 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag re zhig chos sgrog pa ser skya de sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur te srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi rna ba'i sbubs dag tshim par byas nas/_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa tsam gyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[177b.2\]]ngan par skyes par gyur na/_bdag cag da ltar drag shul can/_lag pa dmar ba/_snun pa dang rab tu snun pa la zhugs pa/_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jud pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa dag yin pas/_bdag cag 'di nas 
[\[177b.3\]]shi 'phos pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni cir 'gyur/_tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/_gal te bdag cag rigs dma' bar skyes par ma gyur na/_bdag cag gis kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo rnams las rgal bar bya ba 
[\[177b.4\]]dang sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir spro bar bya/_'bad par bya/_brtsal bar bya ba zhig na snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni gdul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la thugs brtse bas nyin lan 
[\[177b.5\]]gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs par mdzad do/_/nyan thos chen po rnams kyang de bzhin pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la rnam par bltas pa na rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po de dag shin tu yid la gcags 
[\[177b.6\]]shing lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khyed cag ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong 
[\[177b.7\]]du chud cing 'khod/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ltar chos sgrog pa ser skya de sde snod gsum dang ldan pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur te srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi rna ba'i sbubs dag tshim par bgyis na/_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa tsam gyis 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas ngan par skyes par gyur na/_bdag cag da ltar drag shul can/_sug pa dmar ba/_snun pa dang rab tu snun pa la zhugs pa/_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod du stsol pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar bgyid 
[\[178a.2\]]pa dag lags pas bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni cir 'gyur/_tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/_gal te bdag cag rigs dma' bar skyes par ma gyur na/_bdag cag gis kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing /_
[\[178a.3\]]chu bo rnams las rgal bar bgyi ba dang /_sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyi ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi/_'bad par bgyi/_brtsal bar bgyi ba zhig na snyam pas bdag cag ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi mchis su rung /_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung 
[\[178a.4\]]rab 'di la ni rigs gces pa ma yin/_khyim gces pa ma yin/_rus gces pa ma yin gyi/_thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa gces pa yin no/_/yang smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/_/khyim dang rus dag rtog mi mdzad/_/yun ring 
[\[178a.5\]]byas par gyur kyang ni/_/las rnams la ni yongs rtog mdzad/_/gal te khyed cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshur sheg_/yu bu cag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'dong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[178a.6\]]kyis khyed cag rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa legs te/_gal te de lta na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung du mchi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po de dag khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom 
[\[178a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag rab tu dbyung du gsol/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu phyung zhing dge slong dag 
[\[178b.2\]]tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/_skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_lag pa lhung bzed dang bya ma bum gyis brel ba dang /_dge slong bsnyen 
[\[178b.3\]]par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/yang smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus 
[\[178b.4\]]gzugs bkab par gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po de dag rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas yangs pa can du ci dgyes par bzhugs te/_'od ma can gyi grong ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs pas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'od ma 
[\[178b.5\]]can gyi grong du byon nas 'od ma can gyi grong na grong gi byang phyogs shing sha ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag la lta smos kyang 
[\[178b.6\]]ci dgos pa byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag la lta smos 
[\[178b.7\]]kyang ci dgos pa byung gis/_dge slong dag khyed cag tshur shog la smos 'drin ji lta ba dang /_phebs par smra ba ji lta ba dang /_'grogs bshes ji lta bas yangs pa can gyi nyen kor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par khas long shig_/nga yang 'od ma can gyi grong 'di nyid 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]du bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang dbyar gnas par khas len gyis/_thams cad nyid ni bsod snyoms kyis nyon mongs par gyur na mi rung ngo /_/dge slong de dag gis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas smon 'grin 
[\[179a.2\]]ji lta ba dang /_phebs par smra ba ji lta ba dang /_'grogs bshes ji lta bas yangs pa can gyi nyen kor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang 'od ma can gyi grong de nyid du bsnyen bkur ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang dbyar gnas par zhal 
[\[179a.3\]]gyis bzhes so/_/de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces/_dge slong dag da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas 
[\[179a.4\]]sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dag byung gis/_dge slong khyed cag tshur sheg la/_smos 'drin ji lta ba dang /_phebs par smra ba ji lta ba dang /_'grogs bshes ji lta bas yangs pa can gyi nyen kor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par 
[\[179a.5\]]khas long shig_/nga yang 'od ma can gyi grong 'di nyid du bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang dbyar gnas par khas len gyis/_thams cad nyid ni bsod snyoms kyis nyon mongs par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes bka' stsal na/_'di na bdag cag la nye du 'ga' yang med de nya pa'i 
[\[179a.6\]]grong na bdag cag gi nye du dag 'khod kyis bdag cag nya pa'i grong du dong ste nye du rnams bltas nas nya pa'i grong gi nyen kor du lo ma dang 'dab ma'i sbyil bu dag byas te dbyar gnas par khas blang bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag nya pa'i grong du dong ste nye du dag la 
[\[179a.7\]]bltas nas nya pa'i grong gi nyen kor du lo ma dang 'dab ma'i sbyil bu dag byas te dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/bdag cag ni thos pa nyung ngu dang ldan pa dag yin pas bdag cag gi nye du dag nye bar 'ong 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]bar gyur na/_bdag cag gis nye bar 'ongs pa de dag la chos ston par mi nus kyis/_bdag cag gis nye du 'ongs pa dag la nye du dag khyed cag gang dag gi grong tshigs na dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di 'di ltar dbyar gnas par khas blangs par gyur pa'i nye du de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs 
[\[179b.2\]]par rnyed pa yin te/_dge slong 'di ni mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes 
[\[179b.3\]]dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang /_spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes 
[\[179b.4\]]dang /_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 
[\[179b.5\]]'du shes thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye 
[\[179b.6\]]mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_sems yongs 
[\[179b.7\]]su shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang /_zag pa zad pa thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin no zhes gcig gis gcig gi yon 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]tan bsgrags par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de dag gi nye du dag nye bar 'ongs par gyur nas/_de dag gis nye du nye bar 'ongs pa de dag la gcig gis gcig gi yon tan bsgrag par brtsams te/_nye du dag khyed cag gang dag gi grong tshigs na dge slong gi dge 
[\[180a.2\]]'dun yon gyi gnas 'di lta bu dbyar gnas par khas blangs par gyur pa'i nye du de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin te/_dge slong 'di ni mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[180a.3\]]zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang /_spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi 
[\[180a.4\]]sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 
[\[180a.5\]]'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_
[\[180a.6\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_rdzu 
[\[180a.7\]]'phrul gyi yul dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_sems yongs su shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang /_zag pa zad pa thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]par grol ba yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed kyis yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu dag thob bam/_thob bo/_/'jig rten ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas re zhig rang gi bu dag las kyang phrogs te/_de dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems so/_/sangs 
[\[180b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams la chos nyid kyis nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po gnyis yod de/_gcig ni dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe'o/_/gnyis pa ni ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nya la'o/_/de la gang dag dbyar zla 'bring 
[\[180b.3\]]po'i nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe gdams ngag mnos te/_grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu dbyar gnas par khas len pa de dag ni ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nya la lhags nas ji ltar thob pa ni rjod par byed/_ma thob pa ni thob par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[180b.4\]]'og tu 'dri bar byed do/_/de nas dge slong gang dag yangs pa can gyi nyen kor spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_
[\[180b.5\]]skam pa dang /_lus ma thob pas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_'od ma can gyi grong ga la ba der rgyu zhing 'dong ba na mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'dong ba'i tshe 'od ma can gyi grong du phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/
[\[180b.6\]]mthong nas kyang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mnyes gshin pas bshes pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham yu chad dang /_mchil 
[\[180b.7\]]lham len par byed cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg 'ongs pa legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gang nas da ltar 'dir 'ongs/_khyed cag gang du dbyar gnas par khas blangs/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag spong byed kyi grong nas 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]'dir 'ongs so/_/bdag cag spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar spong byed kyi grong du bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par khas blangs sam/_khyed cag bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar ma gyur tam/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[181a.2\]]kun dga' bo bdag cag spong byed kyi grong du te por bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par khas blangs mod kyi bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de kho na ltar snang ste 'di ltar bsod snyoms kyis brel bas rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_
[\[181a.3\]]skom pa dang /_lus ma thob pa dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag bri bar gyur to/_/dge slong gang dag nya pa'i grong gi nyen kor du dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag kyang dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing 
[\[181a.4\]]tsho ba dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas pas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te 'od ma can gyi grong ga la ba der rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/_mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'dong ba'i tshe 'od ma can gyi grong du phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rab tu mang po de 
[\[181a.5\]]dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mnyes gshin pas bshes pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril pa spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod 
[\[181a.6\]]dang /_zhwa dang /_lham yu chad dang /_mchil lham len par byed cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur sheg_/'ongs pa legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gang nas da ltar 'dir 'ongs/_khyed cag dbyar gang du gnas par khas blangs 
[\[181a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag nya pa'i grong nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/bdag cag nya pa'i grong du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar nya pa'i grong du bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par khas blangs sam/_khyed cag bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]ma gyur tam/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag nya pa'i grong du te bor bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par khas blangs te/_bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang ngal bar ma gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de kho na ltar snang ste/_'di ltar bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med pas tsho 
[\[181b.2\]]ba dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag rgyas par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba/_dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin pa dang /_bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa byung na 
[\[181b.3\]]'dir tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang yin rkyen ni gang yin/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag gis nye du rnams kyi mdun du gcig gis gcig gi yon tan bsgrag par byas te/_dge slong 'di ni mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag 
[\[181b.4\]]pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang /_spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags 
[\[181b.5\]]dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes 
[\[181b.6\]]dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_
[\[181b.7\]]gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_sems yongs su shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang /_zag pa 
[\[182a.2\]]zad pa thob pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa yin no/_/dge slong 'di ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin no zhes gcig gis gcig gi yon tan bsgrag pa byas so/_/ci yang dag pas sam/_yang dag pa ma yin 
[\[182a.3\]]pas yang dag pa ma yin pas so/_/khyed cag zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir mi'i chos bla ma med la med bzhin du smrar rung ngam/_rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de/_'di ltar bdag cag gis ni smras so/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag zang zing cung zad tsam 
[\[182a.4\]]gyi phyir mi'i chos bla ma med la med bzhin du smra bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 
[\[182a.5\]]'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la rmas 
[\[182a.6\]]pa/_dge slong dag khyod kyis zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir mi'i chos bla ma med la med bzhin du smras pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa 
[\[182a.7\]]ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad do/_/dge slong dag gsum po 'di dag ni 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i rkun po rkun po chen po yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la rkun po 'khor brgya dang ldan pa'am/_'khor stong dang ldan 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]pa de brgya 'am stong gi mdun du song ste/_khyim 'bugs par byed/_mdud pa 'grol bar byed/_ril gyis 'phrog par byed/_lam sgugs shing 'dug par byed/_me gtong bar byed/_lam pa 'joms par byed/_rgyal po'i mdzod rku bar byed/_grong 'joms par byed/_
[\[182b.2\]]grong khyer 'joms par byed/_yul 'joms par byed pa de ni dge slong dag 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i rkun po rkun po chen po dang po yin no/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rkun po rkun po chen po 'khor brgya dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_'khor stong dang yang ldan pa ma yin la/_de brgya'am/_
[\[182b.3\]]stong gi mdun du song ste/_khyim 'bugs par mi byed/_mdud pa 'grol bar mi byed/_ril gyis 'phrog par mi byed/_lam sgugs shing 'dug par mi byed/_me gtong bar mi byed/_lam pa 'joms par mi byed/_rgyal po'i mdzod rku bar mi byed/_grong 'joms par mi 
[\[182b.4\]]byed/_grong khyer 'joms par mi byed/_yul 'joms par mi byed mod kyi/_'on kyang dge 'dun gyi rtswa 'am/_shing ngam/_me tog gam/_'bras bu'am/_'od ma'am/_gzhal ba gang yang rung ba de btsongs shing btsongs shing 'tsho bar byed pa dang /_des khyim mi gso 
[\[182b.5\]]bar byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i rkun po rkun po chen po gnyis pa yin no/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rkun po rkun po chen po 'khor brgya dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_'khor stong dang ldan pa yang ma yin la/_de brgya'am/_stong gi mdun du song ste/_khyim 'bugs par 
[\[182b.6\]]mi byed/_mdud pa 'grol bar mi byed/_ril gyis 'phrog par mi byed/_lam sgugs shing 'dug par mi byed/_me gtong bar mi byed/_lam pa 'joms par mi byed/_rgyal po'i mdzod rku bar mi byed/_grong 'joms par mi byed/_grong khyer 'joms par mi byed/_
[\[182b.7\]]yul 'joms par mi byed/_dge 'dun gyi rtswa'am/_shing ngam/_me tog gam/_'bras bu'am/_'od ma'am/_gzhal ba gang yang rung ba des btsongs shing btsongs shing 'tsho bar mi byed/_des khyim mi gso bar mi byed mod kyi/_'on kyang mi'i chos bla ma med la med bzhin 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]du smra bar byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing srid pa'i rkun po rkun po chen po gsum pa yin no/_/dge slong dag rkun po rnams kyi nang na rkun po gang 'khor brgya dang ldan pa'am/_'khor stong dang ldan pa'am/_brgya 'am stong gi mdun du song ste/_khyim 'bugs 
[\[183a.2\]]par byed/_mdud pa 'grol bar byed/_ril gyis 'phrog par byed/_lam sgugs shing 'dug par byed/_me gtong bar byed/_lam pa 'joms par byed/_rgyal po'i mdzod rku bar byed/_grong 'joms par byed/_grong khyer 'joms par byed/_yul 'joms 
[\[183a.3\]]par byed pa de ni cung zad tsam yin no/_/rkun po rnams kyi nang na rkun po gang dge 'dun gyi rtswa'am/_shing ngam/_me tog gam/_'bras bu'am/_'od ma'am/_gzhal ba gang yang rung ba de btsongs shing btsongs shing 'tsho bar byed pa dang /_des khyim mi gso bar byed pa de 
[\[183a.4\]]yang cung zad tsam yin no/_/dge slong dag rkun po rnams kyi nang na gang mi'i chos bla ma med la med bzhin du smra bar byed pa de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mir bcas 
[\[183a.5\]]pa'i nang na rkun po rkun po chen po yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'di na gang zhig dgra bcom ma gyur par/_/bdag nyid dgra bcom yin zhes rjod 
[\[183a.6\]]byed pa/_/de ni tshangs bcas 'jig rten rkun po ste/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par brjod par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs 
[\[183a.7\]]pas ngas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir zhes bya ba nas/_nga'i tshangs par spyod pa skye bo mang po la phan pa yangs par gyur pa lha dang mi'i bar la yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]bar snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang mngon par mi shes shing yongs su mi shes la/_mi'i chos bla ma mtha' dang /_'phags pa dang bye brag thob pa dang /_shes pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_reg par 
[\[183b.2\]]spyod pa med la med bzhin du 'di shes so/_/'di mthong ngo zhes khas 'ches pa las/_de ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod nas dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung ma dris kyang rung /_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis ni mi shes par shes so zhes smras/_ma mthong bar mthong ngo 
[\[183b.3\]]zhes smras te/_gsob gsog [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras so zhes zer na/_dge slong de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do/_/dge slong rab tu mang po gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /_
[\[183b.4\]]ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag na rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par gnas pa dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i yid la byed pas nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas des na 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag de 
[\[183b.5\]]dag gi rgyud la kun du mi 'byung nas de'i 'og tu de dag gis gcig la gcig tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/dgon pa pa dag gis thob par bya ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis thob ste/_bdag cag skye ba ni zad/_tshangs par spyad pa ni bsten/_bya ba ni byas srid pa 'di las 
[\[183b.6\]]gzhan ni mi shes kyis/_tshur sheg bdag cag gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste/_gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu 'jug par bya'o zhes brjod nas/_de dag gis gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste/_gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu zhugs pa dang /_der de dag yang dang 
[\[183b.7\]]yang du bud med kyi yul mthong zhing kun dga' ra ba pa'i dge tshul rnams dang /_lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa dag la yang nyon mongs pa dag byung bar gyur te/_'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du byung bar gyur nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_tshe dang 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_yang dge slong gang mngon par mi shes shing yongs su mi shes la mi'i chos bla ma mtha' dang /_'phags pa dang bye brag 
[\[184a.2\]]thob pa dang /_shes pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_reg par spyod pa med la med bzhin du 'di shes so/_/'di mthong ngo zhes khas 'ches pa las de ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod nas dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung ma dris kyang rung /_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag 
[\[184a.3\]]gis ni mi shes par shes so zhes smras/_ma mthong bar mthong ngo zhes smras te/_gsob gsog [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras so zhes zer na dge slong de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/zhes bca' ba mdzad na/_bdag cag gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /_ri 
[\[184a.4\]]drung dang /_bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i yid la byed pas nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun tu mi 'byung nas/_
[\[184a.5\]]bdag cag gis gcig la gcig tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/dgon pa pa dag gis thob par bya ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis thob ste/_bdag cag skye ba ni zad/_tshangs par spyad pa ni bsten/_bya ba ni byas/_srid pa 'di las gzhan ni mi shes kyis/_
[\[184a.6\]]tshur sheg bdag cag gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste/_gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu 'jug par bya'o zhes brjod nas/_bdag cag gis gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste/_gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu zhugs pa dang /_der bdag cag yang dang yang du bud 
[\[184a.7\]]med kyi yul mthong zhing /_kun dga' ra ba pa'i dge tshul rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa dag la yang nyon mongs pa dag byung bar gyur te/_'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du byung bar gyur na/_bdag cag la pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]byung bar ma gyur tam/_tshur sheg bdag cag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong zhing phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la don de yongs su dri bar bya ste/_bdag cag la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ji skad du lung ston par 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du gzung bar bya'o 
[\[184b.2\]]snyam nas/_de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar 
[\[184b.3\]]bca' ba mdzad de/_yang dge slong gang mngon par mi shes shing yongs su mi shes la/_mi'i chos bla ma mtha' dang /_'phags pa dang /_bye brag thob pa dang /_shes pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_reg par spyod pa med la med bzhin du 'di shes so/_/'di mthong ngo /_/zhes 
[\[184b.4\]]khas 'ches pa las/_de ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod nas dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung ma dris kyang rung 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis ni mi shes par shes so zhes smras/_ma mthong bar mthong ngo zhes smras te/_gsob gsog [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras so/_/zhes zer 
[\[184b.5\]]na/_dge slong de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/zhes bca' ba mdzad na/_bdag cag gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten 
[\[184b.6\]]nas 'jig rten pa'i yid la byed pas nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du mi 'byung nas/_bdag cag gis gcig la gcig tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/dgon pa pa dag gis thob par bya ba 
[\[184b.7\]]gang yin pa de bdag cag gis thob ste/_bdag cag skye ba ni zad/_tshangs par spyad pa ni bsten/_bya ba ni byas/_srid pa 'di las gzhan ni mi shes kyis/_tshur sheg bdag cag gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste/_gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu 'jug par bya'o zhes 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]brjod nas/_bdag cag gis gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste/_gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu zhugs pa dang /_der bdag cag yang dang yang du bud med kyi yul mthong zhing kun dga' ra ba pa'i dge tshul rnams dang /_lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa dag 
[\[185a.2\]]la yang nyon mongs pa dag byung bar gyur te/_'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du byung bar gyur na/_bdag cag la pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur tam/_tshur sheg bdag cag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der 'dong zhing phyin nas tshe 
[\[185a.3\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la don de yongs su dri bar bya ste/_bdag cag la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ji skad du lung ston par 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du gzung bar bya'o snyam nas/_bdag cag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la don de yongs su 'dri na/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag 
[\[185a.4\]]la pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur tam/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rab tu mang po de dag khrid de/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[185a.5\]]mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_yang dge slong gang mngon par mi shes shing yongs su mi shes 
[\[185a.6\]]la mi'i chos bla ma mtha' dang /_'phags pa dang /_bye brag thob pa dang /_shes pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_reg par spyod pa med la med bzhin du 'di shes so/_/'di mthong ngo /_/zhes khas 'ches pa las de ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod nas dus gzhan zhig na 
[\[185a.7\]]dris kyang rung /_ma dris kyang rung 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis ni mi shes par shes so zhes smras/_ma mthong bar mthong ngo zhes smras te/_gsob gsog [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras so/_/zhes zer na dge slong de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o zhes 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag na gnas pa 'di dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la 
[\[185b.2\]]brten nas 'jig rten pa'i yid la bgyid pas nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du mi 'byung nas/_'di dag gis gcig la gcig tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/dgon pa pa dag gis thob par 
[\[185b.3\]]bya ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis thob ste/_bdag cag skye ba ni zad/_tshangs par spyad pa ni bsten/_bya ba ni byas/_srid pa 'di las gzhan ni mi shes kyis/_tshur sheg bdag cag gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu 'jug par 
[\[185b.4\]]bya'o zhes brjod nas/_'di dag gis gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste gnas mal grong mtha' dag tu zhugs pa dang /_der 'di dag yang dang yang du bud med kyi yul mthong zhing kun dga' ra ba pa'i dge tshul rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa dag la yang nyon mongs pa dag 
[\[185b.5\]]byung bar gyur te/_'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du byung bar gyur nas/_'di dag bdag cag la pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur tam/_snyam du 'gyod pa skyes par gyur na de'i slad du bdag bcom ldan 'das la don 'di yongs su zhu ste/_
[\[185b.6\]]'di dag la pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_
[\[185b.7\]]bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang rjes su mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]'di ni rjes su gnang ba yin te nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya'o/_/yang dge slong gang mngon par mi shes shing yongs su mi shes la/_mi'i chos bla ma mtha' dang /_'phags pa dang /_bye brag thob pa dang /_shes pa 
[\[186a.2\]]dang /_mthong ba dang /_reg par spyod pa med la med bzhin du 'di shes so/_/'di mthong ngo zhes khas 'ches pa las de ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod nas dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung /_ma dris kyang rung /_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis ni mi shes par shes 
[\[186a.3\]]so zhes smras/_ma mthong bar mthong ngo zhes smras te/_gsob gsog [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras so zhes zer na mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma gtogs te/_dge slong de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni dge slong bzhi po dag las zhes bya ba 
[\[186a.4\]]nas don gyi skabs 'dir ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g.yo ba gzhag par mi 'os pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dge slong du dgongs te zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/_des na yang dge slong gang zhes gsungs so/_/mngon par mi shes shing zhes bya ba la ci 
[\[186a.5\]]zhig mngon par mi shes shing zhe na/_gzugs mngon par mi shes pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mngon par mi shes shing /_yongs su mi shes la zhes bya ba la ci zhig yongs su mi shes la zhe na/_gzugs nyid yongs 
[\[186a.6\]]su mi shes pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su mi shes pa'o/_/mi'i chos zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi chos mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_de mi rnams kyis 'thob kyi za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan gnyis pa dag 
[\[186a.7\]]gis kyang mi 'thob na sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yid dgas rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/bla ma zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams pas gzugs kyi khams bla ma yin la/_gzugs kyi khams pas gzugs med pa'i khams bla ma 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]yin pa'o/_/yang na mi'i chos zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa lnga po dag go/_/bla ma zhes bya ba ni de dag spangs pa gang yin pa'o/_/mtha' zhes bya ba la mtha' zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/'phags pa zhes bya ba la 'phags pa ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs 
[\[186b.2\]]rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams so/_/bye brag thob pa zhes bya ba la bye brag thob pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/shes 
[\[186b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa bzhi po dag ste/_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa'o/_/mthong ba zhes bya ba ni mthong ba bzhi po dag ste/_sdug bsngal mthong ba dang /_kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang /_'gog pa 
[\[186b.4\]]mthong ba dang /_lam mthong ba'o/_/reg par spyod pa zhes bya ba la reg par spyod pa ni bsam gtan bzhi po dag ste/_snyoms par 'jug pa las yin gyi skye ba las ni ma yin no/_/med la zhes bya ba ni de'i dngos po med la'o/_/med bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la'o/_/
[\[186b.5\]]'di shes so zhes bya ba la ci zhig shes zhe na/_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam shes so zhes so/_/'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba la ci zhig mthong ngo zhe na/_lha rnams mthong ngo /_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[186b.6\]]rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_lus srul po rnams dang /_rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams mthong ngo /_/lha rnams kyis 
[\[186b.7\]]kyang bdag mthong ngo /_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_lus 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]srul po rnams dang /_rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyis kyang bdag mthong ngo /_/lha rnams kyi sgra thos so/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_yi 
[\[187a.2\]]dgas rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_lus srul po rnams dang /_rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyi sgra thos so/_/lha rnams kyis kyang bdag gi sgra thos so/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_
[\[187a.3\]]dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_lus srul po rnams dang /_rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyis kyang bdag gi sgra thos so/_/lha rnams 
[\[187a.4\]]blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_
[\[187a.5\]]lus srul po rnams dang /_rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/_/lha rnams bdag blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_
[\[187a.6\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_lus srul po rnams dang /_rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams bdag blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/lha rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun 
[\[187a.7\]]dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed do/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_grul 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_lus srul po rnams dang /_rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed do/_/lha rnams bdag dang lhan cig 
[\[187b.2\]]gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed do/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams 
[\[187b.3\]]dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_lus srul po rnams dang /_rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams bdag dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang 
[\[187b.4\]]lhan cig gnas par byed do/_/ma thob bzhin du bdag gis mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par 
[\[187b.5\]]mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes dang /_spong ba'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam 
[\[187b.6\]]par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid 
[\[187b.7\]]du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes thob bo/_/ma thob bzhin du bdag gis bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[188a.2\]]gyi yul dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_sems yongs su shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang /_zag pa zad pa thob bo/_/bdag ni dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang /_gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin no zhes pa'o/_/khas 'ches 
[\[188a.3\]]pa las zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa las so/_/de ltung ba byung ba zhes bya ba ni gzhi de'i'o/_/rnam par dag par 'dod nas zhes bya ba ni rnam par ldang bar 'dod nas so/_/dus gzhan zhig na zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o/_/dris kyang rung zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gis so/_/ma dris kyang rung 
[\[188a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni de bdag nyid la 'gyod pa dang /_cung zad 'gyod pa dang /_rnam par 'gyod pa dang /_rab tu 'gyod pa skyes pas so/_/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis ni mi shes par shes so/_/zhes smras zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas so/_/ma mthong bar 
[\[188a.5\]]mthong ngo zhes smras te/_zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pas so/_/gsob gsog [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras so zhes bya ba de dag ni smras pa'i rnam grangs kyi tshig yin no zer na zhes bya ba ni brjod na'o/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal bzhag ste'o/_/
[\[188a.6\]]dge slong zhes bya ba ni gang la dge slong gi dngos po yod pa ste/_snga ma bzhin no/_/de yang zhes bya ba de ni nye bar bstan pa dang /_kun tu bstan pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/pham par gyur pa yin gyis zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba yang gang zag 
[\[188a.7\]]bcu gnyis po dag gis bsko bas bsko bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/_des na gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//sdom la/_'du shes bsgyur dang dgon pa dang /_/khyim rnams su ni stan bkra dang /_/rang gi 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dang /_/bdag nyid nye bar ston pa'o/_/dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces lha rnams mthong ngo zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams 
[\[188b.2\]]nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar du mthong ngo zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams mthong ngo zhes zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_
[\[188b.3\]]lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces lha rnams kyi sgra thos so zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar gyi sgra thos so zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyi sgra thos so zhes 
[\[188b.4\]]zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas 
[\[188b.5\]]snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o zhes zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_
[\[188b.6\]]blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces lha rnams bdag blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar du bdag blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo zhes zer na pham par 'gyur
