[\[188b.7\]]ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyang bdag blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo zhes zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces lha rnams dang /_lhan 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar dang lhan cig 
[\[189a.2\]]gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun 
[\[189a.3\]]dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces lha rnams bdag dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar 
[\[189a.4\]]byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar yang bdag dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs 
[\[189a.5\]]par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyang bdag dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_
[\[189a.6\]]rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed ces zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces ma thob bzhin du bdag gis mi rtag pa'i 'du shes thob bo zhes 
[\[189a.7\]]zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes nas snga ma bzhin du stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi bar du thob bo zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces ma thob bzhin du bdag gis bsam gtan dang po thob bo zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_snga ma bzhin du bdag dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang /_
[\[189b.2\]]gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dag grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas shig na gnas shing de na de dag la mi ma yin pa dag gis 'tshe ba na/_
[\[189b.3\]]de na dge slong gang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa yin pa de la de na mi ma yin pa dag gis 'tshe bar mi byed nas dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba 
[\[189b.4\]]bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag kyang grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas te/_de na bdag la mi ma yin pa rnams 'tshe bar mi byed do zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dag khyim rnams su mgron du bos te za bar byed cing /_de na de dag 
[\[189b.5\]]la stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag bshams shing /_de na dge slong gang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa yin pa de la de na stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag shom par byed nas/_dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod 
[\[189b.6\]]pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag kyang khyim der mgron du bos shing zos te de na bdag la yang stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag shom par byed do/_/zhes zer na pham par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dgon 
[\[189b.7\]]pa na gnas pa dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du mi 'byung nas/_dge slong gis 'du shes bsgyur 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag kyang grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas shing bdag gis kyang de na gnas pa na zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten 
[\[190a.2\]]nas 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag bdag gi rgyud la yang kun du mi 'byung ngo zhes zer na/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod 
[\[190a.3\]]pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis lha rnams mthong ba de yod do zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po 
[\[190a.4\]]rnams kyi bar du mthong ba yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams mthong ba de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[190a.5\]]dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis lha rnams kyi sgra thos pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom 
[\[190a.6\]]por 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar gyi sgra thos pa yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams kyi sgra 
[\[190a.7\]]thos pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang lha 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar du blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces 
[\[190b.2\]]kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du 
[\[190b.3\]]shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang la lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_
[\[190b.4\]]gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar du blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang la rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba yod do zhes 
[\[190b.5\]]zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang lha rnams dang lhan 
[\[190b.6\]]cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma 
[\[190b.7\]]bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tha na 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]'di skad ces dge slong gang rdul khrod kyi sha za rnams dang lhan cig gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes 
[\[191a.2\]]byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang dang lhan cig lha rnams gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_
[\[191a.3\]]so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas snga ma bzhin du lus srul po rnams kyi bar yang lhan cig gtam 
[\[191a.4\]]'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'di skad ces dge slong gang dang lhan cig rdul khrod kyi sha za 
[\[191a.5\]]rnams gtam 'dre bar byed/_phebs par smra bar byed/_so sor kun dga' bar byed/_rtag tu yang lhan cig gnas par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes 
[\[191a.6\]]bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis mi rtag pa'i 'du shes thob pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ji lta 
[\[191a.7\]]ba de bzhin du gang gis snga ma bzhin du stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi bar du thob pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis bsam gtan dang po thob pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du gang gis snga ma bzhin 
[\[191b.2\]]du gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa nas dge slong gang dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang /_gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'i bar de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di 
[\[191b.3\]]ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dag grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas shig na gnas shing de la de dag na mi ma yin pa dag gis 'tshe ba na de dge slong gang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa yin pa de la de na mi ma yin pa 
[\[191b.4\]]dag gis 'tshe bar mi byed nas dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa de la de na mi ma yin pa 
[\[191b.5\]]rnams 'tshe bar mi byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge slong rab tu mang po dag khyim rnams su mgron du bos te za bar byed cing de na de dag la stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag bshams shing de na dge slong 
[\[191b.6\]]gang rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa yin pa de la de na stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag shom par byed nas/_dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros 
[\[191b.7\]]dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang khyim der mgron du bos shing zos te/_de na de la yang stan khra bo nye bar bkra ba dag shom par byed pa de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar dge 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]slong rab tu mang po dag dgon pa na gnas pa dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du 
[\[192a.2\]]mi 'byung nas dge slong gis bdag nyid la nye bar ston pas 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces dge slong gang gis grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas shing zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[192a.3\]]'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems dag rgyud la kun du mi 'byung ba de yod do zhes zer zhing /_'di skad ces kho bo'o zhes ni mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_
[\[192a.4\]]phan tshun zhe ni 'gras pa dang /_/char 'bab pa dang mtshan gyur dang /_/rgyal po'i khab kyi chu dron dang /_/glang chen rnams kyi sgra skad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na lus 
[\[192a.5\]]'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams phan tshun zhe 'gras par gyur to/_/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_
[\[192a.6\]]shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te/_yul spong byed gzhom par brtsams pa dang /_yul spong byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la shes ldan dag lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras dpung 
[\[192a.7\]]gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te yul spong byed 'joms par byed do zhes ra mda' ba bzlog go/_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis thos nas de dag gis kyang dpung 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te/_yangs pa can nas 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag 'byung ba na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung 
[\[192b.2\]]bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag 'di ni mchog gsum pa yin te/_
[\[192b.3\]]'dis mi shes pa'am/_ma mthong ba'am/_ma rig pa'am/_rnam par mi shes pa cung zad kyang med do zhes grag gis bdag cag gis/_'di la bdag cag gang rgyal bar 'gyur ba dri bar bya'o snyam nas/_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la dris pa/_'phags 
[\[192b.4\]]pa lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras yul spong byed 'joms par bgyis pas bdag cag g.yul 'gyed pa'i slad du mngon du mchis na/_bdag cag gang rgyal bar 'gyur/_maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_ba siSh+Tha'i rigs dag khyed cag rgyal 
[\[192b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bdag cag rgyal bar lung bstan to zhes rangs pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma brtsis par 
[\[192b.6\]]tsham tshom med pa kho nar de'i steng du brtul ba dang /_de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra pham pa dang /_skrag pa dang /_bcom pa dang /_gzhan rgyal ba dang /_rgyab kyis phyogs par byas te/_chu klung gang gA'i 'gram du phyin to/_/yangs 
[\[192b.7\]]pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams rgya cher rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis phyi bzhin kho nar 'brang ba dang /_lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bsams pa/_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI 'di dag ni gdug cing rnam par gnon pa yin pas gal te bdag gang gA'i 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]nang du zhugs na yang 'od dag gis rgya mo 'am mchil pas dbyung bas 'byin par byed cing tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yod kyis bdag mngon du phyogs te shi ba ni legs so snyam du rig nas/_des 'chi ba'i shugs kyis bsngos pa dang /_dpung 
[\[193a.2\]]thams cad phyir log nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams pham pa dang /_skrag pa dang /_bcom pa dang /_gzhan rgyal ba dang /_rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/_gar yang ma 'khor bar yangs pa can du zhugs nas/_sgo dag bcad de ra ba'i khar sbrengs nas 'dug 
[\[193a.3\]]go/_/lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra g.yul las rnam par rgyal zhing yul spong byed bcom nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/de nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag na 'phags pa 
[\[193a.4\]]maud gal gyi bu chen pos khyed cag rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bdag cag la lung bstan na/_de ci gal te bdag cag gi yangs pa can phrogs par gyur na de lta na rgyal bar 'gyur ram zhes smod par byed/_phyar kha gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/de dag smod par byed 
[\[193a.5\]]pa na drug sde dag kyang bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de dag gis de dag 'phya ba thos nas drug sde dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag su la smod/_khyed cag la'o/_/'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khyed cag rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag cag la lung bstan na/_de ci 
[\[193a.6\]]gal te bdag cag gi yangs pa can phrogs par gyur na de lta na rgyal bar 'gyur ram/_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag dang por g.yul sprad pa gang yin pa der su rgyal/_kho bo cag go/_/gal te khyed cag rgyal na de'i 'og tu ci'i phyir ldog par mi byed/_ci yul ma ga 
[\[193a.7\]]d+hA bcom ste rgyal po'i khab len par 'dod dam/_khyed cag gis ha cang mnan na wa yang seng ge lta bur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ma thos sam/_de dag spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' de dag la go bar byas zin mod 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]kyi 'on kyang don nyung ngu de la ltung ba byung gis tshur sheg de'i gan du dong la 'chags su gzhug go zhes de dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas phyag 'tshal te tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[193b.2\]]gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag a rog gya/_gnas brtan je skabs phye shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba sde lnga dag la skabs phye'o/_/gnas brtan gyis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la rgyal bar lung bstan tam/_lung bstan to/_/ci gal te de 
[\[193b.3\]]dag gi yangs pa can phrogs par gyur na de lta na rgyal bar 'gyur ram/_khyod lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi byed pas des na kun shes pa brda sprod par byed cing de yang 'bras bu med par gyur te/_khyod kyis spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed 
[\[193b.4\]]kyis/_khyod la ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir 'di 
[\[193b.5\]]la ci'i phyir lhag par btang snyoms su bya/_khang skyong su yin/_che ge mo zhig go/_/bos shig_/bos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gaN+DI rdungs shig_/maud gal gyi bu chen po don nyung ngu la ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed pas/_de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas 
[\[193b.6\]]dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/khang skyong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ba dang /_drug sde dag kyang de dang lhan cig dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed de/_de rtag tu gaN+DI brdungs pa na tshe dang ldan pa su zhig yongs su gnas pa 'am/_
[\[193b.7\]]gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa 'am/_mgu bar bya ba 'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba 'am/_'byin par byed ces chos kyi dbang du byas te rmed par byed do/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan su 'ang yongs su gnas pa 'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa 'am/_mgu 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]bar bya ba 'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba 'am/_'byin par mi bgyid de/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'drums pa ltung bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dral bar bgyid de/_lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi bgyid pas des na mi'i 
[\[194a.2\]]chos bla ma dam 'cha' zhing kun shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de/_de yang 'bras bu ma mchis par gyur nas des spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed de/_de la ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas 
[\[194a.3\]]dbyung ba'i las bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gnas brtan la tho ma btsams par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa/_the tshom thams cad gcod 
[\[194a.4\]]par mdzad pa yin gyis de'i spyan sngar dong la don 'di zhus shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed la ji skad lung ston pa de de kho na bzhin du zung shig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[194a.5\]]g.yul ngor dang por mi ma yin pa dag g.yul 'gyed cing /_de'i 'og tu mi rnams g.yul 'gyed de/_gang du mi ma yin pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur ba der mi rnams kyang rgyal bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen pos yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la lung bstan 
[\[194a.6\]]pa de'i tshe na yangs pa can pa'i mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rgyal po'i khab pa'i mi ma yin pa rnams pham par byas so/_/gang gi tshe de dag gang gA'i 'gram du phyin pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab pa'i mi ma yin pa dag gis yangs pa can pa'i mi ma yin pa dag pham par byas so/_/gal te 
[\[194a.7\]]dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen po la de yang dris par gyur na/_dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen pos de yang lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'du shes de lta bus lung bstan pa la ltung ba med do/_/ji ltar yangs pa can pa dag gis sngar rgyal 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]bar byas nas/_phyis rgyal po ma skyes dgras gang gA'i 'gram du 'chi ba'i shugs kyis bsngos pas pham par byas pa de bzhin du rgyal po ma skyes dgras sngar rgyal bar byas nas/_phyis yangs pa can pa de dag gis gang gA'i 'gram du 'chi ba'i shugs kyis bsngos nas pham 
[\[194b.2\]]par byas pa yang de bzhin rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na mu stegs can rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su than pa 'byung bar bstan to/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[194b.3\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de la yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis dris pa/_'phags pa yun ji srid kyis lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur/_des smras pa/_
[\[194b.4\]]shes ldan dag nyi ma bdun 'das nas so/_/de dag 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos nyi ma bdun 'das nas lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan to zhes de dag gis khyim dang bang ba na 'dug pa'i 'bru gang dag yin pa de dag kyang phyi rol du khyer te bor ro/_/
[\[194b.5\]]ji tsam na nyi ma bdun 'das nas lhas 'brug bsgrags shing sgra byung nas sa rgyas btab ste btang ba dang /_de dag lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag na shes ldan dag mu stegs can rnams dam pa yin gyi/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni de lta ma 
[\[194b.6\]]yin te/_rtag tu 'gro ba'i shing ljon pa bzhin du ngur smrig dag gis lus dag dkris shing 'khod par zad kyi cung zad kyang mi shes so zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/de dag smod par byed pa na drug sde dag kyang bsod snyoms la zhugs 
[\[194b.7\]]nas de dag gis de dag smod pa thos nas drug sde dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag su la smod/_khyed cag la'o/_/nged kyis ci byas/_mu stegs can rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su than pa 'byung bar bstan na 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos nyi ma bdun 'das 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]nas lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan nas/_bdag cag gis khyim dang bang ba na 'dug pa'i 'bru gang dag yin pa de dag kyang phyi rol du khyer te bor na lhas char ma phab bo/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag mu stegs can kun du 
[\[195a.2\]]spyod pa ni gal te sprin kyang yod/_sprin las 'brug kyang grag_/glog kyang 'byung /_phyogs bzhi nas rlung bsil bdag kyang ldang /_lhas khad kyis dal bu dal bus char cung zad 'bebs pa de'i tshe na de dag dang /_'jig rten dag kyang lhas gdon mi za bar char 'bebs so zhes 
[\[195a.3\]]zer na/_char cher bab cing sa rgyas btab par gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos pa yin no/_/'di ltar ji 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lo tog thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan tam/_de dag spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_
[\[195a.4\]]drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' de dag la go bar byas zin mod kyi 'on kyang don nyung ngu de la ltung ba byung gis tshur sheg_/de'i gan du dong la 'chags su gzhug go/_/zhes de dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas phyag 'tshal te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba 
[\[195a.5\]]der dong nas phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag a rog gya/_gnas brtan ji skabs phye shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba sde lnga po dag la skabs phye'o/_/mu stegs can rnams 
[\[195a.6\]]kyis lo bcu gnyis su than pa 'byung ngo zhes bstan na/_khyod kyis char 'bab par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/_chos gos kyi grwa rdzab kyis ma rungs par gyur na mi rung gis theg shig_/khyod lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi byed pas des na kun shes pa brda sprod par byed cing 
[\[195a.7\]]de yang 'bras bu med par gyur te/_khyod kyis spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed kyis/_khyod la ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir 'di la ci'i phyir lhag par btang snyoms su bya/_khang skyong su yin/_che ge mo zhig go/_/bos shig_/bos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gaN+DI rdungs shig_/maud gal 
[\[195b.2\]]gyi bu chen po don nyung ngu ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/khang skyong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ba dang /_drug sde dag kyang de dang lhan cig dong ngo /_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge 
[\[195b.3\]]'dun gyi gnas brtan byed de/_de rtag tu gaN+DI brdungs pa na tshe dang ldan pa su zhig yongs su gnas pa 'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa 'am/_mgu bar bya ba 'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba 'am/_'byin par byed ces chos kyi dbang du byas pa rmed par byed do/_/
[\[195b.4\]]drug sde dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan su yang yongs su gnas pa 'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa 'am/_mgu bar bya ba 'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am/_'byin par mi bgyid de/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'drums pa ltung bas 
[\[195b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dral bar bgyid de/_lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi bgyid pas des na mi'i chos bla ma dam 'cha' zhing kun shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de de yang 'bras bu ma mchis par gyur nas/_des spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis bsod 
[\[195b.6\]]snyoms kyang mi rnyed de/_de la ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gnas brtan la tho ma btsams par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen 
[\[195b.7\]]pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang /_shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa yin gyis de'i spyan sngar deng la don 'di zhus shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed la ji skad lung ston pa de de kho na bzhin du zung shig_/skabs 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag ni ltas mkhan dag gis lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes ston kyang mi rtog pa than pa chen po'i rgyu lnga dang rkyen lnga yin te/_lnga gang 
[\[196a.2\]]zhe na/_'di ltar sprin kyang yod/_glog kyang 'byung /_sprin las 'brug kyang grag_/phyogs bzhi nas rlung bsil ba dag kyang ldang /_ltas mkhan dag kyang lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes ston mod kyi/_'on kyang sa gzhi chen po 'di las me'i khams mngon par 'phags 
[\[196a.3\]]nas des char pa de bar ma dor kho nar skams par byed de/_'di ni ltas mkhan dag gis lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes ston kyang mi rtogs pa than pa chen po'i rgyu dang po dang rkyen dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang sprin yang yod/_glog kyang 'byung /_sprin las 'brug kyang grag_/
[\[196a.4\]]phyogs bzhi nas rlung bsil ba dag kyang ldang /_ltas mkhan dag kyang lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes ston mod kyi/_'on kyang nam mkha' la mi mnyam pa'i rlung dag ldang zhing des char pa de daN+Da ka'i dgon pa dag dang /_ka ling ka'i dgon pa dag dang /_ma tang ka'i dgon pa dag tu 
[\[196a.5\]]'bebs par byed de/_'di ni ltas mkhan dag gis lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes ston kyang mi rtogs pa than pa chen po'i rgyu gnyis pa dang /_rkyen gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang sprin yang yod/_glog kyang 'byung /_sprin las 'brug kyang grag_/phyogs bzhi nas rlung bsil ba 
[\[196a.6\]]dag kyang ldang /_ltas mkhan dag kyang lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes ston mod kyi 'on kyang lha'i bu char gyi shugs can dag rab tu myos par gnas pa dang /_bag med par gnas shing de dag rab tu myos par gnas pa dang /_bag med par gnas pas lhas dus dang dus su chu'i 
[\[196a.7\]]rgyun legs par 'bebs su mi ster te/_'di ni ltas mkhan dag gis lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes ston kyang mi rtogs pa than pa chen po'i rgyu gsum pa dang rkyen gsum pa yin no/_/gzhan yang sprin yang yod/_glog kyang 'byung /_sprin las 'brug kyang grag_/phyogs 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]bzhi nas rlung bsil ba dag kyang ldang /_ltas mkhan dag kyang lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes ston mod kyi/_'on kyang mi rnams chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyis chags pa dang /_'dod pa dga' bas zil gyis non pa dang /_chos log pas dkris par gyur na/_
[\[196b.2\]]chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyis chags pa dang /_'dod pa dga' bas zil gyis non pa dang /_chos log pas dkris pa de dag la lhas dus dang dus su chu'i rgyun legs par 'beb tu mi ster te/_'di ni ltas mkhan dag gis lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes ston 
[\[196b.3\]]kyang mi rtogs pa than pa chen po'i rgyu bzhi pa dang rkyen bzhi pa yin no/_/gzhan yang sprin yang yod/_glog kyang 'byung /_sprin las 'brug kyang grag_/phyogs bzhi nas rlung bsil ba dag kyang ldang /_ltas mkhan dag kyang lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes ston mod kyi/_'on 
[\[196b.4\]]kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra can rgya mtsho chen po nas mngon par 'phags nas des char pa de lag pa gnyis kyis bzed cing rgya mtsho chen por ldugs par byed de/_'di ni ltas mkhan dag gis lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes ston kyang mi rtogs pa than pa chen po'i rgyu lnga pa dang 
[\[196b.5\]]rkyen lnga pa yin no/_/dge slong dag 'di ltar de'i tshe lhas char phab mod kyi/_de na lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra can rgya mtsho chen po nas mngon par 'phags nas des char pa de lag pa gnyis kyis bzed cing rgya mtsho chen por blugs so/_/ci de dag gis lo tog thams cad grub 
[\[196b.6\]]par 'gyur ram zhes dris sam/_gal te dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen po la de yang dris par gyur na/_dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen pos de yang lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'du shes de lta bus lung bstan pa la ltung ba med do/_/
[\[196b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na yangs pa can na gcer bu pa'i nyan thos shig 'dug pa de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na de'i khyim du zhugs pa dang /_des bsams pa/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[197a.2\]]chen po 'di ni mchog gsum pa ste/_'dis mi shes pa'am/_ma mthong ba'am/_ma rig pa'am/_rnam par mi shes pa cung zad kyang med do zhes grag gis bdag gis 'di la bdag gi chung ma sbrum pa 'di las khye'u'am/_bu mo'am ci zhig skye bar 'gyur ba gsungs 
[\[197a.3\]]shig ces dri bar bya'o snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gi mchis 'brang 'di sbrum na ci 'di'i mngal na khye'u mchis sam/_'on te bu mo mchis/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khye'u'o/_/
[\[197a.4\]]'jig rten ni 'byor pa 'dod pas des rangs pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' bas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang ba bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste byin nas smras pa/_'phags pa yang gshegs su gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[197a.5\]]maud gal gyi bu chen pos a rog gya zhes smras te song ngo /_/de'i khyim dang ha cang mi ring ba na gcer bu pa zhig 'dug pa des tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu lhung bzed bkang ste song ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag gi slong mo ster ba'i khyim gcig pu yod pa gang yin pa der shAkya'i bu'i 
[\[197a.6\]]dge sbyong dag rgyu bar 'gyur ba ni ma legs kyis de'i phyir je khyim bdag de'i gan du song la des khyim bdag dang lhan cig gtam ci zhig byas par gyur pa dri'o snyam nas de myur ba myur bar khyim bdag gi gan du song ste smras pa/_khyim bdag dge sbyong maud gal gyi bu chen po 'ongs sam/_
[\[197a.7\]]'ongs so/_/khyed kyis cung zad dris sam/_dris so/_/ci dris/_bdag gi mchis 'brang 'di sbrum na ci 'di'i mngal na khye'u mchis sam/_'on te bu mo mchis zhes dris pa dang /_de na re khye'u'o zhes zer ro/_/gcer bu pa de rtog ge'i shes pa la mkhas pas brtsi bar brtsams pa dang 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]ji tsam na bu mor mthong nas de bzhin sgyur bar byed/_lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed do/_/khyim bdag des gcer bu pa de la dris pa/_ci'i phyir bzhin sgyur bar byed/_lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed/_gcer bu pas smras pa/_kho bos bu mor mthong gi khye'ur ma mthong ngo /_/khyim 
[\[197b.2\]]bdag des spyos nas 'phral bar 'phral rtsa gsum bsgreng zhing khro gnyer byas te smras pa/_gcer bu pa sgre byi khyed ci shes/_khyod pas 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i mkhyen pa ches dri ma can yin nam/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u'o zhes lung bstan na/_khyod bu mo'o 
[\[197b.3\]]zhes zer ram/_de de ltar tshar bcad nas yang brtsi bar brtsams pa dang /_bu mo nyid du mthong nas de kun nas dkris pas smras pa/_gal te dge sbyong shAkya'i bu nyid kyis lung bstan du zin kyang /_de lta na yang 'di ni bu mo nyid yin gyi khye'u ma yin no/_/ji tsam na de zla ba dgu 'das te 
[\[197b.4\]]btsas pa las bu mo zhig skyes nas/_khyim bdag de nang mi dang bcas pa gcer bu pa dag dam pa yin gyi/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni de lta ma yin te/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u'o zhes lung bstan na/_'di bu mor gyur to zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong 
[\[197b.5\]]bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag na smod pa la zhugs par gyur to/_/de dag smod par byed pa na drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos 
[\[197b.6\]]lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de dag gis de dag smod pa thos so/_/thos nas smras pa shes ldan dag khyed cag su la smod/_khyed cag la'o/_/nged kyis ci byas/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos gcer bu pa'i nyan 
[\[197b.7\]]thos kyi chung ma'i mngal na khye'u yod do zhes lung bstan na/_de las dbu mo btsas so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'jig rten thams cad shes pa rgya mtsho la 'khrul pa yod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig chos rnams la skyob pa yin gyi/_skyob pa gzhan 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]med do/_/gzhan yang mi'i skye dgu rnams la khye'u'am/_bu mo btsas par zad kyi/_gzhan mtshan ci zhig tu 'gyur/_ci khyi zhig gam/_'on te spre'u zhig tu 'gyur snyam mam/_de dag spobs pa med par gyur te/_cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_drug sde dag 
[\[198a.2\]]gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' de dag la go bar byas zin mod kyi don nyung ngu de la ltung ba byung gis tshur sheg_/de'i gan du 'dong la 'chags su gzhug go/_/zhes de dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas phyag 'tshal te tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa 
[\[198a.3\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag a rog gya nad med par gyur cig_/gnas brtan je skabs phye shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba sde lnga po dag la skabs phye'o/_/gnas brtan gyis ci 
[\[198a.4\]]gcer bu pa'i nyan thos kyi chung ma'i mngal na khye'u yod do zhes lung bstan tam/_lung bstan to/_/bzhud cig dang dga' ba 'phel ba nyams su myong zhing 'bru mar dang bu ram yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyod lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi byed pas des na kun shes pa brda sprod par byed cing 
[\[198a.5\]]de yang 'bras bu med par gyur te/_khyod kyis spyod yul bsregs pas kho bo cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi thob kyis khyod la ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[198a.6\]]ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir 'di la ci'i phyir lhag par btang snyoms su bya/_khang skyong su yin/_che ge mo zhig go/_/bos shig_/bos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gaN+DI rdungs shig_/maud gal gyi bu chen po don nyung ngu la ltung ba byung ba chos 
[\[198a.7\]]bzhin du phyir mi byed pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/khang skyong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ba dang /_drug sde dag kyang de dang lhan cig dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed de/_de rtag tu gaN+DI brdungs pa na tshe 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]dang ldan pa dag su zhig yongs su gnas pa'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am/_mgu bar bya ba'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am/_'byin par byed ces chos kyi dbang du byas pa 'dri bar byed do/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan su yang yongs su gnas pa'am/_
[\[198b.2\]]gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa 'am/_mgu bar bya ba 'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba 'am/_'byin par mi bgyid de/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'drums pa ltung bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dral bar bgyid de/_lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi bgyid pas des 
[\[198b.3\]]na mi'i chos bla ma dam 'cha' zhing kun shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de/_de yang 'bras bu ma mchis par gyur nas/_des spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed de/_de ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung 
[\[198b.4\]]ba'i las bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gnas brtan la tho ma 'tsham par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa/_the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa yin 
[\[198b.5\]]gyis de'i gan du deng la don 'di zhus shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed la ji skad lung ston pa de de kho na bzhin du zung shig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gnas bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam 
[\[198b.6\]]par mi bya ba dag yin te/_gang dag sems par byed pa dag myos pa dang /_rmongs par 'gyur zhing sems rnam par g.yengs pa thob par 'gyur ba yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag la sems pa dang /_'jig rten la sems pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi las kyi 
[\[198b.7\]]rnam par smin pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/_/'di ltar gang gi tshe dge slong maud gal gyi bus lung bstan pa de'i tshe na de khye'ur gyur pa yin la/_phyis de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtshan gyur to/_/gal te dge slong maud gal gyi bu la de yang dris par gyur na dge 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]slong maud gal gyi bus de yang lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag dge slong maud gal gyi bus 'du shes de lta bus lung bstan pa la ltung ba med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/rgyal 
[\[199a.2\]]po'i khab na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des gang dge slong gi dge 'dun la so sor rig par ma byas par zas sbyin pa de 'phral kho na la longs spyod dag gis mngon par 'phel lo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_de ni nor sgrub pa'i thabs bzang po yin gyis/_bdag 
[\[199a.3\]]gis kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la so sor rig par ma byas par zas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas des srang du song ste/_sha mang po nyos nas de'i 'og tu zangs kyi nang du zhun mar mang po dang sbyar ba'i thug pa bskol nas grong khyer gyi sgor sgo ba la kye nang rje dge slong gang la la zhig bsod snyoms 
[\[199a.4\]]la 'jug na kho bo'i khyim du thong shig ces spring ba dang /_sgo ba des smras pa/_khyim bdag de bzhin du btang ngo zhes des dge slong bsod snyoms la 'jug pa gang mthong ba de la 'phags pa khyim bdag che ge mo zhig deng dge slong rnams la bsod snyoms 'bul gyis de'i sdum par bzhud cig 
[\[199a.5\]]ces smras pa dang /_de de'i khyim du song ngo /_/de bzhin du sgo bas bsod snyoms pa thams cad la bsgo ba dang /_bsod snyoms pa thams cad khyim bdag de'i khyim du dong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des shin tu snum pa'i sha'i thug pa dag gis de dag so so'i lhung bzed bkang ste byin no/_/
[\[199a.6\]]de'i nyin mo nam mkha' sprin gyis khebs shing yul ngan byung bar gyur nas dge slong dag zan zos nas lhung bzed snum po 'di dag rtsub par bya mi nus kyis de na chu dron yod kyis chu dron gyi gan du song ste bkru bar bya'o zhes de dag chu dron gyi gan du song ste bkru bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong 
[\[199a.7\]]gzhon nu zhig la chu dron 'di gang nas 'ong snyam pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa byung nas de dang ha cang mi ring ba na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' lhung bzed 'khru bar byed de/_de de'i gan du song nas/_btsun pa nye dga' chu dron 'di gang nas 'ong zhes dris pa dang /_de dang yang ha cang mi ring ba na tshe dang ldan 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen po lhung bzed 'khru bar byed nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]song la don nyung ngu 'di la dris shig_/ces gzhon nu de tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gan du btang ba dang /_gzhon nu de spyod lam zhi ba rgya chen pos de'i gan du song ste gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa gnas brtan chab 
[\[199b.2\]]dron 'di ga las mchis/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thos nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde'i mtha' la gnod pa ma byed cig_/chos kyi khrid byed rnam par ma dkrugs shig_/chos kyi mngal ma rtol cig_/'di ltar kho bo 
[\[199b.3\]]cag la rtogs pa med kyang ci lung yang med dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i chu ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/_bsil ba dang /_mngar ba dang /_yang ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_dang ba dang /_dri nga ba med pa dang /_'thung ba na mgul pa la mi 
[\[199b.4\]]gnod pa dang /_'thungs na lto la mi gnod pa'o zhes gsungs na/_de'i phyir khyod kyis yan lag dang po nyid kyis bslus so/_/khyod lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi byed pas des na kun shes pa brda sprod par byed cing de yang 'bras bu med par gyur te/_khyod kyis spyod yul bsregs 
[\[199b.5\]]pas bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed kyis/_khyod la ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las 
[\[199b.6\]]bya'o zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir 'di la ci'i phyir lhag par btang snyoms su bya/_khang skyong su yin/_che ge mo zhig go/_/bos shig_/bos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gaN+DI rdungs shig_/maud gal gyi bu chen po don nyung ngu la ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed pas de ltung ba 
[\[199b.7\]]ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/khang skyong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ba dang /_drug sde dag kyang de dang lhan cig dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed de/_de rtag tu gaN+DI brdungs pa na tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]dag su zhig yongs su gnas pa'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am/_mgu bar bya ba'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am/_'byin par byed ces chos kyi dbang du byas pa 'dri bar byed do/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan su yang 
[\[200a.2\]]yongs su gnas pa dang /_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am/_mgu bar bya ba'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am/_'byin par mi bgyid de/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'drums pa ltung bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dral bar bgyid de/_
[\[200a.3\]]lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi bgyid pas des na mi'i chos bla ma dam 'cha' zhing kun shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de/_de yang 'bras bu ma mchis par gyur nas des spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed de/_de ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mi 
[\[200a.4\]]bgyid pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gnas brtan la tho ma 'tsham par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i 
[\[200a.5\]]mnga' brnyes pa/_the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa yin gyis de'i gan du deng la don 'di zhus shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed la ji skad lung ston pa de de kho na bzhin du zung shig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[200a.6\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chu dron de ni mtsho chen po ma dros pa kho na las 'ong ngo /_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chab de mtsho chen po ma dros pa las mchis na ci'i slad du dro lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[200a.7\]]dge slong dag 'di ltar chu de nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba lnga brgya'i steng nas 'ong ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te dge slong maud gal gyi bu la de yang dris par gyur na/_dge slong maud gal gyi bus de yang lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag dge slong maud gal gyi bus 'du shes de lta bus lung 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bstan pa la ltung ba med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo ci yang med pa'i skye mched la 
[\[200b.2\]]snyoms par zhugs pas/_rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram na glang po che gtso bo rab tu mang po dag gi sgra skad thos so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 'khor de nyid na 'dug cing mthun par gyur nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde'i mtha' la gnod pa ma byed cig_/chos 
[\[200b.3\]]kyi khrid byed rnam par ma dkrugs shig_/chos kyi mngal ma rtol cig_/'di ltar bdag cag la rtogs pa med kyang ci lung yang med dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs pa'i gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par gzhig cing sgra'i 'du shes 
[\[200b.4\]]dang bral lo zhes gsungs na/_de'i phyir ji ltar gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bshig cing sgra'i 'du shes dang bral ba des gzugs dag mthong bar 'gyur zhing sgra dag thos par 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/_/khyod lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi byed pas des na kun shes pa brda 
[\[200b.5\]]sprod par byed cing de yang 'bras bu med par gyur te/_khyod kyis spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed kyis khyed la ltung ba byung ba de chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig tshe dang ldan pa ltung ba ma mthong ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[200b.6\]]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir 'di la ci'i phyir lhag par btang snyoms su bya/_khang skyong su yin/_che ge mo zhig go/_/bos shig_/bos so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gaN+DI rdungs shig_/maud 
[\[200b.7\]]gal gyi bu don nyung ngu la ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/khang skyong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ba dang /_drug sde dag kyang de dang lhan cig dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed de/_de rtag tu gaN+DI brdungs pa na tshe dang ldan pa dag su zhig yongs su gnas pa'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am/_mgu bar bya ba'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am/_'byin par byed ces chos kyi dbang du byas pa 
[\[201a.2\]]'dri bar byed do/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan su yang yongs su gnas pa'am/_gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am/_mgu bar bya ba'am/_gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am/_'byin par mi bgyid de/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'drums 
[\[201a.3\]]pa ltung bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dral bar bgyid de/_lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi bgyid pas des na mi'i chos bla ma dam 'cha' zhing kun shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de/_de yang 'bras bu ma mchis par gyur nas/_des spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis 
[\[201a.4\]]bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed de/_de la ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid pas de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gnas brtan la tho ma 'tsham par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa/_
[\[201a.5\]]thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa/_the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa yin gyis de'i gan du deng la don 'di zhus shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed la ji skad lung ston pa de de kho na bzhin du zung shig_/skabs de dge slong 
[\[201a.6\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs pa'i gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bshig cing sgra'i 'du shes dang bral bas gzugs 
[\[201a.7\]]kyi 'du shes rnam par bshig cing sgra'i 'du shes dang bral ba des gzugs dag mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing /_sgra dag thos par mi 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/_/'di ltar dge slong maud gal gyi bu ni bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]pa dag thob pa yin te/_de ni myur du snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang bar byed pas des snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems nye bar rtogs shing rnam par langs pa'i sems ni ma rtogs te/_dge slong dag dge slong maud gal gyi bu rnam par langs pas sgra de thos so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 
[\[201b.2\]]maud gal gyi bus 'du shes de lta bus lung bstan pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/pham par 'gyur ba bzhi pa rdzogs te/_pham par 'gyur ba rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba 
[\[201b.3\]]rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_sdom la/_khu ba 'dzin pa 'khrig tshig bsnyen bkur smyan/_/khang pa khang chen dang ni gzhi med pa/_/bag tsam dge 'dun dbyen dang de rjes phyogs/_/khyim sun 'byin dang bka' blo mi bde ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[201b.4\]]mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i kun tu spyod pa ni grong ngam grong rdal gang na nye bar rten cing gnas pa der nang par sngar langs te/_gtsug lag khang du chag chag 'debs par byed/_legs par nyug par 
[\[201b.5\]]byed/_ba lang gi lci ba sar pa'i byug pas skud par byed cing /_de gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te so shing bor nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te grong ngam/_grong rdal de nyid du lus ma bsrungs/_
[\[201b.6\]]dbang po rnams ma bsdams/_dran pa nye bar ma bzhag par bsod snyoms la 'jug cing /_de grong ngam/_grong rdal der bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos mkhos su phab ste/_rkang 
[\[201b.7\]]pa gnyis bkrus nas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du 'jug par byed do/_/gal te de'i sems 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris par gyur na/_des rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te/_lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas rtsol bar 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]byed cing khu ba 'byin par byed do/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gtsug lag khang rgyu zhing 'dong ba na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba 
[\[202a.2\]]dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ji ltar khyod bzod dam/_'tsho 'am/_bde ba la reg 
[\[202a.3\]]par gnas sam/_bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar ma gyur tam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag te por bzod do/_/'tsho'o/_/bde ba la reg par gnas so/_/bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar ma gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod ji ltar bzod pa dang /_'tsho ba dang /_bde 
[\[202a.4\]]ba la reg par gnas pa dang /_bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar ma gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag grong ngam/_grong rdal gang na nye bar rten cing gnas par bdag nang par sngar langs te/_gtsug lag khang du chag chag 'debs par byed/_legs par nyug par byed/_ba lang gi 
[\[202a.5\]]lci ba sar pa'i byug pas skud par byed cing /_bdag gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te so shing bor nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te grong ngam/_grong rdal de nyid du bsod snyoms la 'jug cing bdag grong ngam/_
[\[202a.6\]]grong rdal de nyid du bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du 'jug par byed do/_/gal te bdag ni 
[\[202a.7\]]sems 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris par gyur na/_bdag gis rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te/_lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas rtsol bar byed cing khu ba phyung nas rims nad dang bral zhing yongs su gdung ba dang bral bas bde ba la reg par gnas shing 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]bsod snyoms kyis ngal ba yang med de/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag de ltar na bzod pa dang /_'tsho ba dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas pa dang /_bsod snyoms kyis ngal ba yang med do/_/dge slong de dag des smras pa la mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/_phyir zlog par yang mi 
[\[202b.2\]]byed cing /_mngon par bstod pa yang ma byas/_phyir bzlog pa yang ma byas par dong ste bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong rab 
[\[202b.3\]]tu mang po dag gis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang gnyis gzigs pa na dge slong gi dge 
[\[202b.4\]]'dun sdud par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis kun shes pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir dang /_ngas 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi legs par bcas par 'gyur ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_mkhyen bzhin du rmed 
[\[202b.5\]]pa/_mkhyen kyang mi rmed pa/_dus su rmed pa/_dus las yol bar mi rmed pa/_don dang ldan pa rmed pa/_don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[202b.6\]]'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[202b.7\]]gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/'char ka ngas 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos bstan pa dang 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /_gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos bstan pa la khyod kyis ci'i phyir mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur/_mi gti mug can khyod 
[\[203a.2\]]kyis lag pa gang dag gis bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag las dad pas sbyin par bya ba len par byed pa'i lag pa de dag nyid kyis ci'i phyir mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur/_mi gti mug can khyod kyis sbrul nag po dug myur du khyab par byed pa/_dug drag pa/_
[\[203a.3\]]dug rno ba lag pa gnyis kyis bzung bar gyur pa ni bla'i/_de ltar gyur pas rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa bzung ba ni ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/'char ka ji snyam du sems/_de ltar na bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bsnyen bkur bdag gir ma byas sam/_btsun 
[\[203a.4\]]pa bgyis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_'di lta ste/_dge 
[\[203a.5\]]'dun bsdu ba'i phyir dang /_dge 'dun legs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dge 'dun bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_gnong mi bkur ba'i gang zag rnams tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir dang /_ngo tsha shes pa rnams bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_mngon par ma dad 
[\[203a.6\]]pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang /_mngon par dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_tshe 'di'i zag pa rnams bsdam par bya ba'i phyir dang /_tshe rabs phyi ma'i rnams bzlog par bya ba'i phyir dang /_nga'i tshangs par spyod pa skye bo mang po la phan pa yangs par gyur 
[\[203a.7\]]pa lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'o/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung na dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po nyal ba dag gi rmi lam na mi gtsang ba shor cing khu ba phyung bar gyur te de dag la 'du shes kyang 
[\[203b.2\]]yod/_sems pa yang yod pas de dag 'gyod pa skyes par gyur nas/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad na/_bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po nyal ba dag gi 
[\[203b.3\]]rmi lam na mi gtsang ba shor zhing khu ba byung bar gyur te/_bdag cag la 'du shes kyang yod/_sems pa yang yod pas bdag cag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur tam/_tshur sheg bdag cag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der 'dong zhing phyin nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[203b.4\]]pa kun dga' bo la brjod par bya zhing bdag cag la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ji skad lung ston par 'gyur ba de de kho na bzhin du gzung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di 
[\[203b.5\]]skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad na/_bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po nyal ba dag 
[\[203b.6\]]gi rmi lam na mi gtsang ba shor cing khu ba byung bar gyur te/_bdag cag la 'du shes kyang mchis/_sems pa yang mchis pas bdag cag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur tam/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rab tu mang po de dag khrid de bcom ldan 
[\[203b.7\]]'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]'di ltar bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung na dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa dge slong rab tu mang po 'di dag mchis nyal ba'i g.yar lam na mi gtsang ba shor cing khu ba byung bar gyur te/_
[\[204a.2\]]'di dag la 'du shes kyang mchis/_sems pa yang mchis pas 'di dag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar ma gyur tam/_kun dga' bo 'di dag la 'du shes kyang yod/_sems pa yang yod de med do zhes nga mi smra mod kyi 'di dag gi de ni tha snyad du byar rung ba ma yin te/_
[\[204a.3\]]kun dga' bo de lta bas na rmi lam gyi ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 
[\[204a.4\]]'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni rjes su gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_bsams bzhin du 
[\[204a.5\]]khu ba phyung na rmi lam gyi ma gtogs te dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/bsams bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyad nas so/_/khu ba zhes bya ba ni khu ba rnam pa lnga ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_bska ba dang /_sla ba'o/_/de la sngon po ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[204a.6\]]po'i 'o/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo dbang bskur bar 'os la dbang ma bskur bar gnas pa mtshams thob pa gang yin pa de'i khu ba yang sngon po yin no/_/ser po ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu de las gzhan pa dag gi'o/_/dmar po ni sna chen po la gtogs pa 'khor lo'i 
[\[204a.7\]]mtha' pa'i 'o/_/bska ba ni dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams kyi'o/_/sla ba ni dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams kyi'o/_/yang na bud med kyis dub pa dang /_khur gyis dub pa dang /_lam gyis dub pa dang /_gta' gam pa dang /_ya za ma lug gang yin pa de'i yang sla ba yin no/_/phyung na zhes 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]bya ba ni de ma thag tu phyung ba'o/_/rmi lam gyi ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi bzhag ste'o/_/dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni ltung ba de dge 'dun la rag las pa dang /_dge 'dun dang 'brel pa dang /_dge 'dun la rton pa yin te/_ltung ba de dge 'dun las rnam par ldang bar 'gyur 
[\[204b.2\]]gyi gang zag las ma yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi po dag ni lhag ma med pa yin gyi/_'di ni lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pa ste/_des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_gzhi lngas te bde ba 'dod pa dang /_sa bon 
[\[204b.3\]]'dod pa dang /_rig sngags 'dod pa dang /_sman 'dod pa dang /_brtag pa 'dod pas so/_/ji ltar bde ba 'dod pas she na/_dge slong gis bde ba 'dod pas nang gi gzugs nye bar len cing sems par byed/_rtsol bar byed la khu ba 'byin na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/khu ba 
[\[204b.4\]]mi 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bde ba 'dod pas ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags 'dod pa dang /_sman 'dod pa dang /_brtag pa 'dod pas kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis bde ba 'dod pas nang gi gzugs nye bar len cing sems par byed/_rtsol bar byed/_
[\[204b.5\]]ril gyis 'chang bar byed/_dam du 'chang bar byed/_khu ba 'byin na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bde ba 'dod pas ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags 'dod pa dang /_sman 'dod pa dang /_brtag pa 'dod pas 
[\[204b.6\]]kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis bde ba 'dod pas nang gi gzugs nye bar len cing sems par byed/_rtsol bar byed/_ril gyis 'chang bar byed/_dam du 'chang bar byed la des kyang bye brag nges par myong ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed cing khu ba 'byin na dge 'dun lhag mar 
[\[204b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bde ba 'dod pas ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags 'dod pa dang /_sman 'dod pa dang /_brtag pa 'dod pas kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis bde ba 'dod pas nang gi gzugs nye bar len cing 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]sems par byed/_rtsol bar byed/_ril gyis 'chang bar byed/_dam du 'chang bar byed la/_des kyang byung la thug pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed cing khu ba 'byin na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bde ba 
[\[205a.2\]]'dod pas ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags 'dod pa dang /_sman 'dod pa dang /_brtag pa 'dod pas kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis bde ba 'dod pas nang gi gzugs nye bar len cing sems par byed/_rtsol bar byed/_ril gyis 'chang bar byed/_dam 
[\[205a.3\]]du 'chang bar byed/_des kyang ngad las pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed cing khu ba 'byin na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bde ba 'dod pas ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags 'dod pa dang /_sman 'dod pa dang /_
[\[205a.4\]]brtag pa 'dod pas kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis bde ba 'dod pas nang gi gzugs nye bar len cing sems par byed/_rtsol bar byed/_ril gyis 'chang bar byed/_dam du 'chang bar byed la/_des kyang bye brag nges par myong ba'i bde ba dang /_byung la thug pa'i bde ba dang /_
[\[205a.5\]]ngad langs pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed cing khu ba 'byin na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bde ba 'dod pas ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon 'dod pa dang /_rig sngags 'dod pa dang /_sman 'dod pa dang /_brtag pa 'dod pas kyang de 
[\[205a.6\]]bzhin no/_/nang gi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi gzugs nye bar len pa la yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro//_//bar sdom la/_gar byed rab tu gar byed dang /_/mkha' dang shugs dang sbubs 'ongs dang /_/kun du mnyed dang bye brag nges/_/'jal ba dang ni lta ba dang /_/rgyun 
[\[205a.7\]]las bzlog dang rdzi bzlog pa'i/_/sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/_/dge slong gis gar byed pas khu ba 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis rab tu gar byed pas khu ba 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nam mkha' la rked pa skyod pas khu ba 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis shugs btang ste/_khu ba 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[205b.2\]]slong gis sbubs su 'ongs pa'i khu ba 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis kun tu mnyed pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed cing khu ba 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bye 
[\[205b.3\]]brag nges par myong ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed cing khu ba 'byin na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khu ba mi 'byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa 'jal bar byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chags 
[\[205b.4\]]pa'i sems kyis rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa la lta na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chags pa'i sems kyis rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa chu'i rgyun las bzlog phyogs su gtong bar byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/chu'i rgyun phyogs su gtong bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[205b.5\]]dge slong gis chags pa'i sems kyis rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa rdzi phyogs ma yin par gtong bar byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rdzi phyogs su gtong bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rma sbyang ba dang /_shu ba dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mdze dang /_phol mig dang /_skrangs pa dang /_
[\[205b.6\]]khyi rngo dang /_glog pa dang /_'brum bu dang /_phyi rol du mchong ba dang /_'obs la mchong ba dang /_brla la reg pa dang /_gos la reg pa dang /_chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dag mthong ba dang /_sngon spyad pa'i yul rjes su dran pa dang /_bsro khang gi las nyams su myong bar byed 
[\[205b.7\]]pas khu ba byung ba la ni ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/khu ba 'byin pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/_rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par 
[\[206a.2\]]bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas/_snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/mnyan yod na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim 
[\[206a.3\]]bdag gi chung ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni skyed mos tshal du song ste/_rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /_gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro bas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi chung 
[\[206a.4\]]ma rab tu mang po dag skyed mos tshal du byung ste gtsug lag khang lta 'dod pas rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ngo /_/drug sde dag gis grong khyer chen po drug po dag na 'khod pa'i mi rnams 'di lta ste rigs las sam/_rus las sam/_rgyud las sam/_ming las sam/_gzugs 
[\[206a.5\]]las sam/_bzo las sam/_'tsho ba las mi shes pa'am/_ma mthong ba'am/_ma thos pa'am/_ma rig pa'am/_rnam par mi shes pa 'ga' yang med pas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/_
[\[206a.6\]]mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/che ge mo'i ma/_che ge mo'i chung ma/_che ge mo'i mna' ma/_che ge mo'i bu mo/_che ge mo'i sring mo 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyed cag ci'i phyir yun ring mo ring mo nas zla ba ltar rgyu bar byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[206a.7\]]'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyis mi khom pa brgyad ni gang zag gi tshangs par spyad pa'i dus ma lags so zhes legs par gsungs na/_bdag cag ni 'di lta ste/_khyim gyi 'du 'dzi dang ldan pas mi khom pa dgu pa lags so/_/'char kas smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed kyis 'ga' zhig gis 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]'di skad ces/_dug can la sogs rgyal po yi/_/bya ba dag ni ma byas par/_/de dag nyid dang bya ba rnams/_/zhig pa nyid du gyur pa yin/_/bya ba de dag nyid kyang ni/_/yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/_/'jig rten dgra bo 'chi bdag de/_/'ong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes 
[\[206b.2\]]smras pa ma thos sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du bdag cag skyed mos tshal du mchis te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /_gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i slad 
[\[206b.3\]]du mchis pa lags so/_/'char kas smras pa/_sring mo dag gal te khyed cag de'i phyir 'ongs na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas legs so legs so/_/sring mo dag de ni mjal gyis 'di ltar ltad mo ji ltar blta ba 
[\[206b.4\]]dri bar bya'o/_/sring mo dag khyed cag gang du 'jug par byed/_btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag kun dga' ra bar 'jug cing gtsug lag khang lta bar 'tshal lo/_/sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis/_mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten dag 
[\[206b.5\]]la gom 'dor na/_/'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi srang tshad ni/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/zhes gsungs pas de yang legs so/_/sring mo dag khyed kyis gang khyed cag gtsug lag khang ston par byed pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig btsal tam/_'phags pa ci bdag cag 
[\[206b.6\]]sgron ma sug pa na thogs bzhin du zhugs gzhan du tshol lam/_btsun pa 'char ka spangs te dge slong gzhan ga la tshol/_khyod pas gzhan khyad par du 'phags pa su zhig mchis kyis/_khyod nyid kyis bstan du gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/_gal 
[\[206b.7\]]te 'di dag la gtsug lag khang bstan par bya na ni bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par yang 'gyur/_gal te bstan par mi bya na ni tshig pa'i bsod snyoms kyang ster bar mi 'gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma dad pa rnams dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]'dzin du gzhug par bya/_gdul bar bya/_gzung bar bya/_rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir 'di dag dge ba la nges par sbyar bar bya/_rnam pa thams cad du bstan par bya'o snyam du rig nas des me tog dang /_bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa 
[\[207a.2\]]rnam pa sna tshogs thogs te pog phor lag tu blangs nas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par brtsams te/_sring mo dag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang ste/_gang du bcom ldan 'das nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par 
[\[207a.3\]]gzigs nas gang ni nyams par 'gyur/_gang ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_gang ni gnod par gyur/_gang ni nyam nga bar gyur/_gang ni mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni ngan song la gzhol/_gang ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang 
[\[207a.4\]]ni ngan song la bab/_ngas gang ni ngan song gi lam nas bslangs te mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya/_'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag 
[\[207a.5\]]par bya/_gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa gang ni yongs su smin par bya/_yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang /_
[\[207a.6\]]gzigs pa 'jug cing 'di ltar/_chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/_/dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni/_/dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la/_/rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[207a.7\]]pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la/_/rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad/_/kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi/_/bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste/_/srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni/_/rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/_/zhes bya ba 'jug 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam 'cha' ba/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra 
[\[207b.2\]]yang dag par sgrog pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya'i gtsug lag khang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /_'dren pa med pa dang /_yongs su 'dren pa med pa na de'i dang 
[\[207b.3\]]por ye shes kyi mig sman gyi thur mas gang gi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyangs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rnams dang /_rgyal tshab lta bu rnams dang /_yun ring po nas rab tu byung ba rnams dang /_tshangs par spyod pa mngon par spyad pa rnams dang /_snam sbyar 
[\[207b.4\]]gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa gang gi rgyud la de'i dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa 'am/_sus kyang chos dang mthun par bskor mi nus pa chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[207b.5\]]chos kyi 'khor lo skye bo mang po'i don dang /_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_'jig rten la rjes su thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de'i yin gyis 'dir yang 
[\[207b.6\]]zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rmon pa dor stong du gcig gis mchog pa spangs te rab tu byung ba dbyig bye ba phrag drug bcu dang ldan pa/_gser gyi nas bang chung brgyad bcu bdog pa/_
[\[207b.7\]]bran gyi grong khyer [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bdog pa/_sbyor ba'i grong bcu drug bdog pa/_ser skya bzang mo lus gser bas lhag pa dang ldan pa mchil ma'i thal ba smin pa ltar spangs te mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ras sbyar ma'i snam sbyar rin thang 'bum ri ba thogs te 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gang 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dag bzhugs pa de dag gi phyir rab tu byung ba/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir nags na brten pa gang yin pa/_gang mthong na spos kyi glang po che dag kyang rgyags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba/_gang 
[\[208a.2\]]gis bu [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]mchod rten du ston par khas blangs nas dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'dod pa chung ba chog shes pa/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_dge slong 'od srung 
[\[208a.3\]]chen po'o zhes gsungs shing /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gtsug lag khang ste/_mchog thob pa'i bu gang yin pa/_gang gis lo brgyad gnyis su dbang 
[\[208a.4\]]po'i brda sprod pa blags pa/_rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab chen po rnams dang /_spobs pa chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams 
[\[208a.5\]]cad gang gi cha bcu drug par bzhag cing bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/_/'jig rten kun gyi shes rab gang /_/shA ri'i bu yi shes rab kyi/_/bcu drug char yang mi chog go/_/gal te lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di/_/shA ri'i bu dang mnyam gyur 
[\[208a.6\]]pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi/_/bcu drug char yang mi chog go/_/zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/_mdun na 'don gyi bu cod pan med 
[\[208a.7\]]pa'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung ba gang yin pa gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos lan gsum du bsgul/_kun du bsgul/_kun du rab tu bsgul ba/_gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]zer can du nyin mtshan bdun gyis gshegs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang /_mthu chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i gtsug lag khang ste/_mi 
[\[208b.2\]]skal ba bzang po las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras gang gi ming yang dag par bsgrags pas tshong pa dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bzhon pa'i snod legs par grub cing 'ong bar 'gyur ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog 
[\[208b.3\]]tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ste/_yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyen bkur ba gang yin pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring na nye bar spyod pa/_ston pas 
[\[208b.4\]]yang dag par bsngags pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis yang dag par bkur ba gang yin pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras las rab tu byung ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa rnams dang /_thos pa 
[\[208b.5\]]bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga'i gtsug lag khang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung po sru'i sras las rab tu byung ba/_gal te rab tu ma byung na stobs kyi 'khor los 
[\[208b.6\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dag gi sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyi gtsug lag khang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sras las
