[\[220b.3\]]mi byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te/_de ltar smon par byed pas so/_/ji ltar gshe bar byed pas she na/_bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de dge slong gi gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces ro lta bu 
[\[220b.4\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pas spyo ba dag gis spyo bar byed pa na/_dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis de'i ro myong bar byed/_nges par rtogs par byed/_lhag par chags par byed/_lhag par chags shing 'dug par byed pa de lta de ltar phyir smra bar byed cing 'khrig pa dang ldan pa rgya'i rna ru 
[\[220b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i ming rjod par byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/rgya'i rna ru zhes bya ba'i ming rjod par mi byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te/_de ltar gshe bar byed pas so/_/nus pa la dge 'dun lhag ma gang yin pa de ni mi nus pa la nyes pa sbom po'o/_/skyes pa dang /_za ma dang /_ma ning 
[\[220b.6\]]dang /_mtshan gnyis pa la nyes pa sbom po'o/_/nus pa la nyes pa sbom po gang yin pa de mi nus pa la nyes byas so/_/skyes pa dang /_za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan gnyis pa la yang nyes byas nyid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la yang nyes byas nyid do/_/nus pa la nyes byas gang 
[\[220b.7\]]yin pa de mi nus pa la yang nyes byas nyid do/_/skyes pa dang /_za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan gnyis pa la yang nyes byas nyid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la yang nyes byas nyid do/_/skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang /_yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang /_ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig gis ni ltung ba 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]med do/_/nas kyi ming dang /_rtswa'i ming dang /_yol ba'i ming brjod pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/'khrig pa dang ldan pa smra ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste gsum pa rdzogs 
[\[221a.2\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/_rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad 
[\[221a.3\]]par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/mnyan yod na 
[\[221a.4\]]gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni skyed mos tshal du song ste rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /_gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro bas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi 
[\[221a.5\]]chung ma rab tu mang po dag skyed mos tshal du byung ste gtsug lag khang lta 'dod pas rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ngo zhes bya ba nas/_des de dag la chos bstan par brtsams so zhes bya ba'i bar du dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no/_/ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de 
[\[221a.6\]]ltar kun tu chags so/_/ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar dral to/_/ji lta ji ltar dral ba de lta de ltar de dag gi mdun du bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan 
[\[221a.7\]]pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes bsngags pa brjod par brtsams so/_/'di lta ste/_dper na mi gsang sngags nyid rjod par byed pa 'byung po'am/_sha zas thal lcag gi snun pas bsnun par gyur pa de bzhin du/_de yang de dag la ji lta ji 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]ltar chos ston par byed pa de lta de ltar kun tu chags so/_/ji lta ji ltar kun du chags pa de lta de ltar dral to/_/ji lta ji ltar dral ba de lta de ltar de dag gi mdun du bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i chos can/_
[\[221b.2\]]tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no/_/zhes bsngags pa brjod par brtsams so/_/de na gang dag bdag gir byed pa de dag ni de dang lhan cig gzhogs stegs dang /_phyar g.yeng dang /_tho 
[\[221b.3\]]'tsham pa dang /_kun tu rtse ba dang /_kun tu ca co 'don pa dang /_dgod pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_lus sgyur bar byed do/_/gang dag bdag gir mi byed pa de dag ni de nas phyir byung ste/_'chag sa dang /_dag ra dang /_sgo khang dag na gang las chu 'byung de las 'bar/_/gang las skyob pa de 
[\[221b.4\]]las 'jigs/_/'jigs pa med las 'jigs pa skyes/_/skyabs las 'jigs pa skyes par gyur/_/bdag cag gi phyogs gcig tu bde ba/_zhi ba/_bde legs rjod pa bde legs su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de las 'jigs pa dang /_yams dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad dang /_
[\[221b.5\]]'khrug pa byung bar gyur to zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/de dag smod cing 'dong ba na dge slong dag gi mngon sum du gyur nas/_de dag gis de dag smod pa thos pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed cag su la smod/_'phags pa dag 
[\[221b.6\]]khyed cag la'o/_/nged kyis ci byas/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis rang gi khyim thab las kyang tshig gang dag ma thos pa/_de dag 'phags pa 'char ka las thos so/_/gal te bdag cag gi pha ma 'am/_phu nu mo dag gis thos par gyur na/_rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der ltar 
[\[221b.7\]]yang mi ster na mchi bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_sring mo dag kha rog shig_/dge slong de ni mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang 'dod chags shas che ba yin pas rtsom pa des nyon mongs pa sel bar byed do/_/'phags pa dag ci lags/_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]glang bu gang la rwa rnon po gnyis mchis pa des bdag nyid kyi dku 'dral bar bgyid dam/_de ni mi rigs so/_/sring mo dag kha rog shig dang bzlog par bya'o/_/'phags pa dag gal te zlog na de lta na legs/_gal te zlog par mi mdzad na bdag cag slan chad rgyal 
[\[222a.2\]]byed kyi tshal du mi mchi'o/_/sring mo dag kha rog shig dang /_ci nas kyang phyin chad de ltar byed par mi 'gyur bar bzlog par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bsgo ste dong ba dang /_lhag ma rnams kyang gtsug lag khang nas byung ste dong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang dgod 
[\[222a.3\]]bzhin du gtsug lag khang nas byung ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas nas da ci dgod/_'char kas smras pa/_kho bos chang 'thungs sam/_kun dong zos sam ci/_tshe dang ldan pa ci de yang byas sam/_gzhan 
[\[222a.4\]]ci zhig byas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag 'phya zhing dong ngo /_/'char kas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ser snas gang la yang tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang mi ston la/_de dag ni gang gzhan 
[\[222a.5\]]la ston pa de la 'phya bar byed do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_ci khyod kyis de dag bden pa dag la bkod dam/_des smras pa/_je de dag gi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba brtsams na mthar gyis bden pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag yan 
[\[222a.6\]]lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis khengs par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 
[\[222a.7\]]'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[222b.2\]]pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang 
[\[222b.3\]]dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med kyi yul gyi mdun du bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i chos can/_tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur 
[\[222b.4\]]rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes bsngags pa brjod na dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de dang 'dra ba gang yin pa'o/_/dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni sems dral cing ma gyur pa yang yod/_gyur cing ma dral ba yang yod/_dral 
[\[222b.5\]]cing gyur pa yang yod/_ma dral cing ma gyur pa yang yod do/_/de la re zhig dral cing ma gyur pa ni sems chags pa dang /_kun tu chags pa dang /_kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa'o/_/gyur cing ma dral ba ni sems ltos pa dang ldan zhing sems 'brel ba gang yin pa'o/_/dral 
[\[222b.6\]]cing ma gyur pa ni chags pa dang /_kun tu chags pa dang /_kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang /_sems ltos pa dang bcas shing 'brel pa gang yin pa'o/_/ma dral cing ma gyur pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/bud med kyi yul gyi zhes bya ba ni bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma 
[\[222b.7\]]legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa'i'o/_/mdun du zhes bya ba ni mngon du'o/_/bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi lus kyi kun tu spyad pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste/_nga lta bu zhes bya ba de ni nye bar bstan 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]pa dang kun tu bstan pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/dge slong zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi dngos po ji skad bstan pa dang ldan pa'o/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi phung po ji skad bstan pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge ba'i chos can zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung 
[\[223a.2\]]po ji skad bstan pa dang ldan pa'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa la zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi phung po ji skad bstan pa dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i'o/_/chos 'dis zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgras bstan pa 'dis yin gyi 
[\[223a.3\]]gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa'o/_/bsnyen bkur byas na zhes bya ba ni kun du spyad pa byas na'o/_/sru zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes bya ba la mchog yin na zhes bya ba ni gtso bo yin no/_/bsngags pa brjod na zhes bya ba ni bstod pa byas 
[\[223a.4\]]na'o/_/dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni ltung ba de dge 'dun la rag las pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_gzhi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis te/_mchog dang /_phul dang /_khyad par 
[\[223a.5\]]du 'phags pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mchod par 'os pa dang /_bstod par 'os pa dang /_rgya che ba dang /_ches mchog dang /_ches phul dang /_ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_ches bzang ba dang /_ches mdzes pa dang /_ches dge ba dang /_ches 
[\[223a.6\]]mchod par 'os pa dang /_ches bstod par 'os pa dang /_ches rgya che bas so/_/de la ji ltar mchog gis she na/_dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa 
[\[223a.7\]]de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni kun tu spyad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni 
[\[223b.2\]]bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di 
[\[223b.3\]]skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon 
[\[223b.4\]]nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen 
[\[223b.5\]]bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 
[\[223b.6\]]'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud 
[\[223b.7\]]med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong dge ba'i chos can tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes 
[\[224a.2\]]par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur 
[\[224a.3\]]ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshangs par spyod pa tshul khrims dang 
[\[224a.4\]]ldan pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par 
[\[224a.5\]]smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshangs par spyod pa dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes 
[\[224a.6\]]brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul 
[\[224a.7\]]khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/mchog ji lta ba bzhin du phul dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_bzang 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mchod par 'os pa dang /_bstod par 'os pa dang /_rgya che ba dang /_ches mchog dang /_ches phul dang /_ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_ches bzang ba dang /_ches mdzes pa dang /_ches dge ba dang /_ches mchod par 'os pa dang /_
[\[224b.2\]]ches bstod par 'os pa dang /_ches rgya che ba yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga 
[\[224b.3\]]lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon 
[\[224b.4\]]nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer 
[\[224b.5\]]zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad 
[\[224b.6\]]ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis 
[\[224b.7\]]bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i 
[\[225a.2\]]chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig 
[\[225a.3\]]pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_
[\[225a.4\]]nga lta bu dge slong dge ba'i chos can tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces sprod pa las byung ba dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur 
[\[225a.5\]]pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur 
[\[225a.6\]]byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos 
[\[225a.7\]]rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu'i dge slong tshangs par spyod pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_
[\[225b.2\]]nga lta bu dge slong tshangs par spyod pa dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud 
[\[225b.3\]]med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 
[\[225b.4\]]'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mchog ji lta ba bzhin du phul dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mchod par 'os pa dang /_bstod 
[\[225b.5\]]par 'os pa dang /_rgya che ba dang /_ches mchog dang /_ches phul dang /_ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_ches bzang ba dang /_ches mdzes pa dang /_ches dge ba dang /_ches mchod par 'os pa dang /_ches bstod par 'os pa dang /_ches rgya che ba yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gis 
[\[225b.6\]]dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis 
[\[225b.7\]]bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta 
[\[226a.2\]]bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshangs 
[\[226a.3\]]par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs 
[\[226a.4\]]par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur 
[\[226a.5\]]rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa 
[\[226a.6\]]de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[226a.7\]]dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong dge ba'i chos can tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_
[\[226b.2\]]nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes 
[\[226b.3\]]zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di 
[\[226b.4\]]lta ste/_dge slong tshangs par spyod pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i 
[\[226b.5\]]sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshangs par spyod pa dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis 
[\[226b.6\]]bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos 
[\[226b.7\]]rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]zhing 'di skad ces nga lta bu zhes ni mi zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mchog la ji lta ba bzhin du/_phul dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mchod par 'os pa dang /_bstod par 'os pa dang /_rgya che ba dang /_
[\[227a.2\]]ches mchog dang /_ches phul dang /_ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_ches bzang ba dang /_ches mdzes pa dang /_ches dge ba dang /_ches mchod par 'os pa dang /_ches bstod par 'os pa dang /_ches rgya che ba yang de bzhin no//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam 
[\[227a.3\]]po bcu bdun pa/_dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di 
[\[227a.4\]]ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma 
[\[227a.5\]]legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad 
[\[227a.6\]]ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i 
[\[227a.7\]]gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 
[\[227b.2\]]dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med 
[\[227b.3\]]dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams 
[\[227b.4\]]kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes 
[\[227b.5\]]par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong dge ba'i chos can tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu 
[\[227b.6\]]zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong dge ba'i 
[\[227b.7\]]chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshangs par spyod pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur 
[\[228a.2\]]byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes 
[\[228a.3\]]par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshangs par spyod pa dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig 
[\[228a.4\]]pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam/_gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste 'di 
[\[228a.5\]]skad ces 'di lta ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes kyang mi zer la nga lta bu zhes kyang mi zer na nyes byas 
[\[228a.6\]]su 'gyur ro/_/mchog ji lta ba bzhin du phul dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mchod par 'os pa dang /_bstod par 'os pa dang /_rgya che ba dang /_ches mchog dang /_ches phul dang /_ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_ches 
[\[228a.7\]]bzang ba dang /_ches mdzes pa dang /_ches dge ba dang /_ches mchod par 'os pa dang /_ches bstod par 'os pa dang /_ches rgya che ba yang de bzhin no/_/nus pa la dge 'dun lhag ma gang yin pa de mi nus pa la nyes pa sbom po'o/_/skyes pa dang /_za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan gnyis 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]pa la yang nyes pa sbom po'o/_/nus pa la nyes pa sbom po gang yin pa de mi nus pa la nyes byas so/_/skyes pa dang /_za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan gnyis pa la yang nyes byas so/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la yang nyes byas so/_/nus pa la nyes byas gang yin pa de mi nus 
[\[228b.2\]]pa la yang nyes byas nyid do/_/skyes pa dang /_za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan gnyis pa la yang nyes byas nyid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la yang nyes byas nyid do/_/las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang sems 'khrug pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bsnyen 
[\[228b.3\]]bkur bsngags pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na mnyan yod na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po zhes bya ba 'dug ste/_de mnyan yod pa'i bram 
[\[228b.4\]]ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi gtam 'dre ba phebs par smra ba smos 'drin 'grogs bshes/_yid gcugs pa/_khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin pas gang yang rung ba dag la bu mo sbyin par bya ba yod pa de dag kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces nag po khyod kyis 
[\[228b.5\]]khyim che ge mo zhig shes sam zhes 'dri'o/_/des shes so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag de la nag po ji lta de na/_khye'u de mkhas pa dang le lo med pa dang /_sgrub phod pa dang /_khye'u de bu mo la bza' ba dang /_bgo ba mang po sbyin nus pa dang /_las chung ba yin nam zhes 'dri'o/_/gal te 
[\[228b.6\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos 'di skad ces khye'u de te por mi mkhas pa dang /_le lo can dang /_sgrub mi phod pa dang /_khye'u de bu mo de la bza' ba dang /_bgo ba mang po sbyin mi nus pa dang /_las che ba yin no zhes bstan par gyur na des na de dag bu mo de khye'u de la sbyin par mi byed do/_/gal te 
[\[228b.7\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos 'di skad ces khye'u de te por mkhas pa dang /_le lo med pa dang /_sgrub phod pa dang /_khye'u de bu mo la bza' ba dang /_bgo ba mang po sbyin nus pa dang /_las chung ba yin no zhes bstan par gyur na des na de dag bu mo de khye'u de la sbyin par byed do/_/gang yang 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]rung ba dag bu mo slong bar byed pa de dag kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces nag po khyod kyis khyim che ge mo zhig shes sam zhes 'dri'o/_/des shes so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag de la nag po ji lta de na bu mo de mkhas pa dang /_le lo med pa dang /_sgrub

[\[229a.3\]]des na de dag bu mo de slong bar mi byed do/_/gal te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos 'di skad ces bu mo de te por mkhas pa dang /_le lo med pa dang /_sgrub phod pa dang /_bu mo de bag yod pas khyim na gnas par nus pa yin no zhes bstan par gyur na des na de dag bu mo de slong bar byed do/_/

[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]bu mo bslang nyes par gyur na/_de dag 'di skad ces bdag cag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po la dris nas bu mo bslangs na bu mo de mi mkhas pa dang /_le lo can dang /_sgrub mi phod pa dang /_bu mo de bag yod pas/_khyim na gnas par mi nus pa yin pas gang dag la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin

[\[229b.5\]]rgyas la mngon par dad/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing /_des srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las phyir ldog_/ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_
[\[229b.6\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/_'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las phyir ldog go/_/des dus cung zhig khyim par khyim na 'dug nas dad pa snga ma de nyid rjes su spel 
[\[229b.7\]]zhing skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang mnyan yod pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dang sngon bshes pa nyid kyis de 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dag gi gtam 'dre ba/_phebs par smra ba smos 'drin 'grogs bshes yid gcugs pa/_khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin pas gang yang rung ba dag la bu mo sbyin par bya ba yod pa de dag kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po'i gan du song ste/_'di skad ces 'phags pa khyod

[\[230a.3\]]sam zhes 'dri'o/_/gal te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos 'di skad ces bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khye'u de te por mi mkhas pa dang /_le lo can dang /_sgrub mi phod pa dang /_khye'u de bu mo la bza' ba dang /_bgo ba mang po sbyin mi nus pa dang /_las che ba yin no zhes bstan par gyur na des na de 
[\[230a.4\]]dag bu mo de khye'u de la sbyin par mi byed do/_/gal te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos 'di skad ces bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khye'u de te por mkhas pa dang /_le lo med pa dang /_sgrub phod pa dang /_khye'u de bu mo la bza' ba dang /_bgo ba mang po sbyin nus pa dang /_las chung ba yin no zhes bstan

[\[230a.7\]]lo can dang /_sgrub mi phod pa dang /_bu mo de bag yod pas khyim na gnas par mi nus pa yin no zhes bstan par gyur na des na de dag bu mo de slong bar mi byed do/_/gal te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos 'di skad ces bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bu mo de te por mkhas pa dang /_le lo med pa dang /_
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]sgrub phod pa dang /_bu mo de bag yod pas khyim na gnas par nus pa yin no zhes bstan par gyur na des na de dag bu mo de slong bar byed do/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag pos de ltar bstan nas gang yang rung ba dag gis bu mo sbyin nyes par gyur na de dag 'di skad ces bdag cag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]

[\[230b.7\]]'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes mi bsngags pa rjod par byed do/_/gang yang rung ba dag gis bu mo bslang legs par gyur na de dag 'di skad ces bdag cag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po la dris nas bu mo bslangs na bu mo de mkhas pa dang /_le lo med pa dang /_sgrub phod pa dang /_bu mo de bag 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]yod pas khyim na gnas par nus pa yin pas gang dag la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po gtam 'dre ba/_phebs par smra ba smos 'drin/_'grogs bshes/_yid gcugs pa khyim du 'jug par byed par bdog pa de dag la yang 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bsngags pa rjod par byed 
[\[231a.2\]]do/_/de na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi bu nag po la mnyan yod na dus gcig na bsngags pa dang bsngags pa ma yin pa dag byung bar gyur to/_/de ni re zhig byung ba yin gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba ni ma mdzad do/_/sangs 
[\[231a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag bud med la skyes pa'i tshig dang /_skyes pa la bud med kyi tshig gis chung ma nyid dam/_mdza' na mo nyid du smyan byed nas mu stegs can dag 
[\[231a.4\]]shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge slong 'di dag ni bud med la skyes pa'i tshig dang /_skyes pa la bud med kyi tshig gis chung ma nyid dang /_mdza' na mo nyid du smyan byed de/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par ma blangs pa gzhan dag kyang bud med la skyes pa'i tshig 
[\[231a.5\]]dang /_skyes pa la bud med kyi tshig gis chung ma nyid dam/_mdza' na mo nyid du smyan byed na/_shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge slong rnams dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par ma blangs pa rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/_bsam pa ni ci yod/_tha dad du bya 
[\[231a.6\]]ba ni ci yod/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_
[\[231a.7\]]gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang gnyis gzigs pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun sdud par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis kun shes pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir dang /_ngas 'dul ba 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]la bslab pa'i gzhi legs par bcas par 'gyur ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa/_mkhyen kyang mi rmed pa/_dus su rmed pa/_dus las yol bar mi rmed pa/_don dang ldan pa rmed pa/_don dang mi 
[\[231b.2\]]ldan par mi rmed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde rnams la 
[\[231b.3\]]rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba 
[\[231b.4\]]ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[231b.5\]]bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang bud med la skyes pa'i tshig dang /_skyes pa la bud med kyi tshig gis chung ma nyid dam/_mdza' na mo nyid du smyan byed na tha na thang 
[\[231b.6\]]'ga' phrad pa la yang rung ste dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de dang 'dra ba gang yin pa'o/_/bud med la skyes pa'i tshig dang zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i bsam pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bud med la rjod par byed pas so/_/skyes pa la 
[\[231b.7\]]bud med kyi tshig gis shes bya ba ni bud med kyi kun tu spyad pa'i bsam pa'i tshig gang yin pa de skyes pa la rjod par byed pas so/_/chung ma nyid dam mdza' na mo nyid du zhes bya ba ni chung ma bdun dang /_mdza' na mo bcu nyid du'o/_/chung ma bdun gang zhe na/_chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa dang /_dang sam du 'dus pa dang /_gos zas kyis 'tshos pa dang /_kha dum pa dang /_thang 'ga' phrad pa ni bdun pa'o/_/de la chu tshigs kyis byin pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang pha ma dag gis skyes 
[\[232a.2\]]pa la byin nas/_khyod kyi chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mo byos shig ces chu tshigs kyis byin zhing de de'i chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor gyur nas/_des 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa dag gis phyir spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa shin tu bsrungs pa/_sbas pa shin tu sbas pa de ni chu tshigs kyis 
[\[232a.3\]]byin pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o/_/rin chas nyos pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang skyes pas 'di bdag gi chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mo bya'o zhes pha ma dag las rin chas nyos shing de de'i chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor gyur nas des 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa dag gi phyir spyod 
[\[232a.4\]]par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa shin tu bsrungs pa/_sbas pa shin tu sbas pa de ni rin chas nyos pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o/_/btsan phrogs su thob pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur bas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_pha 
[\[232a.5\]]rol gyi yul 'khor dang /_pha rol gyi yul du song nas ma phebs pa phab cing /_phebs par gnas nas thob rgyal du sgrogs par byed pa'i tshe de na skyes pas rgyal po rgyal mtshan du byas nas bud med dang gzhon nu ma gang yin pa 'di bdag gi chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mo bya'o zhes phrogs 
[\[232a.6\]]shing de de'i chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor gyur nas des 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa dag gi phyir spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa shin tu bsrungs pa/_sbas pa shin tu sbas pa/_de ni btsan phrogs su thob pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang btsan phrogs su thob pa'i chung ma gang 
[\[232a.7\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chom rkun pa dag gis grong gzhom pa'am/_grong khyer gzhom pa'am/_ljongs gzhom pa byas te/_rang gi mgo rgyal mtshan du byas nas/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang yin pa 'di bdag gi chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mo bya'o zhes phrogs shing de de'i chung ma skye dgu'i 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]bdag mor gyur nas/_des 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa dag gi phyir spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa shin tu bsrungs pa/_sbas pa shin tu sbas pa/_de ni btsan phrogs su thob pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o/_/dang sam du 'dus pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang 
[\[232b.2\]]rang gi dad pa dang /_gcugs pa dang /_dga' bas skyes pa'i gan du 'ongs te/_'di skad ces rje'i sras tshur spyon khyod bdag gi khyim thab mdzod cig dang bdag gis khyod kyi btsun mo skye dgu'i bdag mo bgyi'o zhes zer zhing de de'i chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor gyur nas des 'di la gzhan dag 
[\[232b.3\]]'dod pa dag gi phyir spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa shin tu bsrungs pa/_sbas pa shin tu sbas pa/_de ni dang sam du 'dus pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o/_/gos zas kyis 'tshos pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang skyes pa'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces rje'i sras tshur 
[\[232b.4\]]spyon/_khyod kyis bdag la gos dang zas stsol cig dang /_bdag gis khyod kyi btsun mo skye dgu'i bdag mo bgyi'o/_/zhes zer zhing de de'i chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor gyur nas des 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa dag gi phyir spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa shin tu bsrungs pa/_sbas 
[\[232b.5\]]pa shin tu sbas pa/_de ni gos zas kyis 'tshos pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o/_/kha dum pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang skyes pa'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces rje'i sras tshur spyon/_khyod kyi nor gang lags pa de dang bdag gi nor gang lags pa de dag gcig tu bsdus 
[\[232b.6\]]te/_bdag cag gnyis mnyam du 'tsho bar bgyi zhing /_bdag cag gnyis las khye'u 'am/_bu mo gang dag mchis par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu 'am/_mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag bgyis nas 'di de gnyis

[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]sbas pa shin tu sbas pa/_de ni kha dum pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o/_/thang 'ga' phrad pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang skyes pas deng bdag 'di dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam nas de'i dus su glas shing yud tsam phrad par gyur nas des

[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ma gang gi pha ma dang /_khyim thab shi zhing dus la bab par gyur tam/_rgyal pos bcings sam/_bsad dam/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan dang /_yul gzhan du bros par gyur tam/_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen par

[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]mdza' na mo gang zhe na/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang gi pha ma dang /_khyim thab shi zhing dus la bab par gyur tam/_rgyal pos bcings sam/_bsad dam/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan dang /_yul gzhan du bros par gyur tam/_smyos pa dang /_

[\[234a.4\]]bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo gang zhe na/_nye du zhes bya ba ni khyim bdun pa tshun chad las brten pa ni nye du yin la de phan cad ni nye du ma yin te/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang gi pha ma dang /_khyim thab shi zhing dus la bab par gyur tam/_rgyal pos bcings sam/_bsad dam/_rgyal

[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rigs gcig pa'i gan na gnas shing rigs gcig pas de 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa dag gi phyir spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa shin tu bsrungs pa/_sbas pa shin tu sbas pa/_de ni rigs kyis bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo zhes bya'o/_/rus chags kyis bsrungs pa'i mdza' 
[\[234b.2\]]na mo gang zhe na/_rus zhes bya ba ni ku sa'i rigs dang /_bad sa'i rigs dang /_shan di la'i rigs dang /_b+ha ra dwa dza'i rigs dang /_lnga pa'i rigs dang /_nye lnga'i rigs dang /_gau ta ma'i rigs te/_bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang gi pha ma dang khyim thab shi zhing dus la bab par gyur

[\[234b.5\]]rgyu mo dang /_khyim thab kyi mal gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_chos bzhin spyod pa de ni rnam par 'khrug pa med pa'i mdza' na mo zhes bya'o/_/smyan zhes bya ba ni phrin byed pa'o/_/byed na zhes bya ba ni byed par gyur na'o/_/tha na thang 'ga' phrad pa la yang rung ste zhes bya ba ni tha na yud tsam la 
[\[234b.6\]]yang rung ste'o/_/dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na//_//bar sdom la/_spring ba'i phrin dang dge slong gnyis/_/spyod lam dang ni sngon 'gro dang /_/bdag dang bdag min yul phyogs tshigs/_/spring yig lag yig chung ma'o/_/dge 
[\[234b.7\]]slong gis bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te bdag nyid kyis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /_bdag nyid kyis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/_bdag nyid kyis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing mngags 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]pas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/_mngags pas phrin phar skyel bar byed cing bdag nyid kyis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag nyid

[\[235a.4\]]mngags pa las bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/_mngags pas phrin phar skyel bar byed cing bdag nyid kyis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mngags pa las bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/_mngags pas phrin phar skyel bar byed cing

[\[235a.7\]]nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/_mngags pas mngags pas phrin phar skyel bar byed cing bdag nyid kyis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis mngags pas mngags pa las bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/_mngags pas mngags pas phrin phar 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]yang skyel bar byed cing /_mngags pas mngags pas phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gnyis kyis spring ba mnos te/_gnyi gas phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing gnyi gas phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na gnyi ga la dge 'dun lhag mar 
[\[235b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong gnyis kyis gnyi gas spring ba mnos te/_de na gcig 'di skad ces re zhig kho bo'i don du phrin phar yang skyol la phrin tshur yang skyol cig ces zer nas/_des de'i don du phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na gnyi ga la dge 'dun lhag 
[\[235b.3\]]mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gnyis kyis gnyi gas spring ba mnos te/_de na gcig 'di skad ces kho bo ni phrin phar ni skyel lo/_/phrin tshur ni mi skyel lo zhes zer na de gnyis las gang phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed pa de la ni dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur 
[\[235b.4\]]ro/_/gang phrin phar ni skyel bar byed la phrin tshur ni skyel bar mi byed pa de la ni nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gnyis kyis gnyi gas spring ba mnos te/_de na gcig 'di skad ces kho bo ni phrin phar yang mi skyel la phrin tshur yang mi skyel lo/_/zhes zer na de gnyis 
[\[235b.5\]]las gang phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed pa de la ni dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur la/_gang phrin phar yang skyel bar mi byed la/_phrin tshur yang skyel bar mi byed pa de la ni nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gnyis kyis gnyi gas spring ba mnos 
[\[235b.6\]]te/_gnyi gas phrin phar ni skyel bar byed la/_phrin tshur ni skyel bar mi byed na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom po gnyis gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gnyis kyis gnyi gas spring ba mnos te/_de na gnyi ga 'di skad ces bdag cag gnyi ga phrin phar yang skyel bar yang mi byed la/_phrin 
[\[235b.7\]]tshur yang skyel bar mi byed do zhes zer na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom po re rer 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gcig gis khyim pa gcig dang khyim pa mo gcig 'gron lam du 'gro ba na de na gal te khyim pa de dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa khyod khyim pa mo 'di la 'di skad ces khyod khyim pa 'di'i 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]chung ma 'am/_mdza' na mo 'am/_smos 'drin gyis shig ces smra nus sam zhes [(]zar [,]zer [)]ram/_yang na khyim pa mo de dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa khyod khyim pa 'di la 'di skad ces khyod khyim pa mo 'di'i khyo 'am/_mdza' na po 'am/_smos 'drin gyis 
[\[236a.2\]]shig ces smra nus sam zhes zer ba la dge slong des spring ba rnam pa de lta bu de mnos te/_phrin phar skyel bar byed dam/_phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba la ji lta ba bzhin du sdod pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dag la yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[236a.3\]]dge slong gcig dang /_khyim pa gcig dang /_khyim pa mo gcig la ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong gnyis dang /_khyim pa gnyis dang /_khyim pa mo gnyis dang /_dge slong rab tu mang po dang /_khyim pa rab tu mang po dang /_khyim pa mo rab tu mang po la yang de bzhin du ci rigs par 
[\[236a.4\]]rgyas par sbyar ro/_/dge slong mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong dang /_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gnyis las mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis spring ba mnos te/_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge slong gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed 
[\[236a.5\]]na/_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis spring ba mnos te/_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong la nyes pa 
[\[236a.6\]]sbom po gnyis su 'gyur la/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la ni nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis spring ba mnos te/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing mdun du 'gro ba'i dge slong gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed 
[\[236a.7\]]na/_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong la nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur la/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la ni nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis spring ba mnos te/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing phyi bzhin 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong la nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur la/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la ni nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong dang /_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gnyis 
[\[236b.2\]]las phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis spring ba mnos te/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge 
[\[236b.3\]]sbyong gis spring ba mnos te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur la/_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong la ni nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/
[\[236b.4\]]phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis spring ba mnos te mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur la/_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong la ni nyes pa 
[\[236b.5\]]sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gis spring ba mnos te/_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /_mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong la nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur 
[\[236b.6\]]la mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong la ni nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag ni gnyis te/_bdag po dang /_bdag po ma yin pa'o/_/de la bdag po zhes bya ba ni bu mo sbyin pa dang /_'phrog pa'i bdag por gyur cing bla'i grwa'i nang du song yang rung /_'og gzu'i nang du song 
[\[236b.7\]]yang rung ste de'i tshig yang dag pa ma yin pa yang gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bdag po zhes bya'o/_/bdag po ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni bu mo sbyin pa dang /_'phrog pa'i bdag por gyur pa ma yin zhing bla'i grwa'i nang du song yang rung /_'og gzu'i nang du song yang rung ste/_de'i 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]tshig yang dag pa yang gzung bar 'os par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bdag po ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gis bdag po las spring ba mnos te/_bdag po la phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing bdag po la phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[237a.2\]]dge slong gis bdag po las spring ba mnos te/_bdag po la phrin phar skyel bar byed cing bdag po ma yin pa la phrin tshur skyel bar byed na nyes pa sbom po gnyis dang /_nyes byas gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag po las spring ba mnos te/_bdag po ma yin pa la phrin phar skyel bar 
[\[237a.3\]]byed cing bdag po la phrin tshur skyel bar byed na nyes pa sbom po gnyis dang /_nyes byas gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag po las spring ba mnos te/_bdag po ma yin pa la phrin phar skyel bar byed cing bdag po ma yin pa la phrin tshur skyel bar byed na nyes pa sbom po gcig dang /_
[\[237a.4\]]nyes byas gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag po ma yin pa las spring ba mnos te/_bdag po ma yin pa la phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing bdag po ma yin pa la phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na nyes byas gsum du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag po ma yin pa las spring ba 
[\[237a.5\]]mnos te/_bdag po la phrin phar skyel bar byed cing bdag po ma yin pa la phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/_nyes pa sbom po gcig dang /_nyes byas gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag po ma yin pa las spring ba mnos te bdag po ma yin pa la phrin phar skyel bar byed cing bdag po la 
[\[237a.6\]]phrin tshur skyel bar byed na nyes pa sbom po gcig dang /_nyes byas gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bdag po ma yin pa las spring ba mnos te bdag po la phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing bdag po la phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na nyes pa sbom po gnyis dang /_nyes byas gcig tu 
[\[237a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyu gsum gyis spring ba'i phrin tshur bskyal bar 'gyur la phar bskyal bar ni mi 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_mtshan mas so/_/ji ltar yul phyogs kyis she na/_gang gi tshe kho bo skyed mos tshal lam/_'dun sa 'am/_lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]na 'dug pa khyod kyis mthong ba de'i tshe bya ba de byas par khyod kyis shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/_de ltar yul phyogs kyis so/_/ji ltar brdas she na/_gang gi tshe kho bo snga dro 'am/_gung tshigs sam/_phyem 'bred na khyod kyis mthong ba de'i tshe bya ba de byas par khyod kyis shes par gyis shig ces 
[\[237b.2\]]bya ba ste de ltar brdas so/_/ji ltar mtshan mas she na/_gang gi tshe kho bo skra dang /_kha spu bregs nas ring por ma lon pa'am/_snam sbyar dmar ser gyon pa 'am/_lhung bzed zha nye'i dbyar 'dab can nam/_khar ba lcags sbubs can nam/_zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dam/_'bru mar gyi lhung bzed 
[\[237b.3\]]dam/_sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed dam/_bu ram gyi dbu ba'i lhung bzed thogs pa khyod kyis mthong ba de'i tshe bya ba de byas par khyod kyis shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/_de ltar mtshan mas so/_/rgyu gsum gyis ni spring ba'i phrin phar bskyal bar yang 'gyur la phrin tshur bskyal bar yang 'gyur te/_gsum 
[\[237b.4\]]gang zhe na/_tshig dang /_spring yig dang /_lag yig gis so/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te/_tshig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /_tshig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te tshig gis phrin phar 
[\[237b.5\]]skyel bar yang byed cing /_spring yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing tshig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos 
[\[237b.6\]]te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar yang byed cing /_spring yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar yang byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_mtshan mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 
[\[237b.7\]]'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te tshig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing tshig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te tshig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing lag yig gis phrin tshur 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te/_lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /_tshig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te/_lag yig gis 
[\[238a.2\]]phrin phar skyel bar byed cing lag yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar yang byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis tshig gis spring ba mnos te lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_mtshan mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 
[\[238a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing spring yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing tshig 
[\[238a.4\]]gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te tshig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing spring yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te tshig gis 
[\[238a.5\]]phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing tshig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_mtshan mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag 
[\[238a.6\]]mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing spring yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing 
[\[238a.7\]]lag yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing spring yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]mnos te lag yig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing lag yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis spring yig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_mtshan mas phrin tshur 
[\[238b.2\]]skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te/_lag yig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing lag yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te lag yig gis 
[\[238b.3\]]phrin phar skyel bar byed cing tshig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te tshig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing lag yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig 
[\[238b.4\]]gis spring ba mnos te tshig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing tshig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te/_lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_mtshan mas phrin 
[\[238b.5\]]tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te lag yig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing lag yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te lag 
[\[238b.6\]]yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing spring yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing lag yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[238b.7\]]slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te spring yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing spring yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis lag yig gis spring ba mnos te/_lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing yul phyogs dang /_brda dang /_
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]mtshan mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_dge slong gis chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa/_
[\[239a.2\]]'thabs pa nyid kyi mod yin la 'thabs pa'i 'og ma yin pa dang /_dum pa ma bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum ma gtor ba dang /_cho ga ma btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par ma bsgrags pa dang /_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byed cing mthun par gyur na nyes byas gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/
[\[239a.3\]]dge slong gis chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa de dag nyid 'thabs pa nyid kyi mod dang 'thabs pa'i 'og yin la/_dum pa ma bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum ma gtor ba dang /_cho ga ma btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin 
[\[239a.4\]]par ma bsgrags pa dang /_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byed cing mthun par gyur na nyes byas gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa de dag nyid 'thabs pa nyid kyi mod dang /_
[\[239a.5\]]'thabs pa'i 'og dang /_dum pa bcad pa yin la/_rde'u gsum ma gtor ba dang /_cho ga ma btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par ma bsgrags pa dang /_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byed cing mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chung ma dang po 
[\[239a.6\]]gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa 'thabs pa nyid kyi mod dang /_'thabs pa'i 'og dang /_dum pa bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum gtor ba yin la/_cho ga ma btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par ma bsgrags pa dang /_dril ma 
[\[239a.7\]]bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byed cing mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /_nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa 'thabs pa nyid kyi mod dang /_'thabs pa'i 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]'og dang /_dum pa bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum gtor ba dang /_cho ga btang ba yin la/_chung ma ma yin par ma bsgrags pa dang /_dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byed cing mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /_nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chung ma 
[\[239b.2\]]dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa 'thabs pa nyid kyi mod dang /_'thabs pa'i 'og dang /_dum pa bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum gtor ba dang /_cho ga btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par bsgrags pa yin la/_dril ma bsgrags 
[\[239b.3\]]pa dag gi sdums byed cing mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /_nyes pa sbom po gsum dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /_rin chas nyos pa dang /_btsan phrogs su thob pa 'thabs pa nyid kyi mod dang /_'thabs 
[\[239b.4\]]pa'i 'og dang /_dum pa bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum gtor ba dang /_cho ga btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par bsgrags pa dang /_dril bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byed cing mthun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /_nyes pa sbom po bzhi dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[239b.5\]]slong gis chung ma de las gzhan pa 'thabs pa nyid kyi mod dang /_'thabs pa'i 'og dang /_dum pa bcad pa dang /_rde'u gsum gtor ba dang /_cho ga btang ba dang /_chung ma ma yin par bsgrags pa dang /_dril bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byed cing mthun par gyur na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur 
[\[239b.6\]]ro/_/dge slong khyim du 'gro bas khyim du song ste 'di skad ces ci'i phyir khye'u chen po 'di'i khyim mi dbub ces zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir bu mo chen mo 'di mi bkri zhes zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir khye'u 'di dang bu mo 'di mi sprad ces zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[239b.7\]]ci'i phyir khye'u 'di gyos po'i gan du mi 'gro zhes zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir bu mo 'di gyos po'i gan du mi bkri zhes zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong khyim du 'gro bas de ltar de dang mthun pa'i tshig rjod na thams cad du nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/smyan byed pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[240a.2\]]de'i tshe na dge slong rnams la khang pa 'di lta bur mang ba nyid du gyur te/_kha cig ni khang pa 'di ha cang [{]rings so [,]ring ngo  [}]zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud do/_/kha cig ni khang pa 'di ha cang thungs so/_/'di ha cang yangs so/_/'di ha cang dog go/_/'di ha cang rnyings so/_/'di ha cang stobs 
[\[240a.3\]]chung ngo /_/'di ha cang brtsig nyes so zhes de bor nas/_gzhan byed du 'jug go/_/de dag khang pa byed pa dang /_byed du 'jud pas bya ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur nas lung mnod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la byed pa gtong zhing /_yang dang yang du rtsa 
[\[240a.4\]]ba dang /_shing dang /_mi blas dang /_shing rta'i las slong bar byed pas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis kha bya bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mnyan yod na shar gyi kun dga'i ra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung 
[\[240a.5\]]chen pos dge slong rab tu mang po dag la khang pa de lta bur mang ba nyid du gyur pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang phyi dro nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 
[\[240a.6\]]'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa da ltar dge slong rnams la khang pa 'di lta bur mang ba nyid du gyur te/_kha cig ni khang pa 'di ha cang [{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/zhes de bor nas gzhan bgyid du 
[\[240a.7\]]stsal to/_/kha cig ni khang pa 'di ha cang thungs so/_/'di ha cang yangs so/_/'di ha cang dog go/_/'di ha cang rnyings so/_/'di ha cang stobs chung ngo /_/'di ha cang brtsig nongs so/_/zhes de bor nas gzhan bgyid du stsal to/_/de dag khang pa bgyid pa dang /_bgyid du stsal bas 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]bya ba dang /_byed pa mang bar gyur nas lung mnod pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bgyid pa gtong zhing /_yang dang yang du ran dang /_zhugs shing dang /_mi blas dang /_shing rta'i las slong bar bgyid pas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis kha 
[\[240b.2\]]bgyi bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du dge slong rnams la khang pa dang /_khang pa'i gzhi legs par bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[240b.3\]]kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir lhung 
[\[240b.4\]]bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te ljongs rgyur song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po dag la 
[\[240b.5\]]rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed cag la khang pa 'di lta bur mang ba nyid du gyur te/_kha cig ni khang pa 'di ha cang [{]rings so [,]ring ngo  [}]zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud/_kha cig ni khang pa 'di ha cang thungs so/_/'di ha cang yangs so/_/'di ha cang dog go/_/'di ha cang rnyings so/_/'di ha cang 
[\[240b.6\]]stobs chung ngo /_/'di ha cang brtsig nyes so zhes de bor nas gzhan byed du 'jud pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang dgang dka' ba rnam par smad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[240b.7\]]'dod pa chung ba'i bsngags pa brjod de/_chog shes pa dang /_gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_tshod shes pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis bdag gis bslangs 
[\[241a.2\]]pa bdag po med pa/_bdag gi phyir khang pa rtsig tu 'jud na dge slong des khang pa tshad bzhin du rtsig tu chug shig_/de la khang pa'i tshad ni 'di yin te/_nang srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bcu gnyis/_zheng du mtho bdun no/_/gzhi blta ba'i phyir dge slong des dge slong dag bkri 
[\[241a.3\]]bar bya'o/_/khrid pa'i dge slong dag gis kyang gzhi rung ba dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang /_brtsam du rung bar blta bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis gzhi mi rung ba'am/_rtsod pa dang bcas pa 'am/_brtsam du mi rung bar bdag gis bslangs pa bdag po med pa bdag gi phyir khang 
[\[241a.4\]]pa rtsig tu 'jud dam gzhi blta ba'i phyir dge slong dag kyang mi khrid dam/_dge slong khrid pa dag la gzhi mi ston tam/_tshad las 'das na dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/bdag gis bslangs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa las byung ba'i slong mo la la 
[\[241a.5\]]las ni shing /_la la las ni rtswa/_la la las ni mi blas/_la la las ni shing rta'i las bslangs pa'o/_/bdag po med pa zhes bya ba ni gang la bdag po skyes pa'am bud med dam ma ning med pa'o/_/bdag gi phyir zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la bsngos te'o/_/khang pa zhes bya ba ni gang du 
[\[241a.6\]]spyod lam bzhi po 'chag pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dag shong ba'o/_/rtsig tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan gyis so/_/dge slong des khang pa tshad bzhin du rtsig tu chug shig_/de la khang pa'i tshad ni 'di yin te/_nang srid du bde bar gshegs 
[\[241a.7\]]pa'i mtho'i mtho bcu gnyis zheng du mtho bdun no zhes bya ba la bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa ste/_de'i mtho bcu gnyis gang dag yin pa de dag la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru'i khru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_nang gi srid du tshad dang ldan pa'i khru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bdun gang dag yin pa de dag la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru'i khru phyed dang bcu gcig ste/_nang gi zheng du khru phyed dang bcu gcig go/_/gzhi blta ba'i phyir dge slong des dge slong dag bkri bar bya'o zhes bya ba la/_gzhi blta ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sa gzhi rung ba dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang /_
[\[241b.2\]]brtsam du rung ba nyid blta ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/dge slong dag bkri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag yod pa dag yin gyi ji tsam gyis gzhi de mig gis bltas par 'gyur ba'i dge slong de tsam bkri bar bya ba ni ma yin no/_/
[\[241b.3\]]gal te de na sbrul gyi gnas sam/_sdig pa'i gnas sam/_sril gyi gnas sam/_grog ma'i gnas yod pa yin na mi rung ba yin pa'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te rung ba'i yin na de'i 'og tu nye bar brtag par bya ste gal te rgyal po'i gzhi'am/_mchod rten gyi gzhi 'am/_khyim 
[\[241b.4\]]bdag gi gzhi 'am/_mu stegs can gyi gzhi 'am/_dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngam/_shing ljon pa gcad par bya ba yod na/_rtsod pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhi rung ba dang /_rtsod pa med pa yin na de'i nyen kor 'dom gang kho ra khor yug nye bar 
[\[241b.5\]]brtag par bya ste/_gal te de na gzhi chu klung la rten tam/_khron pa la rten tam/_lam la rten tam/_ngam grog la rten pa yin na/_brtsam du mi rung ba'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhi de rung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin na dge slong des 
[\[241b.6\]]gtsug lag khang du song ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong dag la bskul nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la mchil lham phud de/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas rgan rims bzhin du phyag 'tshal te 
[\[241b.7\]]rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi bas khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba zhig btsal te/_
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di 
[\[242a.2\]]zhes bgyi ba la khang pa'i gzhi rung ba rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge slong de dag gis kyang dge slong de la dad pas sam yid ches pas 'gro bar mi bya bar 'di ltar dge 'dun thams cad der 'gro 
[\[242a.3\]]bar bya ba'am/_dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong dag gtang bar bya'o/_/de dag gis gzhi de mig gis blta bar bya zhing /_gal te de na sbrul gyi gnas sam/_sdig pa'i gnas sam/_sril gyi gnas sam/_grog ma'i gnas yod pa yin na mi rung ba yin pa'i phyir bstan 
[\[242a.4\]]par mi bya'o/_/gal te rung ba yin na de'i 'og tu nye bar brtag par bya ste/_gal te rgyal po'i gzhi'am/_mchod rten gyi gzhi 'am/_khyim bdag gi gzhi 'am/_mu stegs can gyi gzhi 'am/_dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngam/_shing ljon pa gcad par bya ba yod na rtsod pa dang bcas 
[\[242a.5\]]pa yin pa'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhi rung ba dang /_rtsod pa med pa yin na de'i nyen kor 'dom gang kho ra khor yug nye bar brtag par bya ste/_gal te de na gzhi chu klung la rten tam/_khron pa la rten tam/_lam la rten tam/_ngam grog la rten pa yin na brtsam du 
[\[242a.6\]]mi rung ba'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhi de rung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin na de'i tshe dge slong de dag gis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su gus pa dang bcas pas 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/gnas brtan dag gzhi de rung ba dang /_
[\[242a.7\]]rtsod pa ma mchis pa dang /_brtsam du rung ba lags kyis da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dis khang pa'i gzhi 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]rung ba rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba zhig btsal te/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis 
[\[242b.2\]]gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khang pa'i gzhi rung ba rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lag gi 
[\[242b.3\]]bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dis khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa brtsam du rung ba zhig btsal te/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong
