[\[242b.4\]]lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsol na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang 
[\[242b.5\]]ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung 
[\[242b.6\]]bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla gang la khang pa'i gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa med pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa byin pa des khang pa rtsig tu gzhug par bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/khrid pa'i dge slong dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni der dge slong gang 
[\[242b.7\]]dag khrid pa dag gis kyang ngo /_/gzhi zhes bya ba ni khang pa'i dbang du byas pa'i gzhi gang yin pa'o/_/rung ba zhes bya ba ni sbrul gyi gnas dang /_sdig pa'i gnas la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/_/rtsod pa med pa zhes bya ba ni thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]brtsam du rung bar zhes bya ba ni de'i nyen kor 'dom gang kho ra khor yug na skyon med par ro/_/blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni so sor brtag par bya ba'o/_/gal te dge slong gis gzhi mi rung ba'am zhes bya ba ni sbrul dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i gnas kyi shas che ba'o/_/
[\[243a.2\]]rtsod pa dang bcas pa 'am zhes bya ba ni thab mo dang bcas pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang bcas pa dang rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang /_'gyed pa dang bcas pa'o/_/brtsam du mi rung bar zhes bya ba ni gang gi nyen kor 'dom gang kho ra khor yug med par ro/_/bdag gis bslangs pa bdag 
[\[243a.3\]]po med pa bdag gi phyir khang pa rtsig tu 'jud dam/_gzhi blta ba'i phyir dge slong dag kyang mi khrid dam/_dge slong khrid pa dag la gzhi mi ston tam/_tshad las 'das na zhes bya ba ni tshad ji skad bstan pa de las lhag par rtsig tu 'jud na'o/_/dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma 
[\[243a.4\]]bzhin te/_des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na dge slong gis khang pa byed du 'jud cing mi rung bar byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa dang bcas par byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brtsam du mi 
[\[243a.5\]]rung bar byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma bstan par byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tshad las 'das par byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las 'das pa byed du 'jud na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge 
[\[243a.6\]]slong gi gan du song ste 'di skad ces kho bo'i phyir khang pa rung ba/_rtsod pa med pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa tshad dang ldan pa byed du chug shig ces smras pa las des de'i phyir khang pa byed du 'jud cing mi rung bar byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa dang 
[\[243a.7\]]bcas par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brtsam du mi rung bar byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma bstan par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tshad las 'das par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]sbom por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las 'das par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/gal te de de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces legs par byas so/_/shin tu byas so/_/ngas khyod la 'di skad bsgo'o zhes zer zhing des kyang de la shing ngam/_rtswa 'am/_
[\[243b.2\]]lci ba'am/_sa 'jim 'bul bar byed la/_gal te des mi rung bar byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa dang bcas par byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brtsam du mi rung bar byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma bstan 
[\[243b.3\]]par byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tshad las 'das par byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las 'das par byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/gal te de de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces legs par ma byas so/_/
[\[243b.4\]]shin tu ma byas so/_/ngas khyod la 'di ltar ma bsgo'o zhes zer zhing des de la shing ngam/_rtswa 'am/_lci ba'am/_sa 'jim 'bul bar mi byed la/_gal te des mi rung bar byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa dang bcas par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes 
[\[243b.5\]]pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brtsam du mi rung bar byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma bstan par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/tshad las 'das par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las 
[\[243b.6\]]'das par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/byas pa rnyed pa dang /_byas pa la longs spyod pa dag la ni ltung ba med do/_/rnying pa 'chos pa la yang ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la 
[\[243b.7\]]ltung ba med do/_/khang pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bI na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa'i gtsug lag khang dag na gnas shing de dag de dag na gnas pa na dga' 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]bo nye dga' ltos shig_/gtsug lag khang 'di ni gyong grugs su gyur pa yin no/_/'di ni gas pa yin no/_/'di ni mtshams nyams pa yin no/_/'di ni ngos nyams pa yin no/_/'di ni ma mo'i khyim 'dra ba yin no zhes 'phya bar byed pa dang dge slong rnams kyis de 
[\[244a.2\]]dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag re zhig gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa'i gtsug lag khang dag na gnas shing /_khyed cag gis rdo yang sgreng bar mi nus la 'on kyang 'phya bar byed do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_de dag nga rgyal gyis khengs par gyur nas/_phan tshun smras par 
[\[244a.3\]]brtsams pa/_dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag gis bdag cag la khyed cag re zhig gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa'i gtsug lag khang dag na gnas shing /_khyed cag gis rdo yang sgreng bar mi nus la 'on kyang 'phya bar byed do/_/zhes ha cang zil gyis mnan gyis tshur 
[\[244a.4\]]sheg_/bdag cag gis sngon lhung bzed nag po can gang gis kyang byed du ma bcug pa'i gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang byed du gzhug go/_/gal te bdag cag thams cad lag gi bla la brtson par gyur na lhung bzed nag po can dag rtag pa kho nar bdag cag la 
[\[244a.5\]]skabs tshol bas/_de dag gis drug sde dag thams cad lag gi bla la zhugs so zhes skabs rnyed par yang 'gyur la/_bdag cag gi slong mo'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag tu yang brel ba dag gi skyon brjod nas rjes su 'jug par byed par 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag gis bdag cag 
[\[244a.6\]]gi nang na mkhas pa/_spyod pa gsal ba/_khab gzhug par gtun bu 'dzud nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du bdag cag dong la spro ba bskyed par bya gor ma chag na/_de'i phyir bdag cag gi nang na mkhas pa spyod pa gsal ba/_khab gzhug par gtun bu 'jud par nus pa gang yin/_
[\[244a.7\]]bdag cag gi nang na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa mkhas pa/_spyod pa gsal ba/_khab gzhug par gtun bu 'jud nus pa yin gyis bdag cag de'i gan du 'dong la spro ba bskyed par bya'o/_/zhes de dag 'dun pa'i gan du dong ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa lhung bzed nag po can 'di 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dag gis bdag cag la khyed cag re zhig gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa'i gtsug lag khang dag na gnas shing khyed cag gis rdo yang sgreng bar mi nus la/_'on kyang 'phya bar byed do zhes ha cang zil gyis mnan nas/_kho bo cag 'di snyam du sems te/_lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag gis 
[\[244b.2\]]bdag cag la khyed cag re zhig gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa'i gtsug lag khang dag na gnas shing khyed cag gis rdo yang [(]sgrang [,]sgreng [)]bar mi nus la/_'on kyang 'phya bar byed do zhes ha cang zil gyis mnan gyis tshur sheg_/bdag cag gis sngon lhung bzed nag po can gang gis kyang byed du ma bcug pa'i 
[\[244b.3\]]gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang byed du gzhug go/_/gal te bdag cag thams cad lag gi bla la brtson par gyur na lhung bzed nag po can dag rtag pa kho nar bdag cag la skabs tshol bas de dag gis drug sde dag thams cad lag gi bla la zhugs so zhes skabs rnyed par 
[\[244b.4\]]yang 'gyur la/_bdag cag gi slong mo'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag tu yang brel ba dag gi skyon brjod nas rjes su 'jug par byed par 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag gis bdag cag gi nang na mkhas pa/_spyod pa gsal ba/_khab gzhug par gtun bu 'jud nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du 
[\[244b.5\]]bdag cag dong la spro ba bskyed par bya gor ma chag na/_de'i phyir bdag cag gi nang na mkhas pa/_spyod pa gsal ba/_khab gzhug par gtun bu 'dzud nus pa gang yin/_bdag cag gi nang na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa mkhas pa/_spyod pa gsal ba/_khab gzhug par gtun bu 'dzud nus pa 
[\[244b.6\]]yin gyis bdag cag de'i gan du dong la spro ba bskyed par bya'o snyam nas/_bdag cag gis tshe dang ldan pa gtsug lag khang gi phyir spro bar bya zhing khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis lhung bzed nag po can dag yan lag 'dis zil gyis non par gyis shig_/'dun pas smras pa/_thabs yin 
[\[244b.7\]]gyis de ltar bya'o/_/de dag yid dga' nas dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa yang gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/_'dug nas thabs ci yod na des dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang 'grub par 'gyur snyam du sems pa la zhugs so/_/des su 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]zhig su la mngon par dad snyam du rnam par dpyad par brtsams pa dang /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_re zhig 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa yin/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe 
[\[245a.2\]]dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan 
[\[245a.3\]]pa bzang ldan la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa ming chen la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa gang po la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med pa la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la/_khyim 
[\[245a.4\]]che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung sru'i sras tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la/_khyim che 
[\[245a.5\]]ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa 'gro mgyogs la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la/_khyim che ge mo zhig ni tshe dang ldan pa nab so la mngon par dad pa yin pas de'i phyir de 
[\[245a.6\]]dag sbyor du gzhug tu mi nus kyis/_'di ltar kau shAm+bI na bram ze phyug pa/_nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug na de ni ser sna can mig phra ba/_bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba/_yo byad kun 'dzin pa yin la/_de la dbyig dang /_gser 
[\[245a.7\]]mang po bdog pas gal te de rjes su 'jug par byed nus na dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de de ltar sems pa la zhugs pas/_tshegs chen pos nam nangs par byas nas/_snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_kau shAm+bIr bsod 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]snyoms la zhugs so/_/des khyim gnyis sam/_gsum du bsod snyoms brgyus nas phye nyung shas shig khyer te/_bram ze de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_sgo bas 'phags pa sdod cig_/ma 'jug ces bgags so/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[245b.2\]]kho bo cag gi spyod yul ma yin pa ni rnam pa lnga gsungs te/_rol mo mkhan gyi gnas dang /_'jud mthun ma'i gnas dang /_chang pa'i gnas dang /_gdol pa'i gnas dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang yin na ci khyim 'di ni rol mo mkhan gyi gnas yin nam/_'on te 'jud mthun ma'i gnas sam/_
[\[245b.3\]]chang pa'i gnas sam/_gdol pa'i gnas sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang yin nam ci na de'i phyir kho bo 'gog par byed/_sgo bas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod mang du bkyon par 'gyur mod 'di ni rol mo mkhan gyi gnas kyang ma lags/_'jud mthun ma'i gnas dang /_chang pa'i gnas dang /_
[\[245b.4\]]gdol pa'i gnas dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang yang ma lags te/_'di ltar 'di ni bram ze che ge mo zhig gi khyim lags so/_/'dun pas bsams pa/_gang du re zhig ngo phrad pa yang med pa der gzhan ci zhig yod par 'gyur snyam nas/_de de ltar sgor bgags te/_sems khong du chud cing 
[\[245b.5\]]'dug pa na khyim bdag cig gi bu byung ba der bcu gnyis 'dus pa'i dga' 'dun gar dang /_glu dang /_sil snyan gyis zhugs pa dang /_sgo ba des de dag la te por brtag par brtsams te sgo la mi lta ba'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas 'jug pa thob ste zhugs nas de'i spyod lam gyis 'dod chags 
[\[245b.6\]]dang bral ba'i sa sbyong bar byed pa de/_bram ze des mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa 'dun pa byon pa legs so/_/gdan 'di la bzhugs shig_/'dun pa don yod pas 'dug pa dang gtam gyi skabs ma rnyed nas 'dun pas smras pa/_bram ze kho bos bsod snyoms kyi phye nyung shas shig rnyed pa 
[\[245b.7\]]'di 'tshag tu chug ste byin cig_/bram zes bu mo la bsgo ba/_bu mo 'phags pa'i bsod snyoms kyi phye tshogs te phul cig_/bu mo des btsag par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas phye la brtag par brtsams so/_/bram zes smras pa 'phags pa ci rtog_/srog chags so/_/
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]gal te mchis na ji ltar bgyi/_bza' bar mi bya'o/_/gal te gsol bar gyur na nongs pa ci mchis/_bram ze bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa kun tu bsten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log 
[\[246a.2\]]par ltung ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing /_gal te 'di lta bu nyid du mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'ong na yang tshe thung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi dge ba bcu dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag rgyas par brjod pa dang /_bram 
[\[246a.3\]]ze de mngon par dad par gyur nas rang nyid kyis bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas snod bkang ste smras pa/_'phags pa thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di bzhes su gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas bsams pa/_gal te blangs par gyur na 'di lta ste dper na shing las byas 
[\[246a.4\]]pa'i snod du bskol ba dang 'dra bar bdag gi dang po 'di nyid tha mar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras pa/_bram ze kho bos bsod snyoms kyi phye nyung shas shig rnyed pa 'di nyid yongs su longs spyad par bya'i/_dad pas sbyin par bya ba blangs te dor du ga la rung /_bram zes smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[246a.5\]]bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni gal te ngan pa rnyed nas bzang po rnyed par gyur na ngan pa spangs te bzang po yongs su longs spyod par bgyid pa lags na de khyed cag la ci nongs/_bram ze kho bo cag ni bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa yin la/_khyed bram ze dag ni bslab 
[\[246a.6\]]pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa ma yin pas khyed cag bram ze dag ni ci dgar 'jug par byed pa yin no/_/kho bo cag la ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi bka' stsal te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chos gos gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang /_bsod 
[\[246a.7\]]snyoms gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang /_gnas mal gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang /_spong ba la dga' ba dang /_bsgom pa la dga' ba 'phags pa'i rigs so/_/bram ze de shin tu mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa/_'phags 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]pa 'di ni khyod kyi khab lags kyis dus dang dus su gshegs su gsol/_bram ze khyod kyi sgo ba 'di ni gshin rje'i dbyug pa pa dang 'dra ba yin pas su yang 'jug tu mi ster gyis/_legs par bsgo ba gyis shig dang /_des na kho bo la 'gog par mi byed do/_/bram zes sgo ba bkug 
[\[246b.2\]]ste legs par bsgo ba/_kwa'i nang rje khyim 'di 'phags pa 'dun pa'i yin gyis khyod kyis ma bgag cig_/nang mi la yang bsgo ba/_khyed cag gis 'phags pa 'dun pa la mi gus par mi bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas bsams pa/_bram ze 'di ni mngon par dad par gyur na 'on kyang 
[\[246b.3\]]gal te 'dir lhung bzed nag po can 'jug par gyur na/_des 'di ci nas kyang 'khrug par byed par 'gyur bas thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas 'dun pas sgo ba de la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis bram ze de ji ltar kho bo la mngon par dad par gyur pa mthong ngam/_'phags pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[246b.4\]]des kho bo 'ba' zhig 'dir 'jug tu gnang gis lhung bzed nag po can su yang 'jug tu ma gzhug cig_/gal te 'dir lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig 'jug tu bcug na kho bos khyod la khrims chen po 'char gzhug par bya'o/_/'phags pa shin tu bag yangs su bzhud cig_/khyod nyid kyang re 
[\[246b.5\]]zhig de'u ma chud pa lags na lhung bzed nag po can gzhan 'jug par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa yid bde ba skyes te song nas de dus dang dus su bram ze de'i khyim du 'gro bar byed do/_/bram zes kyang de kho na bzhin du yang dang yang du stobs par byed pa na tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[246b.6\]]'dun pas dang du len par mi byed par sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'ba' zhig byas shing byas shing 'gro bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas bram ze de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing de dag rgya cher 
[\[246b.7\]]legs par bshad pa dang /_bram zes smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis kyang rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi 'ga' zhig bgyi'o/_/bram ze de bzhin gyis shig_/'phags pa ci zhig bgyi/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed du chug shig_/bram zes bsams pa/_
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]bdag gis 'phags pa 'dun pa la rnam pa du mar bstabs na 'dis lan 'ga' yang dang du ma blangs te/_de dang du blangs pa gang yin pa 'di yang dge 'dun gyi phyir ro snyam nas de ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/_'phags pa bdag la kAr ShA pa Na dag ni mchis na/_'on 
[\[247a.2\]]kyang sa gzhi ni rgyal po dbang bas gang du dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal ba'i dog sa ma mchis so/_/bram ze khyod snying las chung ngur gyis shig dang kho bos rgyal po las sa bslang bar bya'o/_/'phags pa gal te de lta na legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas 
[\[247a.3\]]bsams pa/_ji ltar bya je rgyal po la bsten par bya'am 'on te blon po rnams la bsten par bya snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_la la na re 'di skad ces bsten pa la bsten par mi bya bar bsten pa la bsten pa bsten par bya'o zhes zer ro snyam nas/_des blon po rnams la bsten 
[\[247a.4\]]par brtsams te/_de dag la dus la cung zad cig bsten pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa bka' stsal pa ci mchis/_'dun pas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bram ze zhig gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas gzhi rgyal po dbang bas 
[\[247a.5\]]gang du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug pa'i sa med na de'i phyir sa gzhi'i ched du lha'i snyan du gsol ba zhig 'dod na de khyed cag gis grogs gyis shig_/'phags pa gang gi tshe rgyal po tshogs nyung ngu dang dben pa na bzhugs pa de'i tshe khyod sbran par bgyi yis spyon cig_/ji tsam 
[\[247a.6\]]dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshogs nyung ngu dang dben pa na 'dug pa'i tshe blon po de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa la/_'phags pa rgyal po tshogs nyung ngu dang dben pa na bzhugs kyis spyon cig ces bang chen btang ba dang /_'dun pa 'ongs nas rgyal po la a rog gya zhes byas te mtha' 
[\[247a.7\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha 'di ni 'phags pa 'dun pa zhes bgyi ste/_shAkya las rab tu byung ba/_sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrog pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa 'phags 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]pa byon pa legs so/_/ci'i slad du byon/_'dun pas smras pa/_lha bram ze zhig gis dge 'dun gyi slad du gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal nas gzhi rgyal po mnga' bas de'i dog sa ma mchis na lhas dog sa stsal bar rigs so/_/'phags pa rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig ma gtogs 
[\[247b.2\]]pa gang du bzhed pa der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu stsol cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas lha a rog gya zhes smras te/_yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ste drug sde gzhan dag gi gan du song nas des smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bram ze che ge mo zhig gis dge 'dun gyi phyir 
[\[247b.3\]]gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas kho bos rgyal po la sa gzhi'i phyir gsol ba byas na/_rgyal po na re 'phags pa rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gang du 'dod pa der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu stsol cig ces zer gyis sa gzhi 'doms shig_/de dag 'dus te bram ze de'i 
[\[247b.4\]]drung du song nas smras pa/_bram ze rgyal pos bdag cag la rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gang du 'dod pa der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu chug shig ces dam pa byin gyis kAr ShA pa Na dag 'on cig dang gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug go/_/bram ze des drug sde dag la kAr ShA pa 
[\[247b.5\]]Na dag byin nas/_de dag gis kAr ShA pa Na dag blangs te phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_phyogs gang du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug ces glengs so/_/kau shAm+bI dang gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba'i bar dag na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na/_bram ze 
[\[247b.6\]]'khor shin tu mang po dang ldan pa zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'jud pa de'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag drug sde dag bsod snyoms la 'jug pa dang 'byung ba na yang dang yang du kye drug sde dag ci bsod snyoms mchog dang bsod snyoms dang po thob 
[\[247b.7\]]bam/_snod khengs sam zhes co 'dri bar byed pas de'i tshe drug sde dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas kyi shing ljon pa de'i drung na bram ze de'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u de dag rtag tu bdag cag la kye drug sde dag ci bsod snyoms mchog dang bsod snyoms dang po thob bam/_snod khengs 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]sam zhes co 'dri bar byed kyis de dag mi dga' bar bya zhing gnas kyi shing ljon pa de gcod du bcug ste phyogs der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug na des na phyin chad yang dang yang du co 'dri bar mi byed do zhes de dag gis gros byas nas kAr ShA pa Na dag khyer te gla mi'i 
[\[248a.2\]]srang du dong nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gla sbyin gyis gtsug lag khang du las gyis shig ces smras nas/_de dag gis gla mi dag bsgrubs so/_/drug sde dag gis gla mi de dag khye'u sus byin te lus bsku ba dang /_mgo bsku ba yang byin pa dang /_de dag mgu nas smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[248a.3\]]dag bzhud la bdag cag la sug las dag phog shig_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur gyis re zhig sdod cig ces de dag gis de dag re zhig bgags pa dang /_ji tsam na nyi ma nub nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag da slar mchi yis 
[\[248a.4\]]deng gi gla stsol cig_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_khyed cag gis las mang po zhig byas pas de'i phyir gla ded dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag gis bdag cag la bka' stsal pa gang zhig bdag cag gis ma bgyis bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag sta re dang /_gzhor 
[\[248a.5\]]dang /_gle ba dag long shig dang las byed du 'dong ngo /_/gla mi de dag drug sde dag dang lhan cig sta re dang /_gzhor dang /_gle ba dag thogs te/_mig lam chad pa dang gnas kyi shing ljon pa de'i gan du song nas drug sde dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gnas kyi shing ljon pa 'di 
[\[248a.6\]]chod cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di ni gnas kyi shing ljon pa lags pas/_cig bdag cag la mgo bo gnyis mchis sam mi gcod do/_/bkren pa dag sa gzhi ni rgyal po dbang bas des kho bo cag la rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gang du 'dod 
[\[248a.7\]]pa der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu chug ces dam pa byin pas su zhig khyod kyi mgo gcod par byed bag tsha ba med par chod cig_/de dag gis gnas kyi shing ljon pa de bcad nas shing de thams cad kyang rtsa ba nas phyung /_sa phyogs de yang ci nas kyang gnas kyi shing ljon pa de phyogs gang 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]na 'dug 'dug par gyur ces bya bar mi shes pa de ltar mnyam par byas so/_/drug sde dag gis phyogs der mig gis brtag par brtsams te/_dga' bo nye dga' phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang brtsig par bya'o/_/phyogs 'dir ni sgo khang bya'o/_/phyogs 
[\[248b.2\]]'dir ni me khang bya'o/_/phyogs 'dir ni rung ba'i khang pa bya'o/_/phyogs 'dir ni nye bar gnas pa'i khang pa bya'o/_/zhes mtshan ma byas te dong ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u de dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni res kyis res kyis gnas kyi shing ljon pa de'i drung du chag chag 'debs par byed/_legs 
[\[248b.3\]]par skud par byed/_ba lang gi lci ba sar pa'i byug pas nyug par byed pas ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u zhig la res bab nas de nang par sngar langs te song ba dang /_des gnas kyi shing ljon pa de ma mthong nas de mkhan po'i gan du 'ongs nas smras pa/_mkhan po gnas kyi shing ljon pa de 
[\[248b.4\]]ma mchis so/_/bram zes smras pa/_kwa'i bram ze'i khye'u ci log par ma song ngam/_mtshan mo gzhan gyis shing ljon pa de gar song /_bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig kyang de dang lhan cig gad mos 'debs shing des smras pa/_mkhan po bram ze'i khye'u 'dis mdang sum 'bras bu'i rtsabs 
[\[248b.5\]]'tshal bas des na ma mthong ngo zhes mchi'o/_/bram zes bram ze'i khye'u ches sgrin pa gzhan zhig btang na/_des kyang de kho na bzhin du ma mthong nas/_de yang 'ongs te smras pa/_mkhan po de de bzhin te gnas kyi shing ljon pa de ye ma mchis so/_/de nas thams cad 'dus te dong 
[\[248b.6\]]ba dang /_de dag gis de kho na bzhin du ma mthong nas/_bram ze'i khye'u dran pa dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de na re phyogs 'di na ni mkhan po gsang tshig 'don par mdzad mdzad do/_/phyogs 'di na ni bdag spyod spyod na de ci nongs ji ltar gyur pa ma 'tshal to zhes zer ro/_/de dag de 
[\[248b.7\]]ltar sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa na mi zhig 'ongs nas des smras pa/_bram ze ci'i phyir 'khor dang bcas pa de ltar sems khong du chud cing 'khod/_kye nang po phyogs 'di na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig 'dug par gyur pa de mtshan mo gzhan gyis gar song ma shes so/_/bram ze 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]kho bos mdang sum mig lam chad pa na phyogs 'di na drug sde dag mi sta re dang /_gzhor dang /_gle ba dag gis lag brel ba dag dang lhan cig 'dug pa mthong na de dag gis bcad par ma gyur tam/_bram zes smras pa/_kye nang po 'on tang de lags so zhes de dag 
[\[249a.2\]]de bzhin du sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa na drug sde dag lhags nas de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze dag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'khod/_'phags pa dag phyogs 'di na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig mchis par gyur pa de mtshan mo gzhan gyis gar mchis ma 'tshal to/_/
[\[249a.3\]]drug sde dag gis bgad par brtsams pa dang /_bram zes smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag gis ma bkum mam/_bkren pa dag khyed cag rtag tu de'i drung na 'khod cing kho bo cag la kye drug sde dag ci bsod snyoms mchog dang /_bsod snyoms dang po thob bam/_snod 
[\[249a.4\]]khengs sam zhes co 'dri bar byed pas/_de'i phyir 'di ltar khyed cag mi dga' bar bya'o/_/de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar gnas kyi shing ljon pa yang gcod par gyur to zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong 
[\[249a.5\]]bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /_yul tha dad pa na gnas pa der lhags pa dag gis kyang thos nas de dag kyang lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag na smod par 
[\[249a.6\]]byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed cing gang dag ma dad pa de dag gis ni bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dag la yang bsod snyoms sbyin par mi byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_
[\[249a.7\]]gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis bdag po yod pa dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]po rtsig tu 'jud na gzhi blta ba'i phyir dge slong des dge slong dag bkri bar bya'o/_/khrid pa'i dge slong dag gis kyang gzhi rung ba dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang /_brtsam du rung bar blta bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis gzhi mi rung ba'am/_rtsod pa dang bcas pa'am/_brtsam du mi rung bar 
[\[249b.2\]]bdag po yod pa dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen po brtsig tu 'jud dam/_gzhi blta ba'i phyir dge slong dag kyang mi khrid dam/_dge slong khrid pa dag la gzhi mi ston na dge 'dun lhag ma'o/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang chos 'di pas so/_/bdag 
[\[249b.3\]]po yod pa zhes bya ba ni/_gang la bdag po skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_ma ning yod pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi phyir ro/_/gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba ni gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'chag pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa 
[\[249b.4\]]dang /_nyal pa dag shong ba'o/_/chen po zhes bya ba ni chen po gnyis po sbyin par bya ba dang /_tshad kyis te/_de las 'dir ni sbyin par bya bas chen por dgongs pa yin gyi tshad kyis ni ma yin no/_/rtsig tu 'jud na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan gyis so/_/gzhi blta ba'i phyir dge 
[\[249b.5\]]slong des dge slong dag bkri bar bya'o zhes bya ba la/_gzhi blta ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sa gzhi rung ba dang /_rtsod pa med pa dang /_brtsam du rung ba nyid blta ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/dge slong dag bkri bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni de 
[\[249b.6\]]na dge slong gang dag yod pa dag yin gyi/_ji tsam gyis gzhi de mig gis bltas par 'gyur ba'i dge slong de tsam bkri bar bya ba ni ma yin no/_/gal te de na sbrul gyi gnas sam/_sdig pa'i gnas sam/_sril gyi gnas sam/_grog ma'i gnas yod pa yin na mi rung ba yin 
[\[249b.7\]]pa'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te rung ba yin na de'i 'og tu nye bar brtag par bya ste/_gal te rgyal po'i gzhi 'am/_mchod rten gyi gzhi 'am/_khyim bdag gi gzhi 'am/_mu stegs can gyi gzhi 'am/_dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngam/_shing ljon pa gcad par bya ba yod 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]na rtsod pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhi rung ba dang /_rtsod pa med pa yin na de'i nyen kor 'dom gang kho ra khor yug nye bar brtag par bya ste/_gal te de na gzhi chu klung la rten tam/_khron pa la rten tam/_lam la rten tam/_
[\[250a.2\]]ngam grog la rten pa yin na brtsam du mi rung ba'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhi de rung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin na/_dge slong des gtsug lag khang du song ste gnas mal bsham par byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge 
[\[250a.3\]]slong dag la bskul nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la mchil lham phud de bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/_rgan rims bzhin du phyag 'tshal te/_rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[250a.4\]]dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba zhig btsal te/_bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las gtsug lag khang gi 
[\[250a.5\]]gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam 
[\[250a.6\]]du rung ba bstan pa stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge slong de dag gis kyang dge slong de la dad pas sam yid ches pas 'gro bar mi bya bar 'di ltar dge 'dun thams cad der 'gro bar bya ba'am dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong dag 
[\[250a.7\]]gtang bar bya'o/_/de dag gis gzhi de mig gis blta bar bya zhing gal te de na sbrul gyi gnas sam/_sdig pa'i gnas sam/_sril gyi gnas sam/_grog ma'i gnas yod pa yin na mi rung ba yin pa'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te rung ba yin na de'i 'og tu nye bar 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]brtag par bya ste/_gal te rgyal po'i gzhi 'am/_mchod rten gyi gzhi 'am/_khyim bdag gi gzhi 'am/_mu stegs can gyi gzhi 'am/_dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngam/_shing ljon pa gcad par bya ba yod na rtsod pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhi 
[\[250b.2\]]rung ba dang /_rtsod pa med pa yin na de'i nyen kor 'dom gang kho ra khor yug nye bar brtag par bya ste/_gal te de na gzhi chu klung la rten tam/_khron pa la rten tam/_lam la rten tam/_ngam grog la rten pa yin na brtsam du mi rung ba'i phyir bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te gzhi 
[\[250b.3\]]de rung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin na de'i tshe/_dge slong de dag gis rgan pa'i mtha' logs su gus pa dang bcas pas 'dug ste/_'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/gnas brtan dag gzhi de rung ba dang /_rtsod pa ma mchis pa dang /_brtsam du rung ba lags 
[\[250b.4\]]kyis/_da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dis gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung 
[\[250b.5\]]ba zhig btsal te/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis 
[\[250b.6\]]dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dis 
[\[250b.7\]]gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba zhig btsal te/_dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam du 
[\[251a.2\]]rung ba bstan pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa/_brtsam 
[\[251a.3\]]du rung ba bstan pa stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas/_de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis dge slong lag gi bla gang la gtsug lag khang gi gzhi rung ba/_rtsod pa med pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa byin pa des gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod 
[\[251a.4\]]par mi bya'o/_/khrid pa'i dge slong dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni der dge slong gang dag khrid pa dag gis kyang ngo /_/gzhi zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang gi dbang du byas pa'i gzhi gang yin pa'o/_/rung ba zhes bya ba ni sbrul gyi gnas dang /_sdig pa'i gnas la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/_/
[\[251a.5\]]rtsod pa med pa zhes bya ba ni thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/_/brtsam du rung bar zhes bya ba ni de'i nyen kor 'dom gang kho ra khor yug na skyon med par ro/_/blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni so sor brtag par bya ba'o/_/gal te dge slong gis gzhi mi rung ba'am zhes 
[\[251a.6\]]bya ba ni sbrul dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i gnas kyi shas che ba'o/_/rtsod pa dang bcas pa 'am zhes bya ba ni thab mo dang bcas pa dang mtshang 'dru ba dang bcas pa dang /_rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang /_'gyed pa dang bcas pa'o/_/brtsam du mi rung bar zhes bya ba ni gang gi nyen kor 'dom 
[\[251a.7\]]gang kho ra khor yug med par ro/_/bdag po yod pa dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen po rtsig tu 'jud dam/_gzhi blta ba'i phyir dge slong dag kyang mi khrid dam/_dge slong khrid pa dag la gzhi mi ston na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/_des na dge 'dun 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang byed du 'jud cing mi rung bar byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa dang bcas par byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brtsam du mi rung 
[\[251b.2\]]bar byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma bstan par byed du 'jud na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las 'das par byed du 'jud na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong gi gan du song ste/_'di skad ces dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang 
[\[251b.3\]]rung ba/_rtsod pa med pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa byed du chug shig ces smras pa las/_gal te des dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang byed du 'jud cing mi rung bar byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa dang bcas par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la 
[\[251b.4\]]nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brtsam du mi rung bar byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma bstan par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las 'das par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[251b.5\]]gal te de de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces legs par byas so/_/shin tu byas so/_/ngas khyod la 'di ltar bsgo'o zhes zer zhing des kyang de la shing ngam/_rtswa 'am/_lci ba'am/_sa 'jim 'bul bar byed la/_gal te des mi rung bar byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 
[\[251b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa dang bcas par byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brtsam du mi rung bar byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma bstan par byed du 'jud na gnyi ga la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las 'das par byed 
[\[251b.7\]]du 'jud na gnyi ga la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/gal te de de'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces legs par ma byas so/_/shin tu ma byas so/_/ngas khyod la 'di ltar ma bsgo'o zhes zer zhing des de la shing ngam/_rtswa 'am/_lci ba'am/_sa 'jim 'bul bar mi byed la gal 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]te des mi rung bar byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/rtsod pa dang bcas par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/brtsam du mi rung bar byed du 'jud na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ma bstan par byed du 'jud 
[\[252a.2\]]na byed pa po la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/thams cad las 'das par byed du 'jud na byed pa po la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/byas pa rnyed pa dang /_byas pa la longs spyod pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/rnying pa 'chos pa la yang ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_
[\[252a.3\]]smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gtsug lag khang gi dge 'dun lhag ma ste bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 
[\[252a.4\]]'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na sdig byung na/_gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa/_rgyal sde zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran 
[\[252a.5\]]pa/_gyad rnams la cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid byed du 'jud pa zhig 'dug ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod kyang de la bu 
[\[252a.6\]]yang med/_bu mo yang med nas de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dag la gsol ba 'debs shing /_lha'i bye brag gzhan 'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /_tshal gyi lha dag dang /_bzhi 
[\[252a.7\]]mdo'i lha dag dang /_sum mdo'i lha dag dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dag dang /_chos mthun pa dag dang /_rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]lta bu yod de/_de ni de lta ma yin te/_gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum po de dag gang zhe na/_
[\[252b.2\]]pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/_gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na 
[\[252b.3\]]sems can srid pa tha ma pa spyod pa tshol ba/_thar pa'i snying po bzung ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa la phyogs pa/_'khor ba las phyir phyogs pa/_srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba don du mi gnyer ba lus tha ma 'dzin pa zhig kyang /_lha'i ris bzang po zhig nas 
[\[252b.4\]]shi 'phos te de'i skye dgu'i bdag mo'i mngal du zhugs so/_/bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /_mngal 
[\[252b.5\]]na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang /_khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o/_/de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas 
[\[252b.6\]]khyim thab la smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pas nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste/_lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas 'di 
[\[252b.7\]]skad ces kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /_kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /_gsos pas phyir gso ba dang bgo skal la spyod pa dang /_kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang bdag 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu 'am/_mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon bshad pa byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa ched 
[\[253a.2\]]du rjod par byed do/_/de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste/_mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /_sman pas bcas pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /_ha 
[\[253a.3\]]cang mi skyur ba dang /_ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang /_ha cang mi mngar ba dang /_ha cang mi tsha ba dang /_ha cang mi bska ba dang /_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa che ba dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_rgyan 
[\[253a.4\]]gyis bklubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /_khri nas khrir dang /_khri'u nas khri'ur dang /_shod kyis gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /_des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'jud do/_/de zla ba brgyad dam/_
[\[253a.5\]]dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_gsal ba/_gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/_lag pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i nye du dag 
[\[253a.6\]]'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/khye'u de'i kun tu spyod pa ni ji srid du mal chen po nas ma phab pa de srid du bshang ba dang gci ba mi byed pa yin la/_yul dbus na 
[\[253a.7\]]kun tu spyod pa ni gang mkhas pa spyod pa gsal ba de la nor lta bu zhes zer bas nye du de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khye'u 'di gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa rgyal sde'i bu yang yin la/_ji srid du mal chen po nas ma phab pa de srid du bshang ba dang gci ba mi byed de/_mkhas pa spyod 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]pa gsal bas nor lta bu yang yin pa'i phyir khye'u yi ming gyad bu nor zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming gyad bu nor zhes bya bar btags so/_/nyi ma gang la gyad bu nor btsas pa'i nyi ma de nyid la blon po lnga brgya dag la yang bu dag btsas te de dag gi ming yang khyim dang mthun pa dag tu btags shing /_de 
[\[253b.2\]]dag kyang gyad bu nor gyi ne'u ldangs su byas so/_/khye'u gyad bu nor ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/_/de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_
[\[253b.3\]]mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing /_rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de ma ma'i pang na 'dug pa na bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig gis mthong nas des de la 
[\[253b.4\]]shin tu nges par brtag par byas te des bsams pa/_khye'u 'di ni rkang gnyis pa bsod nams kyi zhing yin te/_gang dag 'di la mchod pa dag byed pa de dag gi mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu chen po dang /_phan yon chen po dang /_gsal ba chen po dang /_yangs pa chen 
[\[253b.5\]]por 'gyur ro snyam nas/_bram ze mtshan mkhan des ma ma de la smras pa/_khye'u 'di kho bo la yud tsam zhig byin cig dang kho bos 'di la mchod pa dag bya'o/_/ma mas smras pa/_bram ze kho mo la khye'u sbyin pa'i dbang med kyis gal te khyod khye'u 'dod na dmag dpon gyi gan du song la gsol 
[\[253b.6\]]cig_/de nas bram ze de gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa'i gan du song ste/_shis pa brjod pa sngar byas nas smras pa/_dmag dpon khyod kyi khye'u 'di ni rkang gnyis pa bsod nams kyi zhing yin te gang dag 'di la mchod pa dag byed pa dag gi mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu chen po 
[\[253b.7\]]dang /_phan yon chen po dang /_gsal ba chen po dang /_yangs pa chen por 'gyur bas de'i phyir khye'u 'di kho bo la yud tsam zhig byin cig dang /_kho bos 'di la mchod pa dag bya'o/_/dmag dpon gyis smras pa/_bram ze gal te de lta na sbyin gyis khyer cig bram ze des yid rab tu dga' 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]bas khye'u de rang gi khyim du khyer nas chung ma'i drung du yon tan brjod de smras pa/_bzang mo shes par gyis shig_/khye'u 'di ni rkang gnyis pa bsod nams kyi zhing yin te/_gang dag 'di la mchod pa dag byed pa de dag gi mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu chen 
[\[254a.2\]]po dang /_phan yon chen po dang /_gsal ba chen po dang /_yangs pa chen por 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'di la mchod pa dag gyis shig_/des de'i yon tan brjod pa thos nas yid bde ba skyes te smras pa/_bram ze gal te de lta na re zhig gzhes shig dang khyim gyi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]dag bgyi'o zhes des 
[\[254a.3\]]khyim byug pas byugs shing zhal zhal byas nas rtsa lag gi skye bo snying du sdug cing 'brel ba dag mgron du bos nas de'i 'og tu khye'u de bkur sti chen pos dril phyi byas shing khrus byas te/_spos dang /_me tog dag gis brgyan nas sbrang rtsi dang /_'o mas legs par bsnyod do/_/de 
[\[254a.4\]]ltar brgyan cing gnyen 'dab kyis yongs su bskor nas rang gi khyim du phyir khrid do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_gzhug pa dang /_gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing 'byed pa dang /_
[\[254a.5\]]klog pa dang /_mkhas pa dang /_spyod pa gsal ba dang /_brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste/_rin po che brtag pa dang /_gzhi brtag pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_shing brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_bud med brtag pa dang /_skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par 
[\[254a.6\]]gyur to/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_ljongs kyi dbang phyug mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/_sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par rgyal bar byas te gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad par gyur pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_glang po 
[\[254a.7\]]che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang /_rta la bzhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_'phong dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phen thabs dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_goms 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]stangs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_gnas lnga po 'di lta ste/_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba de dag la yang zhugs shing byang bar gyur to/_/blon po'i bu lnga 
[\[254b.2\]]brgya po de dag kyang bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas dag la byang bar gyur to/_/phas de'i chung ma'i 'khor gsum po rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma dag rnam par bzhag go/_/'dug pa'i gnas gsum po dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go/_/skyed mos tshal 
[\[254b.3\]]gsum po dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go/_/de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na skyes pa med par sil snyan gyis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de'i ne'u ldangs lnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gsum du de lta ba'i 
[\[254b.4\]]phyir 'ong zhing de de dag dang lhan cig sten grogs kyi dga' bas rtsed mo rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag nang par sngar langs te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du dong ba dang /_de dag gis de'i nyin mo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma rnyed par de dag 
[\[254b.5\]]gis bsam pa/_deng bdag cag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma rnyed pas ji ltar lag pa stong pa dag gis khyim du 'dong bar bya/_deng 'di nyid du bsdad de sang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag bshor la khyim du 'dong bar bya'o snyam nas/_de dag de'i nub mo der 'khod nas phyi de nyin par [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag bshor 
[\[254b.6\]]te mtshan mo mig lam chad pa dang rang rang gi khyim du dong ngo /_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_deng ni nam sros kyis sang gzhon nu ltar 'dong ngo snyam nas/_de dag mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /_nyi ma gsum pa de la gzhon nu gyad bu nor bltar dong ba dang /_gzhon nus smras pa/_
[\[254b.7\]]shes ldan dag khyed cag kho bo'i ne'u ldangs mnyam du skyes pa sa la lhan cig rtse ba dag yin na ci'i phyir khyed cag de bar kho bo'i gan du ma 'ongs par deng nyi ma gsum pa gdod 'ongs/_gzhon nu bdag cag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du mchis par gyur nas de'i slad du ma mchis so/_/khyed cag gis 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]der ci zhig byas/_gzhon nu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag bkum mo/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag ci za ci 'thung /_gzhon nu ran dag 'tshal zhing /_chab dag 'tshal lo/_/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na de dag gis khyed cag la gnod pa ci zhig byas na khyed cag de dag gsod par byed/_gzhon 
[\[255a.2\]]nu bdag cag des glo ba dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ro/_/shes ldan dag dga' ba de ni mi bzang ste/_gzhan la gnod pas dga' ba gang yin pa de thong shig_/gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod 'khod de/_rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag gzhon nu 
[\[255a.3\]]'di chung ma'i 'khor spangs te 'gro mi 'dod pas de'i phyir bdag cag la smod par byed kyis/_de'i phyir bdag cag gis ci nas kyang dmag dpon la go bar bya ba'i thabs shig gis 'di yang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig byas na des na 'di yang bdag cag dang lhan cig 
[\[255a.4\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis gros byas nas dmag dpon gyi gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_dmag dpon gzhon nu gang dag grib mar skyes par gyur pa de dag ni nges par nyi 'og gi mkhar gyi rgyal po dag gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba lags

[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag gzhon nu 'di ni dmag dpon 'das nas dmag dpon du 'gyur bas 'di bsten pa'i dus kyis ni 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur gyis/_bdag cag gis da 'di bsten par bya'o zhes de dag gis blo gros gcig gis de la smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod 'di kho nar gzhes

[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]lta bus rgyug pas de'i phyir de dag gis kho bo nyid kyang de'u bsad do/_/mi des smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis chos la dga' ba 'di 'phan kar bzhag pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ga la sod/_gal te 'di mngon par 'dod par gyur na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang bros par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag

[\[256a.3\]]pa/_gal te 'di bsad par gyur na thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas dmag dpon gyis thos na bdag cag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis 'di gsad par mi bya bar 'di ltar 'di nyid du bskyur te bor la bdag cag 'dong bar bya'o snyam nas/_de dag gis de la ma bltas par 'dong ngo /_/

[\[256a.7\]]yang yid mi bde bar gyur nas gzhon nu'i gan du song ste smras pa bu gzhon nu khyod ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/yab kyis bdag las mi 'dra bar bskos te gang gi tshe rngon pa drag shul can lag pa dmar ba bsnun pa dang rab tu bsnun pas zhugs pa/_
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jud pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar bgyid pa rnams kyi las de la nges par sbyar na bdag ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi mchis su rung /_bu gzhon nu gal te de lta na khyod bde bar 'dug la bsam pa thong ste phyin chad ma 
[\[256b.2\]]'gro shig_/de nas gzhon nu de sems can la gnod pa las skyes pa'i yid mi bde ba las nges par byung ste mngon par dga' bar gyur nas de dge ba gang yin zhes tshol bas nges par 'byung ba'i mngon par dga' ba btsal bar brtsams so/_/de'i tshe na rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston

[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]tshe dus byed pa na de'i sa'i lus ni sa'i bag la zha/_chu'i lus ni chu'i/_me'i lus ni me'i/_rlung gi lus ni rlung gi bag la zha bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnams ni nam mkha'i rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu'i ro ni khri dang lnga'i mi dag gis khyer te dur khrod du 'gro zhing bsregs

[\[258a.1\]]'gyur ba'i btung ba 'thung ba dang /_khyim 'bigs pa dang /_mdud pa 'grol ba dang /_ril gyis 'phrog pa dang /_lam 'gog cing 'dug pa dang /_grong 'joms par byed pa dang /_grong khyer 'joms par byed pa dang /_yul 'joms par byed pa dang /_sa gzhi

[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]phyin nas/_mi pham skra'i la ba can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_mi pham gyis smras pa/_gzhon nu kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di

[\[258b.3\]]dang /_rlung gi lus dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_srog gson pa nyid ni bdun pa ste/_lus bdun po de dag ni ma byas pa/_byas pas ma byas pa/_ma sprul pa/_sprul pas ma byas pa/_gnod par bya ba ma yin pa/_ther zug tu gnas pa/_ka ba bzhin du gnas pa

[\[258b.7\]]med do/_/byis pa'am/_mkhas pa gang dag yin pa dag ni skye gnas gtso bo dang ldan pa khri bzhi stong dang /_rtog pa chen po drug khri dang /_drug brgya dang /_las lnga dang /_las gsum dang /_las gnyis dang /_las dang /_las phyed dang /_las drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_rtog pa 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bar ma drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_sems can dmyal ba brgya nyi shu dang /_dbang po brgya nyi shu dang /_rdul gyi khams drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_klu'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_kun tu rgyu'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_
[\[259a.2\]]kun tu 'tsho'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_gcer bu pa'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_'du shes can gyi gnas bdun dang /_'du shes med pa'i gnas bdun dang /_gcer bu pa'i gnas bdun dang /_lha ma yin bdun dang /_sha za bdun dang /_lha bdun dang /_mi bdun dang /_mtsho 
[\[259a.3\]]chen po bdun dang /_mtsho bdun brgya dang /_rmi lam chen po bdun dang /_rmi lam bdun brgya dang /_'bri ba chen po bdun dang /_'bri ba bdun brgya dang /_'phel ba chen po bdun dang /_'phel ba bdun brgya dang /_sad pa chen po bdun dang /_sad pa bdun brgya dang /_g.yang sa chen po 
[\[259a.4\]]bdun dang /_g.yang sa bdun brgya dang /_rigs btsun pa bdun dang /_mngon par mtho ba bcu dang /_skyes bu chen po'i sa brgyad po de dag tu bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na skud pa'i dru bu yang 
[\[259a.5\]]ba steng gi nam mkha' las 'phangs pa gzangs pa na sa la 'bab pa de bzhin du byis pa'am/_mkhas pa gang dag yin pa dag kyang de dag tu bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed do/_/de la dge slong ngam/_bram ze gang 'di skad 
[\[259a.6\]]ces bdag tshul khrims sam/_brtul zhugs sam/_dka' thub bam/_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa 'dis las yongs su ma smin pa ni yongs su smin par bya zhing /_yongs su smin pa ni reg par byas nas byang bar bya'o zhes zer ba 'ga' yang med do/_/bde ba dang sdug 
[\[259a.7\]]bsngal ba 'di ni nges pa yin no/_/yar skye ba dang /_mar 'grib pa ni mi srid do/_/'di lta bu nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pas 'khor ba gzhal lo/_/de nas gyad bu nor 'di snyam du sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam ngan pa legs par sgrub pa 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]yin te/_lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_blo ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos 'di de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/
[\[259b.2\]]zhes smras nas snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te song ngo /_/de nas gyad bu nor ka t+ya'i bu nog can ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_ka t+ya'i bu nog can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_tshangs par spyod pa'i 
[\[259b.3\]]'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_nog can gyis smras pa/_gzhon nu kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad ces smra ste/_gal te 'ga' zhig kho bo'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces 'jig rten pha rol yod dam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol yod do zhes dri ba 
[\[259b.4\]]dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol med dam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol med do zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol yod pa dang med pa yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol yod pa dang med pa 
[\[259b.5\]]yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/de bzhin du gal te 
[\[259b.6\]]'ga' zhig kho bo'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces 'jig rten pha rol 'di lta bu nyid dang /_'di lta bu nyid ma yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol 'di lta bu dang /_'di lta bu nyid ma yin pa yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol 
[\[259b.7\]]gzhan nyid dang gzhan nyid ma yin pa yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol gzhan nyid dang /_gzhan nyid ma yin pa yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol de nyid dang de nyid ma yin pa nyid yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol de nyid dang de nyid ma yin 
[\[260a.2\]]pa yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/de nas gyad bu nor 'di snyam du sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam ngan pa legs par sgrub pa yin te/_lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya 
[\[260a.3\]]ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_blo ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos 'di de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/zhes smras nas snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te song ngo /_/de nas gyad bu nor gnyen gyi bu gcer 
[\[260a.4\]]bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gnyen gyi bu gcer bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_gcer bus smras pa/_gzhon nu kho bo ni 
[\[260a.5\]]'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad ces smra ste/_skyes bu gang zag 'dis so sor myong ba gang yin pa ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad sngon byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no/_/las rnying pa rnams ni dka' thub kyis byang bar 'gyur la/_las sar pa rnams ni mi bya ba'i chu lon gyis bzlog par 
[\[260a.6\]]bya'o/_/de ltar na phyin chad zag pa med do/_/zag pa med na las zad do/_/las zad na sdug bsngal zad do/_/sdug bsngal zad na sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gyad bu nor 'di snyam du sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam 
[\[260a.7\]]ngan pa legs par sgrub pa ste/_lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_blo ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos 'di de 'dra ba/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/zhes smras nas snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te song ngo /_/de nas gyad bu nor rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug nas/_de 'di snyam du 
[\[260b.2\]]sems te/_ma la 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mir bcas pa'i nang na gang gis bdag 'khor ba'i dgon pa 'di nas rab tu thar bar byed pa'i dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 
[\[260b.3\]]sman dang /_gsang sngags dang /_rig sngags tshig gcig gam/_tshig gnyis sam/_tshig bzhi tsam 'chad pa de lta bu su yod snyam du sems so/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /_ma gzigs pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[260b.4\]]mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pu pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_gnyis pa med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis zhugs pa/_
[\[260b.5\]]rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 
[\[260b.6\]]yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/_byang chub kyi 
[\[260b.7\]]yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni nyin lan gsum/_mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni nyams par gyur/_gang ni 'phel bar gyur/_gang ni gnod par gyur/_gang ni nyam nga bar gyur/_gang ni mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni 
[\[261a.2\]]gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni ngan song la gzhol/_gang ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang ni ngan song la bab/_ngas gang ni ngan song gi lam nas bslang ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag 
[\[261a.3\]]nas ni drang bar bya/_'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/_gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[261a.4\]]ba dag bskyed pa gang ni yongs su smin par bya/_yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug go/_/yang smras pa/_chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/_/dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas 'dul la byams pa ni/_/dus 
[\[261a.5\]]las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la/_/rtog par byed cing de srog srung byed ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la/_/rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad/_/kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi/_/gzhon ma gdul 
[\[261a.6\]]ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste/_/srid dang ngan 'gros nyams pa'i gdul ba la/_/rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/_sdig byung na gyad bu nor de rgyud yongs su smin pa/_sngon gyi 
[\[261a.7\]]sangs rgyas rnams la bya ba lhag par byas pa yin te/_de gdul ba'i dus ni dper na 'bras yongs su smin pa mtshon gyis brtol ba la sdod pa lta bu yin par gzigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci 'di re zhig ston pas gdul ba yin nam/_'on te 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]nyan thos kyis gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/_nyan thos kyis gdul ba yin par gzigs so/_/sgo gang nas 'jug par 'gyur/_ci rdzu 'phrul gyis gdul ba yin nam/_'on te spyod lam gyis gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/_spyod lam gyis gdul ba yin par gzigs 
[\[261b.2\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni gang la spyod lam gyis gdul ba de la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gtong bar mdzad de/_'di ltar de'i spyod lam gyis ni lha dang mi'i yid sdud par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la bka' stsal pa/_rta thul khyod 
[\[261b.3\]]kyis sdig byung na gyad bu nor 'dug pa la soms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis cang mi smra bas bcom ldan 'das las dang du blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la lhag par bya ba byed pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo 
[\[261b.4\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms 
[\[261b.5\]]brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar yongs su spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs nas sdig byung ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i tshe sdig byung du phyin nas 
[\[261b.6\]]sdig byung na pad pa'i nags khrod na 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_'gro ba dang /_ldog pa dang /_cung zad blta ba dang /_rnam par blta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_snam sbyar dang /_chos 
[\[261b.7\]]gos dang /_lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas sdig byung du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de'i tshe na gyad bu nor steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na dge ba gang yin tshol bas grong khyer la blta zhing 'dug pas gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]dang /_cung zad blta ba dang /_rnam par blta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_snam sbyar dang /_chos gos dang /_lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas sdig byung na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[262a.2\]]sdig byung 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig lhags shing gnas pa dag las 'di lta ste/_rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo snyam nas/_yang 'di snyam du sems te/_rab tu byung ba dag la ni gang dag grong du spyod lam 'chos la dgon 
[\[262a.3\]]par ci dgar spyod pa dag kyang yod pas bdag gis dgon par 'di'i spyod lam brtag par bya'o snyam du rig nas mi zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje tshur shog rab tu byung ba 'di'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du rjes su song la 'di ji ltar grong du spyod lam zhi ba ltar dgon par yang de bzhin nam/_
[\[262a.4\]]'on te ma yin pa rtogs shig_/mi des gzhon nu bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gyad bu nor las mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul sdig byung du bsod snyoms brgyus nas/_pad pa'i nags khrod ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[262a.5\]]pa dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas snam sbyar sprugs te rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te lo ma lhags pa dag bor nas/_lag pa gnyis bsnyal 
[\[262a.6\]]te lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du brten nas/_brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil pa ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go/_/de nas mi de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi spyod lam zhi bas 
[\[262a.7\]]lha dang mi'i sems sdud par byed pas yid bsdus nas gyad bu nor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod kyis rab tu byung ba de spyod lam ji lta bus grong du bsod snyoms rgyu ba gzigs pa de bas brgya stong gis 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]lhag pa'i spyod lam gyis dgon par mchis te gnas so/_/de nas gyad bu nor tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi spyod lam 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa thos pas yid bsdus nas gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas mi de la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje myur du bzhon pa bde ba stod cig dang kho bo de la zhon 
[\[262b.2\]]te deng rab tu byung ba de [(]bltar [,]ltar [)]'gro'o/_/mi des gzhon nu bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gyad bu nor las mnyan nas myur du bzhon pa bde ba bstad de/_gyad bu nor ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu gor bu bsgron lags kyis da de'i dus 
[\[262b.3\]]la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de nas gyad bu nor bzhon pa bde ba la zhon te/_sdig byung nas phyir byung nas pad pa'i nags khrod ga la ba der shing rta bsgyur te bzhon pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te/_rkang pa dag nyid kyis pad pa'i nags 
[\[262b.4\]]khrod du zhugs pa dang /_gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing spyod lam zhi bas 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag gis rab tu byung ba ting nge 'dzin 'di las bslang ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma 
[\[262b.5\]]yin gyis/_gang gi tshe 'di ting nge 'dzin las langs par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du rig nas/_mtha' gcig tu 'dug ste/_de ldang ba la sdod cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul phyi ma 'bred nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas mtha' gcig tu 
[\[262b.6\]]'dug go/_/de nas gyad bu nor tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 
[\[262b.7\]]'dug nas gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan ci khyod ston pa lags sam/_'on te nyan thos lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo ni nyan thos ston pa'i lam gyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no/_/shes ldan ston pa dang /_nyan thos la khyad par 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ci mchis/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyad par shin tu che ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang yungs kar lta bu dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang ba lang gi rjes lta bu dang /_nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer lta bu dang /_nam mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga lta bu'o/_/de la ri'i 
[\[263a.2\]]rgyal po ri rab ji lta ba de ltar ni ston pa blta bar bya la/_yungs kar ji lta ba de ltar ni nyan thos blta bar bya'o/_/rgya mtsho chen po ji lta ba de ltar ni ston pa blta bar bya la/_ba lang gi rjes ji lta ba de ltar ni nyan thos blta bar bya'o/_/nyi ma ji lta ba de ltar ni ston pa blta bar bya la/_srin bu 
[\[263a.3\]]me khyer ji lta ba de ltar ni nyan thos blta bar bya'o/_/nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar ni ston pa blta bar bya la/_pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga ji lta ba de ltar ni nyan thos blta bar bya'o/_/zhes smras nas/_tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_ri rgyal yungs kar gnyis la khyad par gang yod dang /_/
[\[263a.4\]]dug can glang rjes chu la khyad par gang yod dang /_/nyi ma me khyer srin la khyad par gang yod dang /_/nam mkha' pad ma'i bu gar khyad par gang yod pa/_/sangs rgyas nyan thos byang chub khyad par de yod do/_/de nas gyad bu nor 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar rab tu byung ba 'di'i 
[\[263a.5\]]ston pa la stod par byed cing bdag nyid la smod par byed pa las na/_sangs rgyas ni dam pa ma yin par mi 'gyur la/_chos bstan pa yang dam pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag legs par 
[\[263a.6\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par bgyi'o/_/bdag 'phags pa'i drung na tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod pha ma dag gis gnang ngam/_'phags pa ma gnang ngo /_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de 
[\[263a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ni pha ma dag gis ma gnang ba'i rigs kyi bu rab tu 'byin par mi mdzad/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi mdzad do/_/'phags pa khyod kyis bdag rab tu dbyung ba 'ba' zhig mdzod cig dang /_ci nas kyang bdag pha ma dag 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gis gnang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]legs kyis de ltar byos shig ces smras so/_/de nas gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa byas shing rjes su yi rang ba byas nas rang gi khyim 
[\[263b.2\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas pha ma gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/bu gzhon nu shes par gyis shig_/khyod nged kyi 
[\[263b.3\]]bu gcig pa/_sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bzod pa mthong na mi mthun pa med pa yin pas/_khyod shi bar gyur na nged mi 'dod bzhin du 'bral ba kho na yin gyi/_gson bzhin du gtang ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_yab yum gal te gnang na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gnang na deng slan chad 
[\[263b.4\]]'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/_phyag la yang mi 'tshal lo/_/bu gzhon nu mi gnang gis ji srid nged gson gyi bar du khyod nged kyi mig lam na 'dug la bya ba gzhan ma sems shig_/de nas gyad bu nor gyis nyi ma gcig gi zan gcad pa byas so/_/gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa nas 
[\[263b.5\]]drug gi bar du yang zan gcad pa byas so/_/de nas gyad bu nor gyi pha ma gnyis kyis gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu gzhon nu shes par gyis shig_/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba 'dod pa yin pas khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi shes te/_tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/
[\[263b.6\]]rab tu dben pa bya dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag tu gnas pa khong du chud par dka'o/_/gcig pu dgon par gnas pa sdug bsngal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ri 
[\[263b.7\]]dgas gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba dang /_rtsed 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]mo dag las dben par bya dgos so/_/bu gzhon nu tshur shog_/'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cing /_sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig_/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig_/de skad smras kyang gyad bu nor cang mi smra'o/_/de nas gyad bu nor gyi pha ma gnyis kyis nye du 
[\[264a.2\]]rnams la bsgo ba/_kye nye du dag tshur shog_/bu gzhon nu gyad bu nor slong shig_/de nas gyad bu nor gyi nye du dag gyad bu nor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sras gzhon nu mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pa lags pas 
[\[264a.3\]]khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi mkhyen te/_tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/rab tu dben pa bgyi dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag tu gnas pa khong du chud par dka'o/_/gcig pu dgon par 
[\[264a.4\]]gnas pa sdug bsngal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 
[\[264a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/sras gzhon nu tshur spyon bzhugs la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag kyang stsol cig_/bsod nams dag kyang mdzod cig_/de skad smras kyang gyad bu 
[\[264a.6\]]nor cang mi smra'o/_/de nas gyad bu nor gyi pha ma gnyis kyis gyad bu nor gyi ne'u ldangs rnams la bsgo ba/_kye gzhon nu dag tshur shog_/bu gzhon nu gyad bu nor slong shig_/de nas gyad bu nor gyi ne'u ldangs dag gyad bu nor ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sras 
[\[264a.7\]]gzhon nu mkhyen par mdzod cig_/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pa lags pas khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi mkhyen te/_tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka'o/_/rab tu dben par bgyi dka'o/_/gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar dka'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha' dag tu gnas par khong du chud par dka'o/_/gcig pu dgon par gnas pa sdug bsngal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis 
[\[264b.2\]]byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo dag las dben par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/sras gzhon nu tshur spyon bzhugs la 'dod pa dag la 
[\[264b.3\]]yang yongs su spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag stsol cig_/bsod nams dag kyang mdzod cig_/de skad ces smras kyang gyad bu nor cang mi smra'o/_/de nas gyad bu nor gyi ne'u ldangs rnams gyad bu nor gyi pha ma gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gyad bu nor gyi pha ma gnyis la 'di 
[\[264b.4\]]skad ces smras so/_/yab yum dag mkhyen par mdzod cig_/zhi ba gzhon nu gum pas ci zhig bgyi/_rab tu byung ba ni mkhas pas bsngags pa lags pas gal te rab tu byung nas mngon par dga' bar gyur na yang de gson po nyid du gzigs par 'gyur la/_mngon par 
[\[264b.5\]]dga' bar ma gyur na yang drang srong dag ni slar ldog pa lags pas bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig mchis par 'gyur gyis rab tu byung na legs so/_/de nas gyad bu nor gyi pha ma gnyis kyis gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu gzhon nu khyod la rab 
[\[264b.6\]]tu 'byung ba legs par byed pa yin la/_khyim na gnas pa legs pa byed pa ma yin nam/_yab yum bdag la rab tu 'byung ba legs pa bgyid pa lags la/_khyim na gnas pa legs pa bgyid pa ma lags so/_/bu gzhon nu da de'i dus la bab par shes par 
[\[264b.7\]]gyis shig_/de nas gyad bu nor pha ma gnyis kyis gnang nas 'bras khu'i rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus bskyed de sdig byung nas phyir byung nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag pha ma gnyis kyis gnang gis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 
[\[265a.2\]]rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par bgyi'o/_/bdag 'phags pa'i drung na tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]legs so/_/longs spyod dag ni mi rtag pa yin la/_rab tu 'byung ba ni legs pa 
[\[265a.3\]]yin gyis de ltar gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su 
[\[265a.4\]]mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /_bdag gang dag gi bran dang /_mngag gzhug pa dang /_bsgo ba dang /_rang dbang med pa dang /_dga' mgur 'gror med pa yin pa de dag gi mchod par bya ba dang /_bstod par bya bar 
[\[265a.5\]]'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar bya ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /_grub pa dang /_bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu
