[\[285b.5\]]lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis dge slong pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong nyes byas 
[\[285b.6\]]kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la so sor bshags par bya ba'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis dge slong pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na 
[\[285b.7\]]dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la nyes byas kyi lta ba nyid thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba bsgyur te 'di skad ces bdag gis dge slong pham par 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dril bsgrags pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/ngos la ri mor bris pa phan cad la yang ltung ba med do/_/ji ltar bdag gis shes pa de bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang shes so snyam na'o/_/las 
[\[286a.2\]]dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste dgu pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na 
[\[286a.3\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas bsod snyoms rnyed par dka' ba byung ngo /_/de na dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul thob pa de dag ni gang gi ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar shes pa'i shing 'dzam bu de las 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu lhags pa kha dog dang /_dri dang /_
[\[286a.4\]]ro dang ldan pa dag dang /_de'i nyen kor na skyu ru ra'i tshal dang /_bil ba'i tshal dang /_ka pid tha'i tshal nas de dag gi 'bras bu lhags pa kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed/_lhag ma yod na dge slong 
[\[286a.5\]]rnams la yang bgo bsha' byed do/_/shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod du yang song /_byang gi sgra mi snyan du yang song ste/_ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed lhag ma yod na dge slong 
[\[286a.6\]]rnams la yang bgo bsha' byed do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song ste lha'i bdud rtsi dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed/_lhag ma yod na dge slong 
[\[286a.7\]]dag la yang bgo bsha' byed do/_/yul gang dag 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba de dag tu yang song ste bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang ba bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed/_lhag ma 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' byed do/_/de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te/_da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas bsod snyoms rnyed par dka' ba byung ste/_'di na dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul thob pa de dag ni gang gi ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar shes pa'i 
[\[286b.2\]]shing 'dzam bu de las 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu lhags pa/_kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa dag dang /_de'i nyen kor na skyu ru ra'i tshal dang /_bil ba'i tshal dang /_ka pid tha'i tshal nas de dag gi 'bras bu lhags pa kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas 
[\[286b.3\]]bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed/_lhag ma yod na dge slong rnams la yang bgo bsha' byed/_shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod du yang song /_byang gi sgra mi snyan du yang song ste/_ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas 
[\[286b.4\]]bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed/_lhag ma yod na dge slong rnams la yang bgo bsha' byed/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song ste/_lha'i bdud rtsi dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag 
[\[286b.5\]]nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed/_lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' byed/_yul gang dag 'byor pa rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba de dag tu yang song ste bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang ba bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag 
[\[286b.6\]]nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed/_lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' byed kyis/_bdag gis kyang gal te rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur na bdag gis kyang gang gi ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar shes pa'i shing 'dzam bu de las 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu lhags pa kha 
[\[286b.7\]]dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa dag dang /_de'i nyen kor na skyu ru ra'i tshal dang /_bil ba'i tshal dang /_ka pid tha'i tshal nas de dag gi 'bras bu lhags pa kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyad par bya/_lhag 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]ma yod na dge slong rnams la yang bgo bsha' bya/_shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod du yang song /_byang gi sgra mi snyan du yang song ste/_ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs 
[\[287a.2\]]su longs spyad par bya/_lhag ma yod na dge slong rnams la yang bgo bsha' bya/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song ste/_lha'i bdud rtsi dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag 
[\[287a.3\]]nyid kyang yongs su longs spyad par bya/_lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya/_yul gang dag 'byor pa rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba de dag tu song ste bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang ba bsod pa dag gis lhung 
[\[287a.4\]]bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyad par bya/_lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya na/_de'i phyir bdag nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par nus pa su yod snyam mo/_/de nas lhas byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste 
[\[287a.5\]]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la lhas byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam 
[\[287a.6\]]bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar thugs su chud nas/_lhas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gau ta ma'i bu khyod kyis lhag pa'i tshul khrims la mngon par brtson par gyis 
[\[287a.7\]]shig dang /_khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gau ta ma'i bu khyod kyis lhag pa'i sems dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab la mngon par brtson par gyis shig dang /_khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lhas byin 'di 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam mi ston to snyam du rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya ga la ba der 
[\[287b.2\]]song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan gyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan du gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la yang rnam par bltas/_lhas 
[\[287b.3\]]byin la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar yang rig nas lhas byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lhas byin khyod kyis gzugs tshul bzhin yid la gyis shig dang /_khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang /_gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lhas byin khyod 
[\[287b.4\]]kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa tshul bzhin yid la gyis shig dang /_khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang /_gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas brtan kun shes kauN+Di n+ya 
[\[287b.5\]]yang bdag la/_rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par mi byed do snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_bzang po dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa 
[\[287b.6\]]gnas brtan lnga brgya po dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_gnas brtan lnga brgya po dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan dag gis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan du gsol/_de nas gnas brtan lnga brgya po dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong 
[\[287b.7\]]gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi thugs yid la rnam par bltas/_lhas byin la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar yang rig nas lhas byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lhas byin khyod kyis gzugs tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang /_khyod 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]la rdzu 'phrul dang /_gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lhas byin khyod kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang /_khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang /_gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[288a.2\]]ro/_/de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas brtan lnga brgya po dag kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam mi ston te/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag gis sngar bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par 'gros par gyur pas des na 'ga' yang bdag la rdzu 
[\[288a.3\]]'phrul gyi lam ston par mi byed na bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par nus pa gzhan su yod snyam mo/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa rgyal po'i khab na sde can ma'i phug na 'dug go/_/de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas brtan 'od 
[\[288a.4\]]srung stobs bcu pa 'di ni yun ring po nas g.yo med pa/_sgyu med pa/_drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can bdag gi phu nu po rgan pa kun dga' bo'i mkhan po yin pas gnas brtan 'od srung stobs bcu pas bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par nus so snyam du rig nas/_
[\[288a.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs 
[\[288a.6\]]bcu pa la lhas byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan gyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan du gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pas/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi thugs 
[\[288a.7\]]yid dang /_lhas byin la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung ba la/_rnam par ma ltas par lhas byin la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan to/_/de nas lhas byin gyis nam gyi cha stod dang /_nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]brtson pas/_spyod cing bsam gtan dang po la brten nas/_'jig rten pa'i lam gyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas de gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro/_/mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/shes pa dang /_mthong bas snang ba dang /_
[\[288b.2\]]mi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do/_/ngos kyi rtsig pa dang /_ngos kyi ra ba dang /_ri la yang lus kyis mi thogs par 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /_byi'u zul byed de/_dper na chu la 
[\[288b.3\]]bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang mi nub par rgyun phyogs su 'gro ste/_dper na sa chen po la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/du ba 'thul bar yang byed/_'bar bar yang byed de/_dper na 
[\[288b.4\]]me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/_/lus las chu'i rgyun chen po 'byin te/_dper na sprin chen po bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang /_zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang lag pas nom zhing nyug par 
[\[288b.5\]]byed do/_/de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la gang gi ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar shes pa'i shing 'dzam bu de las 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu lhags pa/_kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa rnams dang /_de'i nyen kor na skyu ru ra'i tshal 
[\[288b.6\]]dang /_bil ba'i tshal dang /_ka pid tha'i tshal de las de dag gi 'bras bu lhags pa/_kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro dang ldan pa rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas/_bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyad par bya/_lhag ma yod na dge slong 
[\[288b.7\]]dag la yang bgo bsha' bya ba dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod du yang song /_byang gi sgra mi snyan du yang song ste/_ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas/_bdag nyid kyang 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]yongs su longs spyad par bya/_lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song ste/_lha'i bdud 
[\[289a.2\]]rtsi dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas/_bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyad par bya/_lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya ba dang /_yul gang dag 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba de 
[\[289a.3\]]dag nas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang ba bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas/_bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyad par bya/_lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya bas ci zhig byas/_bdag gis ma ga d+hA'i zhing 'di na mi gtso 
[\[289a.4\]]bo gang yin pa/_rjes su 'jug par bya na/_ma ga d+hA'i zhing 'di na gang rjes su 'jug par byas na/_tshegs chung ngus skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyang rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i mi gtso bo rjes su 'jug par bya ba gang yod snyam mo/_/de nas lhas byin 'di snyam 
[\[289a.5\]]du sems te/_gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'di ni pha 'das nas/_pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la gnas par 'gyur ba yin gyis/_bdag gis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra rjes su 'jug par bya ste/_de rjes su zhugs pa na/_tshegs chung ngus skye bo phal po che'i 
[\[289a.6\]]tshogs kyang rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas lhas byin gyis glang po chen po mthu dang ldan pa'i bu rigs btsun par bsgyur nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgra'i khyim du sgo nas zhugs te/_sge'u cung nas phyir byung zhing sge'u cung nas zhugs te sgo nas phyir byung ngo /_/
[\[289a.7\]]rta mthu dang ldan pa'i bu rigs btsun par bsgyur nas sgo nas zhugs te sge'u cung nas phyir byung zhing /_sge'u chung nas zhugs te sgo nas phyir byung ngo /_/de nas dge slong mgo bregs pa snam sbyar gyon par bsgyur nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgra'i khyim du sgo nas zhugs te/_sge'u cung 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]nas phyir byung zhing /_sge'u cung nas zhugs te sgo nas phyir byung ba dang /_gzhon nu ma skyes dgras kyang kye ma 'di ni 'phags pa lhas byin yin no snyam du shes so/_/de nas lhas byin gyis skyes phran gzhon nu gser gyi 'og pag can du bsgyur nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgra'i pang pa na 
[\[289b.2\]]'gre bar byed/_ldog par byed cing gzhon nu ma skyes dgra yang de la 'khyud par byed/_kha sbyor bar byed/_kun tu 'khyud par byed cing /_de'i khar mchil ma yang ldugs par byed pa na yang 'di lta ste/_lhas byin rnyed pa dang /_bkur stis zil gyis gnon cing sems yongs su gtugs 
[\[289b.3\]]pas de yang mid par byed do/_/gzhon nu ma skyes dgras kyang kye ma 'di ni 'phags pa lhas byin yin no snyam du yang shes so/_/de na gzhon nu ma skyes dgras kye ma 'phags pa lhas byin ni ston pa bas kyang ches rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no snyam pa'i sdig pa can gyi lta ba rgya chen po thob 
[\[289b.4\]]par gyur cing de la dad par gyur nas dad pa'i ched du bya ba byed par gyur te nang par dang /_dgongs kar shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig 'byung zhing de la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de la snod du btsos pa lnga brgya tsam gyi zas kyi tshom bu tshom bu dag kyang 'bul bar byed do/_/lhas byin yang 
[\[289b.5\]]dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig zas kyi gral du bkad par byed do/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms 
[\[289b.6\]]rgyu bas lhas byin la rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra nang par dang /_dgongs kar shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig 'byung zhing de la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de la snod du btsos pa lnga brgya 
[\[289b.7\]]tsam gyi zas kyi tshom bu tshom bu dag kyang 'bul bar byed do/_/lhas byin yang dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig zas kyi gral du bkad par byed do zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms brgyus nas/_zas kyi bya ba byed de/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]snyoms las phyir log pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[290a.2\]]mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms 
[\[290a.3\]]la zhugs pa na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms rgyu bas lhas byin la rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra nang par dang /_dgongs kar shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang 
[\[290a.4\]]lhan cig byung zhing de la bsnyen bkur bgyid do/_/de la snod du bsgral ba lnga brgya tsam gyi zas kyi tshom bu tshom bu dag kyang 'bul bar bgyid do/_/lhas byin yang dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig zas kyi gral du bkad par bgyid do zhes thos so/_/dge slong dag khyed cag lhas byin 
[\[290a.5\]]gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti la dga' bar ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag lhas byin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gsod par 'gyur ba dang /_lhas byin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_dper na chu shing 
[\[290a.6\]]'bras bu rgyas pa ni gsod par 'gyur ba dang /_chu shing 'bras bu rgyas pa ni zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lhas byin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yang gsod par 'gyur ba dang /_lhas byin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na 'od ma 
[\[290a.7\]]dang /_'dam bu'i 'bras bu rgyas pa ni gsod par 'gyur ba dang /_'od ma dang /_'dam bu'i 'bras bu rgyas pa ni zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lhas byin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yang gsod par 'gyur ba dang /_lhas byin gyi rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti yang zil gyis 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gnon par 'gyur ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na dre'u mos mngal na gnas pa 'dzin pa ni gsod par 'gyur ba dang /_dre'u mos mngal na gnas pa 'dzin pa ni zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lhas byin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yang gsod par 'gyur ba dang /_lhas byin 
[\[290b.2\]]gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba yin no/_/dge slong dag lhas byin la ji tsam du rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti rnam pa de lta bu de 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni mi gti mug can de la yun ring por don med pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[290b.3\]]slong dag de lta bas na/_khyed kyis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti zil gyis mnan par bya zhing rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti byung bas sems yongs su gtugs shing gnas par mi bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[290b.4\]]de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/chu shing 'bras bus gsod par byed/_/'od ma'i 'dam bu 'bras bus gsod/_/dre'u mo rang gi mngal gyis ltar/_/mi ngan bkur 
[\[290b.5\]]stis gsod par byed/_/byis pa ji tsam grags gyur pa/_/don med nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/byis pa'i dkar cha gsod byed cing /_/rtse mo las kyang ltung bar 'gyur/_/de nas lhas byin rnyed pa dang /_bkur stis zil gyis non cing sems yongs su gtugs 
[\[290b.6\]]pa la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das ni rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pas 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la 'doms pas ngal bar 'gyur bas/_kye ma bcom ldan 
[\[290b.7\]]'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la btang bar gyur na bdag gis kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang bar bya zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyang tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas thugs las chung ngur gnas par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/sems bskyed 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]ma thag tu de'i rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams par gyur cing yongs su nyams kyang bdag yongs su nyams so snyam du mi shes par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kauN+Di n+ya'i bu dge slong nog can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa 
[\[291a.2\]]de tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag bsgoms nas/_'dod pa dag la 'dod pa la 'dun pa spangs te des mang du gnas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du las dang ris mthun pas skyes so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ngan spong gi bu dag na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 
[\[291a.3\]]'jigs rung gi tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na 'dug go/_/de nas tshangs pa nog can gyis lhas byin rdzu 'phrul de las yongs su nyams par rig nas 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag ngar bskums pa las rkyong ba'am/_brkyang ba las skum par byed pa de bzhin du 
[\[291a.4\]]tshangs pa nog can tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas ngan spong gi bu dag tu chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la tshangs pa nog 
[\[291a.5\]]can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/lhas byin rnyed pa dang bkur stis zil gyis gnon cing sems yongs su gtugs pa la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das ni rgan po rgas pa dgog tu 
[\[291a.6\]]gyur pas 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la 'doms pas ngal bar 'gyur bas/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la btang bar gyur na bdag gis kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun drang bar bya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyang tshe 'di la bde bar 
[\[291a.7\]]gnas pa la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas thugs las chung ngur gnas par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems bskyed ma thag tu de'i rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams par gyur cing yongs su nyams kyang bdag yongs su nyams so snyam du mi shes par gyur gyis/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]bzhud de byon nas don de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol na legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/_/de nas tshangs pa nog can gyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[291b.2\]]po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can song nas ring po ma lon par rig nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/_'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag ngar bskums pa las rkyong ba'am/_brkyang ba las 
[\[291b.3\]]skum par byed pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ngan spong gi bu dag nas mi snang bar gyur cing rgyal po'i khab tu 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song 
[\[291b.4\]]ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de la tshangs pa nog can dang lhan cig bar du gtam brjod pa ci byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par 
[\[291b.5\]]gsol to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis ches sngar lhas byin gyis sems la sems kyis khyab par byas te rig nas de'i 'og tu tshangs pa nog can gyis ma brjod dam/_btsun pa de lags te/_bdag gis 
[\[291b.6\]]ches sngar lhas byin gyis sems la sems kyis khyab par bgyis te rig nas de'i 'og tu tshangs pa nog can gyis brjod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig bar du bka' mchid 'di gsung ba'i skabs su lhas byin grogs dge slong bzhi po ko ka li ka dang /_
[\[291b.7\]]khaN+Da dra ba bya dang /_ka ta mo ra ka ti Sh+ya dang /_rgya mtshos byin dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu lhas byin de 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]'ong zhing da mi gti mug can de nga'i mdun du bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lung ston par byed kyis da tshig srungs shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/_'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu stobs 
[\[292a.2\]]dang ldan pas lag ngar bskums pa las rkyong ba'am/_brkyang ba las skum par byed pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas nas mi snang bar gyur cing ngan spong gi bu dag tu chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su gnas par 
[\[292a.3\]]gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas lhas byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lhas byin gyis 'di skad ces 
[\[292a.4\]]gsol to/_/da ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bgres po bgres pa/_dgog tu gyur pas 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la 'doms pas mnyel bar 'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la btang na legs te/_
[\[292a.5\]]bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang bar bgyi zhing bcom ldan 'das kyang tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas thugs las chung ngur gnas par 'gyur ro/_/mi gti mug can shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa des pa des pa dag la yang nga re 
[\[292a.6\]]zhig dge slong gi dge 'dun gtong bar mi byed na/_ro 'dra ba mchil ma za ba khyod la gtong re skan/_de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /_bdag la ro dang 'dra ba/_mchil ma za ba zhes brjod pas 
[\[292a.7\]]kun du spyad do snyam nas/_de na lhas byin gyis de'i dang por bcom ldan 'das la kun nas mnar sems dang /_mi bzod pa dang /_yid mi ches pa byas par gyur to/_/de nas lhas byin gyis sdod cig ces brjod de mgo lan gsum lcogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //_//
